1a1(mdo sde): @#/ /mdo ha pa bzhugs so//
1b1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pUr+Na pra mu kha a ba dA na sha ti ka/ bod skad du/
1b2(mdo sde): gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po dang po/ thams cad
1b3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdom ni/ gang po bzang dang grags ldan ma/ /le lo
1b4(mdo sde): can dang tshong pa rnams/ /zla ba che ba pad+ma dang / /pany+tsa la dang bdug pa dang / /rgyal
2a1(mdo sde): po mjug tu smos pa ste/ /'di ni sde tshan bsdus pa yin/ /ljongs shig tu bram ze gang po
2a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams
2a3(mdo sde): dang | phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang /
2a4(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams
2a5(mdo sde): dang | mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/
2b1(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
2b2(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing / shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
2b3(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ sangs rgyas gsar du byung ste/ gsung rab kyi snying khu 'thung
2b4(mdo sde): ba'i dus la bab cing / lha dang / mi man chad la yang dag par rab tu ston pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab
2b5(mdo sde): na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
2b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par 'jig rten thams cad du grags pas yongs su gang ngo / /de nas lho phyogs kyi ri bo zhes bya ba'i
3a1(mdo sde): ljongs na/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po zhes bya ba/ phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa
3a2(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas so/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la/
3a3(mdo sde): dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/
3a4(mdo sde): gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ des re zhig na
3a5(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba thams cad la mchod sbyin byas nas/ der mu stegs can la sogs pa stong phrag du mas zas zos so/ /gang gi tshe bcom
3a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pa btul nas/ de btul bas srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dul
3b1(mdo sde): bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i khab nas gang po'i nye du rnams lhags te/ gang po'i mdun du sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do/ /de nas bram ze che
3b2(mdo sde): zhing mtho ba gang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan thos nas/ dga' ba chen po thob par gyur to/ /de nas khang thog tu song nas rgyal po'i khab logs su kha bltas te 'dug nas
3b3(mdo sde): pus mo gnyis kyi lha nga sa la btsugs te/ me tog kyang gtor/ bdug pa dang / chu'ang phul nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi mchod sbyin
3b4(mdo sde): la gshegs su gsol/ mchod sbyin gyi mdun sa gzigs su gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me tog
3b5(mdo sde): de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du me tog gi khang par gyur te 'dug go / bdug pa ni sprin gyi mgo lta bur gyur to/ /chu ni bai DUR+ya'i sdong po lta bur gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
3b6(mdo sde): pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ spyan 'dren 'di ga las mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun
3b7(mdo sde): dga' bo/ lho phyogs kyi ri bo zhes bya ba'i ljongs na/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po zhes bya ba 'dug pa der/ 'u bu cag 'dong dgos kyi/ dge slong dag/ chos shig /de nas
4a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong gis zham 'bring byas nas lho phyogs kyi ri bo'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po'i mchod sbyin
4a2(mdo sde): gyi 'dun sa dang nye ba zhig tu gshegs nas/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas bram ze gang po rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis dad par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
4a3(mdo sde): dge slong stong po de dag mi snang bar mdzad de/ nyag gcig lhung bzed dang / chu snod phyag na bsnams nas gang po dang nye ba zhig tu gshegs so/ /de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba
4a4(mdo sde): gang pos/ bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang
4a5(mdo sde): gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang shin tu rings par bcom ldan 'das
4a6(mdo sde): kyi thad du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gshegs pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bzhugs su gsol/ bdag la phan gdags
4a7(mdo sde): pa'i slad du bshos gsol bar ci gnang zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te khyod kyis yongs su btang nas lhung bzed 'di'i nang du byin
4b1(mdo sde): cig| de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyas g.yog byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs 'khur ba dang / bshos dang / 'jams dang /
4b2(mdo sde): bldag pa dang / bzhib pa la sogs pas/ lhung bzed 'gengs par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nyid kyi lhung bzed kyi nang nas dge slong gi lhung bzed dag gi nang du zas de
4b3(mdo sde): dag 'pho bar mdzad do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong gi lhung bzed rnams gang bar thugs su chud pa de'i tshe/ nyid kyi lhung bzed gang bar bstan to/ /de nas
4b4(mdo sde): dge slong stong lhung bzed gang bzla ba tshes pa'i dbyibs lta bur 'khod pa bstan to/ /nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong stong gi lhung
4b5(mdo sde): bzed rnams gang bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /de nas cho 'phrul bstan pa des bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po dga' bar gyur nas/ dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga'
4b6(mdo sde): ste yid rangs shing dga' ba dang / yid bde bar gyur te/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i
4b7(mdo sde): rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin pa bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma brgal ba
5a1(mdo sde): rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs
5a2(mdo sde): su mya ngan las zla ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig
5a3(mdo sde): nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon
5a4(mdo sde): po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams 'byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can
5a5(mdo sde): dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / du 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang /
5a6(mdo sde): chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha
5a7(mdo sde): ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /de nas
5b1(mdo sde): sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam
5b2(mdo sde): snyam mo| |de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed pa mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ ci/ bdag cag ni 'di
5b3(mdo sde): nas kyang shi 'phos par kyang ma gyur la/ gzhan du'ang ma skyes mdo kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams
5b4(mdo sde): rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang / mi rnams
5b5(mdo sde): kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nyid mtshams 'dzin par gyur to/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /
5b6(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams
5b7(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams
6a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang /
6a2(mdo sde): mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug
6a3(mdo sde): bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung bar brtsams par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan
6a4(mdo sde): la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye
6a5(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
6a6(mdo sde): khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin du 'brangs te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das
6a7(mdo sde): kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar
6b1(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung
6b2(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur
6b3(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi
6b4(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang
6b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i
6b6(mdo sde): gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur
6b7(mdo sde): to| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de
7a1(mdo sde): yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags
7a2(mdo sde): dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum
7a3(mdo sde): mi ston| |brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /
7a4(mdo sde): bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi
7a5(mdo sde): don du dga' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal cher nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de
7a6(mdo sde): ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga'
7a7(mdo sde): po| bram ze che zhing mtho ba 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba 'dis dge ba'i
7b1(mdo sde): rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par
7b2(mdo sde): bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye
7b3(mdo sde): bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po bzang zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin
7b4(mdo sde): par byas pa'i chos ni/ gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang bo bla na med pa yang dag par
7b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ gang pos bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du mchod sbyin gyis 'dun sar bshos gsol te/
7b6(mdo sde): lhag par yang des dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag yang dag par bskyed do/ /dge slong dag/ de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri
7b7(mdo sde): mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /
8a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //
8a2(mdo sde): grags ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong
8a3(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams
8a4(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
8a5(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas
8a6(mdo sde): dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa
8a7(mdo sde): brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis
8b1(mdo sde): zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /yangs pa can du mthar gyis bsod snyoms la gshegs nas/
8b2(mdo sde): dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas dmag dpon seng ge'i mna' ma grags ldan ma zhes bya ba gzugs
8b3(mdo sde): bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod pa des/ bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan dang / dpe byad rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar ba dang ldan pa mthong nas shin tu dga' ba thob par gyur to/ /
8b4(mdo sde): des gyos po la dris pa/ bdag kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa'i thabs 'ga' lta mchis sam/ de nas dmag dpon seng ge 'di snyam du sems te /kye ma/ bu mo 'di
8b5(mdo sde): ni rgya chen po la mos pa zhig ste/ gal te 'di rkyen dang phrad na ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas smras pa/ bu mo/
8b6(mdo sde): gal te rgyu yang dag par blangs te 'dug na ni/ khyod kyang bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de nas dmag dpon seng ge grags ldan ma'i dad pa 'phel bar bya ba'i
8b7(mdo sde): phyir dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che mang du byin no/ /de nas grags ldan mas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ phyi de nyin khyim gyi nang du gdugs
9a1(mdo sde): tshod la spyan drangs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la phan gdags pa'i phyir gnang ngo / /de nas bu mo grags ldan mas gser dang / dngul dang / rin po
9a2(mdo sde): che'i me tog rnams kyang byed du bcug / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa mang po dag kyang bsags/ zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'ang bshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
9a3(mdo sde): 'phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su
9a4(mdo sde): gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim ga
9a5(mdo sde): la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas bu mo grags ldan mas/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
9a6(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis gtor to/ /de
9a7(mdo sde): nas me tog de dag / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du rin po che'i khang pa dang / khang pa
9b1(mdo sde): brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyal mtshan can/ mgar ba'am/ mgar ba'i slob ma legs par lobs pas kyang byed mi nus pa de lta bur gyur te 'dug go /de nas bu mo grags ldan mas lha
9b2(mdo sde): dang / mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba de mthong nas/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du lus thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas
9b3(mdo sde): smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med
9b4(mdo sde): par sems can ma brgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams
9b5(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bu mo grags ldan ma'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas
9b6(mdo sde): gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe de'i zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /
9b7(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos
10a1(mdo sde): dang | thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu
10a2(mdo sde): bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i
10a3(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de
10a4(mdo sde): dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas 'di dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes snyam mo/ /de
10a5(mdo sde): nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi
10a6(mdo sde): 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar
10a7(mdo sde): gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las da zad de lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du gang
10b1(mdo sde): du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nyid mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
10b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na
10b3(mdo sde): 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang
10b4(mdo sde): dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang /
10b5(mdo sde): shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su
10b6(mdo sde): bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni
10b7(mdo sde): gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod
11a1(mdo sde): par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal
11a2(mdo sde): te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na
11a3(mdo sde): ni| mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar
11a4(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye
11a5(mdo sde): bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil
11a6(mdo sde): du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par
11a7(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung
11b1(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur
11b2(mdo sde): ro| |de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
11b3(mdo sde): dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu
11b4(mdo sde): snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi
11b5(mdo sde): dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis pa/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge
11b6(mdo sde): sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni
11b7(mdo sde): ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal cher
12a1(mdo sde): nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa
12a2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ bu mo grags ldan ma 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i
12a3(mdo sde): bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ bu mo grags ldan ma 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos
12a4(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ skal ba grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i
12a5(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang
12a6(mdo sde): ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems
12a7(mdo sde): mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
12b1(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do/ / //le lo can zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho
12b2(mdo sde): brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding
12b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin
12b4(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang /
12b5(mdo sde): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
12b6(mdo sde): tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa
12b7(mdo sde): yangs zhing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan
13a1(mdo sde): cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod kyang / bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med nas/ de lag pa la skom tshugs
13a2(mdo sde): bcas te/ bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bdag la bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po
13a3(mdo sde): dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /de nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / ltas mkhan dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / rtsa lag gzhan dag gis
13a4(mdo sde): lha la gsol ba thob cig ces de la bsgo'o/ /'jig rten na'ang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de'ang de lta ni ma
13a5(mdo sde): yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang / bu mor skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la'ang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i
13a6(mdo sde): rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla
13a7(mdo sde): mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur na/ 'on kyang dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams dang / ltas mkhan rnams
13b1(mdo sde): dang | mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / rtsa lag rnams kyis de la mtho btsams nas/ de bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la
13b2(mdo sde): sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la'ang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i
13b3(mdo sde): lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos mthun pa pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la'ang gsol ba 'debs te/ de'ang gsol ba 'debs pa
13b4(mdo sde): lhur byed cing 'dug la/ sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig nas shi 'phos te/ de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs so/ /bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni/ thun
13b5(mdo sde): mong ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa chags pa'ang shes la/ ma chags pa 'ang shes pa dang / dus kyang shes la zla mtshan yang shes pa dang / bu chags pa
13b6(mdo sde): shes pa dang / gang las bu chags pa shes pa dang / khye'u'ang shes la bu mo'ang shes pa ste/ gal te khye'u yin na ni/ lto g.yas logs na rten cing gnas so/ /gal te bu
13b7(mdo sde): mo yin na ni/ lto g.yon logs su rten cing gnas so/ /de nas de dga' ches nas khyim bdag la sbran pa/ jo bo/ bdag la sras chags te/ bdag gi rum g.yas logs na
14a1(mdo sde): rten cing gnas pa las na/ khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyi dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas nas/ de'ang dga' ches ste ro stod ni bteg/ lag pa g.yas
14a2(mdo sde): pa ni brkyang nas bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo / /bdag gi bu rung bar shog cig /mi rung bar ma gyur cig /bdag gi bya ba dag byed par
14a3(mdo sde): shog cig / gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog cig /nor skal la spyod par shog cig /bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog cig /bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i
14a4(mdo sde): 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung / nyung yang rung ste/ sbyin pa dag sbyin la bsod nams dag byas nas/ de gnyis gang dang / gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di
14a5(mdo sde): song zhig ces yon bsngo bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/ /des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzang kyi steng du nyam rangs su bzhag
14a6(mdo sde): ste| grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang / tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang / ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang
14a7(mdo sde): sgyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang lan tshwa che ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams
14b1(mdo sde): te/ kha ba dang / sgyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing / do shal dang / se mo dos lus rnams par klubs te/ lha'i bu mo
14b2(mdo sde): dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang / khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra
14b3(mdo sde): skad ci'ang mi thos par byas so/ /de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas/ de btsas pa'i tshe khyim gang
14b4(mdo sde): gi mi thams cad dga' bar gyur te/ de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di btsas ban
14b5(mdo sde): khyim gang gi mi thams cad dga' bar gyur pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dga' byed ces gdags so zhes zer nas/ de'i ming dga' byed ces btags so/ /de nas khye'u
14b6(mdo sde): dga' byed pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma
14b7(mdo sde): brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma
15a1(mdo sde): bzhin du skyed cher drag par gyur to/ /de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes te lo lnga'am drug lon pa de'i tshe/ le lo can mchog tu le lo che ba zhig tu gyur te/
15a2(mdo sde): mal dang / stan las kyang ldang mi 'dod do/ /de blo rno zhing gsal bas khyim gyi nang du 'dug bzhin du bstan bcos rnams bslabs so/ /de nas tshong dpon de 'di snyam du sems
15a3(mdo sde): te| bdag gis lha mnyes par byas nas/ brgya lam na lan gcig na bu skyes pa de'ang le lo can mchog tu le lo che ba zhig tu gyur te/ mal dang / stan las kyang mi ldang na/
15a4(mdo sde): 'di ltar lus tha mal par gyur kyang grum po bzhin du lda re 'dug pa 'di 'dra ba'i bu lta ci dgos snyam mo/ /tshong dpon de'ang rdzogs byed la dga' ste/ des mu stegs
15a5(mdo sde): can gyi ston pa drug rang gi khyim du bos nas/ gal te khye'u 'dis de dag mthong na zhe sa bskyed de/ mal nas ldang ba tsam yang byed srid dam snyam pa dang / de nas khye'u le
15a6(mdo sde): lo can gyis ston pa de dag mthong nas mig gis kyang ma bltas na/ ldang ba'am/ gus par smra ba'am/ stan bstabs pa lta ci smos/ de nas tshong dpon des gnas
15a7(mdo sde): skabs de lta bu mthong nas/ ches rab tu gdung bar gyur te/ lag pa la skom tshugs bcas te sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan
15b1(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyis mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci'ang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig
15b2(mdo sde): rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dan/ lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum
15b3(mdo sde): snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil
15b4(mdo sde): shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs
15b5(mdo sde): pa| yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par
15b6(mdo sde): bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs
15b7(mdo sde): bca'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus
16a1(mdo sde): gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug /su ni nyam nga bar
16a2(mdo sde): gyur| su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang / nyam nga ba dang / gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas
16a3(mdo sde): ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor
16a4(mdo sde): bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
16a5(mdo sde): rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho
16a6(mdo sde): chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
16a7(mdo sde): kyis khye'u le lo can gyis nga mthong na brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du sems yongs su 'gyur bar 'ong ngo
16b1(mdo sde): snyam du gzigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mu stegs can rnams kyi rgyags pa dang / dregs pa gcad pa dang / khye'u'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ 'od zer gser gyi
16b2(mdo sde): kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od zer bas lhag pa dag bkye ste/ de dag gis khyim de kun tu snang bar byas so/ /bskal pa stong du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag
16b3(mdo sde): kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu rab tu sim par gyur nas/ su'i mthus bdag gi lus rab tu sim par byas snyam ste/ des phan tshun du bltas so/ /
16b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ khyim de'i nang du gshegs nas khye'u le lo can gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i
16b5(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin
16b6(mdo sde): po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' bar gyur te/ 'phral la rang nyid langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams
16b7(mdo sde): te| bcom ldan 'das/ tshur gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das/ gshegs pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol zhes de skad kyang
17a1(mdo sde): smras so/ /de nas de'i pa ma dang / nang mi rnams kyis sngon ma mthong pa'i gus par sgrim pa mthong nas/ mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/ /de nas khye'u le
17a2(mdo sde): lo can dga' zhing mdangs phyung ba'i mig dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das
17a3(mdo sde): kyis de la le lo'i nyes pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phan yon rnam pa du ma bka' stsal nas/ tsan dan gyi dbyug gu zhig kyang de la byin te/ khye'u/ dbyug gu 'di rdungs
17a4(mdo sde): shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas des dbyug gu de brdungs pa dang sgra snyan pa thos par gyur la rin po che'i gter sna tshogs kyang mthong ngo / /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/
17a5(mdo sde): kye ma/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa la ni khyad par chen po de lta bu yod kyi bdag gis phyir zhing brtson 'grus brtsam par bya gor ma chag snyam nas/ des mnyan du yod par dril gyis
17a6(mdo sde): sgra bsgrags te/ bdag nyid kyis ded dpon bya bar bsgrags nas rgya mtsho chen po la lan drug brgal te/ gru'i don grub pas rin po che chen po bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das
17a7(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan
17b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis khye'u le lo can gyi rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
17b2(mdo sde): rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng
17b3(mdo sde): 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab
17b4(mdo sde): tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas
17b5(mdo sde): pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de
17b6(mdo sde): dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ ci/ bdag cag 'di nas
17b7(mdo sde): shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas
18a1(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ kyai/ bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos bar ma gyur la/ gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba
18a2(mdo sde): 'di'i mthus bdag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa de la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba
18a3(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nyid mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba
18a4(mdo sde): gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang /
18a5(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med
18a6(mdo sde): 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams
18a7(mdo sde): dang | 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song
18b1(mdo sde): nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /
18b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ bag yod spyod par byed pa
18b3(mdo sde): ni| |skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
18b4(mdo sde): khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam
18b5(mdo sde): logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzheng
18b6(mdo sde): na ni| zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par
18b7(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
19a1(mdo sde): rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/
19a2(mdo sde): phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na
19a3(mdo sde): ni| zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag
19a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
19a5(mdo sde): ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon
19a6(mdo sde): sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//
19a7(mdo sde): yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams
19b1(mdo sde): ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams//
19b2(mdo sde): thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog bstan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas
19b3(mdo sde): rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal cher nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/
19b4(mdo sde): de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun
19b5(mdo sde): dga' bo/ khye'u le lo can 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ khye'u le lo can 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems
19b6(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong pa 'dis/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying
19b7(mdo sde): rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum
20a1(mdo sde): dang | snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu rtsal dang shin tu ldan pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/
20a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge
20a3(mdo sde): slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po gnyis
20a4(mdo sde): pa| ded dpon zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong
20a5(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams
20a6(mdo sde): dang | lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang
20a7(mdo sde): mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
20b1(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas
20b2(mdo sde): sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ded dpon chen po zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du gru bub ste phyir 'ongs nas/ des lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar
20b3(mdo sde): du lha thams cad la gsol ba btab ste/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs na/ 'on kyang gru bub ste phyir 'ongs so/ /de nas de mi dga' ba chen po skyes nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/
20b4(mdo sde): bdag gis thabs gang gis nor bsdu bar bya ba'i thabs ci yod snyam mo/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni lha thams cad las kyang ches khyad
20b5(mdo sde): par du 'phags pa/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ thugs rje can/ bdag nyid chen po/ chos la gus pa/ skye dgu la mnyes gshin pa yin gyi/ da ni
20b6(mdo sde): bdag gis 'di la brten te/ yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs la/ gru'i don legs par grub ste phyir 'ongs nas/ nor phyed kyis 'di la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo/ /des de
20b7(mdo sde): ltar brtson 'grus byas te/ yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus rin po che'i gling du phyin nas/ rin po che chen po bsdus te bde ba dang / nye zho
21a1(mdo sde): med par bdag gi khyim du phyin to/ /de ngal bso nas snod bzlugs na/ des rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas chags pa chen po skyes te/ bdag gis
21a2(mdo sde): rin po che 'di lta bu dag/ dge sbyong gau ta ma la phyed ji ltar sbyin snyam du sems pa la zhugs te/ ma la/ bdag gis 'di rnams bdag gi chung ma'i lag tu zho'i bzhi cha gcig
21a3(mdo sde): tu btsongs la/ bcom ldan 'das la spos dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /des zho'i bzhi cha gcig gis a ka ru'i spos nyos nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song
21a4(mdo sde): ngo| |de nas shin tu ngo tsha bzhin du sgo khang du 'dug nas a ka rus bdugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis bdug pa de steng gi nam mkha' la yang dag par
21a5(mdo sde): 'phags te/ mnyan du yod pa thams cad khyab par gyur nas/ sprin chen po'i mgo ltar 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mdzad do/ /des lha
21a6(mdo sde): dang | mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba de mthong nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/ bdag gi sems la brgyad bkag nas/ gang bdag gis rin po che'i sgo
21a7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bslu ba 'di ni bdag gi cha ma yin no zhes byas so/ /de nas dad dpon des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi
21b1(mdo sde): nang du bshos la spyan drangs so/ /de nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas/ rin po che chen po dag gis gtor to/ /de nas rin po che de dag/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs
21b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ rin po che'i khang pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyal mtshan
21b3(mdo sde): can/ mgar ba'am/ mgar ba'i slob ma legs par lobs pas kyang byed mi nus pa de lta bur gyur te 'dug go/ de nas ded dpon des cho 'phrul de mthong nas ched kyis dga' ba
21b4(mdo sde): skyes te/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i
21b5(mdo sde): chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med pa/ sems can ma brgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba
21b6(mdo sde): dang | dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas
21b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis ded dpon de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
22a1(mdo sde): 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung
22a2(mdo sde): nas| kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / du
22a3(mdo sde): 'bod dang / du 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang /
22a4(mdo sde): ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang
22a5(mdo sde): ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di
22a6(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ kye/ ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par
22a7(mdo sde): mdzad do/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma
22b1(mdo sde): byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems
22b2(mdo sde): can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro
22b3(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang | 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan
22b4(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang /
22b5(mdo sde): 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang /
22b6(mdo sde): mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
22b7(mdo sde): dang | stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung bar brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar
23a1(mdo sde): gyis| |'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /
23a2(mdo sde): skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
23a3(mdo sde): bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs
23a4(mdo sde): su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na
23a5(mdo sde): ni| zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston
23a6(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los
23a7(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag
23b1(mdo sde): g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi
23b2(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
23b3(mdo sde): chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
23b4(mdo sde): kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /
23b5(mdo sde): mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang
23b6(mdo sde): bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog
23b7(mdo sde): lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog
24a1(mdo sde): brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams
24a2(mdo sde): gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal cher nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
24a3(mdo sde): bo| de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi
24a4(mdo sde): mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ ded dpon 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ ded dpon 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
24a5(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrubs par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs
24a6(mdo sde): te| snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar
24a7(mdo sde): gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de sbyin par
24b1(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur ba 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis
24b2(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams
24b3(mdo sde): dang | pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam
24b4(mdo sde): mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
24b5(mdo sde): dang | lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan
24b6(mdo sde): pa| na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal
24b7(mdo sde): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas mnyan du yod pa na tha ga pa zla ba zhes bya ba dbul zhing mchog tu dbul ba zhig
25a1(mdo sde): gnas so/ /de'ang las ji tsam zhig byed pa de tsam nye tshe'i zan rnyed par zad de/ des cung zad kyang gzhag tu med do/ /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/
25a2(mdo sde): bdag ni 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bsod nams ma byas par 'dir 'ongs pa/ 'dir yang dge ba mi byed pas/ 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu'ang bsod nams kyang ma byas/
25a3(mdo sde): dge ba'ang ma byas/ 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mgon skyabs kyang ma byas par 'gro dgos srid kyi/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la sna 'ga' zhig gis mchod par bya gor ma
25a4(mdo sde): chag snyam mo/ /de nas des khyim bdag gzhan zhig gi ras btags nas/ ras de las ras kyi tshar tshar khyer te srang du zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang /
25a5(mdo sde): chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
25a6(mdo sde): kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro
25a7(mdo sde): ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la phan gdags pa'i phyir nyid kyi
25b1(mdo sde): chos gos ral bar bstan to/ /de nas des ras kyi tshar tshar de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de'i mod la chos gos drubs par bstan to/ /de nas de
25b2(mdo sde): rgya cher dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te smon lam btab pa/ sbyin pa chung la zhing ni rgya che ste/ /mthu chen khyod nyid thugs su chud par bas/ /
25b3(mdo sde): sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis ni/ /bdag ni rgya cher grags pa'i sangs rgyas shog /sbyin pa 'di ni chung ngu lags kyis kyang / /bdag gi sems ni rab yangs dpag yas te/ /mi
25b4(mdo sde): dang lha mchog rgyal bas bzhes nas ni/ /sbyin pa chung yang 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni phyi mar zhi ba mthu che ba/ /rgya chen
25b5(mdo sde): grags pa mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /rang byung 'jig rten phan pa snying brtser ldan/ /tshar tshar bla ma zhes bya rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tha ga pa zla ba'i rgyu
25b6(mdo sde): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad
25b7(mdo sde): pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu
26a1(mdo sde): 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang /
26a2(mdo sde): tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa
26a3(mdo sde): dang | pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems
26a4(mdo sde): can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams ni rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam
26a5(mdo sde): du sems te/ kye/ ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa
26a6(mdo sde): 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/
26a7(mdo sde): 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems
26b1(mdo sde): mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams
26b2(mdo sde): 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi yi ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul
26b3(mdo sde): dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams
26b4(mdo sde): dang | tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams
26b5(mdo sde): skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar
26b6(mdo sde): du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba
26b7(mdo sde): brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di
27a1(mdo sde): nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas
27a2(mdo sde): 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das
27a3(mdo sde): pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang
27a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs
27a5(mdo sde): kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/
27a6(mdo sde): pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
27a7(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar
27b1(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin
27b2(mdo sde): mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
27b3(mdo sde): 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
27b4(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/
27b5(mdo sde): nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur
27b6(mdo sde): gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge
27b7(mdo sde): sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal
28a1(mdo sde): lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las
28a2(mdo sde): skye bo phal cher nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa
28a3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ tha ga pa zla ba 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti
28a4(mdo sde): byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ tha ga pa zla ba 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong
28a5(mdo sde): ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug
28a6(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par byas nas stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par
28a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshar tshar bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di
28b1(mdo sde): yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //che ba
28b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang /
28b3(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen
28b4(mdo sde): po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci
28b5(mdo sde): dang | lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan
28b6(mdo sde): dang | snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
28b7(mdo sde): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon gyi bu che ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas so/ /de yang khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa shas che ba zhig ste/ rdzogs byed la
29a1(mdo sde): sogs pa ston pa drug la mchod pa byed do/ /de phyis nad tshabs chen po zhig gis thebs te/ de sman pa dang / sman dang / nad g.yog med de/ shi la
29a2(mdo sde): thug nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ da ni bdag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i skyabs byed pa'am/ srog phangs pa sbyin par byed pa sangs rgyas ma yin pa gzhan su zhig yod
29a3(mdo sde): snyam mo/ /de nas de ltar bsams nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs
29a4(mdo sde): pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung
29a5(mdo sde): ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum
29a6(mdo sde): la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i
29a7(mdo sde): dngos po bzhi la yun ring nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par
29b1(mdo sde): spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi
29b2(mdo sde): yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/
29b3(mdo sde): phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du
29b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang / nyam nga ba dang /
29b5(mdo sde): gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan gsong du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag
29b6(mdo sde): par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug
29b7(mdo sde): par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam
30a1(mdo sde): par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go / 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /
30a2(mdo sde): gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon gyi bu che ba'i gnas skabs de gzigs nas/ 'od zer
30a3(mdo sde): gser gyi kha dog can/ nyi ma stong gi 'od las lhag pa dag bkye ste/ de dag gis khyim de kun tu snang bar byas so/ /bskal pa stong du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od
30a4(mdo sde): zer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu rab tu sim par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i sgo khang du gshegs nas/ sgo srung gi mis bcom
30a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das sgo nas bzhugs so zhes de la sbran to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu che ba dga' bar gyur te/ dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs phyin par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das/
30a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nang du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan
30a7(mdo sde): 'das nang du gshegs nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis che ba la bka' stsal pa/ che ba khyod la gnod pa ci zhig yod/
30b1(mdo sde): che bas gsol pa/ bdag la lus kyi gnod pa dang / sems kyi gnod pa mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis gdams ngag
30b2(mdo sde): bstan te/ 'di ni khyod kyi sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po yin no zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de/ kye ma/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ri spos kyi
30b3(mdo sde): ngad ldang las sman shi ri ka khyer te 'ongs na legs so snyam du dgongs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyed pa'i mod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ri spos kyi ngad ldang
30b4(mdo sde): las sman shi ri ka blangs te bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nyid kyi phyag tu bzhes nas che ba la byin te/ 'di ni khyod kyi lus kyi sdug bsngal tsha ba zhi
30b5(mdo sde): bar byed pa yin no zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas des lus dang / sems shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde ba thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to/ /sems dga'
30b6(mdo sde): bar gyur nas rgyal po gsal rgyal la bsnyad de/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol nas 'bum ri ba'i na bza' phul te/ me tog dang / spos
30b7(mdo sde): dang | me tog phreng thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa byas so/ /de nas sems la rtas par byas te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya
31a1(mdo sde): b a'i chos yongs su btang ba 'dis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal pos bdag gsos pa bzhin du bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
31a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing 'dren pa med par sems can ma brgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams 'byin pa dang /
31a3(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis che ba'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu
31a4(mdo sde): brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i
31a5(mdo sde): tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa
31a6(mdo sde): de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa
31a7(mdo sde): dang | chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar
31b1(mdo sde): gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gnag yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur
31b2(mdo sde): te 'bab bo/ /de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye tsa/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'bos sam/
31b3(mdo sde): 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems
31b4(mdo sde): te| kye| bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i
31b5(mdo sde): khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha
31b6(mdo sde): dang | mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba de nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
31b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs
32a1(mdo sde): ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal
32a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che
32a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong
32a4(mdo sde): pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam
32a5(mdo sde): bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug
32a6(mdo sde): bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid
32a7(mdo sde): kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i
32b1(mdo sde): las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs ki mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror
32b2(mdo sde): skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung
32b3(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//
32b4(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
32b5(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar
32b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
32b7(mdo sde): la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus
33a1(mdo sde): pa| tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar
33a2(mdo sde): bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub
33a3(mdo sde): rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis pa/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan par som nyi
33a4(mdo sde): 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /
33a5(mdo sde): mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan
33a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
