33a7(mdo sde): rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ tshong dpon gyi bu che ba 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /
33b1(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ tshong dpon gyi bu che ba 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub
33b2(mdo sde): par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma
33b3(mdo sde): 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i
33b4(mdo sde): sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan
33b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //pad+ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang /
33b6(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin
33b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu
34a1(mdo sde): dang | gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
34a2(mdo sde): 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
34a3(mdo sde): dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba'i snga rol
34a4(mdo sde): na ni rgyal po gsal rgyal lha gzhan dag la dus gsum du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa rnams kyis rjed par byed do/ /gang gi tshe bcom
34a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas ni/ gzhon nu lta bu'i mdo'i dpes rgyal po gsal rgyal btul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/ de'i tshe dga' ba dang /
34a6(mdo sde): yid bde ba skyes nas/ dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro zhing mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa rnams kyis
34a7(mdo sde): mchod pa byed do/ /de nas re zhig na kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma zhig gis me tog pad+ma gsar du byung ba zhig khyer te/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi thad du mnyan du yod par song ba
34b1(mdo sde): dang | mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen zhig gis mthong nas / kye/ mi pha gi pad+ma 'o ni 'tshong ngam zhes dris so/ /de na re/ 'tshong ngo zhes zer ro/ /de nyo 'dod pa las re zhig na khyim bdag
34b2(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin der phyin te/ des de las rin nyis 'gyur du bskyed nas/ de gnyis phan tshun ltod de 'bum 'gyur gyi bar du bskyed do/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma 'di
34b3(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di ni rgod bag can ma yin te/ sems can brtan po yin pas na/ 'di la ni don zhig yod gor ma chag snyam nas/ de the tshom
34b4(mdo sde): skyes te/ mu stegs can la dga' ba'i mi de la dris pa/ khyod kyis su'i don du 'di ltar skyed par byed/ des smras pa/ nga ni bcom ldan 'das sred med kyi bu'i phyir skyed par byed
34b5(mdo sde): do| |mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ nga ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi don du skyed par byed do/ /kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas smras pa/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de su yin/
34b6(mdo sde): de nas mgon med zas sbyin gyis de la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgyas par bshad do/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas/ mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/ khyim bdag /nga nyid
34b7(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das de la mchod par bya'o/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma de khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/
35a1(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma des/ bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus
35a2(mdo sde): mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu kun
35a3(mdo sde): dga' ra ba'i srung ma des pad+ma de bcom ldan 'das la bor ro/ /de nas bor ma thag tu pad+ma de shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng na 'dug go /de nas kun
35a4(mdo sde): dga' ra ba'i srung ma des cho 'phrul de mthong nas/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ sems la rtas par byas
35a5(mdo sde): nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bdag 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med cing yongs su
35a6(mdo sde): 'dren pa med par sems can ma brgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las
35a7(mdo sde): ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma de rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud
35b1(mdo sde): pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas
35b2(mdo sde): 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can
35b3(mdo sde): dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur
35b4(mdo sde): rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can
35b5(mdo sde): dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod
35b6(mdo sde): pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye| ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag
35b7(mdo sde): dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma
36a1(mdo sde): gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil
36a2(mdo sde): bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du
36a3(mdo sde): gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa
36a4(mdo sde): gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs
36a5(mdo sde): pa'i 'dun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad
36a6(mdo sde): med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang /
36a7(mdo sde): gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra
36b1(mdo sde): sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi
36b2(mdo sde): bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes
36b3(mdo sde): rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das
36b4(mdo sde): kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi
36b5(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs
36b6(mdo sde): kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo
36b7(mdo sde): gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur
37a1(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang
37a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi
37a3(mdo sde): mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de
37a4(mdo sde): dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar
37a5(mdo sde): te| bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gi spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma
37a6(mdo sde): shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag ni dam pa'i rgyur
37a7(mdo sde): gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge
37b1(mdo sde): sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta
37b2(mdo sde): bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams byin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal cher nyan par 'tshal/ /
37b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
37b4(mdo sde): rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ /kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags
37b5(mdo sde): so| |kun dga' bo/ kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal ba grangs med pa gsum gyis
37b6(mdo sde): yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang /
37b7(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/
38a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de
38a2(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //pany+tsa la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
38a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha
38a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir
38a5(mdo sde): byas| bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
38a6(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos
38a7(mdo sde): dang | sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
38b1(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe byang phyogs kyi pany+tsa la'i rgyal po lho phyogs kyi pany+tsa la'i rgyal po dang mi mthun par gyur to/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
38b2(mdo sde): song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
38b3(mdo sde): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi rgyal po bla na med pa sems can phongs pa rnams la yongs su skyob pa/ phan tshun 'khon pa rnams kyi 'khon
38b4(mdo sde): byang bar mdzad pa lags na/ byang phyogs kyi pany+tsa la'i rgyal po 'di/ lho phyogs kyi pany+tsa li'i rgyal po dang mi mthun te/ de gnyis phan tshun du skye bo mang po kha 'dog par bgyid na /
38b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du de gnyis yun ring po nas 'khon byung ba zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang
38b6(mdo sde): mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
38b7(mdo sde): phyag btsal nas stan las langs te song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i phyi de nyin gyi snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ wA ra NA si
39a1(mdo sde): phyogs kyi ka shi rnams kyi grong rdal ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / wA ra NA sir byon nas/ wA ra NA si na drang
39a2(mdo sde): srong smra ba'i ri dwags kyi nags na bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi yul du gshegs par rig go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu
39a3(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi stobs kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa sprul nas/ byang phyogs kyi pany+tsa la'i rgyal po skrag cing bred nas des shing rta gcig zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad
39a4(mdo sde): du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khon 'byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan to/ /des chos de thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa
39a5(mdo sde): dang | sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /lho phyogs kyi pany+tsa la'i rgyal pos kyang bcom ldan 'das
39a6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du spyan drangs te/ zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/ 'bum ri ba'i na bza' yang phul te smon lam
39a7(mdo sde): btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med
39b1(mdo sde): par sems can ma brgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams
39b2(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lho phyogs kyi pany+tsa la'i rgyal po de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las
39b3(mdo sde): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer
39b4(mdo sde): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal
39b5(mdo sde): ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol
39b6(mdo sde): dang | so thams thams dang / kye hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems
39b7(mdo sde): can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi
40a1(mdo sde): gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil par gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ /ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes
40a2(mdo sde): sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ bdag
40a3(mdo sde): cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams
40a4(mdo sde): rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang / mi rnams
40a5(mdo sde): kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /
40a6(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams
40a7(mdo sde): dang | tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams
40b1(mdo sde): dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom
40b2(mdo sde): snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong ba dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad
40b3(mdo sde): pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /
40b4(mdo sde): gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer
40b5(mdo sde): de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston
40b6(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems
40b7(mdo sde): can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur
41a1(mdo sde): ro| |yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su
41a2(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i
41a3(mdo sde): rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi
41a4(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur
41a5(mdo sde): ro| |bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
41a6(mdo sde): la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la
41a7(mdo sde): zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis
41b1(mdo sde): pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spang pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu
41b2(mdo sde): rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /
41b3(mdo sde): thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs
41b4(mdo sde): rgyas rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
41b5(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum
41b6(mdo sde): pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ pany+tsa la'i rgyal po 'dis/ nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ pany+tsa la'i rgyal po 'di
41b7(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang
42a1(mdo sde): dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
42a2(mdo sde): ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te 'jig rten du 'byung bar
42a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi
42a4(mdo sde): rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po gsum pa/ bdug pa
42a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas com ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded
42a6(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen
42a7(mdo sde): po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci
42b1(mdo sde): dang | lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang /
42b2(mdo sde): snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
42b3(mdo sde): na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon gnyis phan tshun mi mthun par gyur te/ de gnyis las gcig ni rdzogs byed la dang / gcig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
42b4(mdo sde): la dad do/ /de nas de gnyis phan tshun gtam du bya ba nges par byed de/ rdzogs byed kyi dge bsnyen na re/ sangs rgyas pas chos rdzogs byed khyad par du 'phags so zhes zer ro/ /sangs
42b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi dge bsnyen na re/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ches khyad par du 'phags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas de gnyis kyi bdog pa thams cad yal bar bya ba'i
42b6(mdo sde): skugs kyi gta' bzhag go / de nas re zhig na rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas bron po rnams la de gnyis kyi de sbyongs shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas blon po de dag gis yul thams
42b7(mdo sde): cad du dril bsgrags te/ da ste zhag bdun na sangs rgyas dang / mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen gnyis kyi sbyang bar chad kyi/ su rmad du byung ba lta 'dod pa de dag gshegs shig/
43a1(mdo sde): ces byas so/ /de nas zhag bdun lon pa na/ sa phyogs go skabs yangs pa zhig tu mi 'bum phrag du ma 'dus pa dang / nam mkha' la lha 'bum phrag du ma
43a2(mdo sde): 'dus pa'i nang du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/ spos dang / me tog phreng thams cad bsdogs pa la/ thog ma kho nar mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen gyis/ bden pas
43a3(mdo sde): gsol ba gdab pa byas te/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug mchog yin pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des na/ me tog 'di dag dang /
43a4(mdo sde): bdug pa 'di dang / chu 'di de rnams kyi thad du song zhig ces byas so/ /de skad ces brjod pa'i mdo la me tog de dag ni sa la lhags so/ /me ni shi'o/ /chu ni sa la thim zhing yongs
43a5(mdo sde): su zad de/ yongs su gtugs par gyur to/ /de nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis ca co dang / ga zha bton te skad po che phyung ngo / /de nas mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen gyis de mthong
43a6(mdo sde): nas| cang mi zer bar 'dug la/ spa gong zhing phrag pa bcum ste/ mig phab nas spobs pa med par gyur te/ sems khong du chung la lag pa la skom tshugs bcas nas 'khums shing
43a7(mdo sde): 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma dga' ches nas/ dga' zhing mdangs phyung ba'i mig dang ldan pas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
43b1(mdo sde): sa la btsugs nas/ bden pas gsol ba gdab pa byas te/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi mchog yin pa'i bden pa dang / bden
43b2(mdo sde): pa'i tshig des na/ me tog 'di dag dang / bdug pa 'di dang / chu 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi tha dad du song zhig ces byas so/ /de skad ces brjod pa'i mod la me tog de dag ni ngang
43b3(mdo sde): pa rgyus pa bzhin du nam mkha' la 'phags nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su kha ltas te song ngo / /bdug pa ni sprin gyi mdog lta bur gyur to/ /chu ni bai DUR+ya'i sdong bu lta bur
43b4(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de nas skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag gis cho 'phrul de mthong nas ca co dang / ga zha bton te skad po che phyung nas de dag song ba'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ste dong ngo / /de nas
43b5(mdo sde): me tog de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi steng na 'dug go/ bdug pa dang / chu ni spyan snga na 'dug go/ de nas skye bo phal po che de dag dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
43b6(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la mdo 'di bka' stsal to/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams/ 'di
43b7(mdo sde): gsum ni mchog tu gdags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang / chos mchog tu gdags pa dang / dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o/ /
44a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams/ sems can rkang med rnams sam/ rkang gnyis rnams sam/ rkang bzhi
44a2(mdo sde): rnams sam/ rkang mang rnams sam/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes rnams sam/ 'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes
44a3(mdo sde): yod pa yang ma yin/ 'du shes med pa yin pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par
44a4(mdo sde): bstan to/ /sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa
44a5(mdo sde): yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ bram ze dang khyim bdag
44a6(mdo sde): rnams/ 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/ de
44a7(mdo sde): dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par bstan to/ /chos la mngon par dga' ba su 'ang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/
44b1(mdo sde): mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa'ang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar
44b2(mdo sde): shes par bya ste/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams/ 'di ni chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ 'dus pa'am/ tshogs sam/ mang po'am
44b3(mdo sde): 'khor gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog yin par rig par bstan to/ /dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su'ang rung ba
44b4(mdo sde): de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang
44b5(mdo sde): du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams/ 'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi rnam
44b6(mdo sde): grangs 'di bstan pa na/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag gi nang nas/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rnams la dad pa rnyed do/ /kha cig gis ni
44b7(mdo sde): skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi blangs so/ /kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas phol mig lnga dang ldan pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig ste/ 'du
45a1(mdo sde): byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can du rtsad chod nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
45a2(mdo sde): te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen des kyang bcom ldan 'das la dad pa rnyed do/ /de nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la
45a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs
45a4(mdo sde): su 'dren pa med par sems can ma brgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las
45a5(mdo sde): ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig
45a6(mdo sde): tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid
45a7(mdo sde): de| de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba
45b1(mdo sde): gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / du 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang /
45b2(mdo sde): chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song
45b3(mdo sde): nas| tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na
45b4(mdo sde): sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes
45b5(mdo sde): sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ bdag cag ni
45b6(mdo sde): 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par
45b7(mdo sde): rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar gyur pa'i las de zad de/ lha dang / mi
46a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par gyur to/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen
46a2(mdo sde): bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /
46a3(mdo sde): tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang /
46a4(mdo sde): dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang /
46a5(mdo sde): mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang /
46a6(mdo sde): bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i
46a7(mdo sde): khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /
46b1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi
46b2(mdo sde): phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las
46b3(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror
46b4(mdo sde): skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir
46b5(mdo sde): skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil
46b6(mdo sde): du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed
46b7(mdo sde): na ni| lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed
47a1(mdo sde): na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du
47a2(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang
47a3(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna tshogs gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun
47a4(mdo sde): tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag
47a5(mdo sde): gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags
47a6(mdo sde): na| |dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gis ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gi the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho
47a7(mdo sde): dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen
47b1(mdo sde): nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
47b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/
47b3(mdo sde): btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bskal
47b4(mdo sde): pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par
47b5(mdo sde): byas nas stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi g.yo ba
47b6(mdo sde): zhes bya bar 'gyur te 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
47b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //rgyal po zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
48a1(mdo sde): 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
48a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
48a3(mdo sde): kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto
48a4(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gang na
48a5(mdo sde): dang | snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
48a6(mdo sde): gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /da'i tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra gnyis phan tshun mi mthun par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras
48a7(mdo sde): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta ba'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po
48b1(mdo sde): gsal rgyal dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangs so/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang / rgyal po ma skyes dgras dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta
48b2(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ bdag dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas des kyang dpung gi tshogs
48b3(mdo sde): yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta ba'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir
48b4(mdo sde): drangs so/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs thams
48b5(mdo sde): cad phrogs te/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal pham zhing skrag la rdugs te/ rab tu pham zhing rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur nas/ shing rta gcig pus mnyan du yod par song ste/
48b6(mdo sde): lan gsum gyi bar du'ang de ltar gyur to/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas/ lag pa la skom tshugs bcas te/ sems khong du chud
48b7(mdo sde): cing 'dug go / de nas mnyan du yod pa de na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam
49a1(mdo sde): thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa des/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ji ltar pham zhing skrag la rdugs te/ rab tu pham zhing rgyab kyis phyogs
49a2(mdo sde): par gyur nas shing rta gcig pus mnyan du yod par song ngo zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin pas/ rgyal po gsal rgyal
49a3(mdo sde): la rgyal bar gyur cig / sku tshe ring bar shog cig ces bstod nas/ smras pa/ lha| ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ lha| bdag gis ci tsam gyis na da dung yang lha ji ltar dgyes
49a4(mdo sde): dgur mdzad par 'gyur ba de tsam gyi gser lha la 'bul bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so/ /des de la gser gyi phung po chen po spungs te/ der mi 'dug pas kyang mi 'greng ba mi
49a5(mdo sde): mthong la/ 'greng bas kyang 'dug pa mi mthong ba zhig phul lo/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bdag nyid kyi yul du rtog chen gyi mi kun tu bkye ste/ mi de dag
49a6(mdo sde): ci zer ba nyon cig ces byas so/ /re zhig na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na rgan po gnyis shig phan tshun gtam zer te/ pad+ma'i ze ba zhes bya ba'i g.yul gyi dgra thabs yod
49a7(mdo sde): de| de la mi sngar ma gang yin pa de dag ni g.yul gyi gdong zan du gtong ngo / /'bring gang yin pa de dag ni bar du gzhog go /mi mchog tu dpa' ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyab
49b1(mdo sde): du gzhog go zhes zer ro/ /de nas de dag gis rgyal po la bsnyad de/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas/ de bzhin du dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas/
49b2(mdo sde): rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangs so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i glang po che'i tshogs thams
49b3(mdo sde): cad kyang phrogs/ rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs kyang phrogs so/ /lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgra'ang pham zhing skrag la rdugs
49b4(mdo sde): te| rab tu pham zhing rgyab kyi ltas par gyur nas gson por bzung ste/ shing rta gcig la bskyon nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
49b5(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol
49b6(mdo sde): to| |btsun pa/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di ni yun ring po nas bdag gi 'khon zla ma lags par 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / dgra zla ma lags par dgra bgyid pa lags mod kyi/ 'di
49b7(mdo sde): ni bdag gi grogs po'i bu lags pa'i slad du/ bdag ni 'di dgum par mi 'tshal te 'di gtang bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rgyal po chen po
50a1(mdo sde): thongs shig ces bka' stsal nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rgyal par gyur na 'khon pa mang / /pham par gyur na sdug bsngal gnas/ /
50a2(mdo sde): rgyal dang pham pa spangs na ni/ /nye bar zhi ste bde bar gnas/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rgyal srid thob pa 'di ni tshong dpon
50a3(mdo sde): 'di'i drin yin gyi/ bdag gis 'di la ci 'dod pa'i bya dga' sbyin pa'i skabs dbye'o snyam mo/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis tshong dpon de la ci 'dod pa'i bya
50a4(mdo sde): dga' sbyin pa'i skabs phye na/ de na re/ bdag ci dga' ba'i bya dga' 'tshal gyi/ bdag zhag bdun gyi bar du ci dga' dgur bgyid pa'i rgyal srid stsol cig ces byas so/ /
50a5(mdo sde): de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bdag gi yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te/ nga'i rgyal srid zhag bdun gyi bar du tshong dpon la byin no zhes bsgo'o/ /re zhig na
50a6(mdo sde): tshong dpon des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa zhag bdun gyi bar du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/ /
50a7(mdo sde): yul ko shi dang / ko sa la na skye bo'i tshogs ji snyed 'khod pa de dag la'ang pho nya btang ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du khyed khral thud med par ci dga' dgur 'khod cig /bde
50b1(mdo sde): pa la reg par gnas par gyis shig / 'dir yang shog la/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhig /nga'i ston mo'ang tshol la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
50b2(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur gyis shig ces byas nas/ des zhag bdun gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bkur sti chen pos bkur sti byas so/ /mi 'bum phrag
50b3(mdo sde): mang po dag kyang bad ba la btsud do/ /zhag bdun lon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ sems la ltas par byas nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
50b4(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma brgal ba rnams sgrol
50b5(mdo sde): ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs
50b6(mdo sde): rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum
50b7(mdo sde): pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
51a1(mdo sde): dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig
51a2(mdo sde): nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams
51a3(mdo sde): dang | kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa
51a4(mdo sde): de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par
51a5(mdo sde): rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed
51a6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/
51a7(mdo sde): gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de
51b1(mdo sde): dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar
51b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga'
51b3(mdo sde): ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /
51b4(mdo sde): 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod
51b5(mdo sde): nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar
51b6(mdo sde): du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /
51b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byad pa ni/ /
52a1(mdo sde): skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
52a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das
52a3(mdo sde): kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par
52a4(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston
52a5(mdo sde): bar bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur pa'i
52a6(mdo sde): rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil
52a7(mdo sde): du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur
52b1(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed
52b2(mdo sde): na ni| dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang
52b3(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /
52b4(mdo sde): de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis ba bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /
52b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /bstan pos nyid kyi blo yis
52b6(mdo sde): dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal
52b7(mdo sde): bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod
53a1(mdo sde): las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin
53a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ tshong dpon 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa nyan
53a3(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa dang / skye bo phal po che dge ba la btsud pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ tshong dpon 'di
53a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub
53a5(mdo sde): yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres
53a6(mdo sde): pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar
53a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de
53b1(mdo sde): dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa rjod pa brgya ba las/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang po rdzogs so// //
53b2(mdo sde): sdom ni/ mnyan pa dang ni ka pa khrus/ /yams kyi nad dang cho 'phrul dang / /lo lnga pa dang bstod mchog sbyin/ /ka shi ka dang lha yi zas/ /mnyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
53b3(mdo sde): la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams
53b4(mdo sde): dang | gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/
53b5(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
53b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi
53b7(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na chu klung khang ldan gyi 'jug ngogs mnyan pa'i grong na bzhugs so/ /de nas mnyan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags
54a1(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas mnyan pa de dag la
54a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/ /chos
54a3(mdo sde): kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar
54a4(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ /de nas mnyan pa de dag stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de
54a5(mdo sde): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du bdag cag
54a6(mdo sde): gi der sang gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / gru zam las kyang bsgral bar 'chel lo zhes gsol na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mnyan pa rnams la cang mi gsung
54a7(mdo sde): bas gnang ngo / /de nas mnyan pa de dag gis chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas te/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng / me tog sna
54b1(mdo sde): tshogs ni gtor/ spos kyi snod dag gi nang nas ni bdug pa gsol/ zhal zas bzang po ni bshams/ me tog mang po ni sta gon byas so/ /gru zam gyi steng yang me tog gi khang pa dag gis
54b2(mdo sde): brgyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis bdugs tshod bskul ba/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs
54b3(mdo sde): te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas mnyan pa'i grong khyer
54b4(mdo sde): ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas mnyan pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge
54b5(mdo sde): 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/ /rang gi lag nas bza' ba
54b6(mdo sde): dang | bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin to/ gsang sder ni gyu/ phyag ni bcabs
54b7(mdo sde): par rig nas stan ches dma' ba dag khyer te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan pa de dag gi bsam pa dang /
55a1(mdo sde): bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos pas
55a2(mdo sde): mnyan pa du mas ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /kha cig gis
55a3(mdo sde): ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
55a4(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /'khor de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la
55a5(mdo sde): 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do/ /de nas mnyan pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas gru zam
55a6(mdo sde): las bsgral to/ /dge slong dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa mthong bas sems dga' bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa
55a7(mdo sde): ba 'di dag gang du mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub
55b1(mdo sde): pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/ /dge slong
55b2(mdo sde): dag| khyed nyan par 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par
55b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/
55b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shing rta skal ldan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong gis zham ring byas te ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ gang+gA'i 'gram
55b5(mdo sde): du byon nas/ de'i che ded dpon zhig 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang gang+gA'i klung las 'gron po dag sgrol zhing 'dug go/ phyogs de na cho ma rkun gyi 'jigs pa chen po'ang yod do/ /de nas dad
55b6(mdo sde): dpon gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shing rta skal ldan dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong gi zham ring byas pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang sems dga' bar gyur te/ sems
55b7(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bdag gis thog ma kho nar bcom ldan 'das bsgral bar 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shing rta skal ldan
56a1(mdo sde): gyis kyang ded dpon la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas ded dpon des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shing rta skal ldan dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong
56a2(mdo sde): gis zham ring byas pa 'byor pa chen po dang ldan pas gru zam las bsgral te/ zhal zas bzang pos kyang tshim par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon
56a3(mdo sde): lam btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ ngas yang dag par
56a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shing rta skal ldan dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong gis zham ring byas pa/ gru zam las bsgral ba dang / zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas pa dang / smon
56a5(mdo sde): lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ngas 'khor ba na bde ba chen po mtha' yas pa nyams su myong la/ da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
56a6(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na'ang 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/ /dge slong dag/ de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur stir bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /
56a7(mdo sde): mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan
56b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //ka ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
56b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams
56b3(mdo sde): dang | klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar
56b4(mdo sde): byas| ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes
56b5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/
56b6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ku ru'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las ku ru'i grong khyer du byon te/ ku ru'i skye bo'i tshogs de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar 'gyur ba sems rgya
56b7(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa la sred pa sha stag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i 'khor gyis bskor ba dgug go/ 'on tang de mthong
57a1(mdo sde): bas 'di rnams kyi dge ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa bskyed de/ kye ma/ lha'i dbang po brgya
57a2(mdo sde): byin lha'i tshogs kyis g.yog byas pas tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i ka ba khyer te 'ongs na legs so snyam du dgongs nas/ dgongs pa bskyed pa'i mod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i tshogs
57a3(mdo sde): kyis g.yog byas pa/ gang na las thams cad pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / grul bu ma du mas g.yog byas pa dag lhags te/
57a4(mdo sde): tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i ka ba khyer te 'ongs nas ha ha zhes ca co dang / ga zha bton te skad po che phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i khang bzang legs par byas
57a5(mdo sde): so| |de nas khang bzang der lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha'i zhal zas dang / lha'i gzims cha dang / gdan dang / lha'i
57a6(mdo sde): spos dang / me tog gi phreng ba dag gis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas so/ /de nas ku ru'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis lha'i 'byor pa de dag mthong
57a7(mdo sde): ba dang mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa las na/ 'jig rten na mchog yin
57b1(mdo sde): pa lta snyam ste/ sems 'dun par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod
57b2(mdo sde): nas ku ru'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams khang bzang de la shin tu dga' ba skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khang bzang de mi snang bar mdzad nas/ mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 'phags
57b3(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa bzhin rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas ku ru'i mi rnams las kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /kha cig gis ni lan gcig
57b4(mdo sde): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /kha
57b5(mdo sde): cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
57b6(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed do/ /'khor de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do/ /dge slong rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi mchod
57b7(mdo sde): pa mthong bas sems dga' bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gang du mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
58a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung
58a2(mdo sde): la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/ /dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/ bcom ldan
58a3(mdo sde): 'das/ nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang /
58a4(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs ba/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
58a5(mdo sde): tshangs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong gis zham ring byas te/ ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs
58a6(mdo sde): ba las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon nas/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong
58a7(mdo sde): gis zham ring byas pa/ ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las bdag gi yul du byon to zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rgyal bo'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan
58b1(mdo sde): 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu
58b2(mdo sde): 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub 'thob par byed pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par btsud do/ /de
58b3(mdo sde): nas rgyal po de dga' bar gyur nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
58b4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi
58b5(mdo sde): par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zla ba gsum gyi bar du bzhugs par ci gnang / de nas yang dag par rdzogs
58b6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pas rgyal po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i khang
58b7(mdo sde): bzang byed du bcug go / des de la na bza' dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas/ me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/ bog phor dag gis ni bdugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
59a1(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul nas/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas te/ na bza'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs phul nas
59a2(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang smon lam btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal
59a3(mdo sde): rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa la de lta bu'i mchod pa byas pa'i las kyi rnam
59a4(mdo sde): par smin pa des na/ ngas 'khor ba na bde ba chen po mtha' yas pa nyams su myong la/ da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
59a5(mdo sde): pa na yang 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/ /dge slong dag /de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur stir bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston
59a6(mdo sde): pa la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de
59a7(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod
59b1(mdo sde): pa brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ khrus zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /
59b2(mdo sde): tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams
59b3(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
59b4(mdo sde): mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang /
59b5(mdo sde): gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod ba na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
59b6(mdo sde): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong pa lnga brgya tsam dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa las de dag lam stor nas/ bye stongs shig tu phyin te/ de dag lam gyi
59b7(mdo sde): ngal bas dkos thag cing / rgyags zad la/ nyi ma'i gung la nyi tshan gyis gdungs nas nya skam la bton pa bzhin du sa la 'gro ldog ste/ sdug bsngal drag po dang / mi bzad pa dang /
60a1(mdo sde): tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong nas gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin la sogs pa lha stong snyed la so sor gsol ba 'debs
60a2(mdo sde): kyang de las skyob par nus pa med do/ /de'i nang nas dge bsnyen sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyus shes pa zhig yod de/ des tshong pa de dag la smras pa/ khyed sangs rgyas la skyabs su
60a3(mdo sde): song zhig / de nas thams cad kyis skad bsdoms te/ skyabs su song ngo / /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ mi
60a4(mdo sde): rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa
60a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs
60a6(mdo sde): par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun
60a7(mdo sde): ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga
60b1(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog
60b2(mdo sde): gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa
60b3(mdo sde): brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang / ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la
60b4(mdo sde): gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug /su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang / nyam nga ba dang / gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan
60b5(mdo sde): song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying pa las lag nas drang
60b6(mdo sde): bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par
60b7(mdo sde): bya| su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /'dir smras
61a1(mdo sde): pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de
61a2(mdo sde): nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa mang po phongs shing nyam nga bar gyur pa gzigs so/ /de nas mig gis cer res bltas pa tsam gyi yun gyis dge slong gi tshogs kyis
61a3(mdo sde): zham ring byas te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur nas phyogs der gshegs so/ /tshong pa de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
61a4(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang skad po che phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa bskyed de/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang chen gyi char phab la/ ser
61a5(mdo sde): bu bsil ba'ang btang na legs so snyam du dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa bskyed pa'i mod la/ brgya byin gyis dbang chen gyi char yang phab/ ser bu bsil ba'ang
61a6(mdo sde): btang ste/ des na tshong pa de dag mi skom par gyur la tsha bas gdungs ba'ang zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong pa de dag sems rtas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la lam yang bstan
61a7(mdo sde): te| de nas mnyan du yod par phyin to/ /de nas de dag ngal bso nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur
61b1(mdo sde): ba de lta bu'i chos bstan nye thos nas kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
61b2(mdo sde): thob bo/ kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ kha cig gis ni rang
61b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /'khor de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /
61b4(mdo sde): chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/
61b5(mdo sde): tshong pa 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar dgon pa'i shul nas bskyabs pa dang / dgongs pa bskyed pa'i mod la dbang chen gyi char phab ste/ ser bu ba sil ba'ang langs pa ngo
61b6(mdo sde): mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/
61b7(mdo sde): dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong
62a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
62a2(mdo sde): dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig
62a3(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge
62a4(mdo sde): slong dag/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
62a5(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tsan+dan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de nas yang
62a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon nas/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de yang dag
62a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug
62b1(mdo sde): go| phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub thob par byed pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par btsud do/ /de nas
62b2(mdo sde): rgyal rigs spyi bo na dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
62b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas tsan+dan ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge
62b4(mdo sde): 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zla ba gsum gyi bar du bzhugs par ci gnang / de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan gyis rgyal po de la cang
62b5(mdo sde): mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de'i tshe than chen byung nas/ des chu klung dang / khron pa rnams chu chung bar gyur la/ shing rnams kyang me tog dang 'bras bu med par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal
62b6(mdo sde): pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan la gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ grong khyer 'di'i nang du rdzing spos chab kyis gtams pa bgyid du stsol bar 'tshal na/
62b7(mdo sde): der bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus mdzad par gsol/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis khrus mdzad na/ bdag gi yul 'dir dgung char dbab tu glo ba
63a1(mdo sde): re lags so zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan gyis rgyal po de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de
63a2(mdo sde): nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des blon po rnams la khyed kyi spos chab dang / rin po che'i bum pa dag sta gon gyis shig dang / de dag gis ngas sangs rgyas
63a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas rgyal po de blon po'i 'khor dang bcas pas grong khyer de rdo dang / gseg ma dang /
63a4(mdo sde): gyo mo med par byas te/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng / me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/ spos chab kyis ni chag chag btab/ bdug pa sna tshogs kyis ni bdugs/ dbus
63a5(mdo sde): su ni rdzing byed du bcug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan gyis sems can la phan gdags pa'i phyir khrus ras gsol te rdzing gi
63a6(mdo sde): nang du bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po blon po 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa spos
63a7(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i chus khrus gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan khrus mdzad pa'i mod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gang
63b1(mdo sde): gis lo tog thams cad rgyal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dbang chen gyi char phab bo/ /gzhi de las skye bo phal po che'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad pa rnyed nas/ spos kyis byugs pa'i
63b2(mdo sde): mchod rten du ma brtsigs te zhal bsros so/ /der yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan+dan la skyabs su song ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de
63b3(mdo sde): dag gi nang nas nga 'ba' zhig lus so/ /dge slong dag/ de bas na 'di lta bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur stir bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la
63b4(mdo sde): bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
63b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //yams kyi nad ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
