63b6(mdo sde): 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang /
63b7(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar
64a1(mdo sde): byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
64a2(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong
64a3(mdo sde): rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yul 'dam bu tshal gyi skye bo mang
64a4(mdo sde): po la mi nad byung ste/ der skye bo phal po che de dag nad kyis dkos thag nas/ gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin la sogs pa lha stong snyed la so sor gsol ba
64a5(mdo sde): 'debs kyang yams kyi nad de zhi bar ma gyur to/ /de nas yul 'dam bu tshal na dge bsnyen zhig gnas pa des 'dam bu'i tshal gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad
64a6(mdo sde): ces smras so/ /khyed tshur shog/ sangs rgyas la skyabs song la/ bcom ldan 'das de 'dir gshegs par gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas tshegs chung dus
64a7(mdo sde): yams kyi nad zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes kyang gsol ba thob cig / de nas 'dam bu'i tshal gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab
64b1(mdo sde): ste| bcom ldan 'das/ 'dir gshegs la phongs shing nyam thag pa 'di las thar bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen
64b2(mdo sde): pa'am| mi gzigs pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs
64b3(mdo sde): pa| srung ba gcig dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa gnyis su med gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la
64b4(mdo sde): legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la
64b5(mdo sde): yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnams par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las
64b6(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog
64b7(mdo sde): gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun
65a1(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu la dpang byed pa bas kyang / ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du sangs
65a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sbyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga par gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang thad/ su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang
65a3(mdo sde): gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par
65a4(mdo sde): bya| su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/
65a5(mdo sde): su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par
65a6(mdo sde): grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams
65a7(mdo sde): la| |sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham
65b1(mdo sde): ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas 'dam bu tshal du gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer gyi mi de dag thams cad la byams pas khyab par
65b2(mdo sde): mdzad de/ des na mi ma yin pa rnams dong ste yams kyi nad zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag de rnams bcom ldan 'das mthong bas dga' ba chen po skyes so/ /dga'
65b3(mdo sde): ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lan bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams las ci
65b4(mdo sde): bzhed pa'i skabs phye'o/ /de nas de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag du
65b5(mdo sde): mas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo| kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ kha cig gis ni rab tu
65b6(mdo sde): byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs
65b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /grong khyer gyi mi de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la
66a1(mdo sde): gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skye te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs
66a2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ sems can 'di dag 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes pas phongs pa las thar bar gyur pa ni ngo mtshar lags
66a3(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba'
66a4(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i la bsags pas na nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/
66a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par
66a6(mdo sde): smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par
66a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung
66b1(mdo sde): ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
66b2(mdo sde): gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zla ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla
66b3(mdo sde): ba ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon nas/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba bdag
66b4(mdo sde): gi yul du byon te zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor ba chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba ga la ba der song ste
66b5(mdo sde): phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur
66b6(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla bas byang chub thob par byed pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par btsud do/ /de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po
66b7(mdo sde): de dga' bar gyur nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba ga la ba
67a1(mdo sde): der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis na bza'
67a2(mdo sde): dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang
67a3(mdo sde): thabs gcig tu zla ba gsum gyi bar du 'dir bzhugs par ci gnang / de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla bas rgyal po de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de'i tshe
67a4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i grong khyer de na skye bo mang po la mi nad byung ste/ des skye bo phal po che de dag la shin tu gnod par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po des nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag par
67a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba la gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ yams kyi nad 'di zhi bar 'gyur ba'i thabs mdzad par ci gnang zhes gsol to/ /de nas
67a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla bas rgyal po de la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ song la nga'i chos gos snam sbyar 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo
67a7(mdo sde): la thogs la bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas bdag gi yul bskor du chug cig/ 'di la dga' ston chen po yang gyis shig /skye bo phal po che thams cad kyang sangs rgyas
67b1(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa yang dag par 'dzin du chug cig dang / des na khyer bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal pos kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du thams cad de kho na bzhin du byas nas/ de'i rgyu
67b2(mdo sde): dang / rkyen gyis yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas skye bo'i tshogs de dag dga' bar gyur te/ rgyal po dang /blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams sangs rgyas dang / chos
67b3(mdo sde): dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin
67b4(mdo sde): te| ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba de la mchod pa chen po byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des na ngas 'khor ba na lha dang / mir skye ba 'thob par 'gyur ba'i bde ba
67b5(mdo sde): chen po nyams su myong la/ da ltar yang nga de'i rgyu las byung ba'i 'byor pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /des na ngas ci bsams pa dang / ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad de bzhin du grub par
67b6(mdo sde): gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur stir bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/
67b7(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas/ brtan te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyer de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de
68a1(mdo sde): dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //cho 'phrul zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
68a2(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang /
68a3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/
68a4(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
68a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi
68a6(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe lhas byin gyis gcugs byas te/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras pha
68a7(mdo sde): chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po bsad nas/ rang nyid rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe su ma dad pa de dag ni mthu dang ldan par gyur to/ /dad pa can rnams ni mthu chung bar gyur to/ /de
68b1(mdo sde): nas re zhig na blon po rgan po ma dad pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sdang ba zhig yod pa des/ bram ze rnams la mchod sbyin byas te/ der bram ze 'bum phrag du ma 'dus nas/ de dag
68b2(mdo sde): gis su'ang dge sbyong gau ta ma la ltar mi 'gro bar nang khrims bcas so/ /de nas bram ze rnams kyis khrims bcas te/ 'dus shing mthun la kun tu dga' nas srang gi dbus su
68b3(mdo sde): rig byed las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin brgya nyin la gsol ba btab ste/ rus pa med ma'i skyes bu gshegs su gsol/ gshegs su gsol zhes byas so/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas
68b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci'ang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang
68b5(mdo sde): ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la gnas
68b6(mdo sde): pa| rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i
68b7(mdo sde): zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra
69a1(mdo sde): chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spang pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs
69a2(mdo sde): pa| rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
69a3(mdo sde): dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas kyang tshes khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos
69a4(mdo sde): nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su
69a5(mdo sde): ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste
69a6(mdo sde): mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag gnas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/ 'phags pa'i
69a7(mdo sde): nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin
69b1(mdo sde): par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar
69b2(mdo sde): 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bskyed pa thar pa'i skal ba
69b3(mdo sde): can du gyur pa/ btsal bar bya brnyed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la nang du bltas pa/ 'khor ba las phyi rol du bltas pa de dag gzigs nas da ltar mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten
69b4(mdo sde): pas nga'i bstan pa la sdang bar gyur te/ ngas 'di dag gdul ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin gyi cha lugs su sprul te/ mchod
69b5(mdo sde): sbyin gyi 'dun khang de lha'i 'od kyis snang bar mdzad de/ der gshegs so/ /de nas bram ze de dag dga' zhing mgul rab tu dga' ste/ yi rangs nas dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur te
69b6(mdo sde): skad bsdoms nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gshegs su gsol/ gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ gshegs pa legs so zhes byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das brgya
69b7(mdo sde): byin gyi cha lugs su bzhugs pa gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer kun tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin mchod sbyin la gshegs so zhes de skad kyi
70a1(mdo sde): sgra yang grags par gyur te/ de thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze rnams dad par gyur pa mkhyen nas/ brgya
70a2(mdo sde): byin gyi cha lugs mi snang bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi cha lugs su bzhugs nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas bram ze drug
70a3(mdo sde): khri nyis stong gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /srog chags 'bum phrag du mas
70a4(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das la dad pa rnyed do/ /de nas dge slong de dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bram ze 'di
70a5(mdo sde): rnams 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das dang mjal nas bden pa mthong bar gyur pa dang / srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dga' ba chen po thob par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom
70a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du
70a7(mdo sde): 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags pas na/ ngas las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong
70b1(mdo sde): dag |las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur
70b2(mdo sde): te| las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las
70b3(mdo sde): rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yar chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
70b4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/
70b5(mdo sde): lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po 'dul zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon to/ /
70b6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de 'ang mu stegs can gyi dbang du gyur to/ /de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul
70b7(mdo sde): bdag gi yul du gshegs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul
71a1(mdo sde): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig
71a2(mdo sde): tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul gyis byang chub thob par byed pa'i chos
71a3(mdo sde): rnams la btsud do/ /de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ yang
71a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
71a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na/ bcom
71a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu zla ba gsum gyi bar du 'dir bzhugs par ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod
71a7(mdo sde): kyi yul na dge slong glo bur du 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba bdag gi gnas su rung ba'i gtsug lag khang 'ga' lta yod dam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ da ltar ma mchis
71b1(mdo sde): kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das gzhes su gsol dang / bdag gis dge slong glo bur du 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dag gnas su rung ba'i gtsug lag khang bgyid du stsal bar 'tshal lo zhes
71b2(mdo sde): gsol to/ /de nas rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir gtsug lag khang byed du bcug ste/ ra ba dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / sgo khang ni bcas/ keg tse dang / zla ba
71b3(mdo sde): tshes pa dang / lan kan gyis ni brgyan/ gding ba dang ni ldan/ rdzing bus ni kun tu gang / shing ljon pa me tog dang / 'bras bu dang ldan pa mang pos ni bskor ba zhig byas so/ /byas
71b4(mdo sde): nas kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la cho 'phrul chen po mdzad par gsol ba btab bo/ /de nas rgyal pos gsol
71b5(mdo sde): ba btab nas/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul gyis/ sangs rgyas phal po che'i rnam par rol ba'i cho 'phrul chen po bstan te/ des na
71b6(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / blon po dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul mi dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi thams cad dga' bar gyur te/ bstan pa srung ba gces par 'dzin par gyur to/ /dge
71b7(mdo sde): slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul de la de lta bu'i mchod
72a1(mdo sde): pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ngas 'khor ba na bde ba bsam yas pa nyams su myong la/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa na'ang nga'i bstan
72a2(mdo sde): pa 'di mdzes par gyur to/ dge slong dag/ de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur stir bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur
72a3(mdo sde): stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
72a4(mdo sde): stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //lo lnga pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
72a5(mdo sde): la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang /
72a6(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnam dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar
72a7(mdo sde): byas| ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod
72b1(mdo sde): cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa
72b2(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la na da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe mi blun po lhas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la
72b3(mdo sde): gnod pa stong snyed byas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu bskyod par yang ma nus pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po rgyal po'i khab nas su'ang dge sbyong gau'u
72b4(mdo sde): ta ma'i thad du mi 'gro ba dang / kha zas mi sbyin pa'i khrims chos shig /de ltar byas pa dang / de khe mi rnyed cing bsnyen bkur mi rnyed pas gdon mi za bar yul gzhan du 'pho bar 'gyur
72b5(mdo sde): ro zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal pos de bzhin du byas nas/ de na dge bsnyen bden pa mthong ba 'khod de dag tu ste/ kyi hud/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba/ u dum wA ra'i me
72b6(mdo sde): tog ltar dkon pa dang phrad kyang / de bsten kyang ma nus pa las na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi mi rnams mgon med par gyur to zhes 'dzer to/ /tshig de nyid thor dge slong dag gis
72b7(mdo sde): thos so| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ji skad thos pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'di la de bzhin gshegs
73a1(mdo sde): pa nyid dus mkhyen gyi khyod snying ma chung zhig/ gzhan yang / nga'i bstan pa ji srid yod kyi bar du'ang nyan thos rnams kyi yo byad med par mi 'gyur na/ da ltar
73a2(mdo sde): lta ci smos/ de'i skabs su lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni 'og ma la shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug ste/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas/ mthong ba'i mod kho
73a3(mdo sde): na la sbyin bdag dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi spro ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i che ba nyid yang dag par bstan pa dang / ma skyes dgra dang / lha sbyin gyi rgyags shing dregs
73a4(mdo sde): pa gcad pa dang / bdag nyid kyi dad pa bstan pa'i phyir rgyal po'i khab ril gyis 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas skad po che phyung ste/ bdag gis deng phan chad bcom ldan 'das nyan
73a5(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha'i na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes smras nas/
73a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom
73a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'di nyid du bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
73b1(mdo sde): dang bcas pa la lha'i na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
73b2(mdo sde): bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka/ 'jig rten na bsod nams 'dod pa mang gi 'di ltar nga la sems dad par byas pa nyid kyis
73b3(mdo sde): chog go/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ 'o na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i slad du bdag gis dgung lo lnga'i bar du lo lnga pa'i dga' ston sbyar bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la
73b4(mdo sde): gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka/ 'jig rten na bsod nams 'dod pa mang gi 'di ltar nga la sems dad par byas pa nyid kyis chog go /
73b5(mdo sde): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ 'o na/ zhag lnga'i bar du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi bsod nams kyi stobs mngon sum
73b6(mdo sde): du bstan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la phan gdags pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus su zhag lnga pa'i dga' ston rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir/ cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de
73b7(mdo sde): nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ 'od ma'i tshal de khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed 'dra bar bstan te/ lha'i gdan cha
74a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha'i rdzing rnams dang / lha'i bdud rtsi'i zhal zas dag kyang bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas lha'i
74a2(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ lha 'bum phrag du ma'i g.yog dang bcas pas/ rang gi lag gis tshim par
74a3(mdo sde): byed cing ci bzhed pa bstabs so/ /rnam grangs du mar rang gi lag gis tshim par byas shing ci bzhed pa bstabs te/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin nas/ gtsang sder ni gyu/
74a4(mdo sde): phyag ni bcabs sbar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba khyer te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin
74a5(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pa la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/ /rgyal po ma
74a6(mdo sde): skyes sgras khang bzang gi steng na 'dug pas kyang 'od ma'i tshal na bcom ldan 'das la de lta bur mchod pa byed pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'gyod pa skyes te/ dad pa chen po rnyed do/ /rgyal
74a7(mdo sde): po'i khab na 'khod pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis kyang chos kyi shugs thob nas/ rgyal po'i thad du dong ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye ma rgyal po chen po/ 'di ltar lha rgyags shing
74b1(mdo sde): bag ma mchis par gnas pa rnams kyis kyang lha yul bor te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa las na/ rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams sgor pham par 'gyur
74b2(mdo sde): gyi| lha| khrims de ni bshig na legs lags so zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras khrims de bshig nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi grong khyer du dril bsgrags te/ bcom
74b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la bkur sti ci dga' bar gyis ces byas so/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste yi rangs
74b4(mdo sde): nas dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes te/ me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng rnams khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dong ngo / /de nas lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyis bcom
74b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la bkur sti chen po byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzhi de las lha dang / mi rnams pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/
74b6(mdo sde): de thos nas lha dang / mi du mas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa mthong nas the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs
74b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la 'di lta bu'i dga' ston bgyis pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
75a1(mdo sde): slong dag / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la
75a2(mdo sde): gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags pas na nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /
75a3(mdo sde): las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi
75a4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ las dge ba bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams
75a5(mdo sde): ni| |bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs
75a6(mdo sde): pa| dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla
75a7(mdo sde): na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i ri bo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang
75b1(mdo sde): 'khor zhig tu byon nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de na yams kyi nad byung ngo / /de nas rgyal po des yams kyi nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla
75b2(mdo sde): ba gsum gyi bar du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/ /zla ba gsum lon nas yams kyi nad de zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po dang / grong khyer gyi mi sems dad par gyur pa rnams kyis de
75b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lo lnga pa'i dga' ston byas so/ /'dir gsungs pa/ kun dga' nga ni rgyal gyur nas/ /rin chen ri bo 'od chen la/ /zhi bar
75b4(mdo sde): 'dod phyir gsol ba btab/ /lo lnga pa yi dga' ston byas/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ ngas yang dag par rdzogs
75b5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i ri bo de la lo lnga pa'i dga' ston byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ngas 'khor ba na bde ba chen po nyams su myong la/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs par
75b6(mdo sde): gyur pa na'ang nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa yin no/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang nga'i bstan pa la lo lnga pa'i dga' ston brgya phrag du ma byed par 'gyur ro/ /dge
75b7(mdo sde): slong dag / de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur stir bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/
76a1(mdo sde): mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong
76a2(mdo sde): de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po lnga pa/ bstod pa zhes bya
76a3(mdo sde): ba ni| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
76a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
76a5(mdo sde): kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
76a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang
76a7(mdo sde): sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
76b1(mdo sde): de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na rol mo mkhan mdza' sde gcig pa lnga brgya tsam 'khod do/ /de'i tshe rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po rab dga' zhes bya ba zhig gsar du 'ongs pa de'i mthu ni 'di lta bu yin
76b2(mdo sde): te| rgyud gcig las skad sna bdun dang / khong du 'khyig pa sna nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung bar shes so/ /des grong khyer chen po drug yul po chem yin par bsgrags te/ mnyan du yod par phyin
76b3(mdo sde): nas| mnyan du yod pa na rol mo mkhan gnas pa rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di'i dus ngas shes kyi/ khyed snying ma chung zhig /de nas rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po
76b4(mdo sde): rab dga' 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po gsal rgyal rol mo la shin tu mkhas zhes de skad grag gi /de dang 'gyed par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po rab dga' ko
76b5(mdo sde): sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po/ khyod rol mo shin tu mkhyen to zhes bdag gis thos na/ gal te khyod
76b6(mdo sde): la gnod pa ma mchis na sad par bgyi'o/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de la bsgyings te smras pa/ kye legs pa/ nga'i mkhan po rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po bla na med pa yod de/
76b7(mdo sde): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na bzhugs kyi chur shog dang / deng 'dong ngo zhes byas so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam gyis zham ring byas pa dang /
77a1(mdo sde): rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po rab dga' dang / mi 'bum phrag du ma rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal du dong ngo / /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
77a2(mdo sde): kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci'ang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la
77a3(mdo sde): phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa
77a4(mdo sde): gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslab pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs
77a5(mdo sde): kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra
77a6(mdo sde): chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs
77a7(mdo sde): pa| rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
77b1(mdo sde): par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu brgyan pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa
77b2(mdo sde): rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug /su ni nya ma nga bar
77b3(mdo sde): gyur| su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang / nyam nga ba dang / gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song
77b4(mdo sde): nas phyung ste mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags
77b5(mdo sde): pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin
77b6(mdo sde): par bya| su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go / 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar
77b7(mdo sde): 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'i skye bo la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten
78a1(mdo sde): pa'i dgongs pa bskyed de/ kye ma dri za'i bu zur phud lnga pa/ dri za bdun stong gis bskor bas/ pi wang gzhi bai DUR+ya las byas pa khyer te nga'i thad du 'ongs na legs
78a2(mdo sde): so snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas dgongs pa bskyed pa'i mod la/ dri za'i bu zur phud lnga pa/ dri za bdun stong gis bskor bas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul bzhin du mchod pa byas nas /
78a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la pi wang gzhi bai DUR+ya las byas pa phul lo/ /de nas rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po rab dgas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pi wang blangs te/ de las rgyud
78a4(mdo sde): gcig las kyang skad sna bdun dang / khong nas 'khyig pa sna nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung ba bstan te/ de thos pas rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / skye bo phal po che gzhan dag kyang
78a5(mdo sde): mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang pi wang gzhi bai DUR+ya las byas pa sbrengs te/ de las rgyud gcig las kyang skad kyi khyad par sna du ma dang /
78a6(mdo sde): khong du 'khyig pa'i sna grangs du ma 'byung bar bstan to/ /de dag kyang stong pa'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam par grag go/ lus 'di'ang pi wang dang 'dra bar bstan
78a7(mdo sde): to| |skad rnams ni dbang po dang 'dra bar bstan to/ /khong du 'khyig pa rnams ni sems kyi khams dang 'dra bar bstan te/ de thos pas rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po rab dga'
78b1(mdo sde): dad pa skyes nas pi wang dri gtsang khang du phul te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung nas/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor
78b2(mdo sde): lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod
78b3(mdo sde): de| nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam
78b4(mdo sde): pa| nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa
78b5(mdo sde): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
78b6(mdo sde): mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye
78b7(mdo sde): chen po rnams dad par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba brtsams so/ /rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po rnams kyang dga' zhing
79a1(mdo sde): yid bde bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag ni las ngan pa byed cing 'dug ste/ dka' bas 'tsho ba yin gyi/ bdag cag gis rgyal po la gsol
79a2(mdo sde): te| bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa grong khyer du gshegs par spyan drangs gor ma chag snyam mo/ /re zhig na rol mo mkhan de dag gis gnang ba'i lung thob
79a3(mdo sde): nas| bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa grong khyer du gshegs par spyan drangs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rol mo mkhan de dag la cang mi gsung bas
79a4(mdo sde): gnang ngo / /de nas rol mo mkhan de dag dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / yul mi rnams bsdongs nas/ mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer thams
79a5(mdo sde): cad rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas nas/ spos chab kyis chag chag ni btab/ me tog sna tshogs ni gtor/ bdug pa sna tshogs kyis ni bdugs/ me tog gi bla
79a6(mdo sde): res ni brgyan to/ /rol mo mkhan de dag gis kyang rang rang gi pi wang khyer te/ rdza rnga dang / gling bu dang / rnga zlum dang / rol mo'i sgra'i khyad par dag gis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /
79a7(mdo sde): zhal zas bzang pos kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa tshim par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas
79b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu
79b2(mdo sde): 'gro'o| |kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / du 'bod dang / du 'bod chen po
79b3(mdo sde): dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pal ltar gas pa
79b4(mdo sde): dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal
79b5(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ ci/ bdag
79b6(mdo sde): cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed pa mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa
79b7(mdo sde): mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba
80a1(mdo sde): 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/
80a2(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nyid mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur
80a3(mdo sde): ro| |steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga'
80a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang /
80a5(mdo sde): tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams
80a6(mdo sde): skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams
80a7(mdo sde): kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba
80b1(mdo sde): brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod
80b2(mdo sde): spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
80b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
80b4(mdo sde): snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed
80b5(mdo sde): na ni| zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na
80b6(mdo sde): ni| zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung
80b7(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar
81a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang
81a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
81a3(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
81a4(mdo sde): smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can//
81a5(mdo sde): mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang
81a6(mdo sde): bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog
81a7(mdo sde): lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog
81b1(mdo sde): brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang
81b2(mdo sde): gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin
81b3(mdo sde): te| kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ rol mo mkhan 'di dag
81b4(mdo sde): gis nga la bkur sti 'di lta bu byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ rol mo mkhan 'di dag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i
81b5(mdo sde): chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis dus ji lta ba bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs nas/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skad snyan zhes bya ba'i rang sangs rgyas sha stag tu 'gyur
81b6(mdo sde): te| sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la
81b7(mdo sde): sems dga' bar gyur ba 'di yin no/ /de nas/ dge slong dag/ the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
82a1(mdo sde): gang dag gi mthu 'di 'dra bar 'gyur ba de dag gang du mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
82a2(mdo sde): kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' brgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na
82a3(mdo sde): nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams
82a4(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags
82a5(mdo sde): pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang
82a6(mdo sde): chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang
82a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi
82b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtogs mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon to/ /de nas rgyal po'i
82b2(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal dus tshigs thams cad du 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ skyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas/ rgyal po de la phan gdags pa'i
82b3(mdo sde): phyir/ shing ljon pa zhig gi drung na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas gdan bting ba la bzhugs te me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur
82b4(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po de bud med kyi sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra sgrogs pa dag dang / skyed mos tshal du song ngo / /de nas rgyal po de skyed mos tshal de na 'khyam zhing 'gro bas/ bcom ldan 'das
82b5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtogs mdzad mdzes shing dga' bar mdzad pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ thugs mchog tu dul zhing rnam par zhi ba dang ldan pa/ gser gyi
82b6(mdo sde): mchod sdong ltar dpal 'bar ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang rgyal po de dga' bar gyur nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrags te/ bcom
82b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs su gsol to/ /zhal zas bzang po'ang gsol nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo/ /dge slong dag/ ji
83a1(mdo sde): snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtogs mdzad de la mchod pa byas
83a2(mdo sde): pa de nyid kyi rgyus/ da ltar nga la rol mo mkhan rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i bsnyen bkur byas so/ /dge slong dag/ de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur stir bya'o/ /
83a3(mdo sde): bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas/ brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed
83a4(mdo sde): kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //
83a5(mdo sde): mchog sbyin zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon
83a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams
83a7(mdo sde): dang | lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
83b1(mdo sde): mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos
83b2(mdo sde): dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas mnyan du
83b3(mdo sde): yod pa na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa las dri ma can la gnas pa zhig yod de/ de rgyal po'i mis bzung nas rgyal po'i mis bzung nas rgyal po la phul lo/ /de nas de nyes pa byed byed pa'i phyir rgyal pos gshed ma la gtad do/ /
83b4(mdo sde): de nas de rgyal po'i mi gos sngon po bgos pa/ mtshon cha thogs pa/ ka ra wI ra'i me tog gi phreng ba mgul na thogs pa rnams kyis lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su 'o
83b5(mdo sde): dod bos nas/ grong khyer gyi lho sgor khrid do/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci'ang med
83b6(mdo sde): la| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/
83b7(mdo sde): zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu
84a1(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi
84a2(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs
84a3(mdo sde): pa| rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
84a4(mdo sde): dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/
84a5(mdo sde): chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shig 'dug /su ni nyam nga
84a6(mdo sde): bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang / nyam nga ba dang / gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan
84a7(mdo sde): song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags
84b1(mdo sde): pas nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni
84b2(mdo sde): yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go / 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar
84b3(mdo sde): bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ /mnyan du yod par bsod
84b4(mdo sde): snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas mi des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par
84b5(mdo sde): byas pa| 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'dod mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
84b6(mdo sde): btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni dam pa stsal ba'i 'os lags kyi/ bdag la srog phangs pa stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
84b7(mdo sde): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod song la rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad du/ rgyal po chen po/ mi 'di nga la byin cig dang rab tu dbyung bar
85a1(mdo sde): bya'o zhes gyis shig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga
85a2(mdo sde): la ba der song ste phyin nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' phrin/ 'di skad du /rgyal po chen po/ mi 'di bcom ldan 'das la rab tu 'byung bar
85a3(mdo sde): gnang bar gyis shig ces byas so/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang shin tu 'os par rig nas gnang ste/ de bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung nas bsnyen par
85a4(mdo sde): rdzogs par mdzad de/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa
85a5(mdo sde): thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa
85a6(mdo sde): nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra
85a7(mdo sde): ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo lnga'i spubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par
85b1(mdo sde): rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par
85b2(mdo sde): smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis
85b3(mdo sde): dgongs pa tsam gyis thams cad grub pa de ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs
85b4(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pa na/ nga nyid kyis las byas shing
85b5(mdo sde): bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur
85b6(mdo sde): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams
85b7(mdo sde): dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras
86a1(mdo sde): bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
86a2(mdo sde): rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
86a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de na
86a4(mdo sde): bram ze reg byed dang / rig byed kyi yan lag gi mthar phyin pa/ rgyal po'i grong na 'dug pa zhig yod do/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan
86a5(mdo sde): snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas pho brang 'khor der bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas bram ze des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
86a6(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal mtshan sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan
86a7(mdo sde): pa| nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi
86b1(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni dam pa stsal ba'i los lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag ni dam pa stsal pa'i 'os lags kyi/ bcom
86b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das gong du bzhugs su gsol/ de nas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gong du bzhugs so/ /
86b3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bzhugs nas bram ze des tshig brgyas bstod de/ zhal zas bzang po'ang gsol nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
86b4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo/ /gzhi de las rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dad pa skyes so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
86b5(mdo sde): bram zer gyur pa de ni nga yin te/ ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan la mchod pa byas pa de'i rgyus na/ ngas 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas pa nyams su
86b6(mdo sde): myong la da ltar yang ngas ci bsams pa dang / ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub pa yin no/ /dge slong dag /de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur stir bya'o/ /bla
86b7(mdo sde): mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o/ /zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar
87a1(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
87a2(mdo sde): bstod do/ / //ka shi ka'i gos zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor
87a3(mdo sde): gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding
87a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha
87a5(mdo sde): ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza'
87a6(mdo sde): dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zod rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal/ bya
87a7(mdo sde): ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po g.yog 'khor mi 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pas bden pa mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe des phan
87b1(mdo sde): btags pa la drin bsab par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa lugs su gzhug pa dang / khyim yangs par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba gces par bstan pa'i phyir
87b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams la bsgo ba/ bcom ldan 'das
87b3(mdo sde): grong khyer du gshegs pa la me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / spos dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod pa gyis shig /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad kyang rdo dang / gseg ma
87b4(mdo sde): dang / gyo mo med par gyis shig /me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor la/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgrengs shig /'od ma'i tshal nas rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi lam thams cad kyang
87b5(mdo sde): ras kyis khebs par gyis shig ces byas so/ /blon po rnams kyis kyang thams cad nyams su blangs so/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos rang gi lag gis bcom ldan
87b6(mdo sde): 'das kyi dbu'i steng du gdugs rtsibs brgya pa bzung ngo / /pho brang 'khor gyi mi gzhan dag gis ni dge slong stong gi gdugs thogs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul la 'khor
87b7(mdo sde): yang dul ba dang / zhi la 'khor yang zhi ba dang / grol la 'khor yang grol ba dang / dbugs phyin la 'khor yang dbugs phyin pa dang / byang la 'khor yang byang ba dang / dgra bcom
88a1(mdo sde): par gyur la 'khor yang dgra bcom par gyur pa dang / 'dod chags dang 'bral la 'khor yang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / mdzes la 'khor yang
88a2(mdo sde): mdzes pa ste/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / glang po che glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / seng ge gcan zan gyi tshogs kyis
88a3(mdo sde): bskor ba lta bu dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis
88a4(mdo sde): bskor ba lta bu dang / dpa' bo dmag mi'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / sa mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta
88a5(mdo sde): bu dang / tshong dpon grong khyer gyi mis bskor ba lta bu dang / rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang /
88a6(mdo sde): zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / nyi ma 'od zer stong gis tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / 'phags skyes po grul
88a7(mdo sde): bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / nor sbyin gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / thags zangs ris lha ma
88b1(mdo sde): yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / tshangs pa tshangs ris kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / rgya mtsho ltar
88b2(mdo sde): ltem me 'dug pa dang / sprin rlan dang ldan pa lta bu dang / glang po che'i rgyal po rgyags pa med pa lta bur dbang po shin tu dang ba dang / spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'chal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
88b3(mdo sde): chos ma 'dres pa du mas brgyan pa'i bcom ldan 'das grong khyer der gshegs te/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs sgo'i them pa la bzhag pa de'i tshes chen po 'di rnam pa
88b4(mdo sde): drug tu g.yos te/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe rmad du byung ba de lta bu dag byung ngo / /gzhan yang / 'di lta ste/ sgo dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to/ /dma'
88b5(mdo sde): ba rnams ni mthon por gyur to/ /glang po chen rnams kyang skad 'byin to/ /rta rnams kyang skad 'byin to/ /khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to/ /rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs khyim
88b6(mdo sde): khyim na 'dug pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin to/ /long ba rnams kyang mig gis mthong bar gyur to/ /'on pa rnams kyang rna bas thos par gyur to/ /lkugs pa rnams kyang smra shes par gyur
88b7(mdo sde): to| |dbang po lhag ma ma tshang ba rnams kyang dbang po tshang ba thob par gyur to/ /chang gis ra ro ba rnams kyang sangs par gyur to/ /dug 'thungs pa rnams kyang dug med par gyur to//
89a1(mdo sde): phan tshun 'khon pa rnams kyang byams pa'i sems thob par gyur to/ /sbrum ma rnams kyang bde bar btsa' bar gyur to/ /bcings pa rnams kyang grol
89a2(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /nor med pa rnams kyang nor rnyed par gyur to/ /bar snang la gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am
89a3(mdo sde): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang lha'i me tog gi char 'bebs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i 'byor bas rgyal po'i pho brang du gshegs so/ /rgyal po gzugs can
89a4(mdo sde): snying po 'ang bdag nyid lag dar te phyi rol gyi sgo khang du zhabs bsil ba'i tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i chu thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs bsil
89a5(mdo sde): to| |de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zhal zas gsol to/ /bshos gsol nas ka shi ka'i na
89a6(mdo sde): bza' yang phul lo/ /rgyu de na ma ga d+ha'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dad par gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas
89a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis 'di lta bu'i mchod pa brnyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
89b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gang du mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing
89b2(mdo sde): rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su
89b3(mdo sde): zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i
89b4(mdo sde): khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams
89b5(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//
89b6(mdo sde): dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
89b7(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bde mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de ljongs
90a1(mdo sde): rgyu shing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon te/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
90a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bde mdzad ljongs rgyu shing gshegs pa las/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor der byon to zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor ba chen po dang / rgyal po'i
90a3(mdo sde): mthu chen po dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde mdzad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde
90a4(mdo sde): mdzad kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de yang dag par
90a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde mdzad kyis/ byang chub thob par byed pa'i chos rnams yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/ de nas rgyal po dga' bar gyur nas/ yang dag par rdzogs
90a6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bde mdzad rgyal po'i pho brang du spyan drangs nas zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol to/ /'bum ri ba'i na bza' yang phul lo/ /yongs su mya ngan las
90a7(mdo sde): 'das pa'i mchod rten yang khor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig / 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa brtsigs so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
90b1(mdo sde): rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga de mdzad la de lta bu'i mchod pa byas te/ des na ngas 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' mas pa
90b2(mdo sde): nyams su myong la rgyu de nyid kyis da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa na'ang nga rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/ /dge slong dag /de bas na 'di ltar
90b3(mdo sde): bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur stir bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas
90b4(mdo sde): brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan
90b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //lha'i zas zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug
90b6(mdo sde): po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams
90b7(mdo sde): dang | nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang /
91a1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
91a2(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
91a3(mdo sde): bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la na da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /de na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/
91a4(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa/ mu stegs can la dga' ba zhig gnas par de tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos dad par byas
91a5(mdo sde): te bstan pa la btsud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ /khyim bdag de'ang rgya chen po la mos pa zhig ste/ des tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen
91a6(mdo sde): po la smras pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal gyi grogs mdzod cig /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos kyang khyim bdag de la cang mi smra bas
91a7(mdo sde): khas blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos khyim bdag de khrid nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
91b1(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
91b2(mdo sde): pa| khyim bdag 'di ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod gsol bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnang bar
91b3(mdo sde): mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khyim bdag de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang
91b4(mdo sde): bar rig nas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zhal zas dang / me tog dang / spos dang | me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang bshams so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos lha'i
91b5(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin la bskur te/ khyim bdag 'di'i grogs gyis shig ces byas so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa dga' byed kyi tshal
91b6(mdo sde): du sprul to/ /sa srung gi bu dang / rab brtan dang 'dra ba'i glang po che stong phrag mang po dag kyang khrid de 'ongs te/ de dag ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi steng du
91b7(mdo sde): gdugs rtsi bas brgya dang ldan pa 'dzin to/ /bdag la sogs pa lha'i bu mo stong phrag du ma'ang khrid de 'ongs te/ de dag ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rnga yab
92a1(mdo sde): nor bu'i yu ba can gyis g.yob par byed do/ /rab dga' dang / zur phud lnga pa dang / tum bu ru las sogs pa dri za stong phrag du ma'ang khrid de 'ongs te
92a2(mdo sde): de dag ni rol mo'i sgra'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs len par byed do/ /lha'i bdud rtsi'i zhal zas dag kyang sbyar to/ /de nas khyim bdag des lha dang / lha'i yo byad rnams kyis bcom
92a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la bsnyen bskur byas nas lus thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang /
92a4(mdo sde): sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma brgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma sgrol ba
92a5(mdo sde): rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces
92a6(mdo sde): byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud ba dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni
92a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams
92b1(mdo sde): byung na/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang bsdus 'joms dang / du
92b2(mdo sde): 'bod dang / du 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer
92b3(mdo sde): dang | ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab
92b4(mdo sde): bo| |grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /de na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de
92b5(mdo sde): dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye| ci| bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul
92b6(mdo sde): pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye| bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos pa ma gyur la/ gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on
92b7(mdo sde): kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par
93a1(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur
93a2(mdo sde): ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang /
93a3(mdo sde): dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa
93a4(mdo sde): chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang /
93a5(mdo sde): sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams
93a6(mdo sde): dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par
93a7(mdo sde): byed de| nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig
93b1(mdo sde): chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis
93b2(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/
93b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar
93b4(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar
93b5(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los
93b6(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i
93b7(mdo sde): mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skyes bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur
94a1(mdo sde): ro| |rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
94a2(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
