94a3(mdo sde): kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /
94a4(mdo sde): mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod
94a5(mdo sde): dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes rab spangs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung
94a6(mdo sde): mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung
94a7(mdo sde): mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin 'da'
94b1(mdo sde): 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni
94b2(mdo sde): de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /
94b3(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ khyim bdag 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ khyim bdag 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed
94b4(mdo sde): pa dang / sbyin par byas pa'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen
94b5(mdo sde): pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum
94b6(mdo sde): dang | snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha'i zas sbyin zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni
94b7(mdo sde): gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /skabs 'di ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang / g.yog 'khor rnams kyis thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan
95a1(mdo sde): du gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
95a2(mdo sde): khyim bdag 'dis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha dang / mi'i 'byor pa dag gis mchod pa bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
95a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la
95a4(mdo sde): gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa 'di dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/
95a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la
95a6(mdo sde): rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam
95a7(mdo sde): par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge
95b1(mdo sde): slong dag / sngon byung ba 'das pa 'dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
95b2(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de nas yang
95b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon te/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag
95b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor der byon to zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal
95b5(mdo sde): po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po'i zhabs la mgo bos
95b6(mdo sde): phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang pos byang
95b7(mdo sde): chub thob par byed pa'i chos rnams yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go / de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po nyan
96a1(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman
96a2(mdo sde): zong rnams la spyan drangs so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang pos kyang cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des
96a3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang pos ha cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang /
96a4(mdo sde): snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs kyang rin po che las byas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi dga' ston byas nas/ der
96a5(mdo sde): srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dad pa chen po skyes te/ rgyu de dang / rkyen des de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
96a6(mdo sde): rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po la de lta bu'i mchod pa byas pa des na/ ngas 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas
96a7(mdo sde): pa nyams su myong ste/ de nyid kyi rgyus da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa na'ang nga la tshong dpon dang / brgya byin gyis 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/ /dge slong dag /
96b1(mdo sde): de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur stir bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod
96b2(mdo sde): pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o/ /zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom
96b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gang po la sogs pa rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa rdzogs so// //
96b4(mdo sde): gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po drug pa/ sdom ni/ tsan+dan dang ni pad+ma dang / /de bzhin 'khor lo mgo bcu pa/ /mdog 'jam dang ni 'od bsal dang /
96b5(mdo sde): mnyan pa dang ni spos ngad ldang / /dri med gdangs snyan zhes bya ba/ /sde tshan dag tu bstan pa yin/ tsan+dan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /
96b6(mdo sde): blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
96b7(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/
97a1(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod
97a2(mdo sde): cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman
97a3(mdo sde): zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ma ga d+ha na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to/ /de'i tshe gang+gA'i klung gi
97a4(mdo sde): 'gram nas thag mi ring ba zhig na mchod rten zhig ral du gyur pa/ rlung dang / nyi tshan gyis bshig pa zhig 'dug pa de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la
97a5(mdo sde): zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mchod rten 'di su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas tsan+dan zhes bya ba zhig byung ste de'i yin no/ /dge
97a6(mdo sde): slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rang sangs rgyas tsan+dan las byung lags/ ming ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
97a7(mdo sde): pa| dge slong dag / khyod rang sangs rgyas tsan+dan ga las byung ba dang / ming ci las btags pa nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa/ nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /
97b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA ra NA si na/
97b2(mdo sde): rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang /
97b3(mdo sde): 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrugs dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan
97b4(mdo sde): par 'dug go / rgyal po de'ang chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/ /de bu med nas bu 'dod de/ gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
97b5(mdo sde): la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la'ang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum
97b6(mdo sde): mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang / chos mthun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la'ang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'jig rten
97b7(mdo sde): na'ang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de'ang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang / bu mo skye bar
98a1(mdo sde): 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la'ang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa
98a2(mdo sde): las bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/
98a3(mdo sde): gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'ang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la de'i skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po zhig yod pa
98a4(mdo sde): de'i nang nas kyang pad+ma tshad las 'das par che ba zhig skyes te/ de nyin gcig bzhin du cher skye la/ kha ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas
98a5(mdo sde): rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal pos kyang pad+ma de legs par srungs shig ces bsgo'o/ /phyis re zhig na nyi ma 'char kar pad+ma de kha bye nas/ pad+ma de'i snying po la khye'u
98a6(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can/ mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ sna mtho
98a7(mdo sde): ba| sna legs pa/ smin ma stug pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa zhig
98b1(mdo sde): skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug ste/ de'i kha nas ni pad+ma'i dri 'byung la/ lus las ni tsan+dan gyi dri 'byung ngo / /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas kyang rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas
98b2(mdo sde): rgyal po blon po dang / btsun mo dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal du dong nas/ khye'u des mthong ma thag tu rgyal po la smras pa/ yab tshur gshegs/ bdag ni khyod sras mi mnga' ba'i
98b3(mdo sde): sras lags so/ /de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs nas/ smras pa/ bu| de ni khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin no/ /de nas rgyal po rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas/ pad+ma'i snying
98b4(mdo sde): po las khye'u blangs te/ lag par bzhag go /de nas khye'u des gang dang / gang du rkang pa bzhag pa de dang / der pad+ma dag byung ngo / /de nas de'i ming tsan+dan zhes btags so/ /
98b5(mdo sde): gang gi tshe khye'u tsan+dan na khad kyis cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha| bdag cag gi grong khyer 'dir dus ston byung na/ lha| sras
98b6(mdo sde): tsan+dan btang ba'i rigs so/ /'on tang bdag cag dang lhan cig tu dus ston myong bar 'gyur la/ gnas thams cad kyang pad+mas brgyan par 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal pos
98b7(mdo sde): smras pa/ de ltar bya'o/ /de nas tsan+dan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ blon po'i bu rnams kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa/ rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs byed cing / grong khyer gyi
99a1(mdo sde): dus ston myong bar bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i pho bras nas phyi rol tu byung ngo / /de nas de der 'gro ba na gom pa re re la pad+ma lta na sdug cing yid 'phrog
99a2(mdo sde): pa dag byung ste/ de dag la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis phog ma thag tu rnyis shing bskams so/ /de nas sems can dag pa/ bsam pa dge ba/ sngon sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa
99a3(mdo sde): ba skyed skyed pa des de mthong nas/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa skyes te/ ji ltar pad+ma 'di dag skyes pa'i mod la ni mdzes par 'dug la/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis gdungs
99a4(mdo sde): pas ni rnyis shing bskam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lus 'di'ang de dang 'dra'o snyam mo/ /de de ltar sems shing 'jal la nye bar rtog pa na/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun
99a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/ des skye bo'i tshogs kyi nang na 'dug bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas re zhig na gnas gtsang
99a6(mdo sde): ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de la gos tshon can dag phul te/ de dag bgos nas nam mkha' la 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/ de mthong bas rgyal
99a7(mdo sde): po dang / blon po dang / grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang bcas par dga' ba chen po thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
99b1(mdo sde): stsal pa| dge slong dag / rang sangs rgyas tsan+dan ni de las byung ste ming yang de las btags so/ /dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ rang
99b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas tsan+dan gyis las gang dag bgyis shing bsags na des de'i lus kyang dri gda' la dbang po lnga'ang rno bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
99b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des der dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la spos chu'i dbang bskur ba'ang phul/ me tog dag kyang btags te/
99b4(mdo sde): der rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam yang bsgoms so/ /dge slong dag /de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur stir bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /
99b5(mdo sde): mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom
99b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //pad+ma zhes bya ba ni/
99b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
100a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
100a2(mdo sde): kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye
100a3(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun
100a4(mdo sde): gsos dang / sman zod rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
100a5(mdo sde): na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yul dbus na 'khod pa rnams kyi lugs kyis na/ kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma rnams kyis pad+ma dag blangs te/ srang du song zhing 'tshong ngo / /de nas
100a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /bud med gcig kyang khye'u
100a7(mdo sde): zhig pang na thogs te/ srang du song ba las khye'u des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad
100b1(mdo sde): bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri po 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /
100b2(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te/ glo bur du lag pa brkyang nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma las pad+ma blangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la bor ro/ /de nas pad+ma de shing rta'i phang
100b3(mdo sde): lo tsam du gyur te/ steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la/ gzhes na ni sdod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad+ma rI ga'i mdog
100b4(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i 'od zer dag bkye nas/ des mnyan du yod pa ril gyis snang bar byas so/ /rgyu des na rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dad par byas so/ /de nas
100b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /
100b6(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang
100b7(mdo sde): sos dang / thig nag dang / bdud 'joms dang / du 'bod dang / du 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang /
101a1(mdo sde): so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha
101a2(mdo sde): ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems
101a3(mdo sde): can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye| ci| bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam
101a4(mdo sde): snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye| bdag cag ni 'di
101a5(mdo sde): nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du'ang ma skyed mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil
101a6(mdo sde): bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du
101a7(mdo sde): gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa
101b1(mdo sde): gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i
101b2(mdo sde): mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams
101b3(mdo sde): dang | dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang /
101b4(mdo sde): shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa
101b5(mdo sde): gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor ba gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par
101b6(mdo sde): gyis| |gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de
101b7(mdo sde): nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das
102a1(mdo sde): pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bdun
102a2(mdo sde): yongs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed
102a3(mdo sde): na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/
102a4(mdo sde): pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur
102a5(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi
102a6(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro//
102a7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan
102b1(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus
102b2(mdo sde): pa| tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang
102b3(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis
102b4(mdo sde): par| |pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu
102b5(mdo sde): mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams
102b6(mdo sde): gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
102b7(mdo sde): bo| de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad
103a1(mdo sde): do| |kun dga' bo/ khye'u 'di dad pa skyes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la pad+ma 'thor ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ khye'u 'di
103a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa bco lnga'i bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang / mi'i bde ba nyams
103a3(mdo sde): su myong nas/ rang sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag /de bas na 'di
103a4(mdo sde): ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
103a5(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
103a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha
103a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha'i lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir
103b1(mdo sde): byas| bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
103b2(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman
103b3(mdo sde): zod rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab nas ded dpon zhig rgya
103b4(mdo sde): mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs nas/ de'i chung ma lang tshol bab pa de khyim thab la gdung zhing yongs su mi chad la/ smre sngags 'don kyang / de'i khyim thab ma 'ongs nas des sred
103b5(mdo sde): med kyi bu la phyag btsal te dam bcas pa/ gal te bdag gi khyim thab myur du 'ongs na bdag gis khyod la gser gyi 'khor lo dbul lo zhes byas so/ /de nas de'i khyim thab rgya
103b6(mdo sde): mtsho'i nang nas myur du phyir 'khor te/ nye zho med par bde bar 'ongs so/ /de nas des gser gyi 'khor lo byed du bcug ste/ de bran po'i tshogs kyis bskor bas/ 'khor lo dang /
103b7(mdo sde): spos dang / gdug pa dang / me tog khyer te lha khang du chas so/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen ba'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/
104a1(mdo sde): thugs su mi chud pa ci'ang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba
104a2(mdo sde): gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la
104a3(mdo sde): legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po
104a4(mdo sde): bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs
104a5(mdo sde): pa| 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ rtag tu gnas par bye ba drug la gnas pa/ byang
104a6(mdo sde): chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/
104a7(mdo sde): phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum
104b1(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug /su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang / nyam pa dang / gnod
104b2(mdo sde): pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni
104b3(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge
104b4(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam
104b5(mdo sde): du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go / 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yel bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus
104b6(mdo sde): las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bu mo des nga mthong na/ rang byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam du gzigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro
104b7(mdo sde): sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i khab tu
105a1(mdo sde): bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dpe
105a2(mdo sde): byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzad par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong
105a3(mdo sde): ngo / /de nas mthong ba'i mod la dga' ba thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi 'khor lo dor bar byas so/ /de nas bran mos bkag ste/ 'di sred med kyi bu ma yin no zhes
105a4(mdo sde): byas so| |'on kyang de bkag bzhin du dad pa drag pos yid 'dun par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis steng du gser gyi 'khor lo bor ro/ /spos dang / bdug pa
105a5(mdo sde): dang / me tog kyang phul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/
105a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang
105a7(mdo sde): yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / du 'bod dang / du 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar
105b1(mdo sde): med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar
105b2(mdo sde): gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te
105b3(mdo sde): 'bab bo/ /de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye|ci| bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'o na te
105b4(mdo sde): gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye|
105b5(mdo sde): bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad
105b6(mdo sde): par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha
105b7(mdo sde): dang | mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nyid mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
106a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
106a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal
106a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang /
106a4(mdo sde): mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal
106a5(mdo sde): ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar
106a6(mdo sde): gyis| |'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab
106a7(mdo sde): spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/
106b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung sten par bzhad na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar
106b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi
106b3(mdo sde): mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gro skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi
106b4(mdo sde): mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed
106b5(mdo sde): na ni| phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye bar lung
106b6(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par
106b7(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur
107a1(mdo sde): ro| |de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang
107a2(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar
107a3(mdo sde): gyur| |de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi
107a4(mdo sde): dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal pa dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi
107a5(mdo sde): ston| |brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge slong rgyal dbang nyan pa so ma nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /
107a6(mdo sde): bzang po bdag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi
107a7(mdo sde): don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye ba phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni
107b1(mdo sde): de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ bu mo
107b2(mdo sde): 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la gser gyi 'khor lo bar ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ bu mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin
107b3(mdo sde): par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa bco lnga'i bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang / mi'i bde ba nyams su myong nas/ rang sangs rgyas 'khor lo bla ma zhes bya
107b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag /de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs
107b5(mdo sde): rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs
107b6(mdo sde): te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //mgo bcu pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po
107b7(mdo sde): chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams
108a1(mdo sde): dang | lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/
108a2(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes
108a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams
108a4(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ma ga d+ha na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis thag ring
108a5(mdo sde): po zhig nas mchod rten rnying pa rlung dang / nyi tshan gyis bshig pa zhig 'dug pa de mthong ngo / /mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ mchod rten 'di su'i lags/
108a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa'i yin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa ga
108a7(mdo sde): las byung lags/ ming ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa ga las byung ba dang / ming
108b1(mdo sde): ce las btags pa nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa/ nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'o na/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs
108b2(mdo sde): shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA ra NA si na/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /
108b3(mdo sde): rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge
108b4(mdo sde): dang | nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug go /rgyal po de'ang chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhig ste/
108b5(mdo sde): chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/ /de nas rgyal po de bu med nas bu 'dod de/ gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par
108b6(mdo sde): gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / su ma mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma
108b7(mdo sde): len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos mthun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la'ang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'jig rten na'ang gsol ba btab
109a1(mdo sde): pa'i rgyus/ bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de'ang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang / bu mo skye
109a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur du zin na ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la'ang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang / bu mo skye bar
109a3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs
109a4(mdo sde): ba las bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ de'ang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ de'i skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma
109a5(mdo sde): dkar bos gang ba/ 'gram dang pa dang / dur pa dang / zel mo la sogs pa bya sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas ba zhig yod pa de'i nang nas kyang pad+ma tshad las 'das par che
109a6(mdo sde): ba zhig glo tol du skyes te/ de nyin gcig bzhin du cher skye la/ kha ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal pos
109a7(mdo sde): kyang pad+ma de legs par srungs shig ces bsgo'o/ /phyis re zhig na nyi ma 'char kar pad+ma de kha bye nas/ pad+ma de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa
109b1(mdo sde): mdog bzang ba/ gsar gyi kha dog can/ mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ sna mtho ba/ sna legs pa/ smin ma stug pa/ lus skyes bu chen
109b2(mdo sde): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa zhig skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas
109b3(mdo sde): kyang rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal pos thos nas/ blon po dang / btsun mo dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal du dong ste/ pad+ma'i snying po la de lta bur mdzes shig 'dug pa mthong ngo //
109b4(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste/ yi rangs nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas khye'u de blangs te bkur sti chen po dang ldan
109b5(mdo sde): pas rang gi pho brang du khyer nas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / mtshan mkhan dag la bsnyad de/ zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/
109b6(mdo sde): mgo bcu pa zhes ming btags so/ /de nas khye'u mgo bcu pa bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma
109b7(mdo sde): ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo
110a1(mdo sde): cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur te/ khye'u de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ bsam pa bzang zhing dge ba bdag la phan
110a2(mdo sde): pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig ste/ des yab rgyal sa na 'dug pa na/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas
110a3(mdo sde): pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las dag byed pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khye'u de mi dga' nas yab la gsol pa/ yab/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
110a4(mdo sde): la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/ /yab kyis kyang gnang ste/ de skra dang / kha spu bregs nas gos tshon can bgos te/ yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim
110a5(mdo sde): med par rab tu byung ngo / /de nas des lung mnos pa med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du
110a6(mdo sde): byas nas/ nam mkha' la 'phags te/ yab la cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/ /de nas yab kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos la sbyan drangs so/ /de nas de'i lus thogs
110a7(mdo sde): pas yongs su skyo nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par song ste/ de'i mchod rten 'di yin no/ /de nas dge slong
110b1(mdo sde): rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pas las gang dag bgyis na/ ma'i mngal du
110b2(mdo sde): ma skyes te/ pad+ma las skyes lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /mgo bcu pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa
110b3(mdo sde): dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ mgo bcu pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan
110b4(mdo sde): su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang /
110b5(mdo sde): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i sung po dang / khams dang / skye
110b6(mdo sde): mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid
110b7(mdo sde): du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig
111a1(mdo sde): pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/
111a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de/ rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen
111a3(mdo sde): ldan zhes bya ba na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/
111a4(mdo sde): dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /ded dpon
111a5(mdo sde): zhig kyang pad+ma khyer te srang du zhugs so/ /de nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan
111a6(mdo sde): pa| dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang
111a7(mdo sde): ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu pad+ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du bor te/ bor ma thag tu pad+ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du shing rta'i phang lo tsam du gyur te/ bcom
111b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la/ gzhes na ni sdod do/ /de nas re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis ded dpon de rang byang chub tu lung bstan
111b2(mdo sde): to| |de nas dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas rang gi khyim du song ba dang / de'i skabs su de'i chung ma bu btsa' zhing 'dug ste/ skad ngan mthon nas/ des bran mo la de ci zhig
111b3(mdo sde): ces dris so/ /des kyang de bzhin du bsnyan do/ /de nas ded dpon de mi dga' bar gyur nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag nam yang 'khor ba na ma'i mngal du skye bar ma gyur cig byas
111b4(mdo sde): so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa de yin te/ dge
111b5(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du nam yang ma'i mngal du ma skyes la/ srid pa tha ma la'ang de'i 'byor pa de 'dra bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de bas na 'di ltar
111b6(mdo sde): bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
111b7(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //mdog 'jam zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
112a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / yo brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
112a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po
112a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang /
112a4(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan
112a5(mdo sde): dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi
112a6(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ nor dang yo byad mang pa/ bdag dbang ba mang pa/ mdza'
112a7(mdo sde): bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs mang ba zhig yod de/ khyim bdag de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la
112b1(mdo sde): phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ longs spyod 'di dag ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin can/ smig rgyu dang
112b2(mdo sde): 'dra ba/ mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug pa ma yin pa/ yid brtan du mi rung ba 'gyur ba'i chos can/ gnod pa chen po lnga dang thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyi/ bdag gis sangs
112b3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus gsol la/ zhal zas bzang pos tshim par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas des bcom
112b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol pa dang / gdugs tshod gsol bar spyan drangs so/ /de nas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das nyan
112b5(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus la gshegs so/ /de nas
112b6(mdo sde): tshong dpon de til mar spos can khyer te bsro khang du song nas/ bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de nas gang gi tshe
112b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol zin pa de'i tshe/ khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la rang gi lag nas/
113a1(mdo sde): bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/ /rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam
113a2(mdo sde): grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/ gsang sder ni gyu/ phyag ni bcabs par rig nas stan ches dma'
113a3(mdo sde): ba zhig khyer te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par
113a4(mdo sde): 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/ /chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /
113a5(mdo sde): yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas tshong dpon de dad pa rnyed nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du/
113a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ sems la rtas par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
113a7(mdo sde): 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni
113b1(mdo sde): 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bdud 'joms dang / du 'bod dang / du 'bod
113b2(mdo sde): chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas
113b3(mdo sde): pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang pa'i sems can
113b4(mdo sde): dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/
113b5(mdo sde): kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis
113b6(mdo sde): sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye/ bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba
113b7(mdo sde): 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba
114a1(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur
114a2(mdo sde): ro| |steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga'
114a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams
114a4(mdo sde): dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams
114a5(mdo sde): skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar
114a6(mdo sde): du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par
114a7(mdo sde): gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod
114b1(mdo sde): spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
114b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kye phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
114b3(mdo sde): snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na
114b4(mdo sde): ni| zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/
114b5(mdo sde): zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston
114b6(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
114b7(mdo sde): lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
115a1(mdo sde): tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par
115a2(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams
115a3(mdo sde): kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal
115a4(mdo sde): gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags
115a5(mdo sde): dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi
115a6(mdo sde): ston| / brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang
115a7(mdo sde): po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo
115b1(mdo sde): 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ /kun dga'
115b2(mdo sde): bo| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ tshong dpon 'dis nga la 'di
115b3(mdo sde): lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ tshong dpon 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su
115b4(mdo sde): gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas mdog 'jam zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga las sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag /
115b5(mdo sde): de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom
115b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs
115b7(mdo sde): pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa/ 'od bsil zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang
116a1(mdo sde): 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams
116a2(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang /
116a3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen
116a4(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du
116a5(mdo sde): yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod
116a6(mdo sde): che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/ de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing
116a7(mdo sde): bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan dag la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig go /de nas de
116b1(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ longs spyod 'di dag ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin can/ glang po che'i rna ba ltar g.yo ba/ mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug pa ma yin pa/ yid brtan du mi rung
116b2(mdo sde): ba| 'gyur ba'i chos can/ gnod pa chen po lnga dang thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyi/ bdag gis longs spyod snying po med pa las snying po blang bar bya gor ma chags snyam mo/ /des sos
116b3(mdo sde): ka'i dus la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/ khyim yang rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas te/ tsan+dan
116b4(mdo sde): gyi chus ni chag chag btab/ spos sna tshogs kyi snod ni bkram/ dri zhim po'i bdug pas ni bdugs/ me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/ me tog gi gdan rnams ni bshams so/ /
116b5(mdo sde): de nas khu ba bsil ba'i btung ba rnams dang / 'khur ba dang / bshos rnams sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/ btsun pa/ gdugs
116b6(mdo sde): tshod la bab ste/ bshos gsol lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham
116b7(mdo sde): thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas/ khyim bdag de'i khyim ga
117a1(mdo sde): la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs
117a2(mdo sde): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/ /rang gi lag
117a3(mdo sde): nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/ bsang sder ni gyu/
117a4(mdo sde): phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la
117a5(mdo sde): chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/ /chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du
117a6(mdo sde): mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim
117a7(mdo sde): bdag de dad pa rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ sems la rtas par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs
117b1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum par mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni/
117b2(mdo sde): 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bdud 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod
117b3(mdo sde): chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kye hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar
117b4(mdo sde): gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems
117b5(mdo sde): can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems
117b6(mdo sde): te| kye| ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de
117b7(mdo sde): dag gi sprul ba mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye| bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang
118a1(mdo sde): ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur
118a2(mdo sde): nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par
118a3(mdo sde): gyur to/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul
118a4(mdo sde): dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams
118a5(mdo sde): dang | tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes
118a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song
118a7(mdo sde): nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par
118b1(mdo sde): gyis| |sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod
118b2(mdo sde): par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad bar byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
118b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam
118b4(mdo sde): logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun la logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na
118b5(mdo sde): ni| zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na
118b6(mdo sde): ni| zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung
118b7(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur
119a1(mdo sde): ro/ /lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur
119a2(mdo sde): ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston
119a3(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams
119a4(mdo sde): kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal
119a5(mdo sde): gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags
119a6(mdo sde): dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/ /
119a7(mdo sde): brtan pos nyad kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge slong rgyal dbang nyan ba so ma nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang po dag gis
119b1(mdo sde): the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ |rgyal mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa
119b2(mdo sde): ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de
119b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ khyim bdag 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i
119b4(mdo sde): bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ khyim bdag 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba
119b5(mdo sde): 'dis| rang sangs rgyas 'od bsil zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag /de bas na 'di ltar bslab par
119b6(mdo sde): bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
119b7(mdo sde): nas| dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //mnyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po
120a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha
120a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor
120a3(mdo sde): byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
120a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/
120a5(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ga ga d+ha na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang+ga'i'i klung gi 'gram du byon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis
120a6(mdo sde): zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan pa rnams ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ mnyan pa rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
120a7(mdo sde): kye| chu klung 'di las nga sgrol cig /mnyan pa rnams kyis gsol pa/ gru btsas stsol cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nga
120b1(mdo sde): yang sngon mnyan pa byed byed de/ ngas dga' bo ni 'dod chags kyi chu klung du lhung ba las bsgral/ sor phreng ni zhe sdang gi rgya mtshor lhung ba las bsgral/ bram ze'i bu nga rgyal gyis khengs
120b2(mdo sde): pa ni nga rgyal gyi mtshor lhung ba las bsgral/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ni gti mug gi rgya mtshor lhung ba las bsgral te/ 'on kyang ngas gru btsas ma blangs so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal
120b3(mdo sde): kyang bsgral bar khas ma blangs so/ /de nas mnyan pa zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'ang thos/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa de'ang
120b4(mdo sde): mthong nas dad pa skyes te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bsgral bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/ /de nas dge slong rnams gyur zhugs pa
120b5(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan pa de bas kyang ches sngar pha rol gyi 'gram du zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas mnyan pa des rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de mthong nas/ sems
120b6(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur te zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ mnyan pa des
120b7(mdo sde): de thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /des bden pa mthong nas dga'
121a1(mdo sde): ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i ri la bsgral ba
121a2(mdo sde): dang / ngan song gi sgo thams cad bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang nas bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma
121a3(mdo sde): bgyis| mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis
121a4(mdo sde): kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyis mthu
121a5(mdo sde): yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag
121a6(mdo sde): khyod la brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye
121a7(mdo sde): dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba las/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de'i nang nas mnyan pa gcig cig 'gyod pa chen
121b1(mdo sde): po skyes nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te nyes pa bshags nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol to/ /de nas bcom
121b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser
121b3(mdo sde): po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang
121b4(mdo sde): sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / du 'bod do/ /du 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang /
121b5(mdo sde): so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal
121b6(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/ /des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i
121b7(mdo sde): khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye| ci| bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ /de nas de dag dad
122a1(mdo sde): pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye| bdag cag ni 'di
122a2(mdo sde): nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams
122a3(mdo sde): rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang / mi rnams
122a4(mdo sde): kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur bas der nyid mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /
122a5(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsung pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnam dang / tshangs ris rnams
122a6(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung
122a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang /
122b1(mdo sde): mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams gyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag
122b2(mdo sde): med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rngod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang
122b3(mdo sde): chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal zad par
122b4(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur/ /zhes rjod par byed do/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang
122b5(mdo sde): ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i las lung
122b6(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi rnams bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dud
122b7(mdo sde): 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/
123a1(mdo sde): mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed
123a2(mdo sde): na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
123a3(mdo sde): lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi
123a4(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/
123a5(mdo sde): dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod
123a6(mdo sde): spur mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/ /mang po zhal gyi
123a7(mdo sde): sgo nas byung bar gyur/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing
123b1(mdo sde): rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ /pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum
123b2(mdo sde): mi ston/ /brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ /dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/ /thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / /bzang
123b3(mdo sde): po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston/ /gang gi don du dpa'
123b4(mdo sde): bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/
123b5(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ mnyan pa
123b6(mdo sde): 'dis nga la sems dga' ba bskyed pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ mnyan pa 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa/ sbyin par bya ba'i
123b7(mdo sde): chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba brgal ces bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dad par byas
124a1(mdo sde): pa 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag /de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes
124a2(mdo sde): dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
124a3(mdo sde): par bstod do/ / //spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang /
124a4(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang /
124a5(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
124a6(mdo sde): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan
124a7(mdo sde): pa| na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na/
124b1(mdo sde): 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yul dbus na 'khong ba'i yul mi rnams kyi lugs kyis na/ phal cher byug pa sna tshogs kyis lus skud
124b2(mdo sde): par byed do/ /de nas re zhig na khyim bdag gi bu zhig yod pa de'i bran mo dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa de'i tsan+dan dmar po bdar zhing 'dug go /
124b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyi zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du
124b4(mdo sde): bdar nas rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par
124b5(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang
