181b3(mdo sde): la brten nas/ sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba'i chos can las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang /

181b6(mdo sde): grangs 'di kho nas khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i grogs po dang / dge ba'i rten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa ril

182a2(mdo sde): slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa
182a3(mdo sde): bzhi pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs rnams rdzogs so// //sdom ni/ bu ram gnas dang kha zas dang / /chu dang phyi sa'i snod rnams dang / /
182a4(mdo sde): mo'u dag la bu dang chu smad dang / /dmus long dang ni tshong dpon dang / /bu rnams dang ni phyi sa khung / /sde tshan dag tu bstan pa yin/ /bu ram 'tshir ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni/
182a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
182a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po
182a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci
182b1(mdo sde): dang | lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang /
182b2(mdo sde): gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/
182b3(mdo sde): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'di'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis
182b4(mdo sde): kyis 'di ltar dam bcas te/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams kyi nang nas sems can gcig tsam yang thar bar ma byas kyi bar du zan mi bza'o
182b5(mdo sde): zhes byas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa de gnyis dus su res 'ga' ni sems can dmyal bar rgyu zhing 'gro'o/ /res dga' ni dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu zhing 'gro'o/ /res dga' ni yi dwags
182b6(mdo sde): kyi nang du rgyu zhing 'gro'o/ /de gnyis kyis der sems can gnod pa sna tshogs kyis nyen pa rnams kyi skad ngan thos nas rgyu ba las slar 'khor te/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la rjod
182b7(mdo sde): par byed do/ /de dag gis kyang thos nas skyo bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de gnyis kyis de las brten nas de dang mthun pa'i chos ston par byed de/ des na sems can du mas thos nas
183a1(mdo sde): khyad par thob par 'gyur ba dang / chos thos pa dang / gtam bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro/ /phyis re zhig na tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po yi dwags
183a2(mdo sde): kyi nang du rgyu zhing song ba dang / yi dwags lto ni ri tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi zhig tsam ste/ rang gi skras yog pa/ 'bar zhing / rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar
183a3(mdo sde): nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag po dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang / bshang gcig la yod pa der 'khor la/
183a4(mdo sde): de'ang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas gnas brtan des yi dwags de la dris pa/ kye| khyod kyis las ci zhig byas nas/ des 'di lta bu sdug bsngal drag po dang / mi bzad
183a5(mdo sde): pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing 'dug /yi dwags kyis smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyi/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus zhig dang / de khyod
183a6(mdo sde): la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du
183a7(mdo sde): yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po
183b1(mdo sde): rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsung ba/ tshur shog
183b2(mdo sde): 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba/ sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ tshur
183b3(mdo sde): shog / khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod da gdod ga las 'ongs/ mo'u dgal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag ni yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las slar mchis te/
183b4(mdo sde): der bdag gis yi dwags lto ni ri tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ rang gi skras yog pa/ phyi sa bzhin du dri nga ba/ mchog tu dri nga ba/ mi sdug pa/ mchog tu mi sdug pa/ zas su
183b5(mdo sde): phyi sa 'tshal la/ de yang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la/ /mchu dang lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug /rang gi
183b6(mdo sde): sgras ni gdong g.yog gcer bar mchis/ /mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu ring / /de ltar gcer bu skras yog pa/ /rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin/ /thod pa thogs shing
183b7(mdo sde): mi bzad la/ /du zhing kun tu rgyug par bgyid/ /bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis/ /du bcing sdug bsngal dag gis nye na/ /nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid/ /sdug bsngal tshor
184a1(mdo sde): ba nyams su myong / /de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ /rab 'jigs sdig ba ci bgyis na/ /des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /'jigs su rung ba myong bar 'gyur//
184a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ yi dwags de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no/ /de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa/ nyan
184a3(mdo sde): par 'tshal lags so/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ 'o na/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal
184a4(mdo sde): po'i khab kyi grong khyer na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang
184a5(mdo sde): 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa de'i bu ram shing 'tshir ba'i gnas grwa lnga brgya yod do/ /de dag tu de bu ram shing 'tshir bar byed do/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe/
184a6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ re
184a7(mdo sde): zhig na rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba zhig byung nas/ de snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs
184b1(mdo sde): nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song ngo / /btsun pa/ de'ang nad khong skam gyis thebs te/ de la sman pas bu ram shing gi khu ba phan par bstan nas/ tshong dpon chen po de'i thad du
184b2(mdo sde): song ngo / /tshong dpon gyis kyang rang sangs rgyas lus kyang mdzes la sems kyang mdzes pa de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshong dpon gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci bzhed/ rang sangs
184b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag /bu ram shing gi khu ba 'dod do/ /de nas khyim bdag des tshal za zhig la 'phags pa la bu ram shing gi khu ba phul cig ces bsgo nas/ khyim bdag de ni
184b4(mdo sde): don zhig la phyi rol tu chas so/ /de nas mi de gzhan gyi rdzas la ser sna skyes nas/ gal te bdag gis 'di la bu ram shing gi khu ba byin du zin na phyis kyang 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur ro
184b5(mdo sde): snyam te/ mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba gsum gyi g.yan sar gzhol ba thams cad kyis 'dod par bya ba'i 'gro ba gnyis bor ba/ 'phags pa'i lam rnams thag pa srings pa des sdig
184b6(mdo sde): pa'i sems bskyed nas/ rang sangs rgyas de la smras pa/ dge slong / lhung bzed tshur byin cig dang / bu ram shing gi khu ba sbyin no zhes byas so/ /nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa
184b7(mdo sde): dang | rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma dgongs kyi bar du shes pa'i mthong ba mi 'jug ste/ sdug cing phongs pa la snying brtse bas mi de la ngas phan gdags par bya'o snyam nas lhung
185a1(mdo sde): bzed de byin no/ /de nas spyod pa ngan cing snying rje med pa des de blangs te/ lkog zhig tu song nas gcin gyis bkang ste/ steng du bu ram shing gi khu ba'i dbu bas
185a2(mdo sde): bkab nas rang sangs rgyas de la phul ba dang / des tshor nas/ des bsams pa/ nyon mongs 'dis sdig pa chen po zhig byas kyi mad do snyam ste/ de phyogs gcig tu song nas pho ste
185a3(mdo sde): song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus tshal za gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dwags 'di yin te/ las de'i rnam
185a4(mdo sde): par smin pas 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur la/ da ltar yang yi dags su gyur nas/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong ba yin no/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ de bas na
185a5(mdo sde): ci nas yi dwags de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni
185a6(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren
185a7(mdo sde): ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig
185b1(mdo sde): tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang
185b2(mdo sde): ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das
185b3(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //kha zas zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug
185b4(mdo sde): po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin
185b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang /
185b6(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod
185b7(mdo sde): nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
186a1(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu
186a2(mdo sde): chen po nyin par gnas pa'i phyir shing zhig gi drung du 'dug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos yi dwags mo zhig gi sgra thos te/ nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin cing
186a3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste/ kha zas slong zhing / grogs mo dag /bdag bkres so/ /grogs mo dag /bdag
186a4(mdo sde): skom mo zhes zer ba thos so/ /de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos yi dwags mo de mthong nas dris pa/ khyod kyis las ci zhig byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal dag
186a5(mdo sde): myong zhing 'dug / yi dwags mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyi/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston
186a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/
186a7(mdo sde): 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po rnams mi g.yo ba/ bcom ldan 'das
186b1(mdo sde): las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsung ba/ tshur shog /'ongs pa legs so
186b2(mdo sde): zhes gzung ba/ sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ tshur shog /
186b3(mdo sde): khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/ mo'u dgal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag ni yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las slar mchis te/
186b4(mdo sde): der bdag gis yi dwags mo lto ni ri tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ rang gi skras yog pa/ gcer bur mchis shing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa
186b5(mdo sde): dang | mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la/ /mchu dang
186b6(mdo sde): lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug / rang gi skras ni gdong yog gcer bar mchis/ /mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu rid/ /de ltar gcer bu skras yog par /rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor
186b7(mdo sde): bsgreng ba bzhin/ /thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la/ /du zhing kun du rgyugs par bgyid/ /bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis/ /dub cing sdug bsngal dag gis nyan/ /nyam thag skad kyang
187a1(mdo sde): 'byin par byed/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong / /de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ /rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/ /des na sdug bsngal
187a2(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba/ /'jigs su rung ba myong bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ yi dwags mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin
187a3(mdo sde): no| |de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa/ nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ 'o na/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas
187a4(mdo sde): bshad do/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang
187a5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang /
187a6(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA ra NA si na/ drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs
187a7(mdo sde): so| |de nas grong khyer wA ra NA si de na/ khyim bdag cig gi chung ma ser sna can/ 'jungs pa/ yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa/ khra la'ang gtor ma mi ster na/ slong ba gzhan
187b1(mdo sde): dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa zhig yod do/ de dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing phongs pa dang / bkren pa dag mthong na sems kyis sdang bar byed do/ /re zhig na bsod
187b2(mdo sde): snyoms pa zhig de'i khyim du 'ongs nas/ des de mthong na ser sna skyes te/ sems kyang sdang bar gyur nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gis 'di la bkur sti byas na
187b3(mdo sde): ni| 'di phyis kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas sdig can des tshe phyi ma'i mi sdug pa khyad du bsad nas/ dge slong de nang du bos te sgro bcad nas smyung du bcug go /mang
187b4(mdo sde): du'ang spyos te/ dge slong khyod la bkur sti ma yin pa byas pa 'di yin gyi/ phyin chad khyim 'dir ma 'ongs shig /ces byas so/ /de nas de ser sna kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/
187b5(mdo sde): mang du byas pa des yi dwags su skyes te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo / /mo'u dgal gyi bu de bas na ci nas/ yi dwags mo de'i nyes pa gang yin pa de lta bu dang /
187b6(mdo sde): mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spong ba la brtson par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu dang / lha dang / lha ma yin
187b7(mdo sde): dang | nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //
188a1(mdo sde): chu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi
188a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding
188a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
188a4(mdo sde): dang | lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po
188a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
188a6(mdo sde): bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na brten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu
188a7(mdo sde): zhing song ba dang / yi dwags mo sdong du ma me reg 'dra la rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri rab tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar
188b1(mdo sde): te| me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ skom gyis gdungs te sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i
188b2(mdo sde): tshor ba myong ba dang / des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang / khron pa rnams skam par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe char 'bab pa de'i tshe/ de'i steng du me stag 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i
188b3(mdo sde): char 'bab pa zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de la smras pa/ kyai/ khyod kyi sdig pa ci zhig byas nas/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ba myong
188b4(mdo sde): zhing 'dug / yi dwags mos smras pa/ btsun pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ bdag ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus zhig dang /
188b5(mdo sde): de khyod la bdag gis las kyi rnam pa ston par 'gyur te/ de thos nas sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi
188b6(mdo sde): bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol
188b7(mdo sde): ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas
189a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsung ba/ tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba/ sngar
189a2(mdo sde): 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ tshur shog /khyod 'ongs pa
189a3(mdo sde): legs so/ /khyod/ da gzod ga las 'ongs/ mo'u dgal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag ni yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las slar mchis te/ de bdag
189a4(mdo sde): gis yi dwags mo sdong po me reg 'dra la rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig
189a5(mdo sde): tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la skom gyis gdungs te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong
189a6(mdo sde): ba dang / des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang / khron pa rnams skam par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe char 'bab pa de'i steng du me stag 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i char 'bab pa
189a7(mdo sde): zhig mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ yi dwags mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no/ /de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod
189b1(mdo sde): dam| btsun pa/ nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ 'o na/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba
189b2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs
189b3(mdo sde): su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
189b4(mdo sde): 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de grong khyer wA ra NA si na/ drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs pa na/ der dge slong zhig lam du zhugs nas de skom
189b5(mdo sde): gyis gdungs te/ khron pa'i drung du song nas/ de na bu mo zhig bum pa chus bkang ste/ 'dug pa la dge slong des smras pa/ che zhe/ bdag ni skom gyis gdungs kyi/ chu byin cig
189b6(mdo sde): ces byas na/ yo byad la kun tu 'dzin pa de ser sna skyes nas/ dge slong de la smras pa/ dge slong / bdag gi bum pa 'gribs su 'ong gis gal te khyod shin na'ang chu mi sbyin no zhes
189b7(mdo sde): byas so/ /de nas dge slong de skom gyis gdungs bzhin du re thag chad nas song ngo / /de nas bu mo de ser sna kun tu bstan cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas pa de lta bus shi nas yi dwags su
190a1(mdo sde): skyes te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing 'dug go /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ de bas na 'di
190a2(mdo sde): ltar bslab par bya ste/ ser sna spang bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o zhes/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
190a3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
190a4(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ phyi sa'i snod ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
190a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang /
190a6(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir
190a7(mdo sde): byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod
190b1(mdo sde): cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/
190b2(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po snga gro sham thabs dang /
190b3(mdo sde): chos gos bgos nas lhung bzed thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms byas te/ zan zos nas zas phyis len pa spangs te/ lhung bzed dang
190b4(mdo sde): chos gos bzhag nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzegs te nyin par gnas pa'i phyir/ shing zhig gi drung du rten cing 'dug go /de nas
190b5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos yi dwags mo sdong du ma me reg 'dra la/ gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar
190b6(mdo sde): la kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba/
190b7(mdo sde): phyi sa bzhin du dri nga zhing mchog tu dri nga ba/ zas su phyi sa za la de'ang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nas yi dwags
191a1(mdo sde): mo la dris pa/ khyod kyis sngon sdig pa ci zhig byas na des 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu myong zhing 'dug /yi dwags mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ bdag ni sdig
191a2(mdo sde): pa byed byed pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus zhig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos nas sems can gzhan dag kyang
191a3(mdo sde): sdig pa'i las spong bar gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas
191a4(mdo sde): 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang
191a5(mdo sde): ldan no cog nyan par byed do| / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong bor gsung ba/ snyan par gsung ba/ tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung pa/ sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der
191a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/ mo'u dga' gyi bu
191a7(mdo sde): bus gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag ni yi dwags kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las der bdag gis yi dwags mo sdong du ma me reg 'dra la/ gcer bur mchis shing rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri
191b1(mdo sde): tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi
191b2(mdo sde): bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang / des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang / khron pa rnams ska mar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe char 'bab pa de'i ste de'i steng du mi stag
191b3(mdo sde): 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i char 'bab pa dang / phyi sa bzhin dring zhing mchog tu dri nga ba/ zas su phyi sa za ba 'tshal la/ de yang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ nyam thag
191b4(mdo sde): skad kyang 'byin par byed/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong / /gang na phyi sa'i gnas yod pa/ /der ni sdug bzhin rgyug par bgyid/ /phyi sa bza' 'am btung snyam na/ /de yang bde blag
191b5(mdo sde): rnyed mi 'gyur/ /de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ /sdig pa rab 'jigs ci bgyis na/ /des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /'jigs su rung ba nyams su myong / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
191b6(mdo sde): pa| mo'u dgal gyi bu/ yi dwags mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no/ /de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa/ nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ 'o na/ legs par
191b7(mdo sde): nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA ra NA si na rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal
192a1(mdo sde): gyis 'tsho ba zhig yod la/ de yang nad bu can zhig ste/ wA ra NA sir bsod snyoms la song ngo / /re zhig na de la sman pas mthun pa'i zas bstan nas/
192a2(mdo sde): de tshong dpon zhig 'dug pa ga la ba der song ba dang / ded dpon des kyang mthong nas dris pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod ci bzhed/ des smras pa/ mthun pa'i kha zas 'dod do/ /de nas
192a3(mdo sde): tshong dpon des 'phags pa la kha zas mthun pa phul cig mna' ma la bsgo'o/ /de nas de'i mna' ma ser sna skyes te/ gal te bdag gis deng 'di la kha zas byin du zin na
192a4(mdo sde): sang yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ phyogs gcig tu song ste/ lhung bzed phyi sas bkang nas/ steng 'bres chen gyis bkab ste/ rang sangs rgyas de la phul lo/ /nyan
192a5(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma dgongs kyi bar du shes pa'i mthong ba mi 'jug ste/ des blangs so/ /blangs nas tshor te/ 'di dring ba las na 'dis phyi sas bkang
192a6(mdo sde): gor ma chag go snyam mo/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po des de ga zhig tu bor nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ de'i
192a7(mdo sde): tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi mna' mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dwags mo 'di yin te/ des sdig pa'i las de lta bu byas nas/ de phyin chad rtag tu sems can dmyal ba dang /
192b1(mdo sde): dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams su skyes te/ rtag tu zas su phyi sa za bar gyur to/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ de bas na ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ ci nas yi dwags mo de'i nyes pa de lta
192b2(mdo sde): bu dag 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal byi bu dang / lha dang /
192b3(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //
192b4(mdo sde): mo'u dgal gyi bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon
192b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto
192b6(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto
192b7(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos
193a1(mdo sde): dang | sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe
193a2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab kyi ni pha rol/ 'od ma'i tshal gyi ni tshu rol de'i bar skabs na/ yi dwags mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la/ gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha ni
193a3(mdo sde): khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ste/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad
193a4(mdo sde): pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba lnga brgya khwa khyus lding ba bzhin du nam mkha' la 'khor te/ gang du'ang 'dug sa mi rnyed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
193a5(mdo sde): pa mo'u dgal gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la song ba dang / des yi dwags de dag mthong ngo / /
193a6(mdo sde): yi dwags de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mthong ngo / /de nas de dag gcig tu 'dril nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i thad du dong ste/ phyi nas
193a7(mdo sde): snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la gti zhing smra bar tshig mthun par smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu/ bdag cag ni rgyal po'i khab tu tshong dpon lnga brgyar gyur te/
193b1(mdo sde): bdag cag ser sna can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams la kun tu 'dzin par gyur nas/ bdag cag nyid kyis kyang sbyin pa ma byin la/ gzhan dag sbyin pa byed pa la'ang bgegs byas so/ /
193b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la yang yi dwags kyi tshig lta bus mang du spyos te/ khyod ni yi dwags su skyes pa bzhin du gzhan gyi khyim phyi nyug pa'o zhes byas so/ /des na bdag cag shi ba'i 'og tu
193b3(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i yi dwags su skyes so/ /btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ de bas na bdag cag gi nye du rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa de dag la bdag cag gi las kyi rnam pa shes par
193b4(mdo sde): mdzod la dad pa dris te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas/ bdag cag gi slad du yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig /'on tang bdag
193b5(mdo sde): cag yi dwags kyi skye gnas nas thar kyang srid do zhes gsungs shig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bus kyang yi dwags rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/ /de nas tshe
193b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bus de dag gi nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas/ phyi de nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs so/ /yi
193b7(mdo sde): dwags rnams la'ang sbran te/ sang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos la spyan drangs kyi khyed kyang der shog cig ces byas so/ /de dag gi nye du rnams la'ang
194a1(mdo sde): khyed kyang shog cig dang / nye du'i mchod ston byed pa der yi dwags de dag mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal
194a2(mdo sde): gyi bu nyid mchod ston gyi zhal ta byed pa la zhugs so/ /de nas nam nangs nas zhal zas bshams te/ gdugs tshod la bab na yi dwags de dag mi snang ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan
194a3(mdo sde): pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos lha'i mig gis yi dwags de dag bsams na/ yul ma ga d+ha thog thag na'ang mi snang la/ mthar gyis gling bzhi'i bar du bltas na'ang de na yang mi snang
194a4(mdo sde): ngo| |de nas ji srid du de'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa de srid du bltas kyang de na'ang mi snang ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan
194a5(mdo sde): 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi sbyin bdag de rnams mi gda' lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ thongs la/ khyod mi
194a6(mdo sde): dgar ma byed cig / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag yod de/ de dag tu las kyi rlung gis 'phangs mod
194a7(mdo sde): kyi| 'on kyang mo'u dgal gyi bu/ deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la ltos shig /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mngon par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu
194b1(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'ang bstan gyi gaN+Di rdungs shig / de nas gaN+Di brdungs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyang 'dus/ yi dwags kyi nye du rnams dang / yi dwags
194b2(mdo sde): mthong bar 'dod pa'i sems can gzhan dag kyang ltad mo la lhags te 'dus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas yi dwags rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
194b3(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ba mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag cag gi phyir nye du rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bshos gsol zhing
194b4(mdo sde): 'khod do snyam du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pas yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di
194b5(mdo sde): yi bsod nams gang / /de ni yi dwags phyi bzhin song / /yi dwags 'jig rten rab 'jigs las/ /de dag myur du thar gyur cig /ces gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
194b6(mdo sde): gzhi de las brten nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas ser sna'i dri ma spangs te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /yi dwags de dag kyang
194b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems
195a1(mdo sde): rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas yi dwags las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa
195a2(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur ba de dag gis mthong ngo / /de nas sngon yi dwags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du
195a3(mdo sde): sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon te gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyi/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir
195a4(mdo sde): 'dong ngo snyam mo/ /de nas sngon yi dwags su gyur pa'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i
195a5(mdo sde): cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spri ka la la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da
195a6(mdo sde): dang | pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
195a7(mdo sde): la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dwags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa
195b1(mdo sde): dang | bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de ngang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon yi dwags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis khyad par chen po thob
195b2(mdo sde): po| |de dag tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa bzhin du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
195b3(mdo sde): dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ khyod kyis yi dwags mang po dag lha'i nang du bkod nas de dag kyang mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ de dag la ngas chos
195b4(mdo sde): bstan nas/ de dag gis rnyed par bya ba rnyed de mthong bar 'gyur ba rnyed nas dong ba de ni khyod kyis zhal ta byas pa 'bras bu yod par gyur te/ legs so/ /legs so/ /de nas tshe
195b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de dag gi nye du rnams la'ang shes par byas te/ de dag gis thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga'
195b6(mdo sde): bar gyur nas bkur sti byas so/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ de bas na khyod kyis ci nas yi dwags de dag gi nyes pa de lta bu dag mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spong ba la brtson par bya'o//
195b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa
196a1(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //chu smad ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
196a2(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams
196a3(mdo sde): dang | gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri
196a4(mdo sde): mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
196a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa
196a6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na tshong dpon phyug cing
196a7(mdo sde): nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas ba das rigs mnyam
196b1(mdo sde): pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing 'ga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/
196b2(mdo sde): dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste khye'u zhig btsas nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de nye du rnams na re/ khye'u
196b3(mdo sde): 'di rgyu skar chu smad la btsas pas na/ de'i phyir ming chu smad ces gdags so zhes zer nas/ de'i ming chu smad ces btags so/ /de nas khye'u chu smad bskyed bsrings te cher skyes nas/
196b4(mdo sde): de'i pha shi ba dang / rang gi khyim gyi bdag por gyur to/ /de nas des tshong dus bkram nas nyo tshong byed cing nyo tshong gis 'tsho bar byed pa las/ de nyin gcig bzhin du bcom ldan
196b5(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad du song ste/ des bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang / dam pa'i chos thos pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par gyur nas/ de rab tu 'byung ba'i sems
196b6(mdo sde): skyes te/ des ma la gsol ba btab pa/ yum| bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gi gnang bar mdzod cig /de nas de'i mas smras pa/ bu/ khyod ni bu gcig
196b7(mdo sde): pa yin gyi/ bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rab tu ma 'byung zhig /bdag shi ba'i 'og tu ci bya ba byos shig ces zer ro/ /chu smad des kyang ci rnyed pa de dag thams cad ma la byin
197a1(mdo sde): te| yum| 'dis dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing phongs pa dang / bkren pa rnams la sbyin pa dag gyis shig ces byas so/ /de'i ma de ni rkam
197a2(mdo sde): chags can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa zhig ste/ kaR+Sha pa Na de dag spas nas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze gang dag zas 'dod de/ khyim der 'ongs pa de dag la rgya che
197a3(mdo sde): zhing khyed ni yi dwags su skyes pa bzhin du khyim phyi nyug cing slong ngo zhes zer ro/ /bu de la'ang slu bar byed de/ bdag gis nyin gcig bzhin du dge slong 'di snyed 'di snyed
197a4(mdo sde): cig la zan byin no zhes zer ro/ /phyis re zhig na de shi ba dang / de yi dwags su skyes nas bu chu smad ma dang bral ba'i mya ngan byed do/ /sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag
197a5(mdo sde): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo
197a6(mdo sde): zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/
197a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bod
197b1(mdo sde): par mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan sbangs pa bzhin du bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang
197b2(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha
197b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur nas/ des chu klung gang+gA'i 'gram du lo ma'i spyil po byas te bsam gtan byed do/ /de'i ma yi dwags kyi
197b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten du skyes pa de'ang stong dum me reg 'dra la/ gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu
197b5(mdo sde): rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyi thad du song nas/ re zhig na tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yi dwags
197b6(mdo sde): mo de mthong nas dris pa/ 'di kho na 'dra ba khyod su zhig /yi dwags mos smras pa/ bu gcig gang las btsas pa yi/ /byams pa'i ma ni bdag yin te/ /zas dang skom dang bral ba
197b7(mdo sde): yi| |yi dwags rnams kyi nang du skyes/ /bdag ni shi ba'i dus 'das nas/ /lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon te/ /chu yi bag kyang ma mthong na/ /kha zas lta zhig ga la mthong / /'bras bu
198a1(mdo sde): ldan pa'i shing rnams kyi/ /drang srong de dag 'bras med 'gyur/ /gang ba'i mtsho 'gram bdag song yang / /de dag kyang ni skam par 'gyur/ /btsun pa'i
198a2(mdo sde): shing drung bde ba lags/ /khyod kyi snod nang chu yang bsil/ /bkren pa bdag la thugs rje skyed/ /skom gyis gdungs kyi chab stsol cig /de nas chu smad kyis ma la smras pa/ yum/ khyod
198a3(mdo sde): mir gyur pa'i tshe bdag gis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed du ma bcug gam/ yi dwags mos smras pa/ bu gcig /bdag ni ser snas non pas sbyin pa dag kyang ma
198a4(mdo sde): byin bsod nams dag kyang ma byas te/ nor rnyed pa de dag thams cad sdig pa'i sems kyis dong du sbas so/ /bu gcig de bas na dad pa dris la bdag gi phyir sangs rgyas la
198a5(mdo sde): sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig / 'on tang bdag yi dwags kyi skye gnas nas thar kyang srid do/ /chu smad kyis smras pa/
198a6(mdo sde): de ltar bgyi yi/ khyod kyang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug cig /yi dwags mos smras pa/ bu gcig /bdag ni gcer bur 'dug pas ngo tsha ste ngos mi thub bo/ /chu smad kyis smras pa/
198a7(mdo sde): yum/ khyod gang gi tshe sdig pa byed pa de'i tshe ngo mi tsha na/ da ltar 'bras bu myong ba'i tshe ci'i phyir ngo tsha/ yi dwags mos smras pa/ 'o na de bzhin du 'ong bar bya'o/ /de nas chu smad kyis
198b1(mdo sde): nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas/ phyi de nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs nas/ gdugs tshod la bab pa na sangs rgyas la sogs pa
198b2(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun dag kyang 'dus/ yi dwags mo de'ang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dug pa rnams kyis yi dwags mo de mthong ngo / /de dag
198b3(mdo sde): gis yi dwags mo de'i lus mi sdug pa mthong nas shin tu skyo ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa
198b4(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas/ yi dwags mo'i phyir yon gyi rabs gdon par gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang
198b5(mdo sde): ldan pas sbyin pa'i rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang / /de ni yi dwags phyi bzhin song / /yi dwags 'jig rten rab 'jigs las/ /de ni myur du thar gyur cig /ces
198b6(mdo sde): gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las brten nas yi dwags mo de dang / skye bo mang po la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ srog chags 'bum phrag du mas des thos
198b7(mdo sde): nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /yi dwags mo de 'ang sems dga' bar 'gyur te/ shi nas yi dwags rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yang yi dwags rdzu 'phrul
199a1(mdo sde): chen mor skyes par shes so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis smras pa/ yum/ da ni mthu yod kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba dag gyis shig /yi dwags rdzu
199a2(mdo sde): 'phrul chen mos smras pa/ bu gcig /bdag ni sbyin pa la dga' ba med de mi nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yi dwags rdzu 'phrul chen mo la smras pa/ chags pa'i mun pas
199a3(mdo sde): mig ni rab bsgribs te/ /khyod kyis yi dwags 'jig rten bsgrubs pa yi/ /khyod kyi rus bu chen po sha med pa/ /rus pa pags pa skyi rnams da dung 'dug /ces byas so/ /de nas tshe
199a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa chu smad kyis lan mang du spyos nas smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu de las ras zung gcig thob bo/ /de nas chu smad kyis dge 'dun la phul nas/ gang gis dge 'dun la ras
199a5(mdo sde): zung gcig po nyos pa'i dge slong des gos kyi gdang la bzhag go / de nas yi dwags mo de mtshan mo 'ongs nas brkus so/ /de nas dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa chu smad la bsnyad nas/
199a6(mdo sde): chu smad song ste yi dwags mo spyos nas phyir bkug ste byin no/ /de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du dge slong de las brkus nas/ tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis phyir bkug ste byin pa dang /
199a7(mdo sde): dge slong des kyang de shes nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stan la klan to/ /de nas de phyin chad ma brkus so/ /de bas na sems can rnams la de ltar ser snas
199b1(mdo sde): mtho 'tsham par byed pa mthong nas/ ci nas yi dwags mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de
199b2(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom
199b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //dmus long zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po
199b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang /
199b5(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
199b6(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza'
199b7(mdo sde): dang | zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zod rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal
200a1(mdo sde): byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos
200a2(mdo sde): bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo / /mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos te/ zas phyis len pa spangs nas/ lhung bzed
200a3(mdo sde): dang | chos gos bzhag ste yi dwags kyi yul rgyu zhing song ba las tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis yi dwags mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la/ dmus long du 'dug pa rang gi skras yog
200a4(mdo sde): pa| lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dri nga ba/ khwa dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis bskor nas/ phyogs kun nas sha bcad cing
200a5(mdo sde): bcad cing za ba dang / de gnad la bab ste/ dkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing
200a6(mdo sde): 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed mi dga' bar gyur nas dris pa/ sring mo/ khyod kyis sngon sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas nas/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal
200a7(mdo sde): myong zhig 'dug / yi dwags mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyi/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par
200b1(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang
200b2(mdo sde): du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol pa dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po rnams
200b3(mdo sde): mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsung ba/ tshur shog
200b4(mdo sde): 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsungs pa/ sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dga' byed/ tshur shog
200b5(mdo sde): khyod 'ongs ba legs so/ /khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/ dga' byed kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag ni yi dwags rgyu ba'i nang nas mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dwags mo sdong dum
200b6(mdo sde): me reg 'dra la/ dmus long du mchis pa/ rang gi skras yog pa/ lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dri nga ba dang / khwa dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa
200b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis bskor nas/ phyogs kun nas sha bkum zhing bkum zhing 'tshal ba dang / de gnad la bab ste dkos thag nas nyam thag ba'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag pa dang / mi
201a1(mdo sde): bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la/ /mchu
201a2(mdo sde): dang lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug / rang gi skras ni gdong yog gcer bur mchis/ /mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu rid/ /de ltar gcer bu skras yog pa/ /rus pa'i 'khrul
201a3(mdo sde): 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin/ /thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la/ /ngu zhing kun tu rgyugs par bgyid/ /bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis/ /dub cing sdug bsngal dag gis nyen/ /nyam thag
201a4(mdo sde): skad kyang 'byin par bgyid/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong / /de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ /rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/ /des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /'jigs
201a5(mdo sde): su rung ba myong bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' byed/ yi dwags mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no/ /de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/
201a6(mdo sde): btsun pa/ nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /dga' byed/ 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas bshad do/ /dga' byed/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal
201a7(mdo sde): pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
201b1(mdo sde): pa| 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA
201b2(mdo sde): ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas grong khyer wA ra NA si de na/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig 'dug pa de chos 'dod de/ des chos thos nas 'khor ba la nyes
201b3(mdo sde): par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur te/ des pha ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de nas de'i phyir nye du rnams kyis
201b4(mdo sde): dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang byas nas de de na slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i dge slong ma dag dang lhan cig tu gnas pa las re zhig na des bag med pa'i dbang gis bslab pa'i gzhi la
201b5(mdo sde): lhod par byas so/ /de nas dge slong ma rnams kyis tshul khrims 'chal pa'i phyir bskrad do/ /de nas des sbyin bdag khyim bdag rnams dad pas nges par 'bul ba'ang gcod du
201b6(mdo sde): bcug / slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa'ang brjod/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag mthong na'ang mig btsums te 'dug
201b7(mdo sde): go |dga' byed/ ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni yi dwags mo 'di yin te/ des gtsug lag khang la ser sna byas pa des ni yi dwags su skyes so/ /des nar ma
202a1(mdo sde): bcad pa des ni khwa dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis bskor to/ /de slob pa dang / mi slob pa dge slong ma rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas ni
202a2(mdo sde): de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to/ /dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams mthong na mig btsums pas ni dmus long du gyur to/ /dga' byed/ de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag
202a3(mdo sde): pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /
202a4(mdo sde): las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dga' byed/ de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las
202a5(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dga' byed/ khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na srog chags sa yas
202a6(mdo sde): bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ser sna dang / ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i nyes dmigs de dag dang
202a7(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang rtogs nas ser sna dang / ngag gi nyes par spyod pa spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ dge slong / khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
202b1(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
202b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //tshong dpon zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams
202b3(mdo sde): dang | pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang /
