202b5(mdo sde): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang
202b6(mdo sde): ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod
202b7(mdo sde): pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod
203a1(mdo sde): che ba| yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ de phyi zhig na rgyal
203a2(mdo sde): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad
203a3(mdo sde): cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas
203a4(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las
203a5(mdo sde): skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la
203a6(mdo sde): rab tu byung nas kun la grags pa dang / bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / smon zong rnams
203a7(mdo sde): rnyed par gyur to/ /des yongs su bzung ba'i yo byad rnyed do cog gsog par byed de/ des tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bgo bsha' ma byas so/ /de nas ser sna
203b1(mdo sde): kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas pa des na/ rang gi yo byad la lhag par zhen bzhin du shi nas rang gi gnas khang du yi dwags su skyes so/ /de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs
203b2(mdo sde): par spyod pa rnams kyis gaN+Di mjug med pa brdungs nas rus bu phyir byung ngo / /de nas de'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas/ phyir gtsug lag khang du lhags so/ /de nas gnas
203b3(mdo sde): khang gi sgo phye ste chos gos dang / lhung bzed g.yar snga 'grems pa la zhugs pa dang / re zhig na yi dwags rkang lag dang / mig mi sdug la lus mchog tu 'jigs la chos gos dang /
203b4(mdo sde): lhung bzed 'dzin cing 'dug pa de mthong ngo / /de ltar mi sdug pa de mthong nas/ dge slong ngag mi dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
203b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de la phan gdags pa dang / slob ma'i tshogs rnams skyo ba bskyed pa dang / ser sna'i rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham
203b6(mdo sde): ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te/ gnas der gshegs so/ /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs
203b7(mdo sde): par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang
204a1(mdo sde): ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyes te/ de ngo tsha bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis char sprin gyi 'brug sgra
204a2(mdo sde): lta bur zab pa dang / rnga sgra lta bu'i gsung gis yi dwags de spyos te/ bzhin bzang / khyod nyid kyis bdag nyid phung ba'i phyir chos gos dang / lhung bzed 'di bsgrubs te/ des ni yi dwags
204a3(mdo sde): su skyes pa yin gyi/ da'ang nga la sems dga' bar gyis la yo byad 'di la'ang sems ma chags par byos dang legs so/ /'di las kyang shi nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su
204a4(mdo sde): skye re| de nas yi dwags des chos gos dang / lhung bzed dge 'dun la phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te nyes pa bshags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
204a5(mdo sde): kyis yi dwags kyi phyir yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang / /de ni yi dwags phyi bzhin song / /yi dwags 'jig rten rab 'jigs las/ /de ni myur du
204a6(mdo sde): thar gyur cig / de nas yi dwags de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas yi dwags rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so/ /de nas yi dwags rdzu 'phrul chen po rna cha gdung
204a7(mdo sde): 'khor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spr-i ka
204b1(mdo sde): la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pal dang pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la na da ga gnas pa kho ra
204b2(mdo sde): khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das
204b3(mdo sde): kyis kyang de la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas dga' ba skyes te song ngo / /de'i tshe dge slong srod dang / tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas pa de dag gis
204b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /de mthong nas the tshom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mad nga sum mi
204b5(mdo sde): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
204b6(mdo sde): pa| dge slong dag / mi mjed kyi bdag po'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ yi dwags de shi nas yi dwags rdzu 'phrul
204b7(mdo sde): chen por skyes te/ de mdangs sum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas/ ngas de la chos bstan te/ der sa'am skyes nas song ngo / /dge slong dag /de bas na ci na sa tshong dpon la sa yi dwags su
205a1(mdo sde): gyur pa de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag byung bar mi 'gyur bar ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ dge slong / khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
205a2(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi
205a3(mdo sde): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams
205a4(mdo sde): dang | phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha
205a5(mdo sde): ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par
205a6(mdo sde): byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
205a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi
205b1(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'ong ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang / chos
205b2(mdo sde): gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song ngo / /rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos te/ zas phyis len pa spangs nas/ chos gos
205b3(mdo sde): dang | lhung bzed bzhag ste/ yi dwags kyi yul du rgyu zhing song ba dang / des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i nyen kor du yi dwags mo gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra la lus khrag gis bsgos pa/
205b4(mdo sde): dur khrod na 'dug bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba/ nyin mo dang / mtshan mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong la/ bu la byams pa yod bzhin du de bkres pas nyen nas
205b5(mdo sde): de dag za zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas gnas brtan 'dam bu sbyin gyi bus de la dris pa/ khyod kyis sngon las ci zhig byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug/
205b6(mdo sde): yi dwags mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyi/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na
205b7(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang
206a1(mdo sde): dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du
206a2(mdo sde): ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par
206a3(mdo sde): gsung ba/ tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba/ sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu
206a4(mdo sde): sbyin gyi bu/ tshur shog /khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod da gdod ga las 'ongs/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni yi dwags kyi nang
206a5(mdo sde): du mchi mchi ba las slar mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dwags mo gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra la/ lus khrag gis bsher ba/ dur khrod na 'dug pa bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor
206a6(mdo sde): ba zhig mthong lags so/ /yang gsol pa/ bdag ni nyin bzhin bu lnga btsa'/ /mtshan yang de bzhin lnga btsa' ste/ /btsas nas de dag zos na yang / /'grangs par mi 'gyur
206a7(mdo sde): zhes mchi na/ /de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ /rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/ /des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /'jigs su rung ba myong bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
206b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu/ yi dwags mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no/ /de las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa/ mnyan par 'tshal lags so/ /'dam bu
206b2(mdo sde): sbyin gyi bu/ 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer wA ra NA si na tshong dpon phyug cing nor
206b3(mdo sde): mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las
206b4(mdo sde): chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med de/ de lag pa la skom
206b5(mdo sde): tshugs bcas nas/ bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po
206b6(mdo sde): dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go /de nas bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs
206b7(mdo sde): pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la'ang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha
207a1(mdo sde): dang | gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos mthun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs la/
207a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten na'ang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de 'ang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu
207a3(mdo sde): dang | bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la'ang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang /
207a4(mdo sde): bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas
207a5(mdo sde): 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ des lha mnyes par byas kyang bu'ang ma byung / bu mo'ang ma byung nas/ de'i blo 'di lta bu zhig skyes te/ ma la/ bdag
207a6(mdo sde): gis chung ma zhig blangs na/ brgya la bu yod par gyur lta srid dam snyam ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur
207a7(mdo sde): spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na bu chags par gyur nas/ de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/ khyim thab la spran pa/ jo bo/ bdag la
207b1(mdo sde): sras chags te/ bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na/ khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyi/ dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so/ /de'ang dga' ches te/ ro stod ni
207b2(mdo sde): bteg / lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/ bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo / /bdag gis bu rung bar shog cig /mi rung bar ma gyur cig /bdag
207b3(mdo sde): gi bya ba dag byed par shog cig / gsos pa'i lan phyir gsol bar shog cig /nor skal la spyod par shog cig /bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog cig /bdag cag 'das
207b4(mdo sde): te shi ba'i 'og tu'ang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung / nyung yang rung ste/ sbyin ba dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas de gnyis gang dang / gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song
207b5(mdo sde): zhig ces yon bsngo bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/ /de nas des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzang gi steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/ grang ba'i
207b6(mdo sde): tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang / tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang / ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams
207b7(mdo sde): dang | ha cang lan tshwa ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang mdar ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang bskal ba ma yin pa rnams dang / kha ba dang /
208a1(mdo sde): skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing / do shal dang / se mo do lus rnam par klubs te/
208a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang / khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi
208a3(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so/ /de nas chung ma snga ma des de bkur zhing gces par byed pa mthong nas phrag dog skyes te sems pa/ gal te 'di las bu btsas
208a4(mdo sde): par gyur na ni/ bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyi/ ci nas de'i thabs shig bya dgos snyam mo/ /'dod pa la yongs su bsten pa la ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba'i bag ci
208a5(mdo sde): yang med de/ mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba'i g.yang sar kha bltas pa/ des yid rton du bcug nas gang 'thungs pa tsam gyis nyon mongs ma de'i bu 'phyil bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
208a6(mdo sde): mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin no/ /de nas chung ma phyi ma des nye du thams cad bsdus nas chung ma snga ma de zhal lce la bkug ste/ khyod kyis bdag yid rton du bcug nas mngal rlug
208a7(mdo sde): pa'i rtsi byin te/ des bdag gi bu 'phyil to zhes byas so/ /de nas chung ma snga ma des nye du rnams kyi nang du ma na'ang bor te/ gal te bdag gis khyod la mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin par
208b1(mdo sde): gyur na bdag yi dwags mor gyur te/ bu byung ngo cog za bar shog cig byas so/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu/ ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dwags
208b2(mdo sde): mo de yin te/ des sngon phrag dog byas pa des na yi dwags mor skyes so/ /des brdzun byas te mna' bor ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des ni nyin mo dang / mtshan mo bu lnga lnga btsa'
208b3(mdo sde): zhing za bar gyur to/ /'dam bu sbyin gyi bu/ de bas na khyod kyis ngag gi nyes pa spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ ci nas yi dwags mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba
208b4(mdo sde): de ltar 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
208b5(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la
208b6(mdo sde): sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ phyi sa khung zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug
208b7(mdo sde): po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang /
209a1(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang /
209a2(mdo sde): klu dang | gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
209a3(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa
209a4(mdo sde): can na/ sbre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can na grong khyer 'obs shig gi nang na/ yi dwags zas su skyugs pa za ba/
209a5(mdo sde): por ba za ba/ ngar snabs dang / gcin gyis 'tsho ba/ rnag dang / khrag dang / phyis za ba/ mi bzad pa/ rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba lnga brgya gnas so/ /yang smras pa/ skyugs pa
209a6(mdo sde): za zhing bor ba za/ /ngar snabs gcin gyis 'tsho ba dang / /rnag khrag dang ni phyi sa za/ /mi bzad rang bzhin sdug cing 'dug /yangs pa can de na bram ze zhig kyang 'dug ste/ des rigs
209a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas de'i lus dri nga bar
209b1(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de nas bram ze des mtshan mkhan rnams bkug ste dris na/ de dag na re/ 'di ni lto na khye'u 'dug pa de'i mthu yin no zhes zer ro/ /re zhig na de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu
209b2(mdo sde): byung ste/ khye'u mdog ngan cing blta na mi sdug la byad ngan po lus mi gtsang bas bsgos pa dri nga ba zhig btsas so/ /de mchog tu mi sdug mod kyi/ byams pa'i dbang gis sbrel bas pha ma gnyis
209b3(mdo sde): kyis gsos so/ /de mi gtsang ba'i gnas rnams 'ba' zhig tu dga' la phyag dar gyi phung po dang / phyis khung du skra 'bal zhing khar mi gtsang ba 'dzud nas/ de'i ming phyis khung zhes bya bar
209b4(mdo sde): gyur to/ /re zhig na de phan tshun du 'khyam pa las 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di de lta bu'i gnas rnams su dga' ba las na 'di ni gor ma chags
209b5(mdo sde): par grub pa'i skyes bu zhig yin gyi bdag gis 'dir rab tu dbyung ngo snyam mo/ /des de rab tu phyung nas gcer bur 'khyam zhing 'dug la/ legs pa byed pa la'ang gnas so/ /de nas
209b6(mdo sde): de 'khyam zhing song ba las yangs pa can gyi 'obs kyi nang na yi dwags lnga brgya 'khod pa rnams mthong nas/ de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel pas grong khyer gyi 'obs de'i nang
209b7(mdo sde): du song nas de dag dang lhan cig 'dus shing phrad de/ dga' bar gyur nas grogs por gyur to/ /phyis re zhig na khye'u phyis khung don zhig la brel te yangs pa can du song ngo / /bcom ldan
210a1(mdo sde): ' das kyang grong khyer gyi 'obs der byon nas yi dwags de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par
210a2(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang
210a3(mdo sde): pa mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag phongs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cis
210a4(mdo sde): phongs/ yi dwags rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni skom lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag sor lnga las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun
210a5(mdo sde): lnga phab ste/ des yi dwags lnga brgya po de dag tshim par mdzad do/ /de nas de dag bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes
210a6(mdo sde): so| |lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /
210a7(mdo sde): de nas yi dwags las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par de dag gis mthong ngo / /de nas
210b1(mdo sde): sngon yi dwags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon te/ gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyi/ bdag cag
210b2(mdo sde): zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo/ /de nas sngon yi dwags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se
210b3(mdo sde): mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyi de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog
210b4(mdo sde): ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
210b5(mdo sde): la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dwags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
210b6(mdo sde): bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu lnga brgyas 'jig
210b7(mdo sde): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing
211a1(mdo sde): pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du
211a2(mdo sde): lhags pa'i 'byor ba de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /de nas khye'u phyi sa khung grong khyer gyi 'obs su 'ongs pa dang / yi dwags de
211a3(mdo sde): dag ma mthong ngo / /de nas tshol ba la zhugs te/ de de dag yongs su tshol bas skyo bar 'gyur la de dag ni ma rnyed do/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi
211a4(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa zhig ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan la/ 'jig rten la phan
211a5(mdo sde): 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med la/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang
211a6(mdo sde): bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu
211a7(mdo sde): brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan
211b1(mdo sde): lag lnga rnams par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang
211b2(mdo sde): chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/
211b3(mdo sde): phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
211b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug /su ni nyam nga bar 'gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang / nyam nga ba dang / gnod pa dang ldan/
211b5(mdo sde): su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song las phyung ste/ mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i
211b6(mdo sde): 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa
211b7(mdo sde): ba rnams ma bskyed pas bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes
212a1(mdo sde): gzigs pa 'jug go / 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs
212a2(mdo sde): rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu phyi sa khung la phan gdags pa'i phyir snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas dge
212a3(mdo sde): slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re zhig na mthar gyis bsod snyoms bskor
212a4(mdo sde): te srang du gshegs na/ phyi sa khung yang phan tshun 'khor 'khor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'greng ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
212a5(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas ba/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin
212a6(mdo sde): po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de'i mod la des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar byas so/ /de dga' ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das
212a7(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te sems can bdag cag lta bu'ang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu
212b1(mdo sde): 'byung ba mchis te/ chud par gyur na bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal
212b2(mdo sde): ba mkhyen pas/ de shin tu skal ba dang ldan par thugs su chud nas phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong / tshur shog /tshangs
212b3(mdo sde): par spyad pa spyod cig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la/ skra dang / kha spu ni bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya
212b4(mdo sde): lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur pa/ lag na ni lhung bzed dang / chu snod thogs par gyur to/ /'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/ de ni mgo bregs lus la
212b5(mdo sde): snam sbyar gyon/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/ /mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ des brtson
212b6(mdo sde): pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam
212b7(mdo sde): par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum
213a1(mdo sde): pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta
213a2(mdo sde): bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur
213a3(mdo sde): sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin na'ang
213a4(mdo sde): ngan pa la dga' bar gyur nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'di lta ste/ nga'i dge slong phyi sa khung 'di ni nga'i nyan thos kyi
213a5(mdo sde): dge slong ngan ngon la mos pa rnams kyi mchog yin no/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun
213a6(mdo sde): pa| gnas brtan phyis khung gis las ci bgyis na des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /phyis khung
213a7(mdo sde): nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/
213b1(mdo sde): phyi sa khung nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams
213b2(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/
213b3(mdo sde): zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gis las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la
213b4(mdo sde): bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/

213b7(mdo sde): po'i pho brang der khyim bdag gcig gis gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/ der phyogs dang / yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong 'ongs pa dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas par sems
214a1(mdo sde): so| |gtsug lag khang de na so so'i skye bo'i dge slong zhig gnas te/ de yang gnas la shin tu ser sna che ba zhig ste/ dge slong gsar du 'ong ba rnams mthong na/
214a2(mdo sde): tshig pa za zhing 'khrug la gnod sems byed de/ zhul zhul por 'dug cing 'khrug pa skyed par byed do/ /dge slong gang dag gtsug lag khang de nas gud du 'gro ba de dag mthong na ni/ shas
214a3(mdo sde): cher dga' zhing mchog tu dga' la skyel zhing smra bar byed do/ /phyis re zhig na gzhig gi yul nas dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig 'ongs so/ /gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de'ang phyir mi 'ong
214a4(mdo sde): ba yin te/ des spyod lam gyi sgo nas dgra bcom pa yin par shes so/ /de nas dga' ba skyes te/ phyi de nyin dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang / bshos
214a5(mdo sde): la spyan drangs so/ /dge slong gzhi ba de ni de na med pa las re zhig na phyi de nyin chog dang ldan pa'i khrus kyang phul/ bshos kyang bshams pa dang / dge slong gzhi pa de'ang 'ongs te/
214a6(mdo sde): de'ang cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus sar song nas/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po khyed rings su byung ste/ dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa'i byi dor byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas de
214a7(mdo sde): phrag dog skyes nas/ des sdang ba'i sems kyis ngag gi las rtsub po smras te/ dge slong khyed ni lus mi gtsang bas byugs kyang bla yi/ sbyin bdag 'di lta bu'i bsnyen bkur len pa ni de
214b1(mdo sde): lta ma yin no zhes byas so/ /de nas dgra bcom pa des nyon mongs pa 'di las ches ming bzad pa skal pa can du 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ cang mi zer bar dang du blangs so/ /re zhig na tshogs par
214b2(mdo sde): gyur te dro la bab pa na dge slong gzhi ba des dgra bcom pa la khyod kyis sdang ba'i sems bskyed do zhes zer ba thos so/ /thos nas kyang de 'gyod pa skyes so/ /de nas dge slong dgra bcom pa de'i
214b3(mdo sde): rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ 'phags pa/ bdag gis khyod la tshig rtsub po smras pa de bzod pa gsol lo zhes byas so/ /de nas dgra bcom pa des de'i dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' la
214b4(mdo sde): 'phags nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/ /de nas lhag par yang 'gyod pa skyes te/ de nas de'i mdun du las kyi nyes pa de mthol zhing bshags te/ shang kyis sbyangs so/ /'on kyang
214b5(mdo sde): des mthar thug pa'i ye shes bskyed ni ma nus so/ /de nas re zhig na 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa dang / des smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /
214b6(mdo sde): ngag gi las rtsub po gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pa ni bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig /bdag gis bklags pa dang / kha ton byas pa dang / sbyin pa dang / sbyin pa chen po dag byin pa

215a1(mdo sde): slong dag / ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong gzhi par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyi sa khung 'di nyid yin te/ des dgra bcom pa la ngag gi las rtsub
215a2(mdo sde): po smras pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des na 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur te/ las de nyid kyi lhag ma lus pas de ltar srid pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe'ang 'di ltar dri
215a3(mdo sde): nga zhing mchog tu dri nga bar gyur la/ mi gtsang ba dang / snyag snyig la dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas kha ton byas pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la
215a4(mdo sde): mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad

215a6(mdo sde): so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / des dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ dge
215a7(mdo sde): slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci
215b1(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/ sdom gyi tshigs
215b2(mdo sde): su bcad pa lnga pa rdzogs so/ / //sdom pa ni/ sprul nag dang ni zla ba dang / /sA la dang ni dpal ldan ma/ /gos dang ne tso pho nya dang / /ma he dang ni gso sbyong dang / ngang pa tha mar
215b3(mdo sde): brjod pa yin/ /sbrul nag po zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong
215b4(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye
215b5(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye
215b6(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang /
215b7(mdo sde): sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim
216a1(mdo sde): bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa
216a2(mdo sde): zhig yod de/ de'ang ser sna can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa/ khwa la'ang gtor ma mi ster ba zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing phongs pa dang / bkren
216a3(mdo sde): pa dag mthong na sems sdang bar byed do/ /de nas des rang gi skyed mos tshal du gser dngul gyi phung po chen po sbas te bzhag nas/ de de la chags te lhag par zhen bzhin du shi'o/ /
216a4(mdo sde): de shi nas de nyid kyi steng du sbrul gdug pa/ sbrul nag po chen po mig gdug pa zhig tu skyes so/ /de nas skyed mos tshal der skye bo'i tshogs gang song ba de dag bltas pa tsam gyis
216a5(mdo sde): gsod par byed do/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thog thag tu'ang che ge mo'i skyed mos tshal du song ba de dag thams cad brlag par 'gyur ro zhes sgra grag par gyur to/ /skye bo'i
216a6(mdo sde): tshogs kyis kyang rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs par de 'dul
216a7(mdo sde): nus par gzhan du zhig yod snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po skye bo mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
216b1(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par
216b2(mdo sde): bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/ /chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin
216b3(mdo sde): du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
216b4(mdo sde): gcig tu gzar nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
216b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po'i khab 'di na skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig na sbrul gdug pa/ sbrul nag po chen po chen po mig gdug pa zhig mchis te/ skye bo mang po brlag par bgyid
216b6(mdo sde): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du de gdul bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas
216b7(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te stan las langs nas song ngo / /
217a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas skyed mos tshal ga la ba der
217a2(mdo sde): gshegs te byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od las lhag pa dag bkye ste/ de dag gis skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad snang bar
217a3(mdo sde): byas so/ /bskal pa stong gi bar du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu rab tu sim par gyur to/ /de nas sbrul
217a4(mdo sde): gdug pa des phan tshun du bltas te/ su'i mthus bdag gi lus sim par gyur cig gu snyam pa dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
217a5(mdo sde): gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri
217a6(mdo sde): bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
217a7(mdo sde): kyis de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ bzhin bzang khyod nyid kyis rdzas 'di bsgrubs pa des na khyod sbrul gdug par lhung bar byas so/ /da yang nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed
217b1(mdo sde): la gter 'di la yang sems ma chags par byos dang legs so/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal bar skyes re/ de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de tshe rabs
217b2(mdo sde): dran par mdzad pa de'i tshe de dus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la/ /da ni nga yis ci byar med/ /mi khom
217b3(mdo sde): par ni skyes zin gyi/ /don med dus pas ci la phan/ /'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can/ /nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na legs/ /'on tang mtho ris
217b4(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul de lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/ 'od ma'i tshal du bsnams so/ /de'i skabs su rgyal po dang / yul ma ga d+ha'i
217b5(mdo sde): skye bo'i tshogs kyis sbrul gdug pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btul ba thos so/ /de nas sbrul gdug pa de rang gi lus la smad de kha 'tshos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems
217b6(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar
217b7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas sbrul gdug pa las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang /
218a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas
218a2(mdo sde): gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon sprul gdug
218a3(mdo sde): par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang /
218a4(mdo sde): ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spr-i kA la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra rnams kyis thu
218a5(mdo sde): ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i chal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom
218a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sprul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud
218a7(mdo sde): nas 'phags pa'i bden pa'i bzhi rtogs par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po
218b1(mdo sde): nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig tu brjod pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchi
218b2(mdo sde): ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i ri las bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag
218b3(mdo sde): pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun
218b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis
218b5(mdo sde): bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas
218b6(mdo sde): thob| |bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /
218b7(mdo sde): srid pa stong du mthong pa dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dgar gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni
219a1(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon sprul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa
219a2(mdo sde): 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' po g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa
219a3(mdo sde): de nyid kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i thad du song nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ rgyal po bslang nas 'di skad ces smras
219a4(mdo sde): so| |rgyal po chen po/ longs/ nyal te ci bya/ de nas rgyal po sad de 'od chen po dang / lha'i bu de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu ste khyod su zhig ces dris so/ /de na re/
219a5(mdo sde): bdag ni skyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul gdug pa btul te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la'ang bdag
219a6(mdo sde): gis bsnyen bkur byas nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /da bdag gis khyod la bstan gyis khyod song la/ skyed mos tshal de'i phyogs ga ge mo zhig nas gter chen po phyung la/
219a7(mdo sde): bdag gi phyir bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol te/ yon gyi rabs kyang gdon par gsol cig /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lha'i
219b1(mdo sde): bu la cang mi zer bar khas blangs so/ /de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus rgyal pos cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal
219b2(mdo sde): po gzugs can snying pos de nyid kyi mtshan mo yul ma ga d+ha'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams la bsgo nas skyed mos tshal der song ste gter byung nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
219b3(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos gsol te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sngon sprul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na
219b4(mdo sde): des sprul gdug par skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes nas bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de shas cher chags
219b5(mdo sde): pa bskyed de/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing phongs pa dang / bkren pa rnams la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa des ni sprul gdug par skyes so/ /nga la sems dga' bar byas pa
219b6(mdo sde): des ni lha'i nang du skyes so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la dge bsnyen du gyur to/ skyabs su song ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa des ni bden pa mthong
219b7(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de bas na ser sna spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ ci nas sprul gdug par gyur pa'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de nyid lha'i bur gyur
220a1(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs de dag lta bur 'gyur bar rgyal po khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
220a2(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te stan las langs nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
220a3(mdo sde): stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po
220a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang /
220a5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha
220a6(mdo sde): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod
220a7(mdo sde): nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
220b1(mdo sde): pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhing pa zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam
220b2(mdo sde): pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing
220b3(mdo sde): blta na sdug la mdzes pa skye bo thams cad kyi mig sim par byed pa zhig btsas so/ /de yang bram ze des dka' bas rnyes pa yin te/ de la bu dang / bu mo gzhan yang med nas de bskyed bsrings
220b4(mdo sde): te phyir skyes nas/ de 'jig rten thams cad sim par byed pa'i phyir bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis khye'u de'i ming zla ba zhes btags so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u zla ba grong khyer thams
220b5(mdo sde): cad du brgyud de bskor bas bram ze de'ang khye'u de la lhag par byams par gyur te/ 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dag gi tshe'ang rtag tu legs par bsrung ba lhur byed
220b6(mdo sde): cing 'dug go / bram ze de'i khyim yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang nye ba zhig na 'dug go /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang bsten nas rgyal bu rgyal
220b7(mdo sde): byed kyi tshal du song ste sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed do/ /de yang tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes
221a1(mdo sde): so| |lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang
221a2(mdo sde): gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo / /de nas
221a3(mdo sde): sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom
221a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna
221a5(mdo sde): tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spri ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku
221a6(mdo sde): mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis
221a7(mdo sde): gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang /
221b1(mdo sde): khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta
221b2(mdo sde): ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan
221b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i ri las bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /
221b4(mdo sde): bdag lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang / gnyen
221b5(mdo sde): gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan
221b6(mdo sde): song lam/ /shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i
221b7(mdo sde): mig |shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis
222a1(mdo sde): mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang
222a2(mdo sde): ba dga' 'gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag btsal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i
222a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / /nad pa na nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis
222a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srid dang / tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag
222a5(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi tha dad du snang ba chen pos 'byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom
222a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ ci lags/ ma dang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis
222a7(mdo sde): lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i
222b1(mdo sde): phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ bram ze'i bu gcig pa de tshe thung ste shi nas de nga las sems dga' bar gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdangs sum nga'i thad du 'ongs
222b2(mdo sde): te| ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de'i skabs su bram ze des bu gcig pa sdug cing phangs la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / bzod pa
222b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang / mi mthun pa med pa de dur khrod du khyer nas bang bar bzhag ste/ kyi hud bu/ kyi hud bu thu bo/ /kyi hud bu gcig pa zhes zer zhing 'bod de/ de'i nye du rnams kyis de ltar
222b4(mdo sde): bcugs kyang bslang ma nus nas/ de khwa dang / chun lag dang / bu rgod dang / wa rnams kyis ni bskor/ bud med skra bshig pa dang ni 'grogs/ skye bo mang pos ni blta zhing 'dug go/
222b5(mdo sde): de nas de'i bu lhar skyes pas/ pha smre sngags 'don pa mthong nas snying rjes snying bskyod de/ pha'i mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir bdag nyid drang srong gi cha lugs su sprul nas/ dur khrod kyi 'dab
222b6(mdo sde): tu dka' thub lnga byed cing 'dug go / de nas bram ze des drang srong de dris pa/ kye drang srong chen po/ khyod dka' thub 'dis ci zhig sgrub/ drang srong gis smras pa/ nga ni rgyal srid sgrub ste/ nga'i
222b7(mdo sde): gser gyi shing rta rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ nyi ma dang / zla ba gnyis kyis shing rta'i 'khor lo byas la/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni mdun nas 'dren te/ shing rta de la zhon zhing sa chen
223a1(mdo sde): po 'di bskor bar 'dod do/ /bram zes smras pa/ gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar/ /rgyun du dka' thub spyad byas te/ /dka' thub mchog ni spyad byas kyang //
223a2(mdo sde): gnas de khyod kyis re mi thob/ /drang srong gis smras pa/ khyod kyang shi ba'i khog pa mchog tu mnam zhing mi gtsang ba'i ro shing 'dra bar gyur pa 'dis ci zhig sgrub/ bram zes smras
223a3(mdo sde): pa| sdug pa'i bu gcig pa shi ste de sgrub bo/ /drang srong gis smras pa/ gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar/ /rgyun du du ba'i las byas kyang / /bu de khyod kyis re mi thob/ /khyod ni lus
223a4(mdo sde): kyang ci la phan/ /de nas bram ze de drang srong gi tshig bden no snyam nas dad pa skyes so/ /dad pa skyes nas khyod su zhig ces bya'o/ /de nas drang srong gi cha lugs de mi snang bar
223a5(mdo sde): byas nas/ rang gi cha lugs su 'dug ste pha la smras pa/ bdag ni khyod kyi bu gcig pa de yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum
223a6(mdo sde): pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ khyod kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so/ /yab khyod tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su bzhud cig dang / khyod kyang 'khor
223a7(mdo sde): ba las 'da' bar 'gyur yang srid do/ /de nas bram ze des shi ba'i rus bu bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
223b1(mdo sde): btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa
223b2(mdo sde): mdzad de/ de thos nas bram ze des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /des mtho bar gyur pa
223b3(mdo sde): thob cing rnyed pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas te song ngo / /de nas dge slong the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad
223b4(mdo sde): gcad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ lha'i bu 'dis 'di ltar pha'i mya ngan bsal nas bden pa mthong ba la yang bzhag pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan
223b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'dis bden pa mthong nas/ pha yongs su bskyabs pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/ 'dis ni 'das pa'i dus na so so'i
223b6(mdo sde): skye bor 'dug pa'i tshe 'ang pha bsad pa la thug pa las lan gsum skyabs byas te/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung
223b7(mdo sde): ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA ra NA si na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba skyed pa zhig yod de/ de'i bu ni dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba mi rnams shin tu 'drang ba zhig
224a1(mdo sde): go |de nas re zhig na de'i phas rkun po byas nas rgyal pos gshed ma rnams la gsod cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas bus lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal po la
224a2(mdo sde): gsol nas srog phangs pa byin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa gang yin pa de ni
224a3(mdo sde): bram ze 'di yin no/ /byi ba byed pa'i bu gang yin pa de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di yin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las ci zhig bgyis na des pha dang / bu
224a4(mdo sde): gnyis ka bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la gnyi ga dge bsnyen du gyur te/
224a5(mdo sde): skyabs su song ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pas na de'i phyir de ltar bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de bas na 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / chos
224a6(mdo sde): thams cad bdag med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
224a7(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi
224b1(mdo sde): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //sA la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang /
224b2(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam
224b3(mdo sde): mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma
224b4(mdo sde): yin dang | nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal
224b5(mdo sde): zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim
224b6(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod par sA la gcog pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus nas /
224b7(mdo sde): shing sA la'i me tog blangs te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de nas re zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis sA la'i me tog blangs te/ mnyan du yod pa'i nang du song ba dang /
225a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs kyi zham ring byas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms mdzad de slar gshegs
225a2(mdo sde): nas| bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang
225a3(mdo sde): gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la sA la'i
225a4(mdo sde): me tog gis gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/ phyir log nas khyim du dgos pa'i phyir yang gzhan dag blang ngo snyam pa dang / re zhig na de sA la'i shing la
225a5(mdo sde): 'dzegs pa las lhung ste shi nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /de nas re zhig na lus dang / gzhal med khang sA
225a6(mdo sde): la'i me tog gis brgyan te/ lha'i 'dun sa'i nang du song ngo / /de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na lha'i tshogs kyi nang na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge
225a7(mdo sde): 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing 'dug pa las/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i bu mo lus dang / gzhal med khang sA la'i me tog gis brgyan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba de mthong
225b1(mdo sde): ngo| |mthong nas kyang de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad+ma ut+pal lta bur gyur/ /'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las
225b2(mdo sde): 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur/ /ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad+ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur/ /las rnams gang gis 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smros/
225b3(mdo sde): lha mos smras pa/ mtshan mchog dag gis rgyas pa yi/ /mi yi nyi ma nyan thos bcas/ /sA la'i me tog rdul med pa/ /bzang po dag gis legs par gtor/ /las dge de 'dra byas pa'i
225b4(mdo sde): phyir| |bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes/ /bzhin mdog pad+ma zla ba ltar/ /rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing / /nyes pa thams cad
225b5(mdo sde): rnam spangs pa/ /mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir/ /de la khyod kyis sa bon btab/ /bzhin mdzes pad+ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma/ /bud med mchog rnams kyis ni
225b6(mdo sde): gang la bkur sti byas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba/ /gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod/ /lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu
225b7(mdo sde): mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa na chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa
226a1(mdo sde): dang | sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo / /de nas lha'i bu mo de 'di snyam
226a2(mdo sde): du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo//
226a3(mdo sde): de nas lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta
226a4(mdo sde): ma la'i lo ma dang / spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa de lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du mas g.yog byas nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo sA la'i me tog gi gzhal med khang de nyid dang bcas pas
226a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
226a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos
226a7(mdo sde): nas lha'i bu mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig
226b1(mdo sde): lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i ri las bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris
226b2(mdo sde): dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la pas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma
226b3(mdo sde): bgyis/ nang mi dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang
226b4(mdo sde): por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring
226b5(mdo sde): nyes pa spangs pa'i mig / shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi
226b6(mdo sde): dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' 'gyur
226b7(mdo sde): te| |btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag btsal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha lhas lha yul song / /de nas lha'i bu mo de tshong ba khe spogs phyin pa dang /
227a1(mdo sde): zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi
227a2(mdo sde): thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang / tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
227a3(mdo sde): kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags /
227a4(mdo sde): mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
227a5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no/ /bu mo gang gis lam khar me tog
227a6(mdo sde): gis gtor ba de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /de ni nga la sems dga' ba bskyed nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas de
227a7(mdo sde): nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag /de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la
227b1(mdo sde): bkur stir bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o/ /zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar
227b2(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po
227b3(mdo sde): la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug
227b4(mdo sde): po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang /
227b5(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
227b6(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na
227b7(mdo sde): bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya
228a1(mdo sde): ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa
228a2(mdo sde): dang | rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang /
228a3(mdo sde): mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu gcig pa la
228a4(mdo sde): bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te
228a5(mdo sde): dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi zhig na dpyid kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ shing ljon pa rnams me tog rgyas la ngang pa dang /
228a6(mdo sde): khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byugs dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod na skyed mos tshal gyi sar btsun mo dam pa dang / btsun
228a7(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor dang bcas te dong nas/ der btsun mo'i 'khor gyis rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha| bdag cag ni gdugs gcig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchi ba'i rngo mi
228b1(mdo sde): thog na/ lha| btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar ci gnang / 'on tang bdag cag gis de la rgyun du
228b2(mdo sde): mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bkur sti bgyi'o zhes gsol to/ /de nas
228b3(mdo sde): re zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la dbu skra dang / sen mo stsal du gsol/ 'on ta nga bdag gis mchis brang 'khor
228b4(mdo sde): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar bgyi'o zhes gsol to/ /de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang / sen mo byin nas rgyal po gzugs can
228b5(mdo sde): snying po btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal
228b6(mdo sde): bsros nas de la btsun mo dkor gyis mar me dang / gdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag
228b7(mdo sde): gis kyang mchod pa byed do/ /de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra lha sbyin gyis rbad de/ yab chos dang ldan pa chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa bsad nas rang rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe /
229a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sbyin par bya ba'i chos thams cad bcad de/ su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bkur sti ma byed ces khrims
229a2(mdo sde): kyang bcas so/ /de nas gang gi tshe tshes bco lnga la skabs 'byed pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe/ dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten de la su'ang phyag dar byed pa'am/ mar me dang / gdug
229a3(mdo sde): pa dang / me tog 'bul ba med do/ /de nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyis dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten de de lta bur gyur pa'ang mthong / rgyal po gzugs can snying po'ang dran nas
229a4(mdo sde): snying rje rje skad du du zhing / kyi hud/ chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang bral bas bdag cag bsod nams las 'gribs so zhes 'dzer to/ /de'i nang nas btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes
229a5(mdo sde): bya ba des rang gi srog dang bsngos te sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas/ dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la phyag dar byas te/ mar me'i phreng ba dngar to/ /de nas re zhig na
229a6(mdo sde): rgyal po ma skyes dgra khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du byung ste/ snang ba chen po de mthong nas 'di ci zhig ces 'dris pa dang / re zhig na gzhan zhig gis dpal ldan mas dbu skra dang /
229a7(mdo sde): sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i phreng ba dngar ba lags so zhes byas so/ /de nas dpal ldan ma bkug ste ci'i phyir khyod kyis rgyal po'i bka' bcag ces smras na/ de na re/ bdag
229b1(mdo sde): gis khyod kyi bka' bcag tu lags kyang / bdag gis chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i bka' ma bcag go zhes zer ro/ /de nas de khros nas 'khor lo 'phangs te sad
229b2(mdo sde): do| |de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /de'i tshe lha mdun ma zhig kyang 'dus nas/ lha'i bu mo dpal ldan na
229b3(mdo sde): lha'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod pa dang ldan pa de lha'i mdun sa'i nang du song ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis snang ba chen po de dang / lha'i
229b4(mdo sde): 'od dpag tshad gcig pa mthong nas dris pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyi lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad+ma ut+pal lta bur gyur/ /'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od 'byung 'di
229b5(mdo sde): dag ci las gyur/ /ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad+ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur/ /las rnams gang gi 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smros/ lha mos smras
229b6(mdo sde): pa| 'jig rten gsum mgon 'gro ba'i sgron cig po/ /mtshan mchog rnams kyis phyug pa'i sangs rgyas mthong / /smra mchog nyon mongs mun pa sel ba la/ /mun pa sel ba'i mar me
229b7(mdo sde): yon du phul/ /zla ba'i 'od zer mchog dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /mthong nas thub la snying nas dad pa bskyed/ /'od zer mthong nas dga' bar gyur pa yis/ /ston pa smra ba'i mchog la phyag kyang
230a1(mdo sde): bgyis/ /las dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir/ /bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes/ /bzhin mdog pad+ma zla ba ltar/ /rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug /brgya byin
230a2(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing / /nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir/ /de la khyod kyis sa bon btab/ /bzhin mdzes pad+ma'i 'dab ma
230a3(mdo sde): yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma/ /bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba/ /gser mchog
230a4(mdo sde): phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod/ /lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos
230a5(mdo sde): gang du skyes| las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga'
230a6(mdo sde): bar gyur par des mthong ngo / /de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha
230a7(mdo sde): ma yin gyi/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi snang bas gang ba des de nyid kyi mtshan mo
230b1(mdo sde): me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar
230b2(mdo sde): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma'i bsam
230b3(mdo sde): pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu mo dpal
230b4(mdo sde): ldan mas/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum
230b5(mdo sde): brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i ri las bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris
230b6(mdo sde): dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag dang / mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa'i 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams
230b7(mdo sde): kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang / gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /
231a1(mdo sde): yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan
231a2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas 'thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal//
231a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang 'thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa
231a4(mdo sde): khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do sha la 'phyang bdag 'gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag btsal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig
231a5(mdo sde): rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad
231a6(mdo sde): thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi
231a7(mdo sde): nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas
231b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la
231b2(mdo sde): blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhin nga la
231b3(mdo sde): blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya bas rang gi srog dang bsngos te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas de bzhin gshegs
231b4(mdo sde): pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i phreng ba dngar nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra khros pas bsad de/ de nga la dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul
231b5(mdo sde): bzang por skyes nas de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag /de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/
231b6(mdo sde): ston pa la bkur stir bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod pa bya'o/ /ston pa la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge
231b7(mdo sde): slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //
232a1(mdo sde): gos zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong
232a2(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye
232a3(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
232a4(mdo sde): po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang /
232a5(mdo sde): sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas
232a6(mdo sde): gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chal phul te/ mthar gyis gser srang bye ba phrag brgya bcom ldan
232a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi bstan pa la phul ba de'i tshe/ de'i blo skyes pa/ ma la/ bdag sbyin pa dag byin zhing / bsod nams dag byed pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod kyi bdag gis skye bo dbul po rnams
232b1(mdo sde): la phan gdags pa'i phyir mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dad pa bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de ltar byas pa dang bdag
