232b2(mdo sde): gis skye bo mang po la'ang phan btags par 'gyur la/ bsod nams mang po'ang bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ji ltar bsams pa de rgyal po la gsol
232b3(mdo sde): nas| rgyal pos kyang mnyan du yod pa thams cad du dril bsgrags te/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi khyed rnams nyon cig /deng nas zhag bdun na khyim bdag mgon med
232b4(mdo sde): zas sbyin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir glang po che la zhon te dad pa sdud par 'dod kyi/ khyed gang gis ji tsam yongs su gtong bar bya ba de yongs su gtang bar gyis
232b5(mdo sde): shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas re zhig na zhag bdun lon pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin glang po che la zhon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir dad pa sdud pa la
232b6(mdo sde): zhugs te/ der gang dag la ji tsam bdog pa de dag de tsam sbyin par byed de/ kha cig ni mgul gyi se mo do sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gdub bu sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni dpung rgyan sbyin par
232b7(mdo sde): byed| kha cig ni gser gyi phreng ba sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni sor gdub kyi rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni mu tig gi do shal sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni dngul
233a1(mdo sde): sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni tha na zho'i brgyad cha tsam yang sbyin par byed do/ /khyim bdag de'ang gzhan la phan gdags par phyir len par byed do/ /de nas re
233a2(mdo sde): zhig na bud med shin tu dbul mo zhig gi sha thang ste/ zla ba gsum gyis ras yug gcig rnyed nas/ des ras de gyon te srang du zhugs pa dang / des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dung
233a3(mdo sde): 'bud cing rnga zlum rdung bzhin du rgyang nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ des dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa/ ji ste khyim bdag 'di phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ste/ gter sa'i 'og tu sbas
233a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang mthong na/ ci'i phyir 'di gzhan gyi khyim nas slong zhing skor bar byed ces byas pa dang / dge bsnyen de na re/ gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir te/ gang dag bcom
233a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol mi nus pa de dag gi don du phan 'dogs par byed de/ ci nas mang po bsdongs te/ bcom ldan 'das la dbul du 'jug
233a6(mdo sde): go zhes zer ro/ /de nas bu mo de'i blo skyes pa/ 'o na bdag ni bsod nams ma byas pa yin la bdag gcig pus bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos
233a7(mdo sde): gsol ba'i mthu bdag la med kyi/ bdag gis 'di la cung zad dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas bdag nyid la ci bdog ces bltas na ras yug gcig ma gtogs pa
233b1(mdo sde): gzhan ci yang ma mthong ste/ des bsams pa/ gal te bdag 'di na 'dug bzhin du ras 'di phul na ni bdag gcer bur 'byung gi bdag khang thog tu song la ras dor ro snyam mo/ /de nas
233b2(mdo sde): de khang thog tu song nas rang gi lus las ras phud de/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin steng du bor ba dang / khyim bdag des kyang 'phrigs te/ 'dis khang thog nas por pa las na 'di la
233b3(mdo sde): nor de las med gor ma chag snyam nas/ rang gi g.yog rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed dong la ras 'di sus bor ba ltos shig ces byas nas/ de dag gis bltas pa dang / re zhig na bu mo de tsog tsog
233b4(mdo sde): por 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas de dag gis dris pa dang / de na re/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yon tan brjod pa bdag gis thos nas dbul ba'i 'jigs pas skrag ste/ bdag gis gos rnyed
233b5(mdo sde): pa de de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo zhes zer ro/ /de nas de dag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med
233b6(mdo sde): zas sbyin mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bu mo de la gos dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs bskon to/ /de nas de tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ skyes ma
233b7(mdo sde): thag tu lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo gzhan su la'ang med pa de lta bu'i gos dag de la byung ngo / /lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar
234a1(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang
234a2(mdo sde): po skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la ras phul bar des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se
234a3(mdo sde): mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i
234a4(mdo sde): me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/
234a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo'i
234a6(mdo sde): bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon
234a7(mdo sde): ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mos 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas
234b1(mdo sde): dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus ba'i ri las bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams
234b2(mdo sde): gcad pa dang / mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma
234b3(mdo sde): bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags
234b4(mdo sde): so| |yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang po ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag
234b5(mdo sde): gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang
234b6(mdo sde): thob| |mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do
234b7(mdo sde): shal 'phyang ba dga' 'gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon ras 'bul
235a1(mdo sde): 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las
235a2(mdo sde): thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang / tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa
235a3(mdo sde): lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen pos byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom
235a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la
235a5(mdo sde): blta ba'i slad du ma chis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba
235a6(mdo sde): bzhi nga la blta pa'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin te/ ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bud med de/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dad pa sdud par byed pa la ras phul nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa
235a7(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag/ de
235b1(mdo sde): bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rnams la bkur sti bya yi/ bkur sti med par mi bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /
235b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //ne tso zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
235b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu
235b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor
235b5(mdo sde): byas| mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
235b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
235b7(mdo sde): bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying
236a1(mdo sde): po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab bzhi ba
236a2(mdo sde): dang | 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/
236a3(mdo sde): gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /rgyal po de'ang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba dang / bdag la phan pa dang /
236a4(mdo sde): gzhan la phan pa la zhugs te/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig go /de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar smon te/ lag pa la rkom
236a5(mdo sde): tshugs bcas nas/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha| ci slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas bcom ldan 'das ring zhig
236a6(mdo sde): ma mthong ngo / /ngas bde bar gshegs pa ring zhig ma mthong ngo / /da ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'dod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa la zhugs pas/
236a7(mdo sde): lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po smon pa gsan to/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi
236b1(mdo sde): gzigs pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa zhig ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung
236b2(mdo sde): ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par
236b3(mdo sde): bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring
236b4(mdo sde): po nas 'dris par byas pa dang / mi 'jigs bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang
236b5(mdo sde): dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug
236b6(mdo sde): pa| lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu le gnas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa phyogs bcur grags pas kun rgyas pa/ brgya
236b7(mdo sde): phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang chos khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/
237a1(mdo sde): su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug /su ni nya mang bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang / nya mang ba dang / gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan
237a2(mdo sde): song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag pa bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du byid ba las
237a3(mdo sde): lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las
237a4(mdo sde): bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /'dir smras
237a5(mdo sde): pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal
237a6(mdo sde): po gzugs can snying po la phan gdags pa'i phyir dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas/ chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas ljongs rgyu
237a7(mdo sde): zhing mthar gyis gshegs pa las nags khrod gcig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ne tso mi skad shes pa zhig gnas te/ des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo //
237b1(mdo sde): de nas shin tu rings par song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshur gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das/ gshegs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /bdag la phan gdags su gsol
237b2(mdo sde): nags khrod 'di kho nar gshegs dgongs gdab par gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ne tso de la phan gdags pa'i phyir shing gang la ne co gnas pa de'i drung du rtswa'i gdan
237b3(mdo sde): bting nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /nyan thos chen po rnams ni shing gzhan dag gi drung du 'khod do/ /de nas ne tsos bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos rnams la mi'am/ mi ma yin
237b4(mdo sde): pa'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ yi dwags sam/ gcan zan gnod pa byed du dogs te/ mtshan thog thag nags khrod de na phan tshun skor ba byed do/ /de nas nam nangs pa dang /
237b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzod pa gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa lags pas/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i
237b6(mdo sde): rgyu ci yang ma mchis na bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ de lta lags kyis kyang bdag sngon du mchis te/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bcom ldan 'das gshegs so zhes sbran par 'tshal lo//
237b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar gyis shig /de nas re zhig na de bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon du chas te/ mthar gyis rgyal po'i thad du phyin to/ /de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po
238a1(mdo sde): ni khang bzang gi steng na bud med 'ba' zhig dang sil snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de nas de tso mi skad shes pa des rgyal po la smras pa/ kye
238a2(mdo sde): rgyal po/ khyed mkhyen par mdzod cig /bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyod kyi yul du gshegs lags kyi/ lha|khyed kyis bshos sta gon mdzad pa'i rigs
238a3(mdo sde): so zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal po shin tu rings par khang bzang gi steng nas babs nas blon po chen po'i tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rnams bshams
238a4(mdo sde): nas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
238a5(mdo sde): dang bcas pa bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas nang du spyan drangs nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas so/ /de nas ne tso de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi
238a6(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi 'byor pa 'di dag thams cad ni bdag gi yon tan yin no snyam du rig nas/ dga' zhing mgul yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes
238a7(mdo sde): nas rgyal po'i mdun logs su phan tshun du lding ba las khras khyer te bsad do/ /bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed de shi bas ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang
238b1(mdo sde): por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam
238b2(mdo sde): mo| |de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ne tsor
238b3(mdo sde): gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la
238b4(mdo sde): blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se mo des brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan
238b5(mdo sde): pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar
238b6(mdo sde): po dang / man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i
238b7(mdo sde): phyir bcom ldan 'das des kyi spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thags su chud nas/
239a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ra'i rtsa
239a2(mdo sde): mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
239a3(mdo sde): kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i ri las bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag
239a4(mdo sde): lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang / gnyen gyi tshogs
239a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mchun ma rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan
239a6(mdo sde): song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yi bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs
239a7(mdo sde): pa'i mig / shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas
239b1(mdo sde): mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dga' ba yis/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang bdag gyur te/ /btud cing
239b2(mdo sde): zhabs gnyis la ni phyag btsal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon ne tso gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa
239b3(mdo sde): dang | zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du yongs pa'i 'byor
239b4(mdo sde): pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang / tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas ta/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po
239b5(mdo sde): byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ ma dang sum mi mjed kyi bdag
239b6(mdo sde): po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
239b7(mdo sde): dag| mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no/ /ne tso gang gis nga nags khrod der nub mo'i dgongs
240a1(mdo sde): mal la spyan drangs pa de khyed kyis de mthong ngam/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
240a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag/ /ne tso de nyid shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa de yin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa/ sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag
240a3(mdo sde): bgyis na des ne tsor skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i
240a4(mdo sde): lha'i bus tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ongs ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pa na/ sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i
240a5(mdo sde): bus las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par
240a6(mdo sde): smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po
240a7(mdo sde): dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can ngag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab
240b1(mdo sde): pa na| |'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra
240b2(mdo sde): bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang
240b3(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA ra NA si na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na da na dge bsnyen gcig/
240b4(mdo sde): 'dug pa des bslab pa lhod par byas te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas ni ne tsor skyes so/ /nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so/ /des bslab pa'i gzhi lhag ma rnams
240b5(mdo sde): bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gang pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gang par 'gyur ro/ /
240b6(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge
240b7(mdo sde): slong dag / de bas na las gcig tu nges par gang pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong
241a1(mdo sde): dag |khyed gyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
241a2(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do/ / //pho nya zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams
241a3(mdo sde): kyi dang | tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang /
241a4(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto
241a5(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun
241a6(mdo sde): gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ka gnas par dbyar gnas pa dam bcas so/ /de
241a7(mdo sde): nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig /sku tshe ring rab shog cig /ces bstod nas gsol
241b1(mdo sde): ba btab pa| lha| mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring mo zhig tu ma mthong ste/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags
241b2(mdo sde): so| |bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/ khyim bdag /bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang
241b3(mdo sde): du dbyar gnas par bzhed pa khyod kyis ci thos/ mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ lha| bdag gi bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par dam bzhes so zhes thos
241b4(mdo sde): lags so/ /de nas ka sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas byin la sogs pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / blon po rnams kyis mi zhig pho nyas bkug ste/ kye mi
241b5(mdo sde): khyod tshur shog / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal la bdag cag gis mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnod
241b6(mdo sde): pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la/
241b7(mdo sde): 'di skad du btsun pa/ ko sa la'i rgyal po dang mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa pho brang 'khon gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yun
242a1(mdo sde): ring po zhig tu ma mthong bas/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so/ /bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal
242a2(mdo sde): na| thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su gsol zhes mchi'o zhes gsol ci gces bsgo'o/ /de nas mi des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang
242a3(mdo sde): blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan te/ rgyal po'i khab tu song nas/ mthar gyis song song ba las/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du
242a4(mdo sde): phyin to/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad du bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/
242a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ ko sa ka'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams
242a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bor phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde
242a7(mdo sde): ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes mchi'o/ /'di skad du/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das ring mo zhig du ma mthong ste/ bdag cag ni bcom
242b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so/ /bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su
242b2(mdo sde): gsol zhes kyang mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye|gal te rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'gror ster na 'gro bar bya'o/ /de nas pho nya des rgyal po gzugs can snying
242b3(mdo sde): po la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs par rgyal po gzugs can snying pos dad pa stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i
242b4(mdo sde): dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das dbyar zla gsum 'das
242b5(mdo sde): nas| chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ zham ring 'khor mang po dag dang mnyan du yod pa la logs su chas te gshegs so/ /pho
242b6(mdo sde): nya'ang shing rta la zhon te chas so/ /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhabs kyis gshegs pa mthong nas/ shing rta las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
242b7(mdo sde): sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gi shing rta bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
243a1(mdo sde): pa| rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shing rta dang / /yang dag rtsol la nga gnas na/ /nyon mongs tshe rams ma snad par/ /sa steng kun tu rgyu bar byed/ /pho nyas gsol pa /
243a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis gshegs pa lags kyis kyang bdag la phan gdags pa dang / thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcibs su gsol de nas bcom ldan 'das
243a3(mdo sde): pho nya la phan gdags pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rta'i steng du bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bcibs bzhin du mnyan du yod par byon nas/ pho nyas kyang rgyal
243a4(mdo sde): po la sbran to/ /de nas rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mtshan mo rgyal bu rgyal
243a5(mdo sde): byed kyi tshal de nyid du 'khod do/ /pho nya de ni tshe thung ste/ chos thos pa'i 'og tu de nyid kyi mtshan mo shi ste/ de shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i
243a6(mdo sde): bu'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi
243a7(mdo sde): las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i
243b1(mdo sde): lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir
243b2(mdo sde): 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan
243b3(mdo sde): pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma
243b4(mdo sde): dkar po dang / man dA ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor ti/ chos mnyan
243b5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs
243b6(mdo sde): su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon
243b7(mdo sde): po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
244a1(mdo sde): gi khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams phye
244a2(mdo sde): pa dang / bdag lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis /
244a3(mdo sde): nang mi dang / gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa /
244a4(mdo sde): nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /
244a5(mdo sde): bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob//
244a6(mdo sde): mi mchog dbang ngo mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do
244a7(mdo sde): shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btung cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag btsal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas
244b1(mdo sde): sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor
244b2(mdo sde): pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khang bzang gi steng na 'dug pas/ snang pa chen
244b3(mdo sde): po de mthong nas nam nangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam /
244b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i
244b5(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ khyod kyi pho nya de nga la sems dga' bar gyur nas/ shi ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang
244b6(mdo sde): por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas rgyal po de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ kye ma sangs
244b7(mdo sde): rgyas| kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun/ 'di dag la ni chung ngu zhig byas kyang rnam par smin pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis
245a1(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas stan las langs te song ngo / /der bcom
245a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di gsum ni mchog tu gdags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang / chos mchog
245a3(mdo sde): tu gdags pa dang / dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ sems can rkang med rnams sam/ rkang gnyis rnams sam/ rkang bzhi rnams
245a4(mdo sde): sam| rkang mang rnams sam/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes can rnams sam/ 'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes yod pa'ang
245a5(mdo sde): ma yin/ 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par bstan to/ /
245a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su 'ang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa'ang lha rnams kyi nang
245a7(mdo sde): du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu gyur par shes par bya ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /chos
245b1(mdo sde): mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par bstan to/ /chos la
245b2(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba su'ang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa'ang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/
245b3(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ tshogs
245b4(mdo sde): sam| 'dus pa'am/ mang po'am/ 'khor gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la mchog yin par bstan te/ dge 'dun la mngon par
245b5(mdo sde): dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa'ang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams
245b6(mdo sde): kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyis mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
245b7(mdo sde): dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ ma he zhes bya ba ni/
246a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang /
246a2(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
246a3(mdo sde): bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
246a4(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zod rnams
246a5(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las nags khrod gcig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ma he khyu chen po dang / ma he'i rdzi lnga
246a6(mdo sde): brgya 'khod do/ /de nas re zhig na de'i nang na ma he stobs dang ldan zhing stobs kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de mi gzhan dang gi dri tshor na phyi bzhin rgyug par byed do/ /bcom ldan
246a7(mdo sde): 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs so/ /de nas ma he'i rdzi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo / /de nas de dag gis skad cher
246b1(mdo sde): bos te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di nam he ma rungs pa mchis kyi/ shul 'dir mi gshegs su gsol zhes byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye ngas 'dir dus la bab par
246b2(mdo sde): shes kyi khyed snying ma chung zhig / de nas ma he des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ba dang / rnga ma ldang du gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der brgyugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
246b3(mdo sde): 'das kyi mdun logs su seng ge ral pa can ral pa g.yengs pa lnga sprul de glo g.yas g.yon du me chen po lnga sprul to/ /steng du ni lcags kyi pha bong chen po zhig sprul to/ /de nas ma he des phyogs
246b4(mdo sde): kun tu 'jigs pa chen po mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lces bldags nas/ zhum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bltas so/ /de nas
246b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la des brda phrad pa'i skad du/ bzhin bzang / 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o/ /
246b6(mdo sde): shes chos tshig gsum bstan nas/ tshe rabs kyang dran par mdzad de/ de thos nas dus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal nas/ khyod ni dud 'gror
246b7(mdo sde): skyes pa la/ /da ni nga yis ci byar yod/ /mi khom par ni skyes zin gyi/ /don med ngus pas ci la phan/ /'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can/ /nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas
247a1(mdo sde): spangs na legs/ /'on tang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas ma he ma rungs pa des rang gi lus la dmad de/ kha 'tshes nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog
247a2(mdo sde): chags rnams ni me'i drod che bas de skyen par shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam
247a3(mdo sde): pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang /
247a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir
247a5(mdo sde): 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs
247a6(mdo sde): pa| lus do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs
247a7(mdo sde): pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ nags khrod de dag thams cad 'od chen
247b1(mdo sde): pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i
247b2(mdo sde): bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ma her gyur
247b3(mdo sde): pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthong po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du
247b4(mdo sde): brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang / thar
247b5(mdo sde): pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyang ma
247b6(mdo sde): bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/
247b7(mdo sde): nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag
248a1(mdo sde): gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig / shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi
248a2(mdo sde): ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni de mthong 'bras bu yod/ /
248a3(mdo sde): de nas do shal 'phyang ba dag 'gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas
248a4(mdo sde): sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du
248a5(mdo sde): 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor ba de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas ma he rdzi de dag gis snang ba chen po de mthong ngo / /de mthong nas the
248a6(mdo sde): tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mdang sum bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te/ lha'i 'od kyis snang bar bgyid pa de su
248a7(mdo sde): zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyi ma he de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ de mdang sum nga'i thad
248b1(mdo sde): du 'ongs nas/ ngas de la chos bstan te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas ma he rdzi de dag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te ngo mtshar to/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
248b2(mdo sde): skyes pa 'di'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang phrad nas lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur na bdag cag gis ci ste khyad par thob par mi 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas
248b3(mdo sde): de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas bzang pos tshom par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ de dag gis brtson pa
248b4(mdo sde): pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshoms kyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs
248b5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ sngon ma he ra gyur pa'i lha'i bus gang dag bgyis na des ma her skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa mthong
248b6(mdo sde): bar gyur lags/ ma he rdzi rnams kyis ni las ci bgyis na de sa ma he rdzir gyur lags/ las gang bgyis pas ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan
248b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhag dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i
249a1(mdo sde): las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ de dag nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag
249a2(mdo sde): las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/
249a3(mdo sde): las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las
249a4(mdo sde): rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po
249a5(mdo sde): 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
249a6(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong
249a7(mdo sde): khyer wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong dag gtan la 'bebs par byed pa na/ dge slong sde snod gsum pa zhig 'khor lnga brgya dang
249b1(mdo sde): gtan la 'bebs pa'i nang na 'dug go / de'i nang na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong dag kyang yod de/ de dag sde snod gsum pa la 'dri bar byed la/ des ni lan ma thebs pa dang / de khros
249b2(mdo sde): nas ngag gi las rtsub po phyung ste/ nags kyi ma he dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes byas/ de'i slob ma rnams kyis kyang ma he rdzi dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes smras so/ /bcom ldan
249b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ dge slong sde snod gsum pa gang yin pa de nyid ma he 'di yin no/ /slob ma de dag ni ma he rdzi 'di dag yin te/ las des na
249b4(mdo sde): che rabs lnga brgyar ma her skyes so/ /slob ma rnams kyang ma he rdzi lnga brgyar gyur to/ /nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa des ni lhar skyes so/ /dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ tshul khrims
249b5(mdo sde): bsrungs pas ni bden pa mthong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de bas na ngag gi nyes pa spangs pa'i phyir 'bad par bya ste/ ci nas ma he dang / ma he rdzi
249b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu de'i yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob par 'gyur bar dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan
249b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //bsnyen gnas zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
250a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded
250a2(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
250a3(mdo sde): bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
250a4(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zod
250a5(mdo sde): rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
250a6(mdo sde): lha'i nang na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de chos nyan pa'i phyir rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o/ /de nas phyis re zhig na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog 'khor lnga
250a7(mdo sde): brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom
250b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan
250b2(mdo sde): te| de thos nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i
250b3(mdo sde): tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchil ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /
250b4(mdo sde): mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis
250b5(mdo sde): kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang / gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/
250b6(mdo sde): nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag
250b7(mdo sde): gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig / shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog
251a1(mdo sde): dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de
251a2(mdo sde): nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag btsal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas
251a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu bsnyen gnas tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' po g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor ba
251a4(mdo sde): gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor ba de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de'i tshe dge slong dag srod dang / tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/
251a5(mdo sde): de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom
251a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags
251a7(mdo sde): sam| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma
251b1(mdo sde): yin gyi/ lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas dge slong dag /
251b2(mdo sde): the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ lha'i bu bsnyen gnas ga las byung lags/ ming ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das
251b3(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa/ nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs
251b4(mdo sde): shig ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs
251b5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
251b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /phyis re zhig na rgyal po kr-i kr-I bcom ldan 'das la
251b7(mdo sde): blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo / /de nas re zhig na bram ze gnyis drang srong smra bar don zhig la song ba dang / de gnyis kyis rgyal po de rgyal po'i 'byor ba chen po dang / rgyal po'i
252a1(mdo sde): mthu stobs chen po dang ldan pa mthong ngo / /de nas de gnyis rgyal srid la 'dod pa skyes nas/ de gnyis kyis dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa/ kye sangs rgyas kyi dge
252a2(mdo sde): bsnyen/ las ci zhig byas na/ des ci bsams pa dang / ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes byas so/ /dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/ gang gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad
252a3(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag par bsrungs pa de'i ni ci bsams pa dang / ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes byas so/ /de nas bram ze de gnyis kyis khyim bdag chu stod las bsnyen
252a4(mdo sde): gnas yan lag brgyad pa blangs te bsrungs so/ /de na gcig gis ni yongs su dag par bsrungs te/ de nas shi nas rgyal po kr-i kr-i'i bur skyes te/ de'i ming legs skyes zhes btags nas
252a5(mdo sde): pha shi ba'i 'og tu de rgyal por bcug go / gcig shos kyis ni bsnyen gnas nyams par byas te/ de ni shi nas klu'i nang du skyes te/ de'i steng du nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bye
252a6(mdo sde): tshan bab ste/ des rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byed do/ /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di las gang gis 'bras bu yin/ 'di las gang gis 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa yin na/
252a7(mdo sde): des bdag gi 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug snyam mo/ /de nas des bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag gis blangs pa las bslab pa lhod par byas pa des 'di lta
252b1(mdo sde): bu'i sdug bsngal bdag gis nyams su myong la/ gang gis blangs te/ bsrungs pa des ni rgyal srid thob par gyur to snyam mo/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ de'ang bdag gis bsnyen gnas yan
252b2(mdo sde): lag brgyad dang ldan par bsrung bar bya'o/ /'o na tang bdag klu'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur yang srid do snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze'i cha lugs su bdag nyid sprul nas/ rgyal po'i thad du
252b3(mdo sde): 'ongs te phyin nas rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig / sku tshe ring bar shog cig ces bstod nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag la 'tshal gyi/ lha|
252b4(mdo sde): bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa btsal du gsol/ gal te ma btsal na gdon mi 'tshal bar lha'i dbu tshal ba bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes byas nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar
252b5(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag ste mi dga' las kyi bung zhes byas nas/ gser 'bum yod pa'i snod rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ bdag gi yul thams cad du dril bsgrags
252b6(mdo sde): nas| su nga la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa ston pa de la gser 'bum 'di sbyin no/ /bkur sti chen pos kyang bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas re zhig na shing mkhan gyi
252b7(mdo sde): bu mo bud med rgan mo zhig 'dug pa des rgyal po la ka ba zhig bstan te/ sngon bdag gi pha rtag tu ka ba 'di la spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog gis mchod pa bgyid na 'di phyung ste gzigs
253a1(mdo sde): shig ces byas so/ /de nas rgyal pos zham ring ba rnams la ka ba 'di phyungs shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas rgyal po'i zham ring rnams kyis ka ba de phyung ba dang / de'i
253a2(mdo sde): 'og nas bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang / dge bsnyen gyi bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun gser gyi glegs bam la bris pa
253a3(mdo sde): zhig rnyed do/ /de nas rgyal pos klu de la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa zhig bris te byin no/ /drang srong smra ba na gnas pa'i drang srong khri nyis stong gis kyang byang chub kyi phyogs
253a4(mdo sde): dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon sum du byas so/ /klu des kyang bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrungs nas thang la byung ste/ lus bor nas de kha 'tshos te 'dug
253a5(mdo sde): go |de nas shi ste g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /dge slong dag /bsnyen gnas ni de nas byung ste ming yang de las btags so/ /
253a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //ngang pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
253a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha
253b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/
253b2(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
253b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
253b4(mdo sde): pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/
253b5(mdo sde): de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang /
253b6(mdo sde): chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / pa lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa
253b7(mdo sde): la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /phyis re zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song
254a1(mdo sde): ba dang / pany+tsa la'i rgyal pos ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ngang pa lnga brgya skyes su bskur te/ gang gi tshe rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba de'i tshe/ ngang pa lnga
254a2(mdo sde): brgya po de dag phul lo/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ngang pa de dag la mi 'jigs pa byin te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du btang nas/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
254a3(mdo sde): chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa bshos gsol zhing bzhugs pa de'i tshe ngang pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro la/ bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang
254a4(mdo sde): de rnams khyos ma byin te/ de dag gis zos nas tshim zhing mgu la dbang po rtas te 'khod do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 'khor bzhi
254a5(mdo sde): po de dag la chos ston pa de'i tshe/ ngang pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du dong ste/ chos nyan par byed do/ /de nas de dag tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang
254a6(mdo sde): por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes
254a7(mdo sde): snyam mo/ /de nas ngang pa las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo / /de nas
254b1(mdo sde): sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyi/ bdag
254b2(mdo sde): cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub ko ra dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal
254b3(mdo sde): dang / se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa de dag gis de nyid kyi
254b4(mdo sde): mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra rnams kyi thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang
254b5(mdo sde): bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ngang par gyur
254b6(mdo sde): pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan
254b7(mdo sde): te| de thos nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de
255a1(mdo sde): dag gis bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams
255a2(mdo sde): pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag cag lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag
255a3(mdo sde): cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis
255a4(mdo sde): kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod
255a5(mdo sde): nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das lam bdag cag rnams kyis thob/ /bdag cag de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob/ /
255a6(mdo sde): bdag cag sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /

255b1(mdo sde): dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur

255b4(mdo sde): kyang the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya

255b7(mdo sde): khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ de dag nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ de dag mdang sum
256a1(mdo sde): nga'i thad du lhags nas de dag la ngas chos bstan te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom
256a2(mdo sde): thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des ngang par skyes lags/ las gang
256a3(mdo sde): dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa mthong lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing
256a4(mdo sde): rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las byas
256a5(mdo sde): shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi
256a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang /
256a7(mdo sde): skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du
256b1(mdo sde): smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

256b4(mdo sde): bar byas pa des ni ngang par skyes so/ /nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so/ /bslab pa lhag pa rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de
256b5(mdo sde): ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges
256b6(mdo sde): par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma

257a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod

257a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen

257a6(mdo sde): po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / bsnyun gsos dang /
257a7(mdo sde): sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor
257b1(mdo sde): mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs
257b2(mdo sde): nas| de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/
257b3(mdo sde): khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog 'dra ba zhig btsas te/ de'i gser gyi 'od kyis
257b4(mdo sde): grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas so/ /de nas pha ma dang / sems can gzhan dag gis de mthong nas ltad mo la lhags te/ sems can gyi khyad par 'di lta bu ni ga las
257b5(mdo sde): 'ongs zhig gu zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems pa la zhugs so/ /de na de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye
257b6(mdo sde): du rnams na re/ 'di btsas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad gser gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming gser 'od ces gdags so zhes zer
257b7(mdo sde): ro| |de nas khye'u gser 'od bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad
258a1(mdo sde): nas| de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed
258a2(mdo sde): bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de'ang mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang / dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba dang / bdag dang /
258a3(mdo sde): gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig go /phyis re zhig na de byad gzugs kyi rgyags pas myos te/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol na rtse zhing 'dug go /
258a4(mdo sde): shAkya mang po dag gcig kyang shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo / /de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis mthong nas dris pa/ khyed gar 'dong / de dag gis smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
258a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'gro'o/ /de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba thos te/ sngo ma thos pa'i ming thos nas spu thams
258a6(mdo sde): cad zing zhes byas te/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la/ bdag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro gor ma chags snyam nas/
258a7(mdo sde): de'ang shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/
258b1(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'do ma gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu'i kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/
258b2(mdo sde): mthong ma thag tu byad gzugs kyi rgyags pa med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de
258b3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas/ de chos thos pa dang / rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na pha ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste
258b4(mdo sde): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
258b5(mdo sde): to| |btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung nas bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad
258b6(mdo sde): du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog can glang po che'i sna ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas/ khye'u gser 'od la 'di skad ces bka'
258b7(mdo sde): stsal to/ /gzhon nu tshur shog /tshangs par spyod cig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la/ skra dang / kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni bsnyen par
259a1(mdo sde): rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/ lag na ni lhung bzed dang / chu snod thogs par gyur te/ /'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur
259a2(mdo sde): zhes bka' stsal pas/ /de ni mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas go bgos nas/ /mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
259a3(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo
259a4(mdo sde): zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa
259a5(mdo sde): thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha'
259a6(mdo sde): dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang
259a7(mdo sde): dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta bar/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra
259b1(mdo sde): ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ gser 'od kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di ltar
259b2(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /gser 'od nyid
259b3(mdo sde): kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ gser 'od
259b4(mdo sde): nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par
259b5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams
259b6(mdo sde): dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du
259b7(mdo sde): smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa| yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa
260a1(mdo sde): dang | zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
260a2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
260a3(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
260a4(mdo sde): 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig
260a5(mdo sde): yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do/ /de nas re zhig na khyim bdag gcig mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der
260a6(mdo sde): song ba las mchod rten de las gser gyi me long zhig lhung ba des mthong nas des de'i rna ba'i gong rgyan du bcos nas mchod rten de la btags te/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog
260a7(mdo sde): gis mchod nas zhabs la phyag btsal te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes
260b1(mdo sde): pa byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u gser 'od 'di
260b2(mdo sde): yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di lta bur byad gzugs kyi khyad par can du gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni
260b3(mdo sde): tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gang pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gang par 'gyur ro/ /las
260b4(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de
260b5(mdo sde): bas na las gcig tu nges par gang pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar
260b6(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //dri zhim
260b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
261a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po
261a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
261a3(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams
261a4(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che
261a5(mdo sde): ba| yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang
261a6(mdo sde): lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u
261a7(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/ de'i kha nas me tog ut+pa la'i dri 'byung ba lus thams cad nas
261b1(mdo sde): ni tsan+dan gyi dri byung ngo / /de nas de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de'i nye du rnams na re/ 'di'i kha nas ut+pa la'i dri byung
261b2(mdo sde): la| lus thams cad nas tsan+dan gyi dri byung bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dri zhim zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u dri zhim pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i
261b3(mdo sde): ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi sa'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu
261b4(mdo sde): dang | gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de'ang sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs kyi shugs kyis dad pa dang ldan la/
261b5(mdo sde): dge zhing bsam pa bzang la/ bdag dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che la chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ gang gi tshe khye'u dri zhim dpung rgyan dang / mgul ba'i do shal
261b6(mdo sde): dang | gdu bus brgyan te srang gi nang du zhugs pa de'i tshe/ tsan+dan gyi dri bsung gis grong khyer thams cad khyab par gyur ste/ skye bo mang pos kyang lha'i spos kyi dri tshor nas mchog tu ya
261b7(mdo sde): mtshan du 'dzin te/ 'di skad du/ kye ma| bsod nams dag gi mthu zhes 'dzer to/ /phyis re zhig na khye'u dri zhim shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom
262a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis
262a2(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do//
262a3(mdo sde): dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa
262a4(mdo sde): dang | bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u dri zhim gyis 'jig
262a5(mdo sde): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das
262a6(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi
262a7(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom
262b1(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang /
