262b2(mdo sde): ldan pa/ tsan+dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa
262b3(mdo sde): dang | chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag
262b4(mdo sde): the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dri zhim gyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i kha nas ni ut+pa la'i dri 'byung la/
262b5(mdo sde): lus thams cad nas ni tsan+dan gyi dri 'byung bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dri zhim nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen
262b6(mdo sde): grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za sbar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ dri zhim nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig
262b7(mdo sde): gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang /
263a1(mdo sde): rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa de rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skyi
263a2(mdo sde): mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du
263a3(mdo sde): smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs/ dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang /
263a4(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
263a5(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs
263a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /
263a7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad
263b1(mdo sde): gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do/ /khyim bdag gcig gis kyang de la dad pa skyes nas/ spos dang / byug
263b2(mdo sde): ba rnam pa sna tshogs phul te/ bdug pa dang / me tog gis mchod nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis
263b3(mdo sde): na| bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig / ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das
263b4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u dri zhim 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
263b5(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di lta bur dri zhim par gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong
263b6(mdo sde): dag / de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa
263b7(mdo sde): yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa dang /
264a1(mdo sde): las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /
264a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs
264a3(mdo sde): pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bco lnga pa/ byad bzang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang
264a4(mdo sde): 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams
264a5(mdo sde): dang | mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
264a6(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /
264a7(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
264b1(mdo sde): so| |de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos bu'i nor dang 'gran pa
264b2(mdo sde): zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags
264b3(mdo sde): nas| de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/ lus byad dpe med la mdog
264b4(mdo sde): 'jam pa/ lus kyi bdun mtho ba/ che bar grags pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams
264b5(mdo sde): na re| 'di'i lus dpe med pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming byad bzang zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u byad bzang pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis
264b6(mdo sde): dang | dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan
264b7(mdo sde): yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang /
265a1(mdo sde): gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dang / tha na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang mchod cing
265a2(mdo sde): rjod pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /des sa phyogs gang du gom pa bor ba de dag kyang gtsang mar gyur te/ de ltar bsod nams dang ldan zhing che bar grags so/ /phyis re zhig
265a3(mdo sde): na de shing n+ya gro d+h+ya'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po
265a4(mdo sde): brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma
265a5(mdo sde): thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi
265a6(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs
265a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u byad bzang gis 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
265b1(mdo sde): 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig
265b2(mdo sde): lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin
265b3(mdo sde): par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang
265b4(mdo sde): bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang /
265b5(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
265b6(mdo sde): kyi mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
265b7(mdo sde): btsun pa/ byad bzang gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di lta bu'i lus 'di lta bur gyur la dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
266a1(mdo sde): slong dag / byad bzang nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong
266a2(mdo sde): ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ byad bzang nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas
266a3(mdo sde): shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las
266a4(mdo sde): dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams
266a5(mdo sde): ni| |bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ /bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa
266a6(mdo sde): gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
266a7(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang
266b1(mdo sde): gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du
266b2(mdo sde): phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas rin
266b3(mdo sde): po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der rgyal po gnyen yod gnyen gyi tshogs dang
266b4(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / blon po'i tshogs kyis zham ring byas pas mchod rten gyi dus ston byas so/ /phyis re zhig nyi ma gcig cig mi dbul po zhig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song nas
266b5(mdo sde): des de la me tog rnyis pa dag dang / mchod rten rdul gyis yog pa dag mthong ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/ phyags ma blangs nas mchod rten
266b6(mdo sde): yang phyags/ me tog rnyis pa'ang bsal to/ /de nas mchod rten la rdul med cing dri ma med pa mthong nas dad pa skyes te/ zhabs la phyag btsal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa
266b7(mdo sde): ba dang / sems bskyed pa 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig
267a1(mdo sde): ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mi dbul por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ byad bzang
267a2(mdo sde): 'di yin te/ des mchod rten la phyag dar byas pas na/ byad gzugs bzang por gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des tshe 'di nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong
267a3(mdo sde): dag |de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin
267a4(mdo sde): pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa
267a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan
267a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //stobs ldan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
267a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang /
267b1(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar
267b2(mdo sde): byas| ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
267b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
267b4(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin
267b5(mdo sde): pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan gcig tu rtse
267b6(mdo sde): zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta
267b7(mdo sde): na sdug la mdzes pa stobs kyi shugs gzhan las 'phags pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed
268a1(mdo sde): de| nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming stobs ldan zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u stobs
268a2(mdo sde): ldan pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma
268a3(mdo sde): dang | zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par
268a4(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig
268a5(mdo sde): go / de nas phyis re zhig na de shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par
268a6(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas
268a7(mdo sde): bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ chos mnyan
268b1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden
268b2(mdo sde): pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u stobs ldan gyis 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs
268b3(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas
268b4(mdo sde): phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig
268b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar
268b6(mdo sde): gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom
268b7(mdo sde): pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang
269a1(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smras pa'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod
269a2(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa stobs ldan gyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i lus stobs dang ldan par gyur la/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/
269a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /stobs ldan nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung
269a4(mdo sde): la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ stobs ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/
269a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin
269a6(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / las mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par
269a7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chung mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung
269b1(mdo sde): ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
269b2(mdo sde): pa| 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten du byung
269b3(mdo sde): ste| de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na brten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad
269b4(mdo sde): nas| shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku
269b5(mdo sde): gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi la byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs
269b6(mdo sde): te| mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der skye bo phal po ches glu blangs gar byas pas mchod rten rdul gyis yog par gyur to/ /phyis re zhig na khyim bdag gcig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i
269b7(mdo sde): nang du song ba dang / des mchod rten gyi 'khor sa rdul gyis yog pa mthong ngo / /de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/ spos kyi lde gu til mar
270a1(mdo sde): dang sbyar ba phul te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu dag mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi
270a2(mdo sde): mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni stobs
270a3(mdo sde): ldan 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na stobs dang ldan par gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni dgra bcom pa nyid
270a4(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gang par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par
270a5(mdo sde): dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las
270a6(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gang pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar
270a7(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //sdug gu
270b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
270b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir
270b3(mdo sde): byas| bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes
270b4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan
270b5(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba yongs su
270b6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig
270b7(mdo sde): tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang
271a1(mdo sde): zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa che bar grags pa/ mthong na dga' ba zhig btsas te/ de btsas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad grags pas rgyas par
271a2(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnam na re/ khye'u 'di btsas ma thag tu skye bo thams cad kyi snying
271a3(mdo sde): du sdug pas na/ khye'u 'di'i ming sdug gu zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'i sdug gu pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru
271a4(mdo sde): ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi sa 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo
271a5(mdo sde): byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan
271a6(mdo sde): pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong
271a7(mdo sde): ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa la sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bas sdud par byed do/ /de nas phyis re
271b1(mdo sde): zhig na khye'u sdug gu shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang
271b2(mdo sde): po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag
271b3(mdo sde): tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
271b4(mdo sde): sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur
271b5(mdo sde): ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u sdug gus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyid shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du
271b6(mdo sde): byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga ba'i 'khor
271b7(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin
272a1(mdo sde): bar rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral
272a2(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/ gser dang / /bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i
272a3(mdo sde): sbubs bcom nas/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po
272a4(mdo sde): dang | nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa
272a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ sdug gus las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di grags pa chen po dang ldan pa dang / sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/ rab
272a6(mdo sde): tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sdug gu nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs
272a7(mdo sde): rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sdug gu nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa
272b1(mdo sde): de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / /
272b2(mdo sde): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ las dge ba dang / las mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye
272b3(mdo sde): mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal ba brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin
272b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal ba dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa
272b5(mdo sde): dang | zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
272b6(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs
272b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas
273a1(mdo sde): rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor khor yug
273a2(mdo sde): tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so/ /de nas phyis re zhig na dpyid kyi dus su shing rnams me tog rgyas te/ me tog rnam pa sna
273a3(mdo sde): tshogs 'byung ba na/ khyim bdag gcig cig gis rgyal po la gsol to/ /bdag ni lha dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog gdags
273a4(mdo sde): par 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shig /de nas khyim bdag de dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / zhabs 'bring ba rnams kyis dril bsgrags te/ me tog rnam pa sna
273a5(mdo sde): tshogs sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog bdags te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas sems dga' ba bskyed nas/ dge ba'i
273a6(mdo sde): rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni
273a7(mdo sde): sdug gu 'di yin te/ des skye bo phal po che dang lhan gcig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa des ni/ skye bo phal po che'i snying du sdug pa'i yid du 'ong bar gyur la/ rgyu de nyid
273b1(mdo sde): kyis na blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur la/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par
273b2(mdo sde): smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren
273b3(mdo sde): ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig
273b4(mdo sde): tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong
273b5(mdo sde): de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //pad+ma'i mig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po
273b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang /
273b7(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas
274a1(mdo sde): bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am
274a2(mdo sde): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
274a3(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na
274a4(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan
274a5(mdo sde): pa| rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do//
274a6(mdo sde): de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la
274a7(mdo sde): mdzes pa/ mig pad+ma sngon po 'dra ba/ mgo bo la lha'i nor bu rin po che mthon ka thogs pa zhig btsas te/ des grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nor bu mthon ka'i
274b1(mdo sde): kha dog can du byas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di'i mig pad+ma 'dra
274b2(mdo sde): bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming pad+ma'i mig ces gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u pad+ma'i mig pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma
274b3(mdo sde): 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ de ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang /
274b4(mdo sde): gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/
274b5(mdo sde): bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/
274b6(mdo sde): gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ de gang dag/ gang du 'gro ba de dang / der lha dang / mi rnams kyis mchod cing rjed do/ /de nas phyi zhig na khye'u pad+ma'i mig shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'
274b7(mdo sde): ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/
275a1(mdo sde): 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu des
275a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
275a3(mdo sde): 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par
275a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u pad+ma'i mig gis 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
275a5(mdo sde): 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa
275a6(mdo sde): rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor
275a7(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos
275b1(mdo sde): can yin par rtsad chod te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas /
275b2(mdo sde): gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig
275b3(mdo sde): pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i
275b4(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na de bsod snyoms la song ba dang / skye bo phal po ches de la bltas nas ngo tsha bar
275b5(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de nas pad+ma'i mig bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad
275b6(mdo sde): du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu| 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na nor bu rin po che med par bya mi nus so/ /de lta mod kyi ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams
275b7(mdo sde): kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis mi mthong bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do/ /de nas dge slong de dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad
276a1(mdo sde): gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ pad+ma'i mig gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di chi par grags pa dang / dgra
276a2(mdo sde): bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i mig nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba'
276a3(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ pad+ma'i mig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan dag su zhig gis
276a4(mdo sde): nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
276a5(mdo sde): dang | rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
276a6(mdo sde): rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du
276a7(mdo sde): smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs
276b1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
276b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
276b3(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das
276b4(mdo sde): so| |de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad
276b5(mdo sde): gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang / thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas re
276b6(mdo sde): zhig na ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru'i don grub ste/ phyir 'ongs nas des de'i nang nas nor bu chen po mthon ka chen po zhig khyer te 'ongs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod
276b7(mdo sde): rten mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ nor bu rin po che de bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char kheb la btags nas/ de'i mthus phyogs
277a1(mdo sde): dang | phyogs mtshams thams cad mthon ka'i kha dog lta bur 'dug par byas so/ /me tog pad+ma dag gis kyang mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag
277a2(mdo sde): gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig / ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
277a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pad+ma'i mig yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi
277a4(mdo sde): mchod rten la nor bu rin po cha btags pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung ngo / /pad+ma sngon po dag gis mchod pa byas pa des ni/ mig pad+ma sngon
277a5(mdo sde): po lta bur gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bya so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin
277a6(mdo sde): pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni
277a7(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar
277b1(mdo sde): ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan
277b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //rnga sgra zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po
277b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang /
277b4(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
277b5(mdo sde): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang
277b6(mdo sde): ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas
277b7(mdo sde): na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos
278a1(mdo sde): kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga'
278a2(mdo sde): mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs
278a3(mdo sde): bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ che bar grags pa/ bya ka la ping ka ltar skad snyan pa/ rnga sgra ltar gdangs snyan pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/
278a4(mdo sde): khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di rnga sgra lta ba'i gdangs dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming rnga sgra zhes gdags
278a5(mdo sde): so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u rnga sgra pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad
278a6(mdo sde): la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings
278a7(mdo sde): te| mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje
278b1(mdo sde): can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go /de nas phyi zhig na khye'u
278b2(mdo sde): rnga sgra shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad
278b3(mdo sde): cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des
278b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug
278b5(mdo sde): go |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba
278b6(mdo sde): de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de nas khye'u rnga sgras 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum
278b7(mdo sde): du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/
279a1(mdo sde): pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i
279a2(mdo sde): 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin
279a3(mdo sde): par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/
279a4(mdo sde): gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom
279a5(mdo sde): pa| rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi blta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang
279a6(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs
279a7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ rnga sgras las ci bgyis na/ des 'di gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par
279b1(mdo sde): gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnga sgra nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za
279b2(mdo sde): bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rnga sgra nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas
279b3(mdo sde): shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las
279b4(mdo sde): dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las
279b5(mdo sde): rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu
279b6(mdo sde): rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
279b7(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang
280a1(mdo sde): gnyen ldan rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhing na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing
280a2(mdo sde): zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku
280a3(mdo sde): gdung gi mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs/ /der srog
280a4(mdo sde): chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang / thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas re zhig na khyim bdag gcig gis rol mo'i cha spyad rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mi las rol
280a5(mdo sde): mo bslabs te/ mchod rten de la phul nas/ de dag mchod rten de la nyin gcig bzhin du rol mo'i sgra'i khyad par dag gis bkur sti byed do/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe
280a6(mdo sde): de'i dus na khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rnga sgra 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rol mo'i sgra'i cha spyad rnam pa sna tshogs phul ba des na rnga sgra lta
280a7(mdo sde): bu'i gdangs can du gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig
280b1(mdo sde): tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa'ang
280b2(mdo sde): 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig
280b3(mdo sde): la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
280b4(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do/ / //bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi
280b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am
280b6(mdo sde): ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
280b7(mdo sde): dang | mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang /
281a1(mdo sde): gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na
281a2(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor
281a3(mdo sde): dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las
281a4(mdo sde): chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon te/ bu btsas nas sha snag bu chen po zhig byung ste/ pha ma dang / khyim de na gnas pa gzhan dag dang / g.yog 'khor dang / nye du
281a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis de mthong nas/ 'di lta bu btsas pa ci yin zhes mi dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na khyim bdag de mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs te/ lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas
281a6(mdo sde): nas| sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste/ 'di ci yin/ su la bsnyad par bya shes pa su yod snyam mo/ /de nas de'i blo skyes pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni thams
281a7(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa yin te/ des mkhyen kyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyad par bya'o snyam nas/ da bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
281b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /khyod ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /sha snag bu de ras bal legs par rmel ba'i nang du chug
281b2(mdo sde): la| zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig kyang dus gsum gsum du lag pa brims te/ 'o mas kyang yang dang / yang du gtor cig dang / de'i 'og tu rdol te/ bu brgya 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de
281b3(mdo sde): dag thams cad tshad po che'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khyim bdag des de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ bsams pa/ bdag gis bu de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur
281b4(mdo sde): ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam nas des de bzhin du byas pa dang / zhag bdun lon pa dang sha snag bu de rdol nas bu brgya byung ste/ thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta
281b5(mdo sde): na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go /de nas re zhig na mthar gyis bskyed bsrings nas cher skyes pa dang / de
281b6(mdo sde): dag thams cad byad gzugs dang / lang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs te/ phan tshun 'khyam pa las shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
281b7(mdo sde): sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i
282a1(mdo sde): 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed
282a2(mdo sde): do| |dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
282a3(mdo sde): bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos
282a4(mdo sde): nas thams cad kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de dag gis bden
282a5(mdo sde): pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de dag thams cad kyis brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor
282a6(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can
282a7(mdo sde): yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur
282b1(mdo sde): nas gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig
282b2(mdo sde): pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
282b3(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ gzhon
282b4(mdo sde): nu brgya po 'di dag gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des spun du gyur la tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di rnams kyi sngon tshe rabs
282b5(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ de dag nyid kyis las byas shing
282b6(mdo sde): bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i
282b7(mdo sde): khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang /
283a1(mdo sde): skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la
283a2(mdo sde): bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag
283a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i lha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi
283a4(mdo sde): ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag
283a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
283a6(mdo sde): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod
283a7(mdo sde): rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang / thar
283b1(mdo sde): bar 'gro bar gyur ro/ /de nas re zhig na mdza' sde bo brgya phyi rol du byung ba dang / de dag gis mchod rten de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ de dag tu lhan cig tu
283b2(mdo sde): til mar spos can gyis byugs nas/ me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / mar me dbul ba dag gis kyang bsnyen bkur byas nas/ lhan cig tu smon lam btab ba/ bdag cag gang dang / gang du
283b3(mdo sde): skyes pa de dang / der spun du gyur te/ lhan cig tu lto gcig kho na nas byung bar gyur cig /tshan po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob pa dang / byad gzugs dang ldan par gyur cig /ma 'ongs pa'i
283b4(mdo sde): dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
283b5(mdo sde): mdza' sde bor gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshan po che 'di dag yin te/ de dag gis lhan cig tu mchod rten de la bkur sti byas pa des na/ 'di ltar lhan cig tu skyes te/ tshan po che'i stobs
283b6(mdo sde): kyi shugs thob par gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni gcig tu mthun par rab tu byung bar rab tu byung nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig
283b7(mdo sde): tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar ba
284a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /
284a2(mdo sde): las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
284a3(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal pas/ dge slong dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya ba/
284a4(mdo sde): bam po bcu drug pa/ nyi ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams
284a5(mdo sde): dang | tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am
284a6(mdo sde): ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
284a7(mdo sde): lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas
284b1(mdo sde): dang | gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bcas pa/ yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
284b2(mdo sde): so| |de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya'i bu phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa
284b3(mdo sde): zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de
284b4(mdo sde): zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs pa zhig btsas nas/ de las kho ra khor yug tu nyi
284b5(mdo sde): ma'i 'od zer lta bu 'phro ste/ de'i snang bas mtshan mo grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad khyab par gyur pas nyin mo bzhin du snang bar byas so/ /de nas pha ma dang / khyim de na gnas pa'i
284b6(mdo sde): g.yog 'khor rnams dang / nye du rnams dang / ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis de mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur te dga' bas rgyas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas
284b7(mdo sde): ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di btsas ma thag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nyi ma bzhin du
285a1(mdo sde): snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming nyi ma zhes gdag so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u nyi ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i
285a2(mdo sde): ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang /
285a3(mdo sde): mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la/
285a4(mdo sde): dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa/ gtong ba la
285a5(mdo sde): sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go /de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u nyi ma shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'
285a6(mdo sde): ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs pa brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par
285a7(mdo sde): byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das la
285b1(mdo sde): sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom
285b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bdag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/
285b3(mdo sde): des khye'u nyi mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas sbyin
285b4(mdo sde): pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
285b5(mdo sde): pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa
285b6(mdo sde): thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid
285b7(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems
286a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil par gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang
286a2(mdo sde): dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus
286a3(mdo sde): par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa nyi ma bsod snyoms la 'gro ba de'i tshe bram ze dang / khyim bdag ma dad pa rnams 'phya zhing smod la/ lkog 'phyas
286a4(mdo sde): byed de/ de 'di ltar nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs nas/ lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu 'khyam pa las ni/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong
286a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa'o/ /bram ze'i tshul ni tshig pa'o zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas de shin tu ngo tsha bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin
286a6(mdo sde): nas| bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis
286a7(mdo sde): par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu/ 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na/ med par byar mi nus so/ /de lta mod kyi ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa
286b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad
286b2(mdo sde): gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ nyi mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di che bar grags pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom
286b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i
286b4(mdo sde): las de dag byas shing bsags pas na nyi ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su dag gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags
286b5(mdo sde): pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba
286b6(mdo sde): dang | mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams
286b7(mdo sde): ni| |bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu cu rtsa
287a1(mdo sde): gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
287a2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de
287a3(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/
287a4(mdo sde): shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i
287a5(mdo sde): sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig
287a6(mdo sde): brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang / thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod rten de'i mchod pa la bab pa na/ bram ze dang /
287a7(mdo sde): khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams
287b1(mdo sde): kyis mchod pa byed do/ /de nas re zhig na mi zhig rgyal po dang / rgyan pos rtses nas skugs su nor bu rin po che me shel zhig thob bo/ /de nas de dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
287b2(mdo sde): gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char khebs la btags te/ zhabs la phyag btsal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong
287b3(mdo sde): ba 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /nor bu rin po che
287b4(mdo sde): 'di lta bu yan spyi bo la thogs bzhin du ma'i lto nas 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
287b5(mdo sde): na| cho lo la ngor sgyu byed pa gang yin pa de ni nyi ma 'di nyid yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa dang / nor bu rin po che rtags pa des
287b6(mdo sde): na| 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung la/ rgyu de nyid kyis gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de
287b7(mdo sde): ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang
288a1(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa 'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig
288a2(mdo sde): tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab
288a3(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gyad kyi ba dan
288a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
288a5(mdo sde): dang | ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto
288a6(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
288a7(mdo sde): mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
288b1(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i
288b2(mdo sde): tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa
288b3(mdo sde): zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma
288b4(mdo sde): la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas
288b5(mdo sde): te| gang gi tshe khye'u de btsas pa de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kho ra khor yug nas lha'i ba dan dag bsgrengs so/ /lha'i rol mo'i cha byad dag kyang brdungs so/ /lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma
288b6(mdo sde): dang | ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams kyis kyang gtor te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad du grags pas rgyas par gyur to/ /khyim thams cad du yang de'i phyir ba dan
288b7(mdo sde): bsgrengs so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di btsas pa na 'jig
289a1(mdo sde): rten thams cad grags pas rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming snyan grags zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u snyan grags pang na 'tsho ba'i
289a2(mdo sde): ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho
289a3(mdo sde): dang | mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye grags par
289a4(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig
289a5(mdo sde): go / de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u snyan grags shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
289a6(mdo sde): legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba
289a7(mdo sde): lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
289b1(mdo sde): btsal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su
289b2(mdo sde): chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan to/ /de thos nas khye'u snyan grags kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes
289b3(mdo sde): bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag sbyin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing
289b4(mdo sde): phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i
289b5(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam pa 'thor ba dang / rnam |par 'jig pa'i chos
289b6(mdo sde): can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags thams cad dang bral
289b7(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs
290a1(mdo sde): bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/
290a2(mdo sde): dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de yang gsol ba btab ste phul ba'i gos spyod de/ gsol
290a3(mdo sde): ba btab ste phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung ngu spyod do/ /gsol ba btab ste phul ba'i zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong spyod de/ gsol ba btab
290a4(mdo sde): ste phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung ngu spyod do/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa snyan grags
290a5(mdo sde): kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des btsas ma thag tu lha rnams kyis ba dan bsgrengs nas/ 'jig rten du grags pas rgyas par gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa
290a6(mdo sde): nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /snyan grags nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang
290a7(mdo sde): ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas/ snyan grags nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag
290b1(mdo sde): gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang
290b2(mdo sde): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye
290b3(mdo sde): mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du
290b4(mdo sde): smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/
290b5(mdo sde): rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
290b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
290b7(mdo sde): p ar gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
291a1(mdo sde): 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten
291a2(mdo sde): kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsegs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang / thar
291a3(mdo sde): par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyis mchod rten de la dus ston byas nas/ mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der gyad 'gyed pa rnams kyi ba dan dag
291a4(mdo sde): bsgreng ngo / /de nas re zhig na rgyal po'i gyad gcig gis gyad gcig non pa dang / des gyad kyi ba dan thob nas/ des de blangs te srog chags 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa rol mo'i
291a5(mdo sde): sgra rnam pa sna tshogs len cing / bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dran par byas te/ ba dan
291a6(mdo sde): de mchod rten gyi steng gi srog shing la btags nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu bdag gis mnyes par
291a7(mdo sde): byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gyad du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni snyan grags
291b1(mdo sde): 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na/ 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas myong bar gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyi de ltar yang
291b2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par
291b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang
291b4(mdo sde): 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
291b5(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom
291b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gang po la sogs pa rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/ rtogs pa brjod pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ste/ sdom gyi tshigs
291b7(mdo sde): su brjod pa bdun pa rdzogs so/ / //sdom ni/ 'od bzang ma dang rab sdug ma/ /dkar mo zla ba ut+pa la/ /mdzes ldan ma dang mu tig dang / /ka tsang ga la
292a1(mdo sde): bde byed ma/ /mi sdug sde tshan bcad de bstan/ /'od bzang ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen
292a2(mdo sde): po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
292a3(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor
292a4(mdo sde): byas| mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing
292a5(mdo sde): shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes
292a6(mdo sde): pa| nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe
292a7(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor
292b1(mdo sde): dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las
292b2(mdo sde): chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa lha'i rgyan gyis klubs pa/ nor bu rin po che mgul na thogs pa zhig
292b3(mdo sde): btsas te/ de las 'od byung ba des mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par
292b4(mdo sde): byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ bu mo 'di btsas ma thag tu nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes gdags so zhes zer
