292b5(mdo sde): ro| |de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad de/ ma ma brgyad
292b6(mdo sde): kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye
292b7(mdo sde): drag par gyur to/ /bu mo de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig ste/ de la slong ba su dang / su 'ongs
293a1(mdo sde): kyang rung ba de dang / de dag la mgul nas rgyan bkrol te sbyin par byed do/ /byin nas kyang yang rgyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar
293a2(mdo sde): gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / /tshong dpon gyi bu mang po dag de slong du 'ong ngo / /de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/
293a3(mdo sde): de'i pha lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni/ gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /de nas
293a4(mdo sde): re zhig na bu mo des pha sems khong du chud pa mthong nas smras pa/ yab/ ci zhig gis sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/ des de'i don rgyas par bsnyad do/ /de nas phyis bu
293a5(mdo sde): mo de na re/ yab/ thugs ngan ma mdzad cig dang / da ste zhag bdun na bdag nyid kyis khyim thab 'dam par 'tshal lo zhes zer ro/ /de nas tshong dpon des rgyal po gsal
293a6(mdo sde): rgyal la gsol nas/ /mnyan du yod par dril bsgrags te/ da ste zhag bdun na bu mo 'od bzang ma rang nyid khyim thab 'dam par chad kyi/ khyed kyi bya ba gang yin pa de gyis
293a7(mdo sde): shig ces byas so/ /de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / bu mo 'od bzang ma shing rta la zhon te/ chos gos tshon can gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
293b1(mdo sde): kyi sku gzugs ri mor bris te bstod pa 'don cing srang du zhugs so/ /de nas der rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu rnams de la yid smon byed
293b2(mdo sde): cing lta ba de dag la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shad kyis byang par bshad de/ bdag gis khyed la gang gi sgo nas kyang sku brnyas ni mi 'tshal na yong ye bdag 'dod pa rnams
293b3(mdo sde): la don du gnyer ba ma lags pa kho na bas so/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ste/ de'i thad du rab tu 'byung ngo zhes byas nas de dag phyir log go /bu mo 'od bzang
293b4(mdo sde): ma'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom
293b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / reng bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos
293b6(mdo sde): bstan te/ de thos nas bu mo 'od bzang mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste /
293b7(mdo sde): des bden pa mthong nas mngon par shes pa'ang bsgrubs so/ /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
294a1(mdo sde): lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
294a2(mdo sde): te| |btsun pa/ bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag
294a3(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la gdul bar bya ba mang po dag des 'dren par
294a4(mdo sde): 'gyur bar thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo/ song la 'khor rnams kyang ltos shig /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma rgyal bu rgyal
294a5(mdo sde): byed kyi tshal nas byung ste/ mang po 'dus pa'i nang du song ba dang / der so so nas bsams pa/ 'di mthus dbrog par bya'o snyam ste/ de dag gis bzung bar byas
294a6(mdo sde): so| |de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma de dag gis bsnyegs pa dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam
294a7(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs bstan to/ /so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de/ de nas de dag gis lha dang / mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul de mthong
294b1(mdo sde): ngo| |mthong nas kyang spu zing zhes byas nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag btsal nas gsol ba btab pa/ sru/ mar spyon/ sru/ mar spyon/ khyod kyis chos 'di lta
294b2(mdo sde): bu dag mngon sum du byas pa las na/ khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid do zhes byas so/ /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma nam mkha' las babs nas/ /skye bo phal po che'i gung la
294b3(mdo sde): 'dug ste/ gang thos pas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la
294b4(mdo sde): gtad de/ des de rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/ /de nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi
294b5(mdo sde): brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs
294b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam
294b7(mdo sde): pa| nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon
295a1(mdo sde): par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang
295a2(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs
295a3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ 'od bzang mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mgul pa nas kyang
295a4(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che byung la rab tu byung nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'od bzang ma
295a5(mdo sde): nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags
295a6(mdo sde): pas na/ 'od bzang ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams
295a7(mdo sde): ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang /
295b1(mdo sde): mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams
295b2(mdo sde): ni| |bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab ba na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu
295b3(mdo sde): rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
295b4(mdo sde): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal
295b5(mdo sde): po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/
295b6(mdo sde): /de nas rgyal po gnyan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das
295b7(mdo sde): de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig
296a1(mdo sde): yod pa zhig brtsigs so/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo dam pa rgas nas rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs lus las bkrol te/ mchod
296a2(mdo sde): rten de la phul lo/ /de nas zhabs la phyag btsal te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis
296a3(mdo sde): na| bdag gis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
296a4(mdo sde): na rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo dam par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'od bzang ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rnam pa sna
296a5(mdo sde): tshogs btags pa de na/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni da
296a6(mdo sde): ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag
296a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang
296b1(mdo sde): 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar
296b2(mdo sde): ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi
296b3(mdo sde): rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //rab sdug ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams
296b4(mdo sde): dang | blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams

296b6(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shas
296b7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyan gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes
297a1(mdo sde): p a| nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
297a2(mdo sde): so| |de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa na bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/
297a3(mdo sde): yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa mnyam du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyi snying du rab tu sdug ma zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston
297a4(mdo sde): byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ bu mo 'di skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming rab sdug
297a5(mdo sde): ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de'ang tshe rabs dran te/ btsas ma thag tu tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ sbyin pa byin pa mang nyung ci yang rung / /zhing gi khyad par bzhi
297a6(mdo sde): las 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de'i phyir mkhas pas bsgrims te 'jig rten du/ /dad pas lha mi'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas sbyin/ /de nas de'i pha ma dang / gzhan yang /
297a7(mdo sde): khyim de na gnas pa rnams kyis tshig brjod pa de thos nas skrag cing sdangs te/ mi dga' bar gyur la/ skyi bung zhes byed nas smras pa/ kye ma/ bu mo 'di ni sha za mo zhig
297b1(mdo sde): go |des smras pa/ yum/ bdag ni sha za mo'ang ma lags/ srin mo'ang ma lags kyi/ bdag ni bu mo lags te/ sbyin pa dag sbyin par 'tshal lo/ /de nas de'i mas khyim
297b2(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas sbyin la bu mo des 'di skad mchi'o zhes bsnyad do/ /de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi
297b3(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol te/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i rabs 'don du bcug go /de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis lo bdun lon pa de'i tshe/ pha ma la
297b4(mdo sde): gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas de dge slong ma thams cad la sdug pa dang / phangs pa dang / snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar gyur to/ /
297b5(mdo sde): re zhig na/ de'i tshe mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang 'dra ba'i mu ge chen po byung nas der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bza' ba dang / btung ba med pas shi'o/ /de nas der
297b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod song la rab sdug ma la/ nga na re/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la khyod kyis zla ba gsum gyi
297b7(mdo sde): bar du gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams phul cig ces gyis shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rab sdug ma'i thad du
298a1(mdo sde): song nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod kyis 'khor bzhi po rnams la zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang / zas dang / mal chags
298a2(mdo sde): stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams phul cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas rab tu sdug mas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi bos mnos nas
298a3(mdo sde): bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras so/ /de nas rab sdug ma spyod yul gyi grong blta ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par chas so/ /de nas re zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas
298a4(mdo sde): sbyin gyis gtam de thos nas shin tu rings par rab sdug ma'i mdun du song ste/ smras pa/ rab sdug ma/ gar 'gro/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
298a5(mdo sde): stsal pa/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du zhal ta ba'i las byed par bskos so/ /mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ khyod kyi de dag thams cad bdag gis sbyar gyi/ khyod
298a6(mdo sde): kyis bya ma dgos so/ /rab sdug mas smras pa/ gal te/ yab bden pa mthong ba lags so/ sa'i 'og thog thag tu sbas pa'i gter rnams kyang mngon du gzigs
298a7(mdo sde): na sbyar ba 'di la ngo mtshar che ba ci mchis/ 'on kyang bdag ni skye bo dbul po la phan gdags pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid do/ /de bzhin du dge bsnyen lnga brgya dang / btsun
298b1(mdo sde): mo phreng rgyud ma dang / rgyal rigs kyi bu mo dbyar tshul ma dang / btsun mo 'khor gyi bla brang srong sbyin dang / gna' mi dang / ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal
298b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang skabs phye ste/ khyod kyis bya mi dgos so zhes byas so/ /de nas nags khung du song nas der mi yin pa mi'i cha lugs can dag gis kyang skabs phye'o/ /de
298b3(mdo sde): ltar skabs phye nas kyang / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang /
298b4(mdo sde): gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /des zla ba gsum po de nyid kyi skabs su brtson pa dang / bsgrub ba dang / 'bad bas phol
298b5(mdo sde): mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam
298b6(mdo sde): par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod
298b7(mdo sde): chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / tsan+dan spangs ba lta bur bsil
299a1(mdo sde): bar gyur ba/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i
299a2(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su
299a3(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum 'das pa dang / chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ nyan
299a4(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab tu chas te gshegs so/ /de nas rab sdug mas bcom ldan 'das dang lam du phrad nas/ 'o
299a5(mdo sde): brgyal mi 'tshal zhes gsol to/ /de nas re zhig na nags khung chu dang ldan pa zhig tu phyin nas drol bab na rgyags kyang med nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
299a6(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs par gsol to/ /de nas lhung bzed lag pa g.yon pa la bzhag ste/ tshig tu smras pa/ gal te bsod nams dag gi rnam par
299a7(mdo sde): smin pa yod ce na/ bdag gi lhung bzed bza' ba dang / bca' ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas lhas lha'i bdud
299b1(mdo sde): rtsis bkang ngo / /de nas rab sdug gis gral rims bzhin dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung bzed rnams zhal zas kyis bkang nas/ der bcom ldan 'das
299b2(mdo sde): kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga'i nyan kyi dge slong ma bsod nams byas pa rnams kyi mchog ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma rab sdug ma 'di yin no/ /de nas
299b3(mdo sde): dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcun pa/ rab sdug mas las gang dag bgyis na des phyug
299b4(mdo sde): po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyi bkur la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis
299b5(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rab sdug nyid kyis sngon che rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa'
299b6(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rab sdug ma nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis
299b7(mdo sde): nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phye rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i
300a1(mdo sde): khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung
300a2(mdo sde): po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs
300a3(mdo sde): shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri
300a4(mdo sde): thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na
300a5(mdo sde): med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA ra NA si na/ drang srong smra ba ri dwags
300a6(mdo sde): kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/
300a7(mdo sde): dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs ring byas te/ mdun du bdar nas wA ra NA sir bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re zhig na tshong dpon zhig g.yog 'khor dang
300b1(mdo sde): bcas te skyed mos tshal du song nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba mang po dag kyang khyer ro/ /de nas re zhig na de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo zhig 'bras chan gyi gzeb khyer te/ jo
300b2(mdo sde): bo'i phyi bzhin du 'gro ba las bu mo mngag gzhug ma des/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lam khar mthong nas/ de dga' bar gyur te blo skyes pa/
300b3(mdo sde): bdag la rje bos lan gnyis su bran mor byar ci yod kyi/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas des gsad pa dang / bcing ba
300b4(mdo sde): dang | brdeg pa dang / bsdos nas 'bras chan gyi gzeb phye ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas so/ /de nas
300b5(mdo sde): tshod dpon gyi thad du song ba dang / re zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo 'bras chan gyi gzeb de ga re zhes dris so/ /des smras pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
300b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la zhal zas phul lo zhes byas pa dang / tshong dpon gyis de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/ /de nas de dga' zhing mgu la rab
300b7(mdo sde): tu dga' nas smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod dang phyin chad phran mo las phyung gi song zhig /khyod kyis bdag gnyid kyis log pa na mel tshe byas pa yin no zhes smras so/ /de nas
301a1(mdo sde): de thal mo sbyar te/ khyim bdag la gsol pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang zhes byas so/ /de nas
301a2(mdo sde): khyim bdag des lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang byin nas/ de rje bos byin pa'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/
301a3(mdo sde): des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi gsung rab la lo dgu stong gi bar du zhal ta pa'i las byas te/ 'bras chan dang / skyo ma dang / thug pa btung ba dang / rtag res 'khor
301a4(mdo sde): dang | mgron du bod pa dang / mar me'i phreng ba dang / chos gos sra brkyang rnams dang / sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa rnams kyang phul te/ smon lam btab pa/
301a5(mdo sde): bdag gis dka' bas bsgrubs te/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos
301a6(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab la rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
301a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo mngag bzhug mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab sdug ma 'di yin te/ des bcom
301b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'od srung la zhal zas phul ba des na phyug po'i rigs su skyes te gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyis bkur bar gyur to/ /
301b2(mdo sde): smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig
301b3(mdo sde): tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam
301b4(mdo sde): par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par
301b5(mdo sde): dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi
301b6(mdo sde): rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //dkar mo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon
301b7(mdo sde): po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
302a1(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas
302a2(mdo sde): bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
302a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun
302a4(mdo sde): gsos dang / sman zong rnams bsnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe shAkya rnams
302a5(mdo sde): kyi nang na/ shAkya snar ma zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ /rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos
302a6(mdo sde): kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan gcig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyad do/ /de de
302a7(mdo sde): dang rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med de/ lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas bsams pa/ bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang
302b1(mdo sde): ldan du zin kyang / bdag la bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med pas bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ sems
302b2(mdo sde): khong du chud cing 'dug go / de nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / lhas mkhan dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cig ces de la
302b3(mdo sde): bsgo'o/ /de nas de bu med de bu 'dod pas gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku ber dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba
302b4(mdo sde): 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes
302b5(mdo sde): pa'i lha dang / chos mthun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'jig rten na'ang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang / bu mo skye
302b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam yod mod kyi/ de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
302b7(mdo sde): po bzhin du re re la'ang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur pa'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis
303a1(mdo sde): 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu
303a2(mdo sde): dang | bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig nas shi 'phos te/ de'i chung ma'i
303a3(mdo sde): ltor zhugs nas/ des khyim thab la sbran to/ /de nas khyim thab gyis smras pa/ bzang mo/ gal te khye'u zhig btsas na ni legs/ de ma yin te bu mo zhig btsas na ni/
303a4(mdo sde): de nyid dang bcas te khyod khyim nas bskrad de gtong ngo / /de nas re zhig na de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la
303a5(mdo sde): mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/ gos dkar po gyon pa mngal gyi dri mas ma gos pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas re zhig na shAkya snar
303a6(mdo sde): mas khyod kyi chung ma la bu byung ste/ bu mo zhig btsas so/ /zhes thos pa dang / de khros te nang du song ngo / /de nas de'i chung mas lha'i gos gyon pa'i bu mo phul lo/ /de nas
303a7(mdo sde): shAkya snar mas bu mo mthong nas/ mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas/ de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo'i 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs
303b1(mdo sde): par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di gos dkar po gyon bzhin du btsas pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming dkar mor gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas bu mo dkar mo pang
303b2(mdo sde): na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis/ rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma
303b3(mdo sde): dang | zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag
303b4(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /bu mo dkar mo ji tsam du skye ba de tsam du gos de dag kyang skye ste/ dri ma can du'ang mi 'gyur la/ de'i lus la'ang dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas gang
303b5(mdo sde): gi tshe bu mo dkar mo mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mang po de dag de slong du 'ong ngo / /de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur
303b6(mdo sde): nas| de'i pha lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
303b7(mdo sde): de nas re zhig na bu mo des pha sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa mthong nas smras pa/ yab/ ci zhig gis sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/ de nas de'i don rgyas bar
304a1(mdo sde): bsnyad do/ /de nas bu mo na re/ yab/ thugs ngan ma mdzad cig /bdag ni 'dod pa la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
304a2(mdo sde): bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gi / yab kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas re zhig na des pha ma gnyis la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
304a3(mdo sde): pa la rab tu byung ste/ gos gang dag gyon te btsas pa de dag nyid chos gos lnga tshang bar gyur to/ /de nas des brtson pa dang / sbyor pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga
304a4(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par
304a5(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod
304a6(mdo sde): chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar
304a7(mdo sde): gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur
304b1(mdo sde): sti la mi blta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom
304b2(mdo sde): thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dkar mos las gang dag bgyis na de phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta
304b3(mdo sde): na sdug la mdzes pa dang / gos dkar mo gyon pa dang / rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
304b4(mdo sde): dag/ |dkar mo nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi zar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing
304b5(mdo sde): bsags pas na/ dkar mo nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams
304b6(mdo sde): ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin pa mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge
304b7(mdo sde): ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /
305a1(mdo sde): bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
305a2(mdo sde): na| bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
305a3(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/
305a4(mdo sde): de grong khyer wA ra NA si na/ drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na tshong dpon gyi chung ma dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa
305a5(mdo sde): bzang ba zhig 'dug pa don zhig la drang srong smra bar song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs
305a6(mdo sde): par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu
305a7(mdo sde): kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom
305b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'od srung gis de la chos bstan nas des dad pa rnyed de/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol nas/ dge slong gi
305b2(mdo sde): dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul lo/ /de nas mthar gyis pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i
305b3(mdo sde): tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma dkar mo 'di yin te/ des dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul ba des na/ gos
305b4(mdo sde): dkar po gyon bzhin du btsas so/ /tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig
305b5(mdo sde): tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu
305b6(mdo sde): nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dres mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag/ de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /
305b7(mdo sde): las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong / khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
306a1(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la
306a2(mdo sde): sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams
306a3(mdo sde): dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding
306a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang /
306a5(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas
306a6(mdo sde): dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag
306a7(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ bram ze phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yang shing rgya che ba/
306b1(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas so/ /de yang rig byed gsum gyi mthar phyin te/ ming gi rnam grangs dang / shes gsal
306b2(mdo sde): dang bcas pa dang / yi ge'i rab tu dbye ba dang / lnga pa ste/ gtam rgyud dang bcas pa rnams tshig re re nas brda' sprod nus pa zhig go /de nas de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya/ bram ze'i
306b3(mdo sde): sngags 'don pa'i slob dpon byed do/ /de nas des bu dgos pa'i phyir rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan gcig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur
306b4(mdo sde): spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa
306b5(mdo sde): blta na sdug pa yan lag dang / nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming
306b6(mdo sde): 'dogs par byed de/ /nye du rnams na re/ bdag cag gi bu tsha phal che zla ba zhes 'dogs pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming zla ba zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas
306b7(mdo sde): bu mo zla ba pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma

307a3(mdo sde): bya ba la mkhas pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / thos pa 'dzin pa gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na de'i pha bram ze'i khye'u rnams la sngags slob pa na des thos pa tsam

307a5(mdo sde): stegs can dag kyang nyin gcig bzhin du de la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ de dang lhan cig tu gtan la 'bebs par byed do/ /de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na

307b1(mdo sde): shes pa dag mi 'ong ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa shAkya thub pa 'dir gshegs te/ de dag thams cad de la gzhol
307b2(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma byung ba thos nas/ de spu thams cad zing zhes byas so/ /de nas bu mo zla bas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra thos nas/
307b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po
307b4(mdo sde): brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ba nas/

314a1(mdo sde): ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan
314a2(mdo sde): yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe rgyal tshab tu
314a3(mdo sde): dbang bskur te/ /de nas de rgyal po byed pa ni nyes pa du ma dang ldan zhing gnod pa du ma'i rtsa ba yin par rig nas/ drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo / /de yang gangs
314a4(mdo sde): kyi sul zhig na gnas te 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / chus 'tsho zhing / ri dwags kyi g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun gyon la me'i sbyin sreg byed do/ /phyis re zhig na 'bras
314a5(mdo sde): bu dang / rtsa ba'i phyir ri'i sul zhig tu song ba dang / re zhig na der ma'i ma ci'i bu mo zhig gis drang srong gzhon nu de mthong nas chags par gyur te/ gar byed cing glu len
314a6(mdo sde): la rol mo byed do/ /bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang / bud med kyi rtags rnams dang / bud med kyi rtsed mo rnams kyang ston par byed do/ /de nas re zhig na drang srong ka shi
314a7(mdo sde): mdzes ldan gyis bu mo de la chos bshad de/ che zhe/ khyod rgas te khyod kyi nga ro dang po ni snyan cing mnyen la mjug ni ra ra bor gyur to zhes byas so/ /de nas des chos de lta
314b1(mdo sde): bu bstan te/ de thos nas mi'am ci'i bu mo'i byad gzugs kyi rgyags pa de med par gyur to/ /de nas de dad pa skyes nas smon lam btab pa gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag
314b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag khyod kyi slob mar gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/
314b3(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong gzhon nur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/ /mi'am ci'i bu mo de ni ut+pa la 'di nyid yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge
314b4(mdo sde): slong rnams kyis zhus pa/ btsun pa ut+pa las las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur pa lags/ las gang dag bgyis na/ des dgra
314b5(mdo sde): bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ut+pa la nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa
314b6(mdo sde): dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal ba bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsag pa na/ ut+pa la nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig
314b7(mdo sde): gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang /
315a1(mdo sde): rlung gi khams la smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
315a2(mdo sde): rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du
315a3(mdo sde): smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/
315a4(mdo sde): rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
315a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na lho phyogs nas zlos gar mkhan
315a6(mdo sde): gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs so/ /der gang gi tshe rgyal po mdzes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa de'i tshe zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon la bsgo ba/ nga'i
315a7(mdo sde): mdun du sangs rgyas kyi zlos gar gyi gar thabs gyis shig ces byas nas/ de dag gis rgyal po de'i bka' spyi bos ma nos te/ lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes byas so//
315b1(mdo sde): de nas sangs rgyas kyi zlos gar sbyar te/ legs par sbyangs nas/ rgyal po'i blon po'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i mdun du zlos gar gyi gar thabs byas so/ /de nas de zlos gar mkhan gyi
315b2(mdo sde): slob dpon nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi cha lugs kyis nang du 'ongs so/ /zlos gar mkhan gzhan rnams ni/ dge slong gi cha lugs kyis nang du 'ongs so/ /de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu
315b3(mdo sde): la rab tu dga' nas/ zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon la sogs pa zlos gar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams la nor gyi phung po chen po byin no/ /de nas de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi
315b4(mdo sde): bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag sbyin nas yang dag pa'i smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos
315b5(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /ces byas so/ /dge
315b6(mdo sde): slong dang / ji snyam du sems/ zlos gar mkhan gang yin pa de dag ni ut+pa la sogs pa 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag gis der smon lam btab pa des na/ da ltar dgra bcom pa
315b7(mdo sde): nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu
316a1(mdo sde): nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren
316a2(mdo sde): mar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
316a3(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom
316a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //mdzes ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon
316a5(mdo sde): po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang /
316a6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/
316a7(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
316b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan
316b2(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba'i ri dwags kyi nags na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe grong khyer wA ra NA si na rgyal po tshangs byin rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la
316b3(mdo sde): 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom
316b4(mdo sde): rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu
316b5(mdo sde): gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod
316b6(mdo sde): pa las phyis btsun mo la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang / nying lag thams
316b7(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ bu mo 'di ka
317a1(mdo sde): shi'i rgyal po'i bu mo yin la byad gzugs kyang bzang bas de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming ka shi mdzes ldan ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas bu
317a2(mdo sde): mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma phang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad
317a3(mdo sde): nas de ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis skyed srings te/ mtsho'i nang
317a4(mdo sde): gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug gis rgyal po tshangs pas byin la pho nya
317a5(mdo sde): btang ste/ khyod kyi bu mo btsas zhes bdag gis thos kyi/ gzhan la mi sbyin par bdag gi bu la byin cig ces spring ngo / /de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin mya ngan gyi khang bur bzhugs
317a6(mdo sde): nas| lag pa la rkom tshugs btsas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams ni bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /de
317a7(mdo sde): nas re zhig na bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te pha'i thad du song ba dang / des pha mya ngan gyis non pa mthong nas bris pa/ yab ci'i slad du mya ngan mdzad/ /de
317b1(mdo sde): nas phas kyang de la ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad do/ /de nas bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan mas pha la smras pa/ yab/ nyi log gi rgyal po rnams la nga ste nas/ bdun na bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma
317b2(mdo sde): rang nyid kyi khyim thab 'dam par chad kyi/ khyed kyi bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces pho nya gtang du gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug
317b3(mdo sde): po de rnams 'dus so/ /bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma'ang shing rta la zhon te/ chos gos tshon can gyi ba dan bsgreng nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs lag na thogs
317b4(mdo sde): te| rgyal po 'dus pa'i nang du song nas smras pa/ kye| nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams gson gcig /bdag ni khyed kyi gzugs dang / lang tsho dang / rigs dang / longs spyod dang / dbang
317b5(mdo sde): phyug la mi sems kyi bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/ bdag ni ras 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs bris pa gang yin pa de'i slob ma lags
317b6(mdo sde): te| de'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo zhes byas nas drang srong smra bar song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
317b7(mdo sde): btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad
318a1(mdo sde): du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen po la gtad do/ /de nas des kyang de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen
318a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs par byas nas/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam
318a3(mdo sde): pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa
318a4(mdo sde): nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems
318a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
318a6(mdo sde): srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur
318a7(mdo sde): to| |de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gis de'i gzugs dang / lang tsho dang / mdzes pa rjes su dran nas/ 'dod chags kyi rgyags pas myos te/ rab tu byung bzhin du yang gsol ba
318b1(mdo sde): 'debs so/ /de nas de dag gis gsol ba btab nas/ ngad pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang pa bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan
318b2(mdo sde): to| |so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de/ de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gis lha dang / mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba mthong nas
318b3(mdo sde): spu zing zhes byed de/ rkang pa la phyag btsal nas bzod pa gsol te/ sru/ khyod kyi chos 'di lta bu dag mngon sum du byas pa las na/ khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid kyi
318b4(mdo sde): bzod par mdzod cig ces byas so/ /de nas bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma nam mkha' las babs te/ skye bo mang po'i gung la 'dug nas chos de lta bu dag bstan te/ de thos nas srog
318b5(mdo sde): chags 'bum phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob bo/ /de nas dge slong dag /the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/
318b6(mdo sde): ka shi mdzes ldan mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa lags/
318b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ ka shi mdzes ldan ma nyid kyi sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin

319b1(mdo sde): pa bzang ba zhig yod pa des btsug lag khang zhig brtsig tu bcug ste/ yo byad thams cad kyis gang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul
319b2(mdo sde): lo| |yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la'ang rab tu byung nas lo khri'i bar du byams pa bsgoms so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i
319b3(mdo sde): bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ka shi'i mdzes ldan ma 'di yin te/ des gtsug lag khang phul ba des ni gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to /bcom ldan
319b4(mdo sde): 'das 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung nas/ lo khri'i bar du byams pa bsgoms pa des ni/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu

319b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dres mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gang pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma spangs

320b1(mdo sde): kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la

320b4(mdo sde): mo 'di btsas ma thag tu mgo bo la mu tig gi phreng ba byung bas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming mu tig ces gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas bu mo mu tig pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis
320b5(mdo sde): dang | nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun
320b6(mdo sde): mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gi bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na bu mo mu tig
320b7(mdo sde): mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa dang / de'i mu tig gi phreng ba de phog na phyir zhing 'byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bu mo des bkren pa dang / phongs pa rnams mthong nas longs spyod kyi
321a1(mdo sde): bgo bsha' byed do/ /de nas gang gi tshe bag mar btang rnams par gyur ba dang / rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mang
321a2(mdo sde): po dag de slong du 'ong ngo / /de nas de'i pha mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs nas lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar
321a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro snyam nas/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /de nas bu mo des pha la gsol pa/ yab/ ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ de nas des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad
321a4(mdo sde): bsnyad do/ /de nas bu mos smras pa/ yab/ bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /de
321a5(mdo sde): nas yang re zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu tha chung rab sdug ces bya ba des pha la gsol pa/ bdag gi mchis 'brang du bu mo de bslang bar gsol zhes byas so/ /
321a6(mdo sde): de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis tshong dpon rgyal ba la pho nya btang ste/ bu mo mu tig bdag gi bu la byin cig /de ltar byas pa dang gnyen du'ang 'gyur la/ ji srid
321a7(mdo sde): 'tsho'i bar du'ang mdza' bor 'gyur ro zhes byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag rgyal gyis bdag gi bu mo la don de bsnyad do/ /des smras pa/ gal te shed bye ste cher skyes pa na/ bdag
321b1(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar dam bcas na ni bdag gi khyim thab tu bgyi'o zhes byas so/ /de nas des de ltar byas nas re zhig na skabs shig tu
321b2(mdo sde): gnyis ka khyim nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de nas de gnyis kyis brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor
321b3(mdo sde): lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod
321b4(mdo sde): de| nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar
321b5(mdo sde): mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon
321b6(mdo sde): par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi blta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
321b7(mdo sde): mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun
322a1(mdo sde): pa mu tig gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des mu tig gi phreng ba mgo la thogs bzhin du btsas la/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
322a2(mdo sde): sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ mu tig nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba'
322a3(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ mu tig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams
322a4(mdo sde): su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang /
322a5(mdo sde): rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams
322a6(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs zhing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par
322a7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs
322b1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
322b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na/ ded dpon
322b3(mdo sde): zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs pa las nye zho med pa gru'i don grub ste phyir 'ongs so/ /de nas des mu tig gi phreng ba mchog tu bzang ba zhig khyer te 'ongs so/ /de'i chung
322b4(mdo sde): ma yang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig ste/ des de'i mgo bo la btags so/ /de nas des wA ra NA si na khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa
322b5(mdo sde): bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig gnas pa de'i blo skyes pa/ ma la/ bdag gis dad pa bsdus la/ bcom ldan 'das 'od
322b6(mdo sde): srung gi bstan pa lo lnga pa'i dus ston bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po kr-i krI la gsol te/ bdag gis dad pa bsdus la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lo lnga'i bar du dus ston bgyi bar 'tshal lo zhes
322b7(mdo sde): byas so/ /rgyal pos kyang de ltar gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas khyim bdag de glang po che la zhon te/ grong khyer wA ra NA si'i lam po che dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu
323a1(mdo sde): tu song nas/ dad pa sdud par byed do/ /de nas re zhig na ded dpon gyi chung mas mu tig gi phreng ba mgo bo la phog nas dad pa sdud pa la phul lo/ /de
323a2(mdo sde): nas re zhig na ded dpon 'ongs pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba mgo bo la phog par mthong nas/ bzang mo/ mu tig gi phreng ba de ga re zhes dris so/ /de nas des smras pa/ jo bo
323a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa sdud pa la phul gyi dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ dad pa bskyed du gsol/ /zhes byas so/ /de nas re zhig na ded dpon gyis rin po ches
323a4(mdo sde): phyir blus nas chung ma de nyid la byin na/ de phyir len du ma btub ste/ bdag gis 'di yongs su btang ba lags so zhes byas so/ /khyim thab kyis smras pa/ bzang mo/ ngas
323a5(mdo sde): 'di gser dngul mang pos nyos na ci'i phyir mi 'dod/ de nas bu mo des de blangs nas me tog mang po gsags te/ spos dang / me tog phreng la sogs pa'ang khyer nas
323a6(mdo sde): drang srong smra bar song ngo / /de nas dri gtsang khang spos kyis byugs nas/ me tog gis gtor te/ mu tig gi phreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu la bor nas bcom ldan 'das
323a7(mdo sde): 'od srung gi dbu la gnas par gyur to/ /de nas dad pa skyes te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di kho na lta bu dag
323b1(mdo sde): mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de
323b2(mdo sde): ni mu tig 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la bkur sti byas pa des na gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / de'i mgo la'ang mu tig gi phreng ba byung bar gyur
323b3(mdo sde): to| |rgyu de nyid kyis na da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu
323b4(mdo sde): nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par
323b5(mdo sde): smin pa'ang 'dres mar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
323b6(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das
323b7(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //ka tsang ga la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po
324a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin
324a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod
324a3(mdo sde): pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
324a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zod rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
324a5(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ka tsang ga la na/ ka tsang ga la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yul ka tsang ga la de la ni rgan mo ka tsang ga la zhes bya ba zhig
324a6(mdo sde): gnas pa des bum pa thogs te/ khron pa'i drung du chu chur song ba dang / der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song
324a7(mdo sde): la rgan mo de la bcom ldan 'das skyems kyi/ chu phul cig ces gyis shig /de nas kun dga' bos bsgo nas/ de na re/ 'phags pa/ bdag nyid kyis 'tshal te mchi'o zhes
324b1(mdo sde): zer ro/ /de nas re zhig na ka tsang ga las bum pa chus bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba dang / ka tsang ga las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i
324b2(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis legs par brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i
324b3(mdo sde): 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de bu la byams pa'i sems skyes te/ nu ma gnyis las kyang 'o ma'i rgyun bab nas
324b4(mdo sde): nges/ bu bu zhes smras te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud par byed do/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis de bkag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed
324b5(mdo sde): kyis rgan mo 'di ma bkag cig / de'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du rgyun du nga'i mar gyur te/ nga la bu yi byams pa yis/ /'di ni lus la 'khyud par byed/ /nga
324b6(mdo sde): yi lus la khyud pa las/ /gal te 'di ni bkag gyur na/ /'di ni de'u re 'phral nyid du/ /kha nas khrag dron skyugs par 'gyur/ /bu la byams pa 'di mthong nas/ /drin du gzo
324b7(mdo sde): ba dran gyur te/ /snying yang rje zhing snying brtse bas/ /lus la yang ni 'khyud du gzhug /de nas re zhig na de bu la byams brtse zhil nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
325a1(mdo sde): sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i
325a2(mdo sde): bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas ka tsang ga las 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes
325a3(mdo sde): bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dka' ba byed pa'i ma la ni/ /bu bzang gis ni gang
325a4(mdo sde): bya ba/ /sems ni grol bar 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de ni khyod kyis bdag la byas/ /bdag ni khyod kyis rab bsgrims te/ /ngan 'gro dag las phyung nas kyang / /mtho ris thar pa dag
325a5(mdo sde): la bzhag / khyad par shin tu chen por spags/ /de nas re zhig na des jo bo la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub
325a6(mdo sde): pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par
325a7(mdo sde): 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams
325b1(mdo sde): gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur
325b2(mdo sde): bsil par gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur
325b3(mdo sde): sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
325b4(mdo sde): slong ma rnams la mdor lung dpog pa mdzad nas/ nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs pa de'i tshe/ ka tsang ga las dge slong ma rnams la brda sprod par byed do/ /der bcom
325b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi mchog ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma ka tsang
325b6(mdo sde): ga la yin no/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ka tsang ga la las gang dag bgyis na de
325b7(mdo sde): rgas nas gdod rab tu byung lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des bran mor gyur lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des bcom ldan 'das mngal na gnas pa tha mar 'dzin par
326a1(mdo sde): ma gyur lags/ de ci'i slad du rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis te/ mdo sde rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa rnams kyi mchog tu
326a2(mdo sde): bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ka tsang ga la nyid kyis tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal
326a3(mdo sde): bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ ka tsang ga la nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams
326a4(mdo sde): su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang /
326a5(mdo sde): rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba'
326a6(mdo sde): zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//
326a7(mdo sde): dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na tshe rabs lnga brgyar rgyun chags par 'di nga'i mar gyur te/ gang gi tshe nga rab tu 'byung
326b1(mdo sde): bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ 'dis nga'i bgegs byas te las de'i rnam par smin pas ni rgas nas gdod rab tu byung ngo / /nga sbyin par byed pa na 'dis nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad byas pa des ni
326b2(mdo sde): dbul mor gyur to/ /'dis sgyu 'phrul chen mo lta bu'i che bar grags par 'gyur ba'i las de lta bu ma byas pa de ni nga mngal na gnas pa tha ma'i tshe 'dis ma bzung ngo / /gzhan yang / bcom
326b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung nas des slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams la bran mo zhes bya ba'i tshig smras te/ des na bran mor gyur to/ /des der bslabs shing kha ton du
326b4(mdo sde): byas pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa
326b5(mdo sde): des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag
326b6(mdo sde): pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur
326b7(mdo sde): ro| |las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dres mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/
327a1(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
327a2(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/
327a3(mdo sde): bam po bco brgyad pa/ bde byed ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi
327a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang /
327a5(mdo sde): mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
327a6(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas
327a7(mdo sde): dang | gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag
327b1(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / rgyal po tshangs pas byin gnyis phan tshun mi mthun par gyur to/ /de nas
327b2(mdo sde): re zhig na/ kau sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal de'i yul 'dab tu song nas phru ma btab ste 'dug go /rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang dpung yan lag bzhi pa/ glang po che'i tshogs dang /
327b3(mdo sde): rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / de dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas chu klung zhig gi gram du phru ma btab ste 'dug go /de nas re zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
327b4(mdo sde): gyis de nyid du btsun mo dam pa khrid de/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/ /rgyal po tshangs pas byin yang btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga'
327b5(mdo sde): mgur spyod do/ /de nas nyi ma gcig tu ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo'ang btsas/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi bu pho'ang btsas so/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po gnyi ga'i
327b6(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor na dga' ba'i rnga rdung bar byed do/ /slong ba rnams la'ang sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed do/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mi dag la dris te/ tshangs pas byin gyi pho
327b7(mdo sde): brang 'khor 'dir ci zhig byung na 'di ltar dga' ston byed ces byas nas/ de dag gis kyang rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi bu pho btsas so zhes gsol to/ /rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis
328a1(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin du dris nas/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo bcas so zhes gsol to/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la pho nya
328a2(mdo sde): btang ste/ khyod kyi bu mo btsas pa'i phyir mchod sbyin byed do zhes bdag gis thos la/ bdag gi 'ang bu pho btsas kyi/ bu mo de bdag gi bu la byin cig dang / de ltar byas na
328a3(mdo sde): gnyen du'ang 'gyur la/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du'ang 'khon med par 'gyur ro zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang de ltar bya'o zhes khas blangs so/ /de nas
328a4(mdo sde): de gnyis phan tshun du mdza' bo byas nas bde bar gyur te/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi khye'u btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u'i ming bde byed ces btags su/ /gos
328a5(mdo sde): la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang bu mo bcas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo'i ming bde byed ma zhes btags so/ /de nas gnyis ka'ang bskyed bsrings nas/ re zhig na
328a6(mdo sde): mthar gyis cher skyes so/ /de nas khye'u des bu mo de la do shal dang / se mo dang / phreng ba dang / rna cha dang / mgul rgyan rnams bskur ro/ /de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de chen
328a7(mdo sde): mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ /des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/ 'dod pa rnams la'ang nyes par lta bar gyur to/ /de nas des de dag la dris pa/ skyes 'di
328b1(mdo sde): rnams gang las 'ongs zhes byas pa dang / 'khor rnams kyis kyang gtan tshig dang bcas te rgyas par bsnyad do/ /de nas de thos nas yab la gsol pa/ yab| bdag ni 'dod
328b2(mdo sde): pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal gyi/ yab kyis bdag la gnang par mdzad du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu
328b3(mdo sde): mo| gang gi phyir khyod btsas pa na/ nga bde bar gyur bas na 'di ni ngas bcos su med do/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin la pho nya btang ste/ bu
328b4(mdo sde): mo 'di ni rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyi/ tshur shog la 'di long zhig ces byas so/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis dus btab ste/ de ste zhag bdun na 'ong gi khyod kyis
328b5(mdo sde): bya ba dang / bsham par bya ba gang yin pa de dag gyis shig ces byas so/ /de nas bu mo bde byed mas zhag bdun na bag mar len no zhes zer ba'i gtam de thos so/ /de nas
328b6(mdo sde): bde byed ma 'jigs shing skrag la mi dga' ste/ skyi bung zhes byas nas khang thog tu song ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su phyogs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
328b7(mdo sde): gsol ba btab bo/ /yang smras pa/ drang srong chen po thugs rtse thugs rje gnas pa bsam gtan mdzad/ /'dul mdzad zhi ba'i thugs ldan rab zhi 'dul ba'i cho ga mkhyen//
329a1(mdo sde): bdag ni mgon po khyod la skyabs su mchis kyi mgon khyod kyis/ /mgon med bdag ni tshul bzhin ngan song dag las dgrol du gsol/ /de'i
329a2(mdo sde): skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
329a3(mdo sde): 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsungs
329a4(mdo sde): pa zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo

329a6(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang
329a7(mdo sde): ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa| lam yan lag brgyad
329b1(mdo sde): pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang
329b2(mdo sde): byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/

329b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
329b6(mdo sde): rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams
329b7(mdo sde): kyi gnas/ dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /dga' bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bde byed ma gdul ba'i dus la
330a1(mdo sde): bab par gzigs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis gshegs te byon nas/ 'phags pa'i bden bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas bde
330a2(mdo sde): byed mas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob ste/ mngon par shes pa'ang bsgrubs so/ /de nas bde byed ma 'dod pa'i khams nas 'das te/ gnyen po thob nas 'jigs pa med pa
330a3(mdo sde): la gnas par gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na zhag bdun lon te/ bag ma len pa'i dus la bab pa na/ rgyal po'i bu skye bo brgya phrag du ma dang lhags te mchod sbyin gyi stegs bu'i
330a4(mdo sde): drung du 'ongs nas/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyis 'bras yos dang / mar dang / yungs kar ma grugs pa rnams byin no/ /de nas khye'u dang bu mo gnyis lag pa sbrel par ched pa dang

330b1(mdo sde): ces byas so/ /de nas bde byed ma nam mkha' las babs nas/ skye bo mang po'i gung la 'dug ste/ chos gang thos na srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta
330b2(mdo sde): bu'i chos ston to/ /de nas bu mo bde byed mas phal gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mor gtad do/ /de nas de rab tu byung nas
