335a4(mdo sde): bshos gsol te na bza' yang phul lo/ /de nas bu mo de'i mi sdug pa med par gyur te bzang mor gyur nas lha'i bu mo bzhin du khang phugs 'od kyis snang bar byas te 'dug go /
335a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyang slar gshegs so/ /de nas bu mdza' sde bo rnams kyi blo skyes pa/ gor ma chags par 'di'i chung ma ni mchog tu sdug pa zhig na des phrag dog gis rang bzhin
335a6(mdo sde): gyis chad pa 'jal ba dang bsngos te/ de bstan par ni mi 'dod kyi/ bdag cag gis 'di chang sna mi mthun pas ra ro bar byas la lde mig rnams blangs te/ 'di'i khyim du song la
335a7(mdo sde): chung ma blta'o snyam mo/ /de nas de dag gis chang gar po sna mi mthun pas gtu lum par bas nas/ lde mig rnams khyer te khyim du song nas sgo rnams phye ste bu mo de mthong
335b1(mdo sde): ngo| |mthong nas kyang ya mtshan du gyur te bsams pa/ gang gas 'di bdag cag la mi bstan ni yus so snyam mo/ /de nas de dag phyir log ste/ gang ga chang gi dbang gis gnyid
335b2(mdo sde): log cing 'dug pa las bslang nas smras pa/ gang ga /khyod kyi chung ma de ltar sdug pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes byas so/ /de nas gang ga lhag par yang mi dga'
335b3(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ chad pa'ang bdag gis gcal la/ bdag la gtam ngan par yang gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas mi dga' bzhin du bdag gi khyim du 'ongs nas sgo phye ste chung ma la bltas na
335b4(mdo sde): nags tshal me tog rgyas pa'i nang na nags kyi lha mo 'dug pa bzhin du shin tu mdzes pa mthong nas dris pa/ bzang mo de ci/ ci zhig byas na 'di lta bu'i gzugs khyad par can
335b5(mdo sde): du gyur ces byas so/ /de nas ji ltar gyur pa thams cad khyim thab la bsnyad de/ de thos nas des kyang bcom ldan 'das la dad pa rnyed do/ /de nas re zhig na bu mo des mthar gyis khyim thab
335b6(mdo sde): la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan
335b7(mdo sde): par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
336a1(mdo sde): spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam
336a2(mdo sde): pa| nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par
336a3(mdo sde): shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur stil mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing
336a4(mdo sde): rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur te/ de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ ra s+thas
336a5(mdo sde): las gang dag bgyis na/ des phyug po'i rigs su skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des mi sdug par gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis
336a6(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ra s+tha nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung
336a7(mdo sde): la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags bas na/ ra s+tha nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /
336b1(mdo sde): las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin bar mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las
336b2(mdo sde): dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las
336b3(mdo sde): rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA ra
336b4(mdo sde): NA si na tshong dpon gyi chung ma gtum zhing brlang la gzu lum can zhig 'dug go / sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la
336b5(mdo sde): snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba/ 'jig rten na yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de nas re zhig na rang sangs rgyas mi sdug pa zhig de'i khyim
336b6(mdo sde): du song ba dang / des mi sdug pa 'di lta bu nga'i khyim du ci 'dod ces spyos mang du brgyad nas khyim nas bskrad do/ /de nas rang sangs rgyas des de la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ ngang pa'i rgyal
336b7(mdo sde): po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi chung ma 'gyod pa skyes nas de la gzod pa gsol
337a1(mdo sde): te| bshos kyang phul nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis rang sangs rgyas la spyos brgyad pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa myong bar ma gyur cig /
337a2(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i chos dag kyang thob par gyur cig /'di las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge
337a3(mdo sde): slong dag / ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ra s+tha 'di yin te/ der rang sangs rgyas la bshos phul ba de'i las kyi rnam
337a4(mdo sde): par smin pas ni rgyal po phyug po'i rigs su skyes so/ /mi sdug pa'i tshig smras te/ /khyim nas bskrad pa des ni mi sdug par gyur to/ /gzhan yang / bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi
337a5(mdo sde): ring la rab tu byung ste/ des der bslabs shing kha don du byas pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar
337a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas
337a7(mdo sde): so| |dge slong dag / de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
337b1(mdo sde): ni rnam par smin pa rang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par ni rnam par smin pa rang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par
337b2(mdo sde): gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar pa rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong / khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom
337b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtog pa
337b4(mdo sde): brjod pa brgya pa las/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //sdom ni/ rgya mtsho dang ni snam dang / /lag na gser thogs sde snod gsum/ /grags bshes
337b5(mdo sde): rdzus te skyes pa dang / /mdzes ldan dang ni ka pi na/ /bzang ldan dang ni yul 'khor bsrung / sde tshan dag tu bstan pa yin/ /rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal
337b6(mdo sde): po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang /
337b7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod
338a1(mdo sde): pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes
338a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zod rnams
338a3(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
338a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ded dpon zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing
338a5(mdo sde): dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las re zhig na de'i sems skyes pa/ bdag ji srid du lang tshol bab pa de srid du ni nor spel bar bya'o/ /phyis rgas pa'i tshe ni bde bar longs
338a6(mdo sde): spyod par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas ded dpon de g.yog 'khor tshong pa lnga brgya dang rgya mtsho'i gru nyos nas chung ma dang bcas te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs so/ /de nas re zhig
338a7(mdo sde): na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ rgya mtsho de nyid kyi nang du bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas
338b1(mdo sde): nas| ming rgya mtsho zhes btags so/ /de nas re zhig na ded dpon de gru don grub nas nye zho med par rgya mtsho chen po nas phyir 'khor te/ de nas gang gi tshe khye'u rgya mtsho cher skyes
338b2(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe/ phas ded dpon du bskos nas g.yog 'khor tshong pa lnga brgya dang rgya mtsho chen por btang ste/ de mthar gyis song song ba las/ grong dang / grong rdal dang / grong khyer dang / yul
338b3(mdo sde): 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / tshong 'dus rnams mthong nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin te/ kA ra Sha pa Na lnga brgyas gru'i gla byas nas/ zho shas 'tsho ba rnam pa lnga ste/ gru shol ba
338b4(mdo sde): dang | chu 'phyag pa dang / mnyan pa dang / phye'u zul mkhan dang / ru skya 'dzin pa rnams kyang khrid de/ de lan gsum du dril bsgrags nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so/ /de nas de dag
338b5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen por song ba dang / srin po nag po'i rlung gis gru de phu mdar bskor to/ /ded dpon rgya mtsho ni mu stegs can la dga' ste/ de dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs skrag
338b6(mdo sde): nas| ston pa drug la gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs kyang gru de rlung gis ye bskor to/ /de nas re zhig na tshong pa gzhan dag kyang lha stong snyed la gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs
338b7(mdo sde): te smras pa/ gu lang chu lha ku be ra dang rlung lha me lha dbang chen dang / /drang srong sna tshogs lha dang sa la gnas pa'i klu mang de dag la/ /bdag cag dad pa lags kyi bdag cag 'di
339a1(mdo sde): na 'chi ba'i gnod gyur lags/ /myur du sdug bsngal 'di dag bsal te 'gron po rnams ni bskyab par gsol/ /de nas de dag gis de ltar smre sngags
339a2(mdo sde): bton kyang skyabs byed pa su'ang med do/ /de nas re zhig na dge bsnyen zhig gru de'i nang na 'dug pa des smras pa/ kye/ ston pa drug dang / lha gzhan dag gis kyang khyed la ci byar
339a3(mdo sde): yang med kyi/ mngon sum du yod pa'i lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la snying nas skyabs su song zhig dang / de khyed kyi skyabs su 'gyur ro zhes byas so/ /de nas ded dpon
339a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la sogs pa tshong pa lnga brgya po rnams kyis skad bsnyams te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabs su song ngo / /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan
339a5(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang
339a6(mdo sde): ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la gnas

339b1(mdo sde): bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng
339b2(mdo sde): ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas
339b3(mdo sde): par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs
339b4(mdo sde): bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan
339b5(mdo sde): dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug /su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa
339b6(mdo sde): dang | nyam nga ba dang / gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang / thar pa dang /

340a1(mdo sde): la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su
340a2(mdo sde): smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /'dir smra ba/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs
340a3(mdo sde): yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na bzhugs

340a6(mdo sde): chen po'i nang nas phyir 'khor te 'chi bas skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin nas nye du'i skye bo rnams dbugs phyung ste/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang /

340b1(mdo sde): pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan pa rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang /

341a1(mdo sde): sdang dang bral ba dang / gti mug dang bral ba dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba

341a4(mdo sde): bkod pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/ 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang /

341a6(mdo sde): su bskyabs pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgya mtsho'i 'gram zhig na/ drang srong mngon

341b2(mdo sde): NA si'i tshong pa lnga brgya rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'gro 'dod par gyur te/ de dag mthar gyis song song nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin pa dang / de dag gis drang srong de mthong nas dad
341b3(mdo sde): pa skyes te/ rkang pa la phyag btsal nas gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag cag rgya mtsho'i nang du mchis pa las phongs pa 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na/ bcom
341b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das khyed kyis bdag cag yongs su bskyabs par gsol zhes byas nas/ des kyang gnang ste/ de ltar bya'o zhes byas so/ /de nas tshong pa de dag gis rin po che dag blangs nas
341b5(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling logs su chas so/ /de nas re zhig na srin po nag po'i rlung gis kun tu bskor ba las/ drang srong des yongs su bskyabs so/ /de nas gru'i don grub ste/ nye zho med par
341b6(mdo sde): phyir 'phor nas drang srong gi thad du phyin te smras pa/ kye drang srong chen po/ dka' bas 'bad pa dang / snying rje'i rang bzhin 'dis ci zhig bsgrub cing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ 'jig rten
341b7(mdo sde): long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma brgal ba rnams grol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /
342a1(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de dag gis smras pa/ nam khyod sangs
342a2(mdo sde): rgyas su gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag la'ang dgongs par gsol/ drang srong gis smras pa/ de ltar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du
342a3(mdo sde): sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/ /tshong pa de dag ni rgya mtsho la sogs pa 'di dag yin te/ de'i tshe'ang ngas 'di dag yongs su bskyabs so//
342a4(mdo sde): gzhan yang / bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung ste/ der de dag gis dbang po yongs su smin par byas pa des na/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge
342a5(mdo sde): slong dag / de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin
342a6(mdo sde): pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dres mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams
342a7(mdo sde): dang | las 'dras ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
342b1(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //snam zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
342b2(mdo sde): 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu
342b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor
342b4(mdo sde): byas| mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
342b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zod rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
342b6(mdo sde): bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs
342b7(mdo sde): spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma
343a1(mdo sde): blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las bu btsas so cog shi'o/ /de'i tshe
343a2(mdo sde): gnas brtan ma 'gags pa ni khyim der 'grul lo/ /de nas khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa/ gnas brtan ma 'gags pa 'di ni bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas che bar grags pa
343a3(mdo sde): yin gyi/ gal te bdag gi bu btsas par gyur na/ 'di'i slob mar dbul lo zhes 'di la je gsol ba gdab bo snyam mo/ /de nas khyim bdag des gnas brtan ma 'gags pa
343a4(mdo sde): khyim du spyan drangs te/ bshos gsol nas gsol ba btab pa/ gnas brtan/ gal te bdag gi bu btsas te ma gum na gnas brtan gyi slob mar dbul lo zhes byas so/ /gnas
343a5(mdo sde): brtan ma 'gags pas smras pa/ de ltar dam bcas pa ma brjed par gyis shig /de nas phyis re zhig na'ang rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga'
343a6(mdo sde): mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas des lus las dri bsang zhim po byung bar gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs
343a7(mdo sde): bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ lha'i sna ma'i me tog gi ral chung gyon pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ sna ma zhes ming btags so/ /de nas
343b1(mdo sde): gnas brtan ma 'gags pa khyim gyi nang du bshos la spyan drangs nas khye'u de de la phul lo/ /de nas gnas brtan ma 'gags pas de la chos gos tshon can dag byin te/ tshe ring
343b2(mdo sde): bar gyur cig ces legs su smon pa'ang byas so/ /de nas gang gi tshe btsas nas lo bdun lon pa de'i tshe pha ma gnyis kyis gnas brtan ma 'gags pa la phul lo/ /gnas
343b3(mdo sde): brtan ma 'gags pas kyang rab tu phyung nas yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo
343b4(mdo sde): zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs
343b5(mdo sde): pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam
343b6(mdo sde): mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes
343b7(mdo sde): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing
344a1(mdo sde): rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de 'ang dbang po rnon po zhig ste/ gang gi tshe phyag dar khrod kyi gos 'drub pa de'i tshe/ khab lan re
344a2(mdo sde): 'dzugs pa la rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang par byed do/ /de nas phyis ro zhig na gnas brtan ma 'gags pas bsgo ba/ bu gcig /song la chu klung khang
344a3(mdo sde): ldan nas chu long zhig ces byas so/ /de nas dge tshul pa sna mas bum pa khyer te chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du song ngo / /de nas khrus byas te/ bum pa chus bkang nas nam
344a4(mdo sde): mkha' la byung ste/ ched 'ga' ni bum pa sngon du btang la dge tshul pa sna ma phyi bzhin 'ong ngo / /ched 'ga' ni dge tshul pa sna ma sngon du 'gro la bum pa phyi bzhin 'ong ngo /
344a5(mdo sde): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la chos ston te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la
344a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ dge tshul pa dran pa dang ldan pa/ dbang po shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa bum pa chus bkang ste 'ong ba 'di mthong ngam/ 'dod chags
344a7(mdo sde): zhe sdang rab spangs shing / /ma rig pa dang bral nas ni/ /lus kyi tha ma 'dzin byed pa/ /de ni chu chun rab tu mdzes/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge
344b1(mdo sde): 'dun gyi mdun du dge tshul pa sna ma bstod cing bsngags pa de'i tshe/ dge slong dag /the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/
344b2(mdo sde): sna ma 'dis las gang dag bgyis na des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / lha'i sna ma'i me tog gi ral chung 'tshal bzhin du skyes la dbang po rno ba dang / dgra bcom
344b3(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sna ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/
344b4(mdo sde): dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sna ma nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su
344b5(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par
344b6(mdo sde): smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus
344b7(mdo sde): can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal ba brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/
345a1(mdo sde): bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
345a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba
345a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen yod na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na ded dpon zhig gnas pa de gzhon nu'i tshe nas rab tu byung ba'i sems skyes pa
345a4(mdo sde): las de rab tu 'byung ma nus nas/ gang gi tshe rgas par gyur pa de'i tshe de 'gyod pa skyes te/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu ma byung ba ni bdag gis ma legs
345a5(mdo sde): pa byas so snyam mo/ /de nas des dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la sna ma'i me tog btags so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge
345a6(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa 'ang bshos gsol te/ zhabs la phyag btsal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su
345a7(mdo sde): gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi
345b1(mdo sde): mnyes pa byed par ma gyur cig / gang gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba der gzhon nu'i tshe nas 'phags pa'i chos rnams rtogs par gyur cig ces byas so/ gzhan yang / bcom ldan
345b2(mdo sde): 'das 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung ste/ des der lo khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de

345b6(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //lag na gser thogs zhes bya ba ni/ sangs
345b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal bo rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams
346a1(mdo sde): dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto
346a2(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
346a3(mdo sde): mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
346a4(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
346a5(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor
346a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de la bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med pas de lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te/ bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan
346a7(mdo sde): du zin kyang / bdag la bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med pas bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/
346b1(mdo sde): sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /de nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / ltas mkhan dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cig ces
346b2(mdo sde): de la bsgo'o/ /'jig rten na 'ang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de'ang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab
346b3(mdo sde): pa'i rgyus bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la'ang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /ye ni gnas gsum tshogs
346b4(mdo sde): pa las bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/
346b5(mdo sde): gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /de'ang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi rigs
346b6(mdo sde): gzhan zhig nas shi 'phos nas de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs so/ /bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes
346b7(mdo sde): pa chags pa 'ang shes la ma chags pa'ang shes pa dang / dus kyang shes la zla mtshan yang shes pa dang / bu chags pa'ang shes pa dang / gang las bu chags pa shes pa dang /
347a1(mdo sde): khye'u yang shes la bu mo 'ang shes pa ste/ gal te khye'u yin na ni lto g.yas logs su rten cing gnas so/ /gal te bu mo yin na ni lto g.yon logs
347a2(mdo sde): su rten cing gnas so/ /de nas de dga' ches nas khyim thab la sbran pa/ jo bo/ bdag la sras chags te bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na khye'u
347a3(mdo sde): 'gyur bar nges kyi dgyes pa skyed du gsol zhes byas so/ /de yang dga' ches te ro stod ni bteg /lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa
347a4(mdo sde): bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo / /bdag gi bu rung bar shog cig /mi rung bar ma gyur cig /bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog cig /gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog cig /
347a5(mdo sde): nor skal la spyod par shog cig /bdag gi rigs rgyun ring du gnas par shog cig /bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu'ang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung / nyung
347a6(mdo sde): yang rung ste/ sbyin pa dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas/ de gnyis gang dang / gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song zhig ces yon bsngo bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig
347a7(mdo sde): brjod do/ /de nas des bu chags par rig nas/ bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzang gi steng du nyams rangs su bzhag ste/ grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang / tsha ba'i tshe
347b1(mdo sde): ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang / ha cang khab ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang lan tshwa che ba ma yin pa rnams
347b2(mdo sde): dang | ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang bskar ba ma yin pa rnams te/ kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mngar ba dang /
347b3(mdo sde): tsha ba dang / bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis brten cing do shal dang / se mo dos lus rnam par klubs te/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i
347b4(mdo sde): steng dang / khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang ma thos par byas so/ /de nas zla ba brgyad dam/
347b5(mdo sde): dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas/ de'i lag pa gnyis la las
347b6(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i gser gyi dong tse mtshan mas btab pa gnyis byung ste/ gang gi tshe de phyung ba de'i tshe/ yang gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de btsas
347b7(mdo sde): pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di btsas ma thag tu lag pa gnyis la las kyi rnam par
348a1(mdo sde): smin pa las byung ba'i gser gyi dong tse gnyis byung bas na de'i phyir na khye'u 'di'i ming lag na gser thogs zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de
348a2(mdo sde): na khye'u lag na gser thogs pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad
348a3(mdo sde): la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed
348a4(mdo sde): bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to /de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs
348a5(mdo sde): pa| snying rje can zhig ste/ gang gi tshe srang du 'gro ba de'i tshe dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams mthong na lag pa gnyis brkyang
348a6(mdo sde): nas de la gser dang / dngul gyi dong tse mtshan mas btab pa'i phung po de dag la ji tsam dgos pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i grags pas mnyan du yod pa thams cad
348a7(mdo sde): rgyas par 'gyur to/ /de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u lag na gser thogs rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i
348b1(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga'
348b2(mdo sde): ba| rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das
348b3(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas/ des tshe dang ldan
348b4(mdo sde): pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ slob dpon/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol bar 'tshal lo/ /gnas brtan kun dga' bos smras
348b5(mdo sde): pa| bu| kaR+Sha pa Na dgos so/ /de nas khye'u lag na gser thogs sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar 'greng ste/ lag pa gnyis brkyang nas/
348b6(mdo sde): gser dngul gyi phung po chen po spungs so/ /de nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang / dge slong gzhan dag dang / gnas brtan kun dga' bos de mthong nas/ mchog
348b7(mdo sde): tu ya mtshan du gyur to/ /de nas khye'u lag na gser thogs kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bshos gsol nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
349a1(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/
349a2(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u lag na gser thogs kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu
349a3(mdo sde): ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong nas des nye du rnams la longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' byas te/ dge slong
349a4(mdo sde): dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ des
349a5(mdo sde): brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /
349a6(mdo sde): ltung ba dang / rnam par mthong ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
349a7(mdo sde): byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil 'dra ba'i sems dang /
349b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i
349b2(mdo sde): snyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge
349b3(mdo sde): slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ lag na gser thogs kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i sug pa
349b4(mdo sde): gnyis la gser gyi dong tse mtshan mas btab pa gnyis byung la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /dge slong dag/
349b5(mdo sde): lag na gser thogs nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas
349b6(mdo sde): shing bsags pas na/ lag na gser thogs nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing
349b7(mdo sde): bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba
350a1(mdo sde): dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur
350a2(mdo sde): ro| |lus can dag gis las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba
350a3(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang /
350a4(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
350a5(mdo sde): 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de grong khyer wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
350a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od srung sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su/
350a7(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ rgyal po kr-i krI de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gis mchod pa byas te/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor khor yug
350b1(mdo sde): tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so/ /mchod rten de'i dus ston byed pa na rgyan po ba zhig gis gser gyi dong tse gnyis
350b2(mdo sde): mchod rten de'i srog shing la btags so/ /de nas zhabs la phyag btsal te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gang dang / gang du skyes pa de dang / der lag pa la gser yod pa kho nar
350b3(mdo sde): gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyan po par gyur pa de ni lag na gser thogs
350b4(mdo sde): 'di yin te/ des mchod rten la gser gyi dong tse gnyis btags pa des na 'di lta bu'i khyad par can du gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid
350b5(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig
350b6(mdo sde): tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dres mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag/
350b7(mdo sde): de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag par rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong /
351a1(mdo sde): khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis
351a2(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //bam po bcu dgu pa/ sde snod gsum pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon
351a3(mdo sde): po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang /
351a4(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/
351a5(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing
351a6(mdo sde): shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong
351a7(mdo sde): rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
351b1(mdo sde): de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos
351b2(mdo sde): gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang /
351b3(mdo sde): ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /de nas re zhig na de btsun mo dang /
351b4(mdo sde): lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las btsun mo la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu
351b5(mdo sde): byung ste/ khye'u gos su chos gos tshon can gyon la dge slong gi cha lugs can tshe rabs dran pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas skyes ma thag tu dris pa/ ci/ mnyan du yod pa 'di kho na
351b6(mdo sde): na bcom ldan 'das dang / shA ri bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang / 'od srung dang / kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams bzhugs sam zhes zer ro/ /de nas
351b7(mdo sde): de'i ma ya mtshan du gyur te dga' bas rgyas nas smras pa/ bu|mnyan du yod pa 'di kho nan bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos chen po rnams bzhugs so zhes byas so//
352a1(mdo sde): de nas re zhig na don de rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol te/ khyod kyi sras gos su chod gos tshon can 'tshal ba/ dge sbyong gi cha lugs can tshe
352a2(mdo sde): rabs dran pa zhig btsas te/ de bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos chen po rnams ga la bzhugs pa'ang rmed do zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu
352a3(mdo sde): de la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos la spyan drangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis
352a4(mdo sde): zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun
352a5(mdo sde): gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu pang par blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar brims nad/ bcom
352a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ bdag gi bu 'di btsas ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams dran lags so zhes gsol te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu de la/
352a7(mdo sde): sde snod gsum pa/ khyod nad med par gyur cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag
352b1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe btsas nas lo bdun lon pa de'i tshe/ chos gos tshon can de dag nyid gyon
352b2(mdo sde): bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan
352b3(mdo sde): par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams
352b4(mdo sde): cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha'
352b5(mdo sde): dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so
352b6(mdo sde): so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa
352b7(mdo sde): dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ sde snod
353a1(mdo sde): gsum pas las gang dag bgyis na/ des chos gos tshon can 'tshal ba dge sbyong gi cha lugs can tshe rabs dran bzhin du btsas te/
353a2(mdo sde): rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sde snod gsum pa nyid kyis sngon tshe
353a3(mdo sde): rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na /
353a4(mdo sde): sde snod gsum pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa
353a5(mdo sde): rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las
353a6(mdo sde): dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi
353a7(mdo sde): las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal
353b1(mdo sde): ba bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
353b2(mdo sde): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA ra NA
353b3(mdo sde): si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po kr-i krI'i bu drang srong smra bar song ngo / /de nas nges sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
353b4(mdo sde): sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom pa gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma
353b5(mdo sde): stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dad pa skyes so/ /dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
353b6(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang
353b7(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu stan te/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan
354a1(mdo sde): du lta bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po la gsol te/ yab/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar 'tshal na/ gnang bar mdzad
354a2(mdo sde): du gsol zhes byas so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod ring po ma thogs par rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur dgos pas 'di ni ngas bcos su med do/ /bus smras pa/ rgyal srid
354a3(mdo sde): nyes pa mang po dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dgrar gyur pa bdag la mi 'tshal gyi/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu mi 'byung du mi gnang ngo / /de nas yab
354a4(mdo sde): kyis ma gnang nas/ des zhag gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum nas zhag drug gi bar du kha 'tshos so/ /de nas de'i zla grogs rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol to/ /lha|
354a5(mdo sde): mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ sras 'di ni rab tu byung na legs kyi/ de'u re 'dir 'gum na ma legs so/ /de nas rgyal pos gnang nas dam 'char bcug ste/
354a6(mdo sde): nam khyod sde snod gsum ma lobs kyi bar du nga dang 'phrad du ma 'ong zhig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas re zhig na de yab kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la
354a7(mdo sde): rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas ring po ma lon par sde snod gsum lobs te/ rig pa dang / grol ba smra ba chos ston par gyur nas de
354b1(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la/ bdag gis sngon dam bcas pa gnyer dgum gor ma chag snyam nas/ de yab kyi thad du song ste phrad nas dris pa/ bu/ cung zad lobs pa lta yod
354b2(mdo sde): dam/ des smras pa/ sde snod gsum lobs lags so/ /de nas des yab la chos de lta bu bstan te/ de thos nas rgyal po mgu bar gyur to/ /de nas dga' ba skyes te smras
354b3(mdo sde): pa| bu gcig/ khyod la ci dgos/ des smras pa/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa spyan drangs la yo byad drug dbul bar 'tshal lo/ /
354b4(mdo sde): rgyal pos smras pa/ rgyal po'i pho brang ni rgya che yi/ ci dga' ba gyis shig /de nas sde snod gsum pas bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring 'khor nyi khri dang bcas te zhal zas
354b5(mdo sde): bzang pos tshim par byas nas/ dge slong re re la'ang yo byad drug drug phul lo/ /de nas zhabs la phyag btsal nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag da ltar dka' bas rab tu byung ba thob
354b6(mdo sde): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bkur sti byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtang ba 'dis na/
354b7(mdo sde): bdag gang dang / gang du skyes pa de dang / der gos su chos gos tshon can gyon la dge sbyong gi cha lugs 'di dang ldan te/ tshe rabs dran par gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
355a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po kr-i krI'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sde snod gsum pa 'di yin te/
355a2(mdo sde): rgyu de nyid kyis phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / tshe rabs drin par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par
355a3(mdo sde): gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par

355a7(mdo sde): ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
355b1(mdo sde): dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lte
355b2(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
355b3(mdo sde): mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
355b4(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag
355b5(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ded dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yang shing rgya
355b6(mdo sde): che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga'
355b7(mdo sde): la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de'i tshe mu ge mi bzad pas gnod pa byung ste/ slong bas kyang bzas mi rnyed do/ /ltas mkhan rnams kyis kyang char mi 'bab par bstan pa las re
356a1(mdo sde): zhig na/ ded dpon de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes
356a2(mdo sde): pa| yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas/ gang gi nyin par khye'u de btsas pa de kho na'i nyin par nas than pa med par gyur to/ /de nas de'i
356a3(mdo sde): grags pa mnyan du yod pa mtha' dag tu rgyas par gyur to/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par
356a4(mdo sde): byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di'i grags pa kun tu rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming grags bshes zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u grags bshes
356a5(mdo sde): pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma
356a6(mdo sde): brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i
356a7(mdo sde): nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe khye'u grags bshes cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du don zhig la song ngo / /de nas des
356b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang
356b2(mdo sde): gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dad pa skyes so/ /dad pa skyes nas
356b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba
356b4(mdo sde): las skyo bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan par mdzad de/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur te/ pha ma la
356b5(mdo sde): gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo
356b6(mdo sde): zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon
356b7(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar
357a1(mdo sde): mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i
357a2(mdo sde): sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po
357a3(mdo sde): dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de'i mche ba gnyis las chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa
357a4(mdo sde): byung ste/ des na de la skom pa'i gnod pa med de/ gang gi tshe tsha ba'i dus su dge slong skom pa rnams gung skyems la dge 'dun gyi nang du 'du ba de'i tshe'ang de mi 'ong
357a5(mdo sde): ngo| |de nas de dang bshes pa'i dge slong rnams kyis dris pa/ ci'i phyir khyod la skom pa'i gnod pa med ces byas so/ /des smras pa/ bdag gi mche ba gnyis las
357a6(mdo sde): chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung ste/ des nas bdag la skom pa'i gnod pa med do/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs
357a7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ grags bshes 'dis las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mche ba
357b1(mdo sde): gnyis las chu bo yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung la/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
357b2(mdo sde): pa| dge slong dag / grags bshes nyid kyi sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de
357b3(mdo sde): dag byas shing bsags pas na/ grags bshes nyid kyis las bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags
357b4(mdo sde): pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge
357b5(mdo sde): ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi
357b6(mdo sde): las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal
357b7(mdo sde): pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
358a1(mdo sde): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten
358a2(mdo sde): du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig dge slong rgan po zhig la rab tu
358a3(mdo sde): byung ba las/ de'ang le lo can zhig ste/ gzhan la de bsnyen bkur byed mi 'dod do/ /de nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gnas brtan de nyid kyi bsnyen
358a4(mdo sde): bkur byed par bskos pa dang / de bdag ni bsnyen bkur byed pa yin no snyam du rgya cher 'dzin te/ dge slong ches rgan pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur len par byed pas na/
358a5(mdo sde): de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams zad de/ phyis re zhig na nad kyis btab pa dang / gnas brtan gyis sman pa'i lung bzhin du sman mar blud nas/ de mtshan mo skom ste ci bya
358a6(mdo sde): gtol med nas chu btung snyam ste/ bdag gi chu snod kyi drung du song na chu med par mthong ngo / /de bzhin du mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / dge 'dun gyi drung tshang
358a7(mdo sde): du song na de dag kyang chu med par mthong ngo / /de nas re zhig na chu klung zlog byed kyi 'gram du song na de'ang chu med par gyur te/ de mi dga' bar gyur nas bdag gi
358b1(mdo sde): tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams skyo ba skyed pa dang / dad pas byin pa lci bar bstan pa'i phyir chu klung zlog byed kyi pha rol na shing zhig yod pa la 'dzegs te/ ras shig
358b2(mdo sde): der btags nas/ rang gi las rnams las bsams te las la rten cing 'dug go /de nas re zhig na phyi de nyin par nam nangs pa dang / gtam de tshangs pa mtshungs par
358b3(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams la bsnyad do/ /de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis skabs de thos nas mi dga' bar gyur te phan tshun du bsnyad do/ /de nas de'i mkhan pos
358b4(mdo sde): chu byin na de'ang ma mthong ngo / /de nas de mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis gaN+Di rdungs shig ces bka'
358b5(mdo sde): stsal to/ /de nas khang skyong gis gaN+Di brdungs pa dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 'dus so/ /grong khyer wA ra NA si'i thog thag tu yang gtam
358b6(mdo sde): de grags te/ sems can 'bum phrag du ma 'dus so/ /de nas re zhig na de'i mkhan pos gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug tu bcug nas/ ril ba spyi blugs chus bkang ste
358b7(mdo sde): phyin nas/ bu| chu 'di dge 'dun la brims shig ces byas so/ /de nas 'bras bu mngon sum du mthong ba des skye bar gyur pa de nyid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos
359a1(mdo sde): rnams la dad pa bskyed nas bsam pa drag pos chu de dge 'dun la brims so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la phan gdags pa'i phyir phyag
359a2(mdo sde): glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang nas/ 'jigs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa'i phyag gis chu de bzhes te/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyis kyang blangs na/ 'on kyang zad
359a3(mdo sde): par ma gyur to/ /dge 'dun thams cad la brims na'ang zad par ma gyur to/ /de nas lha dang / mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul ya mtshan can de mthong nas/ srog
359a4(mdo sde): chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de'i rgyud la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sor chud par gyur to/ /gang gi tshe nad sos pa de'i tshe des sangs rgyas
359a5(mdo sde): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chus mi brel bar byas te/ lo khri nyis stong gi bar du des dge 'dun la chu brims so/ /de nas phyis re zhig na 'chi ba'i dus la
359a6(mdo sde): bab pa'i tshe/ smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis
359a7(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes
359b1(mdo sde): bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /bdag gi mche ba'i phrag nas kyang chu yan
359b2(mdo sde): lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur pa
359b3(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni grags bshes 'di yin te/ des lo khri nyis stong gi bar du dge 'dun la chu brims te smon lam btab pa des na/ tshe 'di la mche ba'i phrag nas chu 'byung ba rgyu
359b4(mdo sde): de nyid kyis na dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag
359b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar par 'gyur ro/ /las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dres
359b6(mdo sde): mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba'
359b7(mdo sde): zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das
360a1(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //rdzus te skyes pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams
360a2(mdo sde): dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams
360a3(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar
360a4(mdo sde): byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod
360a5(mdo sde): cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang snyun gsos dang / sman
360a6(mdo sde): zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'du sa rtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na/ rdo leb
360a7(mdo sde): snam bu dkar po lta bu'i steng du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes te/ sku bskrun pa'i yum dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la'ang chos ston to/ /de'i tshe tshe dang
360b1(mdo sde): ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ni mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/ /
360b2(mdo sde): de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag
360b3(mdo sde): btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par
360b4(mdo sde): 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /chos kyis gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang
360b5(mdo sde): dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
360b6(mdo sde): nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'i 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa
360b7(mdo sde): mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod kyis da ltar bcom ldan 'das gang du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes pa cung zad gsan tam/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras
361a1(mdo sde): p a| kye| bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'du sa rtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba
361a2(mdo sde): zhig na rdo leb snam bu dkar po lta bu'i steng du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes te/ sku bskrun pa'i yum dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la'ang chos ston
361a3(mdo sde): cing bzhugs so zhes thos so/ /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te rkang pa
361a4(mdo sde): la phyag btsal nas stan las langs te dong ngo / /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong
361a5(mdo sde): ste lhags nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos
361a6(mdo sde): 'khor bzhi po rnams chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /
361a7(mdo sde): chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas bcang mi
361b1(mdo sde): zer ba 'dug go / de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
361b2(mdo sde): ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan
361b3(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhal ma mthong nas ring mo zhig lags te/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bas skom lags so/ /bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal te/ gal
361b4(mdo sde): te btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la gnod pa ma mchis na/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas zhabs la
361b5(mdo sde): phyag bzhes te gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga'am/ bde ba la
361b6(mdo sde): reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la 'di skad ces kyang gsungs shig / btsun pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i 'khor bzhi po rnams bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal te/
361b7(mdo sde): 'di skad du/ btsun pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams la ni gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur
362a1(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i la yul du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang / mthu ma mchis la/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
362a2(mdo sde): la ni gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du mchi ba de lta
362a3(mdo sde): bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang / mthu mchis na thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs su gsol zhes mchi'o
362a4(mdo sde): zhes mol du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/ /de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis
362a5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal te
362a6(mdo sde): stan las langs te dong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par rig nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam
362a7(mdo sde): par bzhag na/ dper na/ mi stobs po che lag pa bskum pa las brkyang pa'am/ brkyang pa las bskum pa bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mnyan du
362b1(mdo sde): yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'du sa rtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rdo leb snam bu dkar po lta bur
362b2(mdo sde): 'dug pa der son par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ni lha'i 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos
362b3(mdo sde): ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang
362b4(mdo sde): 'dzum dmul te/ bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis gang ba bzhin du 'di na'ang 'khor mang po dang bzhugs so snyam mo/ /de nas
362b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
362b6(mdo sde): to| |mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ 'di dag la ni rang dbang med de/ gang gi tshe ngas deng zhig ces bsams na ni de'i tshe 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe ngas shog cig ces
362b7(mdo sde): bsams na ni de'i tshe 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /sems kyis nga'i bsams pa shes nas 'ong ba dang 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom
363a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs
363a2(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos lha'i 'khor thams cad la bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/
363a3(mdo sde): kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod lags so/ /lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha
363a4(mdo sde): de lta bu dag kyang mchis so/ /chos dang / dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir
363a5(mdo sde): skyes pa dag kyang mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la mthun par dgongs te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
363a6(mdo sde): 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kye ma/ lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing
363a7(mdo sde): 'khod do/ /lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod
363b1(mdo sde): do| |chos dang / dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do/ /de
363b2(mdo sde): nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la mthun par bsams te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
363b3(mdo sde): 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kye ma|lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod
363b4(mdo sde): do| |lha'i 'khor gyi nang nas sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do/ /chos dang / dge 'dun dang / 'phags
363b5(mdo sde): pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa de lta bu dag kyang yod do/ /de nas lha'i bu gzhan zhig gis kyang bcom ldan
363b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa la mthun par bsams te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
363b7(mdo sde): gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni de bzhin te/ kye ma/ lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do/ /lha'i
364a1(mdo sde): 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes ba'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do/ /chos dang / dge
364a2(mdo sde): 'dun dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa de lta bu dag kyang yod do/ /de nas lha kha cig stan
364a3(mdo sde): las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
364a4(mdo sde): to| |btsun pa/ bdag cag ni sangs rgyas la shes nas dang pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa lags so/ /lha gzhan dag gcig gis kyang 'di skad
364a5(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag ni chos dang / dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral
364a6(mdo sde): nas 'dir skyes pa lags so/ /de nas der lha brgya phrag du ma dang / lha stong phrag du ma dang / lha 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar so so'i rgyun du
364a7(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brda sprod pa byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos lha rnams dong bar rig nas/ bla gos phrag pa
364b1(mdo sde): gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor
364b2(mdo sde): bzhi po mchis pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang ldan
364b3(mdo sde): nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' ma/ bde ba la reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u
364b4(mdo sde): 'gal gyi bu khyod dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po 'khod pa rnams bde bar gyur cig /mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor
364b5(mdo sde): bzhi po mchis pa rnams ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te 'di skad ces kyang mchi'o/ /btsun pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams la ni gang gis
364b6(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du mchi ba de lta bu'i
364b7(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul dang / mthu ma mchis la/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la ni gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba
365a1(mdo sde): dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang / mthu mchis na thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das
365a2(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs su gsol zhes kyang mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ 'o na khyod
365a3(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling du song la 'khor bzhi po rnams la/ kye| bcom ldan 'das ni da ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer
365a4(mdo sde): snang ldan gyi 'dab/ a bad dza ra'i nags su shing u dum wA ra'i drung du gshegs so zhes sgron cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan
365a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/ dper na/ mi stobs po che
365a6(mdo sde): lag pa bskum pa las brkyang pa'am/ brkyang pa las bskum pa bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas mi snang bar
365a7(mdo sde): gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du son par gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'dzam bu'i gling du
365b1(mdo sde): 'ongs nas 'khor bzhi po rnams la smras pa/ kye/ bcom ldan 'das ni da ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/ a
365b2(mdo sde): bad dza ra'i nags su shing u dum wA ra'i drung du gshegs so zhes byas so/ /de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam
365b3(mdo sde): bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/ a bad dza ra'i nags su shing u du ma wA ra'i drung du gshegs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das grong khyer snang ldan du gshegs pa
365b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dus so/ /de nas der dge slong rdzus te skyes pa zhig byung ste/ des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
365b5(mdo sde): dge 'dun bcas pa dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag bshos la spyan drangs nas re zhig na gdugs tshod
365b6(mdo sde): la bab pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu gdan dar yug khyim chen pos g.yogs pa dag dang / lha'i zhal zas bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag byung bar gyur to/ /de nas dge
365b7(mdo sde): slong rdzus te skyes pa des bcom ldan 'das lha'i zhal zas kyis tshim par byas te/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de
366a1(mdo sde): dag la'ang bkur sti legs par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsams pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang /
366a2(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas dge slong rdzus te skyes pa phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing
366a3(mdo sde): mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon
366a4(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang
366a5(mdo sde): bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom
366a6(mdo sde): pa| rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang
366a7(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa
366b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ rdzus te skyes pas las gang dag bgyis na/ des rdzus te skyes par gyur la/ 'dis sems bskyed pa'i mod la ci bsams
366b2(mdo sde): pa dang / ci 'tshal ba de dag thams cad grub par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ rdzus te skyes pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs
366b3(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'byung ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rdzus te
366b4(mdo sde): skyes pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi
366b5(mdo sde): sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas
366b6(mdo sde): shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal

367a1(mdo sde): gcig pa la skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang /
367a2(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
367a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na grong med pa dgon pa'i gnas
367a4(mdo sde): shig na/ dge slong lnga dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ de'i nang nas dge slong gcig gis dge slong bzhi'i zhal ta byas nas/ de dag gis brtson pa dang /
367a5(mdo sde): bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong gcig shos kyis ni de dag gi rkang pa

367b1(mdo sde): so| |dge slong dag / ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rdzus te skyes pa 'di yin no/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa/ rdzus te skyes pas

367b5(mdo sde): NA si na drang srong smra ba'i ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe de na tshong dpon zhig gnas pa de'i chung ma bu btsas pa'i tshe sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen te nyam
367b6(mdo sde): thag pa'i skad 'byin cing du ba dang / des de'i sgra thos nas mchog tu mi dga' bar gyur to/ /mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs nas lag pa rkom tsugs bcas te sems khong du
367b7(mdo sde): chud cing 'dug pa las de'i blo skyes pa/ ma la/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung la/ ci nas bdag gis nam yang mngal du gnas pa nyams su
368a1(mdo sde): myong bar ma gyur cig ces smon lam btab gor ma chag mnyam ste/ de skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi gsung rab la
