371a3(mdo sde): na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po mdzes pas de'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs so/ /de nas re zhig na de'i dus ston zhig byung ba'i tshe/ mdza'
371a4(mdo sde): sde dag cig mchod rten gyi drung du dong ba las/ de dag gis mchod rten de mthong ba las/ dad pa skyes te me tog btags so/ /de dag gi nang na mdza' sde bo cig
371a5(mdo sde): na re/ bdag la ni ci yang med kyi/ bdag ni ci yang mi byed do zhes zer nas/ mdza' sde de dag gi nang nas phyir byung ba las de 'gyod pa skyes te/ des me tog rnam
371a6(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs btus nas mchod rten de nyid la phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mdza' sde bo
371a7(mdo sde): 'gyod pa skyes nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la me tog dbul ba gang yin pa de ni mdzes pa
371b1(mdo sde): 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag /mdzes pas ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA ra NA si na tshong
371b2(mdo sde): dpon zhig gnas pa des rang sangs rgyas nad pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas dad pa skyes te rkang pa la phyag btsal nas bsod snyoms kyang phul/ gos kyang phul lo/ /dge slong
371b3(mdo sde): dag / ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mdzes pa 'di yin no/ /gzhan yang / bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring la mi dbul po shing
371b4(mdo sde): thur zhig tu gyur te/ de ri su la zhig tu shing thur song ba dang / des mchod rten zhig mthong na mchod rten de'i 'khor sa na rtswa dag kyang zhes so/ /de nas de dad pa skyes nas rtswa rnams
371b5(mdo sde): kyang phyung ste/ phyags ma thogs nas mchod rten dang / mchod rten gyi 'khor sa phyags so/ /de nas zhabs la phyag btsal te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems
371b6(mdo sde): bskyed pa 'dis na bdag gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur cig / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par
371b7(mdo sde): byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes pa byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dbul
372a1(mdo sde): po shing thun du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mdzes pa 'di nyid yin te/ des mchod rten dang / mchod rten gyi 'khor sa chags pa des na gang
372a2(mdo sde): dang gang du skyes pa de dang / der gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to/ /rgyu de nyid kyis na da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge
372a3(mdo sde): slong dag / de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
372a4(mdo sde): ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dres mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las
372a5(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong

372a7(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do/ / //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu pa/ ka pi na zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
372b1(mdo sde): 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams

372b3(mdo sde): byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
372b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang /

373b3(mdo sde): des mdun logs dang / rgyab logs su dpung chen po thams cad bltas nas/ blon po rnams la dris pa/ kwa'e/ da ltar nga'i dpung chen po 'di lta bu dag gzhan su la

378b7(mdo sde): dus na grong khyer wA ra NA si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye
379a1(mdo sde): bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / tshom rkun dang / mu ge dang /
379a2(mdo sde): nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chos bzhin du
379a3(mdo sde): rgyal po byed do/ /de phyi zhig na blon po khri brgyad stong gis zhabs 'bring byas te/ skyed mos tshal gyi shing rnams me tog rgyas la/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang /
379a4(mdo sde): rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod du song ba las des skyed mos tshal der rang sangs
379a5(mdo sde): rgyas nad pa zhig mthong nas des de la zla ba gsum gyi bar du phan pa'i zas kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang de'i sku
379a6(mdo sde): gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas blon po'i tshogs dang bcas pas til mar gyis bskus te/ des na 'khor dang bcas pa tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan
379a7(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /gzhan yang / sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung ste/ des der dbang po yongs su smin par byas pa des na/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
379b1(mdo sde): sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par
379b2(mdo sde): dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dres mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas
379b3(mdo sde): na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong /
379b4(mdo sde): khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
379b5(mdo sde): bstod do/ / //bzang ldan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang
379b6(mdo sde): 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam
379b7(mdo sde): mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
380a1(mdo sde): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
380a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/
380a3(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas
380a4(mdo sde): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu gnyis lon te/ lo bcu gnyis 'das nas/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas su byon pa de'i
380a5(mdo sde): tshe bre bo zas dang / bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya stong phrag du mas bden pa mthong ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtogs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis
380a6(mdo sde): sras kyi legs pa de dag mthong nas/ mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ de'i blo skyes pa/ gal te bdag gi bu rab tu ma byung du zin na ni 'di 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
380a7(mdo sde): po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba zhig na/ da ni 'di thor tshugs can rab tu byung ba'i g.yog byas pa ni rab tu mi mdzes kyi/ bdag
380b1(mdo sde): gis shAkya rnams las khyim re mi re rab tu 'byung du gzhug gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir grong khyer du dril bsgrags
380b2(mdo sde): so| |de nas shAkya thams cad 'dus pa'i nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ kye| shAkya khyed rnams nyon cig /gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu
380b3(mdo sde): ma byung du zin na'ang khyed kho nas 'di la bsnyen bkur bya dgos na da 'dir rab tu byung gi / shAkya khyim res mi res bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rab tu phyung zhig ces byas
380b4(mdo sde): so| |de nas bzang ldan dang / ma 'gags pa dang / nam gru dang / lha sbyin la sogs pa shAkya'i bu lnga brgya rab tu 'byung bar chas so/ /de nas de dag gi 'dreg mkhan
380b5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed pa nye bar 'khor des de dag rab tu 'byung ba mthong nas dus so/ /de nas shAkya rnams kyis nye bar 'khor khyod ci'i phyir du zhes dris so/ /de nas des snying rje
380b6(mdo sde): rje skad zer zhing / sdug sdug skad zer la/ gti zhing smra ste/ khyed rab tu byung na da bdag la zas dang / gos skyong ba su zhig mchis/ de nas shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/ nye
380b7(mdo sde): bar 'khor/ 'o na ras thing zhig byas so/ /de nas des ras bting nas shAkya rnams kyis lus la thogs pa'i do shal dang / se mo do dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai
381a1(mdo sde): DUR+ya dang / dpung rgyan dang / sor rdub rnams phung po chen por spungs te byin no/ /de nas 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor gyis rab tu 'byung ba de
381a2(mdo sde): dag kyang mthong la/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs la'ang bltas nas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa skyes te/ shAkya 'di dag ni cho rigs dang / byad gzugs dang / lang tsho
381a3(mdo sde): dang / 'byor pa dang ldan pa yin na/ 'on kyang btsun mo rnams dang / rgyan 'di dag mchil ma bzhin du bor nas/ rab tu byung na bdag ci'ang mi bdog pa zhig gis da
381a4(mdo sde): rgyan 'di dag khyim du bskur du ci yod de/ 'di dag btang la bdag kyang 'di dag gi rjes su rab tu 'byung gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor bcom
381a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
381a6(mdo sde): gal te bdag cag lta bu'ang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba mchis la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi
381a7(mdo sde): dngos po thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong / tshur shog /
381b1(mdo sde): ces byas pas rab tu phyung ngo / /de nas bzang ldan la sogs pa shAkya lnga brgya dge slong gi cha lugs can rnams sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal bar
381b2(mdo sde): byas pa las/ de dag gis nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa ngo shes nas cho rigs dang / byad gzugs dang / 'byor pa dang ldan pa'i phyir nye bar 'khor la phyag 'tshal du ma btub
381b3(mdo sde): nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan la bka' stsal pa/ bzang ldan/ gang gi phyir nga'i bstan pa 'di la ni cho rigs dang / byad gzugs dang /
381b4(mdo sde): lang tsho dang / dbang phyug dang / rigs bzhi rnam par dag pa dang sbyar ba med kyi/ 'di la phyag tshol cig /de nas bzang ldan la sogs pa shAkya lnga ba rgyas chos nyid btsan
381b5(mdo sde): par byas nas/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag byas so/ /de dag gis rkang pa la phyag byas pa'i mod la sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /
381b6(mdo sde): de nas der tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan gyis brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig
381b7(mdo sde): nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams
382a1(mdo sde): cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/
382a2(mdo sde): gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i
382a3(mdo sde): sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/
382a4(mdo sde): dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de'ang bdag nyid che ba dang / sdug cing
382a5(mdo sde): phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba zhig ste/ phyi zhig na snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par spyod yul la chas
382a6(mdo sde): so| |de nas re zhig na rigs ngan zhig gi khyim du bsod snyoms la song ngo / /de'i tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal glang po che'i gtso bo pad+ma dkar po
382a7(mdo sde): gcig pu zhes bya ba la zhon te/ kha lo pa rgyu ba'i bu ring po dang / bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir chas pa las ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bzang
382b1(mdo sde): ldan dbang po zhi ba/ yid zhi ba/ sems mchog tu dul zhing nye bar zhi ba dang ldan la/ phyag dar khrod kyi gos gyon zhing kha zas ngan pa khyer te rigs ngan gyi khyim de
382b2(mdo sde): nas phyir byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang kha lo rgyu ba'i bu ring po la dris pa/ 'di dge slong bzang ldan ma yin nam/ kha lo bas smras pa/ lha/ bka' stsal
382b3(mdo sde): pa bzhin te/ de lags so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khams nas brgyal te sa la lhung ngo / /de nas chus gtor ba dang / phyir sangs
382b4(mdo sde): te sems rtas nas kha lo pa rgyu ba'i bu ring pos bslang ngo / /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
382b5(mdo sde): btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni rmad du byung ba zhig mthong ste/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan te/ phyag dar khrod kyi
382b6(mdo sde): gos gyon zhing kha zas ngan pa thogs te/ lha dang / mi dad par bgyi ba'i spyod lam shin tu zhi bas bsod snyoms blangs te/ rigs ngan gyi khyim nas slar byung ba de la
382b7(mdo sde): bdag 'di snyam bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni shin tu dul bar bgyid pa lags te/ de la bsten na 'di lta bur skyid de mchis la/ bde bas bskyed pa
383a1(mdo sde): dag kyang 'di ltar tshul dul bar gyur pa ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ bzang
383a2(mdo sde): ldan 'di la ni ngo mtshar che ba gzhan yang yod kyi nyon cig / rgyal po chen po/ bzang ldan 'di ni dgon pa na gnas sam/ shing drung nas gnas sam/ khang stong na gnas
383a3(mdo sde): kyang rung ste/ kye ma re skyid/ kye ma re skyid/ bdag rab tu ma byung ba tsam na rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang na 'dug ste/ blon po chen po dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi
383a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis shin tu legs par bsrungs la/ rab ba dang / 'obs dang / sgo dang / gcan rnams kyis bskyabs kyang snying gzhan la dogs shing mi dga' la/ kun
383a5(mdo sde): la'ang khu 'phrig za bzhin te/ gnyid kyang mi 'ong ba las/ da ni bdag lus dang srog la'ang mi lta bas gnas gang dang / gang du'ang bde bar 'dug tu yod ngo zhes
383a6(mdo sde): dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du rjod par byed do/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
383a7(mdo sde): btsun pa/ bzang ldan gyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu las gang dag bgyis shing bsags na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / rgyal
383b1(mdo sde): po'i rigs phyug por skyes la/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bzang ldan
383b2(mdo sde): nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags
383b3(mdo sde): pas na/ bzang ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni
383b4(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang /
383b5(mdo sde): mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams
383b6(mdo sde): ni| |bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer wA ra
383b7(mdo sde): NA si na sprang po zhig gnas pa lus bkres shing nyam chung bas non nas/ phan tshun du 'khor 'khor ba las bu mo 'khur ba khyer ba zhig mthong ngo / /de nas sbrang po des
384a1(mdo sde): 'khur ba 'dod pa'i phyir bu mo de bsnyegs te/ nan gyis 'khur ba cig phrogs nas phan tshun du bros so/ /bu mo de'ang de'i phyi bzhin
384a2(mdo sde): 'brang bzhin no/ /de nas sprang po des tsham tshom med par chu klung zlog byed la 'bogs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams mi 'byung ba'i tshe na/ rangs sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa

384a4(mdo sde): de'i mdun du 'ongs so/ /de nas sprang po des rang sangs rgyas spyod lam zhi ba de mthong nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/ de dga' ba chen pos rang gi sdug bsngal
384a5(mdo sde): dang bsngos te rang sangs rgyas la 'khur ba de phul lo/ /de nas rang sangs rgyas des de'i dga' brgya chen po bskyed pa'i phyir / ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma

384b1(mdo sde): la phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag gang dang / gang du skyes pa de dang / der rigs mthon por

386a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid rgyas pa dang / btsun mo drug khri spangs nas dbu skra bregs
386b1(mdo sde): te| chos gos snam sbyar gsol nas/ yul gsus po che 'di nyid na bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing / bzhugs pa mthong gi /bdag bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba'i rjes su
386b2(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad pa'i rigs so/ /de nas de'i pha ma gnyis kyis ma gnang ngo / /de nas de zhag gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum nas drug gi bar du kha tshos
386b3(mdo sde): so| |de nas yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis bu yul 'khor skyong ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ /bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu yul 'khor skyong / /
386b4(mdo sde): shes par gyis shig /khyod ni skyid de bar 'dug 'dug pa bde ba 'dod pa yin te/ khyod kyis sdug ma myong ba yin la/ tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad par dka'o/ /dben par
386b5(mdo sde): gnas pa na dka'o/ /gcig pu 'dug pa ni dga' bar bya dka'o/ /dgon pa dang / nags khung dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas bca' ba ni yid la bsam par yang
386b6(mdo sde): dka'/ bu yul 'khor skyong khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la 'dod pa rnams kyang longs spyod par gyis shig /sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig /bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig ces
386b7(mdo sde): de skad byas nas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi zer ro/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis kyis nye du rnams la bskul te/ kye| nye du
387a1(mdo sde): rnams bu yul 'khor skyong slongs shig ces byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi nye du rnams khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor
387a2(mdo sde): skyong ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu yul 'khor skyong / shes par gyis shig /khyod ni skyid de bar
387a3(mdo sde): 'dug 'dug pa bde ba 'dod pa yin te/ khyod ni sdug ma myong ba yin la/ tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad par dka'o/ /dben par gnas pa ni dka'o/ /gcig pur 'dug pa ni
387a4(mdo sde): dga' bar bya dka'o/ /dgon pa dang / nags khung dang bas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas bca' ba ni yid la bsam par yang dka'i/ /bu yul 'khor skyod/ khyod 'di nyid
387a5(mdo sde): du 'dug la 'dod pa rnams kyang longs spyad par gyis shig / sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig /bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig ces de skad byas na'ang / khyim bdag gi bu
387a6(mdo sde): yul 'khor skyong cang mi zer ro/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis kyis yul 'khor skyong gi grogs po rnams bskul te/ kye| byis pa dag /
387a7(mdo sde): bu yul 'khor skyong slongs shig ces byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi grogs po rnams yul 'khor skyong ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ khyim
387b1(mdo sde): bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /des/ bu yul 'khor skyong / shes par gyis shig /khyod ni skyid de bar 'dug 'dug pa bde ba 'dod pa yin te/ khyod
387b2(mdo sde): ni sdug ma myong ba yin la/ tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad par dka'o/ /dben par gnas pa ni dka'o/ /gcig pur 'dug pa ni dga' bar bya dka'o/ /dgon pa dang / nags
387b3(mdo sde): khung dang bas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas bca' bar ni yid la bsam par yang dka'i/ des pa yul 'khor skyong khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la 'dod pa rnams kyang longs
387b4(mdo sde): spyod par gyis shig / sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig /bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig /ces de skad byas nas yang khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi zer ro/ /de nas
387b5(mdo sde): khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi grogs po rnams yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma
387b6(mdo sde): gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab yum gnyis mkhyen par mdzod cig /des pa yul 'khor skyong gum na ci rung gi /yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med
387b7(mdo sde): par rab tu 'byung du stsol cig dang / gal te rab tu byung ba la dga' bar gyur na ni/ gson por mchis na ni khyod kyis gzigs par 'gyur grang / gal te dga' bar ma
388a1(mdo sde): gyur na ni/ bu 'gro ba'i sa pha ma ma gtogs pa gzhan ma mchis so/ /pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/ byis pa dag /gal te bu yul 'khor skyong rab
388a2(mdo sde): tu byung ba'i 'og tu ngad dang 'phrad du 'ong na ni de bzhin du gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi grogs po rnams khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong ga
388a3(mdo sde): la ba der song ste lhags nas/ yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /des pa yul 'khor skyong khyod rab tu 'byung bar ni pha ma gnyis kyis gnang mod kyi/ gal te rab
388a4(mdo sde): tu byung ba'i 'og tu phrad du 'ong ba na gdod gnang ngo / /zhes zer ro/ /yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa/ kye/ phrad par bgyi'o/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong khad kyis
388a5(mdo sde): lus kyi mthu dang stobs bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug
388a6(mdo sde): go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni pha mas gnang lags
388a7(mdo sde): na bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob tu rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi
388b1(mdo sde): thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /zhes gsol nas rigs kyi bu yul 'khor skyong gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen
388b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/ /de de ltar rab tu byung nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo
388b3(mdo sde): 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad
388b4(mdo sde): chod de/ nyon mongs thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas /
388b5(mdo sde): gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs
388b6(mdo sde): bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye
388b7(mdo sde): dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyi mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
389a1(mdo sde): dag / nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi mchog ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong yul 'khor skyong 'di yin no/ /de nas dge slong dag
389a2(mdo sde): the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ yul 'khor skyong gis las gang dag bgyis na des phyug po'i
389a3(mdo sde): rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das
389a4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /yul 'khor skyong nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du
389a5(mdo sde): 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ yul 'khor skyong nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis
389a6(mdo sde): nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang /
389a7(mdo sde): mi'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa de rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams
389b1(mdo sde): dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//
389b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa pha rol gyi dmag
389b3(mdo sde): tshogs byung ste/ ci bya gtol med nas nags khung du zhugs te/ de nyi ma'i gung la nyi ma'i 'od zer tsha bas gdungs nas dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te phan tshun 'khor
389b4(mdo sde): 'khor nas lam yang ma rnyed do/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal
389b5(mdo sde): gyi 'tsho ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ re zhig na rang sangs rgyas shig dgon pa'i lam de na gnas pa des snying rje bskyed nas/
389b6(mdo sde): lus 'phags kyi rgyal po de la lam yang bstan/ chu'i lteng ka'ang bstan nas/ des rgyal po de 'khor dang bcas pa'i srog phangs pa bskyangs so/ /de nas rgyal po de dad
389b7(mdo sde): pa skyes nas/ rang gi grong khyer du khrid de zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'ang de'i sku gdung gi
390a1(mdo sde): mchod rten brtsigs nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na
390a2(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig / 'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes
390a3(mdo sde): par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin
390a4(mdo sde): pa de ni yul 'khor skyong 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag /yul 'khor skyong gis ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags pa te/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye
390a5(mdo sde): dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
390a6(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung
390a7(mdo sde): ste| de grong khyer wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe grong khyer wA ra NA si na rgyal po kri krI rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la
390b1(mdo sde): 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang /
390b2(mdo sde): chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal
390b3(mdo sde): po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/ /de nas de'i bu tha chung drang srong smra bar song ba dang / de des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
390b4(mdo sde): gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin
390b5(mdo sde): po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to/ /dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das
390b6(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de la chos bstan
390b7(mdo sde): te| de dad pa skyes pas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas te skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ /yongs
391a1(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang mchod rten la gdugs bu chung btags so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal
391a2(mdo sde): po'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyong 'di nyid yin no/ /yul 'khor skyong gis ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba
391a3(mdo sde): ' das pa'i dus na grong khyer wA ra NA si na bram ze las su rtsa ba rko ba zhig gnas pa de ri zhig la rtsa ba rkor song ste nags khrod du 'khor 'khor ba las des der rang sangs
391a4(mdo sde): rgyas nad pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas de dad pa skyes te/ de la bsnyen bkur byas nas gang gi tshe nad sos pa de'i tshe'ang bshos gsol te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis
391a5(mdo sde): kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig / 'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur
391a6(mdo sde): cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rtsa ba rko pa'i bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yul
391a7(mdo sde): 'khor skyong 'di nyid yin te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas 'khor ba na nam yang sdug bsngal myong bar ma gyur la/ da ltar yang rgyal po'i rigs phyug por skyes te /
391b1(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to/ /rgyu de kho nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag
391b2(mdo sde): pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar
391b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dres mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las
391b4(mdo sde): 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
391b5(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa
391b6(mdo sde): brgya pa las/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa rdzogs so// //sdom ni/ rab 'byor dang ni rgan po dang / /lag pa can dang 'de gus gsos/ /'khor ba
391b7(mdo sde): dang ni sped pa dang / /mi sdug pa dang gang+gA pa/ /sen ring dang ni yang dag sdug /sde tshan dag tu bstan pa yin/ /rab 'byor zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
392a1(mdo sde): la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang /
392a2(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams
392a3(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
392a4(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang /
392a5(mdo sde): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu
392a6(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
392a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ljongs so sor 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir nyan thos rnams bskos pa de'i tshe/
392b1(mdo sde): bsam gtan pa gang yin pa de dag ni ri rab kyi bang rim la bsam gtan lhur byed cing 'khod do/ /de nas re zhig na bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzang gis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas klu'i
392b2(mdo sde): phru gu zhig blangs te/ des de ri rab kyi bang rim gyi steng du phyung nas bza' bar brtsams so/ /de nas klu'i phru gu de 'chi ba'i tshe nyan thos chen po rnams la sems dga' bar
392b3(mdo sde): byas te shi'o/ /de nas de shi nas mnyan du yod par bram ze 'byor ba zhes bya ba de'i chung ma chen mo'i ltor zhugs nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u
392b4(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u de'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do//
392b5(mdo sde): nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di'i pha 'byor pa yin pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming rab 'byor ces gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u rab 'byor bskyed bsrings te cher skyes
392b6(mdo sde): nas de sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs dang / shugs kyis spro thung ba dang / khro ba dang / zhe gnag pa'i shas che bar gyur to/ /de nas pha ma gnyis kyis srid srung las phyung ste/ drang srong gi nang
392b7(mdo sde): du rab tu zhugs nas de'ang de na bsam gtan lhur byed par gyur te/ nags khrod gcig na rten cing 'dug go /nags khrod de na lha bden pa mthong ba zhig kyang gnas te /
393a1(mdo sde): des de la snying rje bskyed nas rigs kyi bu 'di ni khro ba dang / zhe gnag pa'i shas che bas khyad par thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis 'di bcom
393a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la bltar gzhug go snyam mo/ /de nas lha des rab 'byor gyi mdun du sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do/ /de nas rab 'byor
393a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i 'dod pa bskyed nas lha de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du khrid do/ /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku
393a4(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong
393a5(mdo sde): pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de sems can rnams la zhe non pa'i sems gang yin pa
393a6(mdo sde): de med par gyur to/ /de nas dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas
393a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de
393b1(mdo sde): lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas rigs kyi bu rab 'byor gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
393b2(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong nas de bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas byams pa bsgoms pas
393b3(mdo sde): sems btul nas/ phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par
393b4(mdo sde): 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams
393b5(mdo sde): gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur
393b6(mdo sde): bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang /
393b7(mdo sde): bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
394a1(mdo sde): gyis gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis skyes pa bsams pa dang / des tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du klu las
394a2(mdo sde): shi 'phos te klu 'ba' zhig tu skyes par mthong ngo / /de nas de'i blo skyes pa/ bdag gis 'di ltar zhe sdang gi rkyen bsgrubs pa des na bdag tshe rabs lnga brgyar klu 'ba'
394a3(mdo sde): zhig tu skyes te/ de kho na'i phyir sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur gyi/ da ni ci nas bdag la gzhan dag gis zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur zhing de dang ldan pas lus dang
394a4(mdo sde): bral ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nyon mongs pa med pa

394a6(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe/ thog ma kho nar spyod yul la lta bar 'dod de/ bdag mthong na tha na grog sbur yan chad su yang sna 'ga' zhig gi phyir sems sdang bar mi 'gyur grang snyam
394a7(mdo sde): nas des spyod lam de btang te/ gzhan du bsgyur nas/ das sems can de dag gi sems dga' bar gyur te/ de dgra bcom pa nyid yin du zin kyang de lta bu'i nyam nga ba
394b1(mdo sde): myong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi blo skyes pa/ ma la/ bdag gi da ni skye bo mang po la phan gdags so snyam mo/ /de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' lding lnga brgya
394b2(mdo sde): sprul te/ de dag mthong nas klu rnams skrag cing dngangs te mi dga' nas phan tshun du ci bya gtol med par gyur to/ /de nas rab 'byor gyis yang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yongs
394b3(mdo sde): su bskyabs so/ /de nas de dag sems dga' bar gyur nas/ byams pa'i lung phog go /de nas yang klu chen po'i gzugs su sprul nas nam mkha' lding lnga brgya gtses
394b4(mdo sde): te| de dag kyang skrag nas byams pa'i lung phog nas/ des de ltar klu dang nam mkha' lding gi rigs lnga brgya lnga brgya btul to/ /de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge

395a3(mdo sde): shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par
