401a4(mdo sde): ldan pa gnas brtan rgan po/ dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang / shing drung na gnas pa dang / khang stong na gnas pas chos gang dag rgyun mi 'chad par yid la bya/ tshe dang ldan pa
401a5(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang / shing drung na gnas pa dang / khang stong na gnas pas chos gnyis rgyun mi 'chad par yid la bya ste/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong
401a6(mdo sde): ngo| |gnas brtan/ zhi gnas kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas pas don gang dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ lhag mthong kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas
401a7(mdo sde): don gang nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ zhi gnas kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas ni lhag mthong la brten te rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /
401b1(mdo sde): lhag mthong kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas ni zhi gnas la brten te rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong yongs su bsgoms
401b2(mdo sde): pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa'i sems ni/ khams kyi sgo nas rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gnas brtan/ khams rnams gang dag yin/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ spong
401b3(mdo sde): ba'i khams gang yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams gang yin pa dang / 'gog pa'i khams gang yin pa'o/ /gnas brtan/ gang spangs pa la spongs pa'i khams zhes bya/ gang las
401b4(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams zhes bya/ gang 'gags pa la 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ 'du byed thams cad spangs pa la
401b5(mdo sde): spong ba'i khams zhes bya'o/ /'du byed thams cad las 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams zhes bya'o/ /'du byed thams cad 'gag pa la 'gog pa'i khams
401b6(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ gnas brtan rgan pos bshad pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas dge slong lnga brgya po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge
401b7(mdo sde): slong lnga brgya po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang / shing drung na gnas pa dang / khang stong na gnas pas chos gang dag rgyun mi
402a1(mdo sde): 'chad par yid la bya/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang / shing drung na gnas pa dang / khang stong na gnas pas chos gnyis
402a2(mdo sde): rgyun mi 'chad par yid la bya ste/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ zhi gnas kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas pas don gang nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ lhag
402a3(mdo sde): mthong kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas/ don gang nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ zhi gnas kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas ni
402a4(mdo sde): lhag mthong la brten te rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lhag mthong kun tu bsten cing mang du byas pas ni zhi gnas la brten te rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
402a5(mdo sde): bo| zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong yongs su bsgoms pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa'i sems ni khams kyi sgo nas rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa
402a6(mdo sde): dag/ khams rnams gang dag yin/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ spong ba'i khams gang yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams gang yin pa dang / 'gog pa'i khams
402a7(mdo sde): gang yin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /gang spangs pa la spong ba'i khams zhes bya/ gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams zhes bya/ gang 'gags
402b1(mdo sde): pa la 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ 'du byed thams cad spangs pa la spong ba'i khams zhes bya'o/ /'du byed thams cad las 'dod chags dang bral ba la
402b2(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams zhes bya'o/ /'du byed thams cad 'gags pa la 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ dge slong lnga brgya po rnams
402b3(mdo sde): kyis bshad pa la mngon par bstod de/ rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs
402b4(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang / shing drung
402b5(mdo sde): na gnas pa dang / khang stong na gnas pas chos gang dag rgyun mi 'chad par yid la bgyi/ kun dga' bo/ dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang / shing drung na gnas pa dang / khang stong na
402b6(mdo sde): gnas pas chos gnyis rgyun mi 'chad par yid la bya ste/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ngo / /btsun pa/ zhi gnas kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas/ don gang nyams su
402b7(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur lags/ lhag mthong kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas don gang nyams su myong bar 'gyur lags/ kun dga' bo/ zhi gnas kun tu bsten cing bsgoms
403a1(mdo sde): te mang du byas pas ni lhag mthong la bsten te rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lhag mthong kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas ni zhi gnas la
403a2(mdo sde): brten te rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ /zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong yongs su bsgoms pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa'i sems ni khams kyi
403a3(mdo sde): sgo nas rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ khams rnams gang dag lags/ kun dga' bo/ spong ba'i khams gang yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams gang yin
403a4(mdo sde): pa dang / 'gog pa'i khams gang yin pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gang spangs pa la spong ba'i khams zhes bgyi/ gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams
403a5(mdo sde): zhes bgyi/ gang 'gags pa la 'gog pa'i khams zhes bgyi/ kun dga' bo/ 'du byed thams cad spangs pa la spong ba'i khams zhes bya'o/ /'du byed thams cad las 'dod
403a6(mdo sde): chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams zhes bya'o/ /'du byed thams cad 'gags pa la 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ ston pa dang nyan thos
403a7(mdo sde): rnams 'di lta ste/ tshig gi mchog gis 'di kho na ltar don dang / don du mthun zhing 'dra ba dang / tshig dang / tshig tu mthun zhing 'dra ba dang / yi ge dang / yi ge mthun zhing 'dra
403b1(mdo sde): ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa/ 'dir bdag gnas brtan dge slong rgan bo ga la ba der mchis nas gnas brtan rgan po la don 'di nyid tshig 'di rnams dang /
403b2(mdo sde): yi ge 'di rnams kyis smras na'ang de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa kho na bzhin du des bdag la don 'di nyid tshig 'di rnams dang yi ge 'di rnams kyis smras
403b3(mdo sde): pa'i lan btab la/ bdag gnas brtan dge slong rgan pos bshad pa la mngon par bstod de/ rjes su yi rangs nas dge slong lnga brgya po rnams ga la ba der mchis te/ dge slong
403b4(mdo sde): lnga brgya po rnams la don 'di nyid tshig 'di rnams dang / yi ge 'di rnams kyis smras na'ang da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa kho na bzhin du de dag gis kyang
403b5(mdo sde): bdag la don 'di nyid tshig 'di rnams dang / yi ge 'di rnams kyis smras pa'i lan btab ste/ btsun pa/ ston pa dang / nyan thos rnams/ 'di lta ste/ tshig gi mchog gis 'di kho na
403b6(mdo sde): ltar don dang / don du mthun zhing 'dra ba dang / tshig dang / tshig tu mthun zhing 'dra ba dang / yi ge dang / yi ger mthun zhing 'dra ba de ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
403b7(mdo sde): pa| kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis dge slong rgan po su yin shes sam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa dge slong rgan po ni dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor
404a1(mdo sde): ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba lags so/ /dge
404a2(mdo sde): slong lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su
404a3(mdo sde): zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag lags so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rgan po dang /
404a4(mdo sde): dge slong lnga brgya po de dag glengs shing bsgrags pa de'i tshe/ dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ rgan
404a5(mdo sde): pos las gang dag bgyis na/ des lo drug cu'i bar du ma'i lto na mchis par gyur lags/ btsun pa/ las gang dag bgyis na/ des yid rtul bar gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom
404a6(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rgan po nyid kyi sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba'
404a7(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rgan po nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar
404b1(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin
404b2(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las
404b3(mdo sde): rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di
404b4(mdo sde): nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen
404b5(mdo sde): pa| skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ grong khyer wA ra NA si na drang srong
404b6(mdo sde): smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig gnas brtan zhig las rab tu byung ngo / /gnas brtan de ni dgra bcom pa 'dod chags spangs pa zhig go /de nas
404b7(mdo sde): re zhig na yul der dus ston zhig byung nas/ dge slong gzhon nu des gnas brtan de bslangs te bzhengs la spyod yul gyi grong du bzhud do zhes byas so/ /gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ bu| da dung
405a1(mdo sde): sngas kyi/ re zhig song la dge ba'i phyogs kyis shig /lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du dge slong gzhon nu des gnas brtan de bslang ste/ bzhengs pa spyod yul
405a2(mdo sde): gyi grong du bzhud ces byas na/ yang lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du gnas brtan gyis/ bu/ da dung sngas kyi song la dge ba'i phyogs kyis shig ces byas so/ /de nas dge slong gzhon nu
405a3(mdo sde): lto 'dun can des ngag gi las rtsub po smras te/ khyed lo drug cu'i bar du'ang khyim nas ma byung zhig /nga ni song zin no zhes byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/
405a4(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong gzhon nur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong rgan po 'di yin te/ des dgra bcom pa la sems sdang bar byas nas ngag gi las rtsub po smras
405a5(mdo sde): pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni lo drug cu'i bar du ma'i lto na 'dug go / gzhan yang / chos la ser sna byas pa des ni shes rab 'chal bar gyur te/ dbang po rnams tshegs chen pos yongs
405a6(mdo sde): su smin par gyur to/ /des der bslab pa dang / kha ton byas pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas
405a7(mdo sde): pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni da ltar nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//
405b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag /de bas na ngag gi nyes pa spang ba'i phyir 'bad par bya ste/ ci nas rgan po de so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i tshe nyes pa de lta bu dag mi 'byung bar bya'o/ /de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i
405b2(mdo sde): yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan
405b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //lag pa can zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams
405b4(mdo sde): dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams
405b5(mdo sde): dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
405b6(mdo sde): mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan
405b7(mdo sde): dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos rnams kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
406a1(mdo sde): rab na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor
406a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing
406a3(mdo sde): dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mdog bzang ba gser
406a4(mdo sde): gyi kha dog can/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas des rang gi lag pa bzung ste 'o byed cing mthang la 'jor bar
406a5(mdo sde): byed la 'khyud par byed de/ tshig tu smras pa/ kye ma/ bdag gi lag gu gnyis shin tu yun ring mo zhig nas gdod rnyed do/ /kye ma/ bdag gi lag gu gnyis shin tu yun ring mo zhig nas
406a6(mdo sde): gdod rnyed do zhes zer ro/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /nye du rnams na re/ 'di btsas ma thag tu lag
406a7(mdo sde): pa bzung ste 'o byed cing mthang la 'jor la 'khyud par byed pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming lag pa can zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u lag pa can pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis
406b1(mdo sde): dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang /
406b2(mdo sde): mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe yul der 'jigs pa
406b3(mdo sde): zhig byung ba de'i tshe skye ba'i tshogs 'jigs par gyur te/ phan tshun du ci bya gtol med nas rdzas rnams sbed par byed do/ /khye'u lag pa can ni lag pa gnyis sbed par byed de/ skye
406b4(mdo sde): bo'i tshogs la'ang 'di skad du/ kye/ yon gnas rnams la sems sdang bar ma byed cig /tshig rtsub bo ma zer cig /kye/ bdag gi lag gu gnyis shin tu ring mo zhig nas gdod
406b5(mdo sde): rnyed do zhes zer ro/ /de nas phyi zhig na khye'u lag pa can rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
406b6(mdo sde): gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i
406b7(mdo sde): ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de sa bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar byas te/ dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
407a1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang /
407a2(mdo sde): khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lag pa can gyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
407a3(mdo sde): ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
407a4(mdo sde): pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams
407a5(mdo sde): cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
407a6(mdo sde): du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan
407a7(mdo sde): dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags
407b1(mdo sde): pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de dgra bcom pa nyid thob
407b2(mdo sde): par gyur kyang de bzhin du dge slong rnams la chos ston te/ kye|yon gnas rnams la sems sdang bar ma gyur cig /tshig rtsub po ma zer cig /kye ma/ bdag gi lag gu
407b3(mdo sde): gnyis yun ring mo zhig nas gdod rnyed do zhes zer ro/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
407b4(mdo sde): btsun pa/ lag pa can gyis las gang dag bgyis shing bsags na des dgra bcom pa nyid thob lags na'ang de bzhin du/ kye ma/ bdag gi lag gu gnyis shin tu yun
407b5(mdo sde): ring mo zhig nas gdod rnyed do zhes mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /gang zag 'di ni las kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du mthong ba
407b6(mdo sde): yin no/ /des ci las bsams te de skad zer bar khyed nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa/ nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /dge slong dag /lag pa can nyid kyis sngon che rabs
407b7(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ lag pa can
408a1(mdo sde): nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa
408a2(mdo sde): rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge
408a3(mdo sde): ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi
408a4(mdo sde): las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi zad/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/
408a5(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan
408a6(mdo sde): pa| bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul pa'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung
408a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /re zhig na de na dge slong gnyis shig mdza' zhing 'dug ste/
408b1(mdo sde): de'i nang na gcig ni dgra bcom pa'ang yin la mang du thos pa'ang yin no/ /gcig shos ni so so'i skye bo'ang yin la thos pa'ang nyung ngo / /de la dgra bcom pa mang du thos pa de ni kun
408b2(mdo sde): gyi shes pa bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams rnyed pa g.yar 'dren pa mang du rnyed pa zhig ste/ gang du g.yar drangs pa
408b3(mdo sde): der des dge slong mdza' bo de phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du khrid do/ /re zhig na nyi ma gcig cig dgra bcom pa de g.yar drangs te/ 'gro bar chad pa las phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong
408b4(mdo sde): de btsal na ma rnyed do/ /de nas de mi snang nas des dge slong gzhan zhig khrid pa dang / re zhig na dge slong gzhon nu sems dgod pa dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa dag /
408b5(mdo sde): gzigs dang / des phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong 'di 'ang deng ma khrid de gzhan khrid do zhes byas so/ /des na de khros te dgra bcom pa la sems sdang bar byas nas ngag gi las
408b6(mdo sde): rtsub po smras te/ bdag gis phyin chad de'i lhung bzed bkrus su zin na/ bdag gi lag pa 'di gnyis med par gyur ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /
408b7(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong mdza' bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni lag pa can yin te/ des dgra bcom pa la sems sdang bar byas te/ ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa des tshe
409a1(mdo sde): rabs lnga brgyar lag pa med par gyur to/ /phyis snying nas 'gyod pa skyes te nyes pa la nyes so zhes mthol zhing bshags te/ rnam par phye zhing gsal bar byas pa
409a2(mdo sde): des ni lag pa thob par gyur to/ /des der bslangs pa dang / kha ton du byas pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung
409a3(mdo sde): ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag
409a4(mdo sde): pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /
409a5(mdo sde): las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dres mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la /
409a6(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge
409a7(mdo sde): slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //'de gus gsos zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /
409b1(mdo sde): blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma
409b2(mdo sde): yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
409b3(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang /
409b4(mdo sde): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim
409b5(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam
409b6(mdo sde): thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing
409b7(mdo sde): dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u mdog ngan pa/ blta na mi sdug pa/ byad ngan po zhig btsas te/ de btsas ma thag
410a1(mdo sde): tu de'i ma'i nu ma gnyis la 'o ma med par gyur to/ /re zhig na bram ze des de'i ma ma gzhan zhig bkug na de'i 'o ma 'ang khye'u de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas med par
410a2(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe de'i phyir 'o ma 'byung ba'i thabs sbyar ba thams cad las kyang 'o ma mi 'byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe 'de gus gsos nas de'i ming 'de gus gsos/ 'de gus gsos
410a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btags so/ /de bsod nams chung bar grags shing bsod nams chung ba zhig ste/ gang gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe lto gang yang mi rnyed do/ /de nas des dge slong sham thabs legs par
410a4(mdo sde): gyon la gos legs par bgos pa dag lhung bzed bung ba'i mdog lta bur gnag pa thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la 'gro la/ de dag kyang lag pa'ang bkang lhung bzed kyang
410a5(mdo sde): bkang ste/ phyir 'byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyur nas de pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de
410a6(mdo sde): rab tu byung yang lto gang yang mi rnyed nas de skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par
410a7(mdo sde): rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom
410b1(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan
410b2(mdo sde): pa| tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa
410b3(mdo sde): dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas phyis re zhig na bcom
410b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang phyag pa la zhugs te/ des de phyags nas sham thabs dang / chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo / /
410b5(mdo sde): de nas des bsod snyoms bzang po mang po dag rnyed de/ des de'i dbang po rnams dang / 'byung ba chen po rnams tshim par gyur to/ /de nas de dbang po tshim par gyur nas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar
410b6(mdo sde): pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis mtshan rangs pa 'das par byas so/ /de nas de'i blo skyes pa/ ma la/ thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig gi /bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la gsol ba gdab
410b7(mdo sde): bo snyam mo/ /de nas des dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la gsol ba btab pa/ btsun pa/ bdag ni bsod nams chung ste/ gang gi tshe dri gtsang khang du phyag dar bgyis nas bsod
411a1(mdo sde): snyoms la mchis pa de'i tshe/ gdod 'drangs par gyur te/ de bas na bdag la dge 'dun gyi thugs brtse bar mdzod la gzhan sus kyang dri gtsang khang du phyag dar
411a2(mdo sde): mi mdzad par gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang du sus kyang phyag dar mi bya'o zhes dge 'dun gyi khrims bcas nas des bag yangs su dri gtsang khang
411a3(mdo sde): phyags pa'i 'og tu mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la 'gro bar byed do/ /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang 'khor lnga brgya dang / rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du dbyar gnas par
411a4(mdo sde): dam bcas nas/ mnyan du yod par lhags te/ ston pa la gus pa skyes nas/ dri gtsang khang du phyag dar byas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'de gus gsos kyis tshor nas des smras
411a5(mdo sde): pa| gnas brtan khyod kyis dri gtsang khang du phyag dar byas pa ni bdag gi ltor bsnun par bas so/ /gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ ci nyes/ 'de gus gsos kyis smras pa/ gnas
411a6(mdo sde): brtan gang gi tshe bdag gi dri gtsang khang du phyag dar ma byas pa de'i tshe bdag gis bsod snyoms mi rnyed do/ /de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus smras pa/ gal te de ltar na bdag ga zhig
411a7(mdo sde): tu g.yar drangs kyi/ khyod snying ma chung zhig dang / bdag gis der khyod la kha zas sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa'i spyan 'dren 'ongs nas
411b1(mdo sde): 'de gus gsos kyang de dang lhan cig tu chas so/ /de nas gang gi tshe khyim bdag de'i sgo dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa de'i tshe/ 'de gus gsos kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas khyim der 'thab
411b2(mdo sde): mo chen po byung ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'de gus gsos 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag bsod nams chung ba'i phyir 'thab mo byung ngo snyam mo/ /de nas phyir log ste gtsug lag khang
411b3(mdo sde): du song nas smyung bar 'dug go/ de nas phyi de nyin par tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ khyod ci'i phyir ma 'ongs/ des smras pa/ bdag bsod nams chung ba'i phyir 'thab mo ji
411b4(mdo sde): ltar byung ba gnas brtan gyis mi mkhyen tam/ de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus de'i nyin par mdun du bcug ste/ khyim de'i nang du song nas dge 'dun gyi khrod du 'dug na yang
411b5(mdo sde): g.yas g.yon ni kha zas brims la/ de la ni 'drim pa'i mis kyang brjed nas de dge 'dun gyi khrod de kho nar lan gnyis su smyung bar gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na gtam de gnas brtan
411b6(mdo sde): kun dga' bos thos so/ /thos nas kyang 'de gus gsos la smras pa/ 'o na/ khyod rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di nyid du 'dug cig dang / /bdag gis khyod kyi zas khyer te 'ong ngo / /
411b7(mdo sde): zhes byas so/ /gnas brtan kun dga' bo ni bcom ldan 'das las chos kyi phung po brgyad khri lobs pa dang / dge slong gzhan dag las nyi khri lobs pa de lta bu'i dran pa dang ldan pa
412a1(mdo sde): yin na/ 'de gus gsos kyi las kyi sgrib pas/ gnas brtan kun dga' bos kyang brjed par gyur to/ /der yang de lan gsum smyung bar gyur to/ /de nas
412a2(mdo sde): zhag bzhi lon pa'i tshe/ gnas brtan kun dga' bos bsgrims te bsod snyoms byin na/ de yang phyir 'gro ba'i tshe khyi rnams kyis 'phrogs te/ der yang de lan bzhi smyung bar gyur
412a3(mdo sde): to| |de nas zhag lnga lon pa'i tshe/ gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos thos nas/ 'de gus gsos kyi phyir bsod snyoms blangs nas rdzu 'phrul gyis chas pa dang / 'de gus gsos
412a4(mdo sde): kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gis 'dab lcag gis bsnun nas rgya mtsho'i nang du bor te der yang lan lnga smyung bar gyur to/ /de nas zhag drug lon pa'i tshe
412a5(mdo sde): gnas brtan shA ri'i bus thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la/ bdag kho nas 'de gus gsos kyi bsod snyoms blangs gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus
412a6(mdo sde): de'i bsod snyoms blangs nas khyim de nyid du mi snang bar byas te/ 'de gus gsos kyi gnas khang gi sgor 'ongs so/ /de na 'de gus gsos kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas sgo de yang
412a7(mdo sde): brag gis 'khor bar gyur to/ /de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus rdzu 'phrul gyi sgo dbye'o snyam nas lhung bzed des la bzhag pa dang / de yang 'de gus gsos kyi las kyi rnam par
412b1(mdo sde): smin pas thur du dpag tshad brgyad khri'i 'og na gser gyis gzhi yod pa'i steng du song nas de las kyang gnas brtan shA ri'i bus rdzu 'phrul gyis phyung nas zas de khar gzhug go snyam ste/ zas de
412b2(mdo sde): khar bcug na de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas kha de med par phyi la bor bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'de gus gsos la skal ba med par shes nas skyo bar gyur te/ der yang btsun
412b3(mdo sde): pa de lan drug smyung bar gyur to/ /de nas zhag bdun lon pa'i nyin par tshe dang ldan pa 'de gus gsos kyis sems can rnams skyo ba bskyed pa dang / las rnams chud mi za par bstan pa dang /
412b4(mdo sde): las kyi stobs gleng ba'i phyir lhung bzed thal bas bkang ste/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas chu dang bskyos te 'thungs nas phung po'i lhag ma med
412b5(mdo sde): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas skyo bar gyur te/ de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas so/ /de nas dge slong
412b6(mdo sde): dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ 'de gus gsos kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ der dgra bcom pa nyid thob
412b7(mdo sde): par gyur kyang zhag drug smyung bar gyur nas/ zhag bdun pa'i gdugs la phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
413a1(mdo sde): stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'de gus gsos nyid kyi sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la
413a2(mdo sde): gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags na/ 'de gus gsos nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge
413a3(mdo sde): slong dag/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par
413a4(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus
413a5(mdo sde): can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
413a6(mdo sde): na| grong khyer wA ra Na si na khyim bdag gcig gi chung ma dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig 'dug pa de rgyun mi 'chad par dge slong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa
413a7(mdo sde): dang / sdug cing phongs pa dang / slong pa rnams la sbyin pa dag byed do/ /phyis de'i khyim thab shi nas re zhig na de'i bu bdag gi khyim gyi bdag por gyur to/ /de yang ser sna can 'jungs
413b1(mdo sde): pa| yo byad la kun tu 'dzin pa/ khwa la yang gtor ma mi ster ba zhig ste/ de dge slong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa dang / slong ba rnams mthong na sems sdang bar
413b2(mdo sde): byed do/ /de'i ma ni sngon gyi lugs bzhin du dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa dang / slong ba rnams la sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed do/ /de
413b3(mdo sde): nas de'i bu ser snas non pa des smras pa/ yum/ bdag ma dad kyi sbyin pa ma byin cig/ des smras pa/ bu gcig/ khyim 'di na khyim gyi lugs kyis de yin no/ /de nas de logs shig tu
413b4(mdo sde): zan phog ste bzhag na 'on kyang de zan gyi phyed ni sbyin par byed do/ /phyed ni bdag nyid za'o/ /de nas ser snas non cing khro bas bsgribs pa'i blo can des yang dang yang du bkag ste/ thabs ji
413b5(mdo sde): lta bus bkag kyang de dgags ma nus nas/ ma la smras pa/ yum/ bgyi ba zhig mchis kyi khyim gyi phug tu bzhud cig /de nas rang bzhin gyis drang ba de khyim gyi phug tu song ngo / /de
413b6(mdo sde): nas des sgo bcad de nyi ma gcig zan gcad nas/ des smras pa/ bu/ bdag bkres so/ /de nas de tshig rtsub po smras te thal ba 'gom zhig ces smras so/ /de nas re zhig na nyam nga zhing mi
413b7(mdo sde): bde la gnod pa dang phrad pa des snying rje rje skad du khus btab kyang zhag drug gi bar du smyung du bcug ste/ ma btang nas shi'o/ /'on kyang ser snas bsgribs pa de ma dang bral ba la 'gyod
414a1(mdo sde): pa med do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gi bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'di
414a2(mdo sde): gus gsos 'di yin te/ des ma la gnod pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas bskal ba gcig gi bar du sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/ /rgyu de kho nas da
414a3(mdo sde): ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas kyang smyung bar gyur te/ thal ba zos nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /dge slong dag /'de gus gsos kyis las gzhan dag kyang
414a4(mdo sde): byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer wA ra NA si na bram ze lha la rten pa wA ra Na si na gnas pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / skye bo
414a5(mdo sde): thams cad kun tu bkur sti bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing bkur ba zhig yod de/ chos nyid kyis na sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung
414a6(mdo sde): ba'i tshe/ rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
414a7(mdo sde): ste| re zhig na rang sangs rgyas gcig wA ra NA sir bsod snyoms la song ba dang / de der lag pa yang bkang / lhung bzed kyang bkang ste/ phyir byung ba bram ze des mthong nas/ de
414b1(mdo sde): ser sna skyes te lhung bzed blta yi/ tshur khyer shog ces byas so/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma bsam par shes pa mi 'jug ste/ btsun pa des bstan to/ /de nas des sa la pho
414b2(mdo sde): nas rkang pas bsnun to/ /de nas rang sangs rgyas de smyung bar 'dug kyang bram ze de 'gyod pa ma skyes so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa
414b3(mdo sde): de ni 'de gus gsos 'di yin no/ /gzhan yang / bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung ste/ des der tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid
414b4(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par
414b5(mdo sde): dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig
414b6(mdo sde): tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong / khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//
414b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'khor ba zhes bya ba ni/
415a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang /
415a2(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po
415a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye
415a4(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun
415a5(mdo sde): gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
415a6(mdo sde): ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/
415a7(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga'
415b1(mdo sde): la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams
415b2(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas te/ de btsas ma thag tu khyim gyi mi rnams la bltas nas tshig tu smras pa/ kye ma/ 'khor ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/ /'khor ba ni mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'o zhes
415b3(mdo sde): smras nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di btsas ma thag tu 'khor
415b4(mdo sde): 'khor ba zhes sgrogs bas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming 'khor ba zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u 'khor ba pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis
415b5(mdo sde): dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang /
415b6(mdo sde): gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings nas/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas de mthar gyi cher skyes pa dang / de rang bzhin gyis
415b7(mdo sde): tshe rabs dran pas skye bo'i tshogs la chos ston te/ kye/ bla ma rnams dang / bla ma lta bu rnams dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams la tshig rtsub po ma zer zhig /'khor
416a1(mdo sde): ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/ /'khor ba ni mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /de nas phyis re zhig na phan tshun du 'khyam du song song ba las rgyal bu rgyal byed
416a2(mdo sde): kyi tshal du phyin nas/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od
416a3(mdo sde): 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das la sems
416a4(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur to/ /de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan
416a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos ston pa mdzad do/ de thos nas khye'u 'khor ba 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon
416a6(mdo sde): tan du lta bar gyur te/ pha ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i
416a7(mdo sde): 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par
416b1(mdo sde): rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar
416b2(mdo sde): mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes
416b3(mdo sde): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /
416b4(mdo sde): gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de dgra bcom par gyur kyang dge slong rnams la chos ston te/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bla ma rnams dang / bla ma lta bu rnams dang / pha ma dang / mkhan
416b5(mdo sde): po dang / slob dpon rnams la tshig rtsub po ma zer zhig/ 'khor ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/ /'khor ba ni mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the
416b6(mdo sde): tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ 'khor bas las gang dag bgyis na des tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du ma'i lto nas gum pa'i ro byung
416b7(mdo sde): la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'khor ba nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs
417a1(mdo sde): rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 'khor ba nyid kyis las
417a2(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par
417a3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam pa smin par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po
417a4(mdo sde): dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la
417a5(mdo sde): bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag / sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs
417a6(mdo sde): pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/
417a7(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA ra NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi
417b1(mdo sde): nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe grong khyer wA ra NA si na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig gnas brtan zhig las rab tu byung ngo / /gnas brtan de ni dgra bcom pa 'dod chags spangs pa zhig
417b2(mdo sde): go| de nas re zhig na yul der dus ston zhig byung ngo / /de nas dge slong gzhon nu des gnas brtan de bslang ste/ bzhengs la spyod yul gyi grong du bzhud do zhes byas so/ /gnas brtan gyis
417b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ bu da dung sngas kyi/ re zhig song la dge ba'i phyogs gyis shig /lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du dge slong gzhon nu des gnas brtan de bslang ste bzhengs la spyod yul gyi
417b4(mdo sde): grong du bzhud ces byas na lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du gnas brtan gyi bu da dung sngas kyi/ song la dge ba'i phyogs gyis shig ces byas so/ /de nas dge slong gzhon nu lto mdun
417b5(mdo sde): can des dag gi las rtsub po smras te/ khyod tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du yang gson por khyim nas phyir ma 'byung zhig/ nga ni song zin no zhes byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
417b6(mdo sde): pa| dge slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong gzhon nur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin no/ /des dgra bcom pa la sems sdang bar byas nas tshig rtsub po byas
417b7(mdo sde): pa'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs snga brgya'i bar du ma'i lto nas shi ba'i ro byung nas da ltar mir skyes te/ de dran nas 'khor ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/ /'khor ba ni mchog tu sdug bsngal
418a1(mdo sde): ba'o/ |zhes zer ba yin no/ /de 'gyod pa skyes te gnas brtan la nyes pa bshags pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom
418a2(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag/ de ltar na las gcig tu nges bar gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu
418a3(mdo sde): nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag/ de
418a4(mdo sde): bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong
418a5(mdo sde): dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
418a6(mdo sde): bstod do/ / //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa ste tha ma/ sbed pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
418a7(mdo sde): la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang /

418b2(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
418b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge
418b4(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rgya skegs kyi
418b5(mdo sde): rna ba can gyis spyan drangs te/ yul slob ma can gyi skye bo 'dul bar bya ba rnams dad par mdzad pa de'i tshe/ yul slob ma can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad sangs rgyas la
418b6(mdo sde): gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab ste 'khod do/ /de'i tshe yul slob ma can na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/
418b7(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga'
419a1(mdo sde): mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u zhig
419a2(mdo sde): btsas nas btsas ma thag tu de'i lus thams cad phol mig gis zhu lu ba tu khyab par 'dug ste/ gang gi tshe phol mig de dag rdol ba de'i tshe/ sha snag bu phyil por gyur te/
419a3(mdo sde): de'i lus las rnag khrag 'dzag cing dri shin tu mnam par 'byung ngo / /de nas de'i phas dbang phyug gi stobs kyi shugs kyis nor dang / sngags dang / sman dang / g.yog dang
419a4(mdo sde): ldan par bdag nyid kyis gsos na 'on kyang las kyi stobs kyis shugs thob pas nad de zhi bar ma gyur te/ lus thams cad de lta bur gyur nas ngo tsha ste/ gos kyis sbed par byed
419a5(mdo sde): pas na/ de'i ming sbed pa zhes btags so/ /de nas re zhig na khye'u sbed pa cher skyes nas de'i grogs po na zla rnams mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer slob ma can du dong dong ba de
419a6(mdo sde): dag gis de'i pha la smras pa/ yab/ gal te 'di mnyan du yod par khrid na ni de na sman pa dang / sman la sogs pa mchis te/ mod pas nad de las gso nus so zhes byas so//
419a7(mdo sde): de nas de'i phas tshig de mnyan nas rin po che mang po dang / g.yog rnams byin te mnyan du yod par btang nas de mthar gyis grogs po na zla rnams dang mnyan du yod par
419b1(mdo sde): phyin na/ de na sman pa dang / nor dang / sman dang / g.yog kyang mang du yod kyi de'i las las skyes pa'i nad de gso ma nus so/ /de nas phyis re zhig na de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song
419b2(mdo sde): nas/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom
419b3(mdo sde): gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang pa mthong nas mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar

419b5(mdo sde): bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas nye bar
419b6(mdo sde): len pa'i phung po lnga nad dang / phol mig dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal yin par rtogs te/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par rig nas/ bcom
419b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du
420a1(mdo sde): byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsod chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
420a2(mdo sde): spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ /gser dang / /bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang /

420a5(mdo sde): par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de'i grogs po na zla de dag kyang skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis rab tu byung nas/ de dag tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa
420a6(mdo sde): sbed pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa 'jig rten na 'jig pa'i chos can ni gang yin/ 'jig rten na 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa ni gang yin/ tshe dang ldan
420a7(mdo sde): pa dag gzugs ni 'jig pa'i chos can yin no/ /de 'gags pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
420b1(mdo sde): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni 'jig pa'i chos can yin no/ /de 'gags pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/
420b2(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rtag pa yin nam/ 'on te mi rtag pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa/ de ni mi rtag pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba yin
420b3(mdo sde): nam/ 'on te sdug bsngal ba ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa/ de ni sdug bsngal ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ ci mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / rnam par 'gyur ba'i
420b4(mdo sde): chos can gang yin pa de la thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi'o/ /'di ni bdag go/ 'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no/ /snyam du bdag tu
420b5(mdo sde): 'dzin par 'gyur ram/ tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
420b6(mdo sde): rtag pa yin nam/ 'on te mi rtag pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa/ de ni mi rtag pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba yin nam/ 'on te sdug bsngal
420b7(mdo sde): ba ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa/ de ni sdug bsngal ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ ci mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la thos
421a1(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi'o/ /'di ni bdag go/ 'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no snyam du bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur ram/ tshe dang
421a2(mdo sde): ldan pa sped pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ de bas na gzugs ci yang rung ba 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'am/ phyi rol lam/ nang ngam/ rags pa'am/ cha phra
421a3(mdo sde): ba'am/ ngan pa'am/ bzang po'am/ thag ring ba'am/ nye ba yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag gi ma yin no/ /'di ni bdag ma yin no/ /'di ni bdag gi bdag ma
421a4(mdo sde): yin no/ /snyam du de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ci yang rung ba dang / rnam par
421a5(mdo sde): shes pa ci yang rung ba 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'am/ nang ngam phyi rol lam/ rags pa'am/ cha phra ba'am/ ngan pa'am/ bzang po'am/ thag ring ba'am
421a6(mdo sde): nye ba yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag gi ma yin no/ /'di ni bdag ma yin no/ /'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no snyam du de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang
421a7(mdo sde): dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dang / de ltar ba lta ba'i thos pa dang ldan pa'i nyan thos ni gzugs las kyang skyo bar 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
421b1(mdo sde): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang skyo bar 'gyur te/ skyo nas 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol ba
421b2(mdo sde): na bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa spyad zin to/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so snyam du rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba kho nar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam
421b3(mdo sde): grangs 'di bshad pa na / grogs po na zla de rnams chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral bas rnam par dag go/ de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad
421b4(mdo sde): gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sbed pas las gang dag bgyis na/ des de'i lus 'di lta bur mi sdug cing nad mang la dri nga bar gyur lags/ las
421b5(mdo sde): gang dag bgyis na des blo rno zhing gsal bar gyur te/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sbed
421b6(mdo sde): pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sbed pa

428b6(mdo sde): phyir khang bzang gi steng du nyams rangs su bzhag ste/ grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang / tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i kha zas rnams

429a1(mdo sde): ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba med pa'i
429a2(mdo sde): zas rnams kyis bsten cing / do shal dang / se mo dos lus rnam par klubs te/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas/ khri'i steng dang / khri bu'i
429a3(mdo sde): steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang ma thos par byas so/ /de nas de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu
429a4(mdo sde): byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas/ de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ de'i
429a5(mdo sde): ming gang gA ba zhes btags so/ /de nas khye'u gang gA pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma
429a6(mdo sde): ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo
429a7(mdo sde): cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang nges par 'byed par cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan te/ khyim na gnas
429b1(mdo sde): par mi dga' nas pha ma gnyis kyi rkang pa la phyag btsal te gsol ba btab pa/ yab yum/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba gnang ba mdzad du gsol/ de nas
429b2(mdo sde): de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bu gcig pa yin pa'i phyir ma gnang ngo / /de nas gang gA ba'i blo skyes pa/ mir skye ba 'thob pa ni rnyed par dka' ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba yang
429b3(mdo sde): rnyed par dka' ba yin/ gzhan du na dbang po phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed par dka' ba yin na/ ma la/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar bya ba'i thabs
429b4(mdo sde): ci yod snyam mo/ /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la/ bdag gis smon lam btab la/ bdag 'chi bar byas te/ ci nas mir skye ba thob nas shin tu myur bar rab tu 'byung
429b5(mdo sde): bar bya'o snyam mo/ /des de ltar bsams nas dug 'thungs na yang ma shi'o/ /me'i nang du mchongs na yang ma shi/ brag la mchongs na yang ma shi/ chu klung zlog byed kyi nang du mchongs
429b6(mdo sde): na der yang ma shi nas/ de'i blo skyes pa/ bdag 'chi bar bya ba'i thabs gzhan ci yod snyam mo/ /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra de ni yong ye gtum
429b7(mdo sde): zhing brgyud la zhe rtsub cing gzu lum can zhig yin gyi/ bdag de'i pho brang du song la mtshan mo khyim phugs gdab bo snyam ste/ de rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du song nas nam sros
430a1(mdo sde): te smag la bab pa na khyim 'bigs shing 'dug go/ de nas srung ma rnams kyis gson por bzung nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra la phul te/ lha/ mi 'dis ni
430a2(mdo sde): rkun ma pho brang sun 'byin pa nongs pa bgyis lags te/ mtshan mo pho brang du khyim phugs btab lags so/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas rgyal pos nyes pa byed byed pa'i phyir gsad
430a3(mdo sde): par chad do/ /de nas gshed ma gos sngon po gyon pa/ ka ra wI ra'i me tog gi phreng ba mgul du thogs pa lag na mtshon cha thogs pa rnams kyis khrid de lam po che dang / srang
430a4(mdo sde): dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / bsgrags pa'i gnas rnams su 'o dod bos te/ grong khyer gyi lho sgo nas phyir byung ste/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du khrid do//
430a5(mdo sde): de khrid pa na gshed ma de dag la smras pa/ kye/ rgyal po'i bka' 'gyur na mi rung gi/ rings par rab tu drongs shig ces zer ro/ /de nas gshed ma de rnams kyis rgyal po la
430a6(mdo sde): gsol to/ /de na rgyal pos phyir bzlog te dris pa/ kwa'i mi khyod ci'i phyir srog phangs pa yongs su gtong bar 'dod/ de nas des gtam de rgyas par rgyal po la gsol te/ de
430a7(mdo sde): nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra ka dam pa'i me tog bzhin du spu zing zhes byas te/ mchi mas brnangs zhing du ba'i bzhin gyis/ kye ma/ 'di ltar 'di rab tu dbyung ba'i phyir srog phangs
430b1(mdo sde): pa gtong bar 'bad pa las na 'di'i blo'i rgyud ni yongs su smin to/ /'khor ba'i nyes pa ni shin tu rtogs so/ /dad pa phun sum tshogs pa ni legs par thob bo zhes dga' ba'i tshig tu
430b2(mdo sde): brjod do/ /de nas rgyal pos dbugs phyung ste smras pa/ bu gcig/ nga ni khyod kyi srog la dbang gi/ da song la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung zhig ces byas nas/ de rgyal
430b3(mdo sde): pos btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung na des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi
430b4(mdo sde): brtan par rigs nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams
430b5(mdo sde): cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha'
430b6(mdo sde): dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so
430b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par
431a1(mdo sde): smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong dad pas rab tu byung
431a2(mdo sde): ba rnams kyi mchog ni/ 'di lta ste/ wA ra NA si'i tshong dpon gyi bu gang gA pa 'di yin no/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan

431a6(mdo sde): bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag/ las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi
431a7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po
431b1(mdo sde): dang | khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/
431b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA ra NA si na rigs ngan dur khrod kyi rdzas la rku ba zhig gnas pa des re zhig na 'gron po
431b3(mdo sde): dag bcom ste rdzas thob pa dang / de'i phyi bzhin du mi rgod dag gis bsnyags pa las re zhig na dur khrod kyi phyogs shig tu rang sangs rgyas 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa de'i
431b4(mdo sde): mdun du rigs ngan dur khrod kyi rdzas la rku ba des rdzas bor nas de nyid du yib bo/ /de nas mi rgod de dag gis rang sangs rgyas mthong nas bong rdo dag gis kyang bsnun/ mtshon gyis
431b5(mdo sde): kyang btab/ mes kyang bsregs na 'on kyang de 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pas na/ de'i chos gos kyi gwa tsam yang bskyong ma nus so/ /de nas gang gi tshe/ mi rgod de dag ngal bar
431b6(mdo sde): gyur te/ phyir dong pa de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas de khad kyis ting nge 'dzin las langs so/ /de nas rigs ngan dur khrod kyi rdzas la rku ba des rang sangs rgyas de la bshos gsol nas smon
431b7(mdo sde): lam btab ba/ bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig/ 'di ltar gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa de bzhin du bdag kyang gang dang / gang du skyes pa de dang / der gzhan

432a3(mdo sde): gA pa 'di yin no/ /gzhan yang / bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung ste/ des 'di tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum

432a6(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyer kyis de
432a7(mdo sde): ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //
432b1(mdo sde): sen ring zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded
432b2(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis

432b4(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzigs cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams

432b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa des/ bram ze ma tha re'i bu mo shA ri zhes bya ba thob nas gang gi tshe shA ri'i ltor shA ri'i bu zhugs pa de'i tshe bud med de ming po sen ring dang / gzhung gi brgyab
432b7(mdo sde): na ming po chad pa la thug par byed do/ /de nas sen ring gis blo skyes pa/ 'di'i ltor sems can bsod nams che bar grags pa zhig gis nying mtshams sbyar ba 'dra ste/ de'i mthu
433a1(mdo sde): yin gyi/ ma la/ bdag gis snga nas phyogs 'ga' zhig la brten par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas sen ring lho phyogs su song nas bstan chos mang po bslabs so//
433a2(mdo sde): de nas re zhig nas mthar gyis shA ri'i bu btsas te/ des lo bcu drug lon na dbang po'i brda sprod pa lobs nas gzhung gis rtsod pa thams cad tshar bcad do/ /de nas de mthar gyis
433a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de nas re zhig na kun tu rgyu sen ring gis mu stegs pa de dag thams cad tsha bos tshar bcad nas/ da ltar dge sbyong gau ta
433a4(mdo sde): ma'i slob mar khas blangs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang shas cher de chad pa'i 'du shes skyes la bstan chos thams cad la yang mu thug pa med pa'i 'du shes skyes so/ /

433a6(mdo sde): ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston to/ /shA ri'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na/ bsil yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yo ba cing 'dug go /de nas

433b1(mdo sde): te chos ston pa dang / shA ri'i bu yang bsil yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yo ba cing 'dug ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye/ gau
433b2(mdo sde): ta ma/ bdag ni thams cad mi 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me'i cha lugs can gyi bu/ bdag ni thams cad mi 'dod do zhes lta ba gang yin pa 'di yang khyod mi 'dod
433b3(mdo sde): dam/ kyai/ gau ta ma/ bdag ni thams cad mi 'tshal lo zhes bgyi ba'i lta ba gang lags pa 'di yang bdag mi 'tshal lo/ /me'i cha lugs can gyi bu/ 'o na ni khyed de ltar shes shing de
433b4(mdo sde): ltar lta bar gyur na/ lta ba 'di yang spangs pa dang / bor ba dang / bsal bar 'gyur la lta ba gzhan yang nyid mtshams sbyor ba med pa dang / len pa med pa dang / 'byung ba med par

433b7(mdo sde): yang de ltar lta zhing de skad smra la/ khyod kyang de skad smra bas na khyod kyang de kho na dang 'dra'o/ /me'i cha lugs can gyi bu dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze su yang rung ste/ lta ba de nges par spong la

434a2(mdo sde): te| gsum gang zhe na/ me'i cha lugs can gyi bu/ 'di na kha cig ni bdag ni thams cad mi 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra'o/ /gzhan yang / 'di ni kha cig ni bdag ni thams

434a7(mdo sde): dang / nye bar len pa dang / lhag par zhen par 'gyur ro/ /me'i cha lugs can gyi bu/ de la bdag ni thams cad mi 'dod do zhes de ltar lta ba gang yin pa'i lta ba de ni kun tu

435a1(mdo sde): tu 'dod chags par mi 'gyur ro/ /kun tu zhe sdang ba med par 'gyur gyi/ kun tu zhe sdang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /kun tu gti mug pa med par 'gyur gyi/ kun tu gti

435a4(mdo sde): pa'i nyan thos ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa slob par byed de/ gal te bdag thams cad 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra na ni bdag ni thams cad mi 'dod
435a5(mdo sde): do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba gang yin pa dang / bdag ni gcig ni 'dod la gcig ni mi 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba gang yin pa de gnyis dang bdag
435a6(mdo sde): 'gyed par 'gyur ro/ /'gyed par gyur na rtsod par 'gyur ro/ /rtsod par gyur na rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ 'gyed pa dang bcas pa dang / rtsod pa dang bcas
435a7(mdo sde): pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang bcas par yang dag par mthong nas/ lta ba de yang spong la lta ba gzhan yang mi len to/ /de ltar na lta ba de yang spong ba dang / dor ba dang / sel bar 'gyur
435b1(mdo sde): la/ lta ba gzhan yang nying mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur/ nye bar len par mi 'gyur/ nye bar len par mi 'gyur/ 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de la thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par slob par
435b2(mdo sde): byed de/ gal te bdag thams cad mi 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra na ni/ bdag ni thams cad 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba gang yin pa dang / bdag ni gcig ni
